41001031	Yesusaar kokal theedayse kosa aanin yedayse koam ki dhaasade. Bishin occhayno koam konin garenka galan baxan kena ko yedade.
41001032	Hayn wavayse peenin sootenka, eeno hajadhaana eenabee beeronin yedaana eena wulbeam Yesuskal bavate nivan ko yedade.
41001033	Katamante dohoono eeno wulaar mayante bukayse ko dahade.
41001034	Yesusaar waana waana hajimoka yedadhon thoothin eenam ki pacchade. Thoothin eendaraar beeronam ki bulade. Beeronaar hay kinin dohonam kenin dhesenna kiam kenin giyoamadettsi ki marade.
41001035	Yesus peen sedhima seddhiman dhaabhayse eedinin qolmon raqinte yivayse Barjoam ki miskade.
41001036	Simoonbee kimbesana kinka dahaana eenabe kiam zagate ke yivade.
41001037	Kiam kenin haapenkaar, "Eeno wul haam zaga ko zage" kina ke hamade.
41001038	Yesusaar "Inin nivoono Barjosa upsinam giyota konin dohonna, igina theedin dahaana gurdanar inin giyoadettsi wo yive" kena ki hamade.
41001039	Ayiwd eensa bukin raqintear Barjosa upsinam giyada beeronam eendara bulada Galila peen wulir yaayte ki dahade.
41001040	Eedi kalaa lamth burqoka dahaa Yesuskal hatte kina kumpurdhayse, "Ha nashidianna, iam pacchana damaada dame" hamayse kiam ki miskade.
41001041	Yesusaar kina burqadhayse yisa aaninam kidar wodayse, "Haam pacchana nashayda nashe, paashaa" kina ki hamade.
41001042	Saanawa easa lamthin burqono kiam konin garenka ki paashade.
41001043	-
41001044	Yesus eam yinin yittsenka, "Hanin paashonam eedi haynaar hanin giyoamadettsi mete hasaam gishaa. Ko dahaannaar, yivayse hasa bishinam gudulana dhahaa. Eennaar hanin paashoono tarja konin maatoadettsi Museyn giyon Barjona machadhen marshanam imaa" hamayse upsi wocchika kina giyayse saanawa ki kiam yittsade.
41001045	Ko dahaannaar kidi kikala utanka een wulna giyan ki yedade. Ogonante Yesus may katamandar ardano kiam ko bashade. Ogona eenin qolmon darante daan ki yedade. Raqin wulraar eeno kalan koda nive.
41002001	Rooro likkasa budonte, pir Yesus Qipirnaahoom katamandar maatate ki nivade; ogote oonisa iir ardayse kinin dohoono ko qansimade.
41002002	Thoothino eeno Yesuskal nivayse ooninam thoothayse mayanin kena tokenka yekka ko bukade; kidiar Barjosa upsinam kena giyte ki dahade.
41002003	Eedi oydi waani hajimonka malgimaa eedi kalaam haaqaka Yesuskal bavate ke nivade.
41002004	Eensa thoothamonka dhaabhoono kidar eam arsana kenin bashadhenka, ooninsa illinam kottsayse Yesusin raqa dahaadar eam haaqan kenin bavate nivonka ke arsade.
41002005	Yesusaar kidar woylamin kenin qajonam shedayse hajimon eana yi giyna: "Inaane, hasa seesono hana gardhidine" ki hamade.
41002006	Musesa yigginam dhettsaynasa waani waani eena ogote dooqayse ke dahade. Kediar woylamka qaabayse,
41002007	"Ea kaa hamin ki yin giye? Barjo maato ki qaabaaw? Eedisa seesoam garana damea Barjo bishkalanka ab hayne?" hamayse ke qaabade.
41002008	Saanawaar Yesus woylaminka kenin qaabonam manpasinka yisa dhesayse kena yin ki giyade: "Yesa woylaminka yin harrnee qaabe?
41002009	Hajimonka malgimaa eana, 'Hasa seesonam hana gardhidine' hamara, 'Dhaabhayse haam baadhon haaqanam hanti bavate yivaa' hamayse giyara hamaane likkaa?
41002010	Ko dahaannaar i Eedi Naasina peendar eedina seesonam garana hayamo isa konin dohonam yenin dhesoadettsi yeam ko zaske" hamayse hajimonka malgimaa eaka
41002011	"Inta hana ida giye: Dhaabhayse haam baadhon haaqanam hanka bavate hasa oonindar yivaa" kina ki hamade.
41002012	Hajimonka malgimaa ea dhaabhayse saanawa kiam baadhon haaqanam bavate een wulsa birandar ki utade. Ogonante eeno wul targadhayse, "Ko yer yin hamonam ena kala hattear haapootone" hamaate Barjoam ko gobshade.
41002013	Yesus pir bazin apondar ki yivade. Ogotear eeno wul kalan ko nivaysaka koam dhettsan ki yedade.
41002014	Raqin ogora dhaabhate kinin yivenka, Ilpoos naasa Lewi gibirin kinin kacchen raqinte dooqayse ki daaka kiam haapayse, "Isa paanan nivaa" kina ki hamade. Kidiar dhaabhayse kisa paananka ki yivade.
41002015	Ogosa budonte Yesus Lewi ooninte kummandar dooqayse ki daaka thoothino eeno kisa paanan nivite konin dohonna, eensaar waani gibirin kacchayna eenabee Musesa yigginam toolimina eenabe Yesusbee kisa paanan yivayna eenabekal kummandar ke dooqade.
41002016	Musesa yigginam dhettsayna Parisa eena gibirin kacchayna eenabee Musesa yigginam toolimina eenabesana kinka kinin kummenka Yesusam haapayse, kisa paanan yivayna eenana "Eena cubbona gibirin kacchaynabee igina seeson eenabesana kinka kinin kummenbee wucenbe harrnane?" hamayse keam ke oysade.
41002017	Yesus yin kenin giyenam qansayse, "Hajadhaanaam akkimi koda zaske; payyanaam akkimi zaskehe. Inta seeson eena Barjodar kenin maatoadettsi keam eelota i nivade; tipana eenaam eelota nivaatine" kena ki hamade.
41002018	Shivea Wannissa paanan yivayna eenabee Parisa eenabe itsima keda qoome. Eeno Yesuskal nivayse, "Wannisbee Parisa eenabesa paanan yivayna eena itsima kenin qoomenka, hasa paanan yivayna eena itsima kenin qoomimino harrnane?" kina ke hamade.
41002019	Yesusaar kena yin ki giyade: "Uutaa kembesana kinka ki daaka, gaydonna nivaana eenaam itsima qooma keam zaska ko zasko? Uutaa kembete ki daaka itsima keam qooma zaskehe.
41002020	Ko dahaannaar uutaanin kekalanka edadhayno woda niva ko nive; ogo wodanka ko hanna itsima keda qoome.
41002021	"Apala gecchoadar apala haaleam lashea eedi qolehe. Yin ki haydianna, apala haalea apala gecchoam yinka hattsate kinin tiyenna, apala gecchoasa haviminoar kalon koda worke.
41002022	Jambin gecchonsa iinte zia haali shabhea eedi qolehe. Shabhadhidianna ziano hallo jambinam bhattsa ko bhattse; zianoar layma ko layme; jambinoar bhaqayse gemma ko gemme. Ogona zian haalin shabhota jambi haali koda zaske" kena ki hamade.
41002023	Ayiwd eensa ukunsen rooroaka Yesus gazgon ushon haaminsa shaarinka kinin yivenka, kisa paanan yivayna eena yivada gazgon tishanam shaaban ke yedade.
41002024	Parisa eenaar "Shedaa! Ukunsen rooroaka zaskimon waadimanam hasa paanan yivayna harrna ke waadadhe?" kina ke hamade.
41002025	Kidiar "Ena Bitaa Dawt kimbete dahaana eenabesana daaqardhayse kenin gaalen wodanka kinin hayonam kala hattear yedi nabbabeete?
41002026	Abiyatar gudullasa gebhaa kinin dohon wodanka, Dawt Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayante ardayse gudullakalanka een abinin itsimon Barjosa birante wodadhon balashanam yina itsayse kimbete dohon eenna kinin imonam yedi nabbabeete?" kena ki hamade.
41002027	Tapir, "Ukunsen rooroa eedina ki wodadhade, eedi ukunsen rooroana wodadhadehe.
41002028	Ogona inta Eedi Naas ukunsen rooroasaar Imbane" kena ki hamade.
41003001	Yesus taar Ayiwd eensa bukin raqinte ki ardade; raqin ogotear aaninsa woboa eedi kala ki dahade.
41003002	Yesusam bersana zagayse "Ukunsen rooroaka eam paccho ki dew?" hamayse kiam shedite ke dahade.
41003003	Yesus aaninsa woboa eana "Dhaabhayse eensa shaarinte woyaa" ki hamade.
41003004	Ogora kena "Musesa yiggino ukunsen rooroaka wo waadadhe konin giyoono payya yermoo? Siya yeru? Eediam wonin dhacchoadettsimoo? Deesoadettsine?" hamayse keam ki oysade. Kediar lay ke hamade.
41003005	Kesa woylaminin duudonam haapayse kedar yinin dhagadhonka yisa gasambar dohon een wulam aapi siyaka shedayse eana "Antaam hasa pishkaa" ki hamade. Ear yisa antaam ki pishkaysaka, anta ki paashade.
41003006	Parisa eenaar utayse, "Hamin hayayse wo kiam deeso?" hamayse saanawa Bitaa Herodissa bitamonam nashayna eenabete ke dhalqade.
41003007	Yesusaar yisa paanan yivaynabete kinka agaa raqaara dhaabhayse Galila bazindar ki yivade; Galila peera thoothino eenoar kisa paanan ko yivade.
41003008	Gebhi yer kinin waadadhon wulam qansayse thoothino eeno Yiwdabee, Yerusaalembee, Edomiyasbee, Yordaanoos baynsa saabarbera ko nivade; pir Thiroos katamarabee, Sidoona katamarabee, kesa gasan peerabe thoothino eeno kikal ko nivade.
41003009	Eeno kattsi konin thoothonna kiam konin kupoamadettsi kisa paanan yivaynana "Bazindara sagadhen gonngalanam ikal thettsayse woysee" ki hamade.
41003010	Thoothin eenaam burqora kinin pacchonna, hajadhoono eeno wul kiam kaamota kidar koda tuure.
41003011	Beerona kiam kenin haapenka, kisa birante dhambayse, "Ya Barjo Naasine" hante ke ilatade.
41003012	Kidiar hay kinin dohonam kenin giyoamadettsi upsi wocchika keam ki marade.
41003013	Yesus dhukandar utayse yinin zagaana eenaam yidar ki eelade; kediar kalan ke nivade.
41003014	-
41003015	Kimbesana kinka kenin doadettsibee Barjosa upsinam eenna kenin giyoadettsi keam yittsotabe tabhi lamaana eenaam kamayse beeronam eendara kenin bulea hayamo kena ki imade. Pir "Tarjamonnante Yittsadhaana" hamayse kena naabe ki wodade.
41003016	Kinin kamaana tabhi lamaana eena kinane: Simoon naabenam Bhethiroos hamayse ki wodade;
41003017	Zabdoos naana lamaana Yayqoobbee Wannisbena "Bovanerges" hamayse ki wodade (Bovanerges hambhoono guganatin naana hamintane.);
41003018	Indiriasbee, Pilbhoosbee, Bartelemoosbee, Maatoosbee, Toomaasebee, Ilpoos naasa Yayqoobbee, Taadoosbee, peen yinnonna bish qaabea Simoonbee,
41003019	Yesusam dembhinna saskate imea Asqoronto peen ea Yiwdabene.
41003020	Oonintear kinin ardenka, kisa paanan yivaynabete galan itsan kenin bashadhenka yekka pir thoothino eeno kikal ko bukade.
41003021	Kisa zelen eenaar ogoam qansayse kanka "Bardhidine" hamayse kiam entsanna ke nivade.
41003022	Yerusaalemra nivaana Musesa yigginam dhettsayna eena "Bevelzebul kidar dahade" pir, "Beeronaam kinin bulayno beeronasa hayoa kantankane" hamayse giyte ke dahade.
41003023	Yesus eenaam yikal eelayse kamsika kena yin ki giyade: "Seethaan Seethaanam hamin ki bulana dame?
41003024	Bit kalaa eena kikala edimayse kinka bit kalaa eed maatayse daana damehe.
41003025	Oonin kallon eena kinka gemmayse kikala edimidi ke hanna, keeda kinka payyamoka daana damehe.
41003026	Seethaanaar kinka kiam jibbayse edimidi ki hanna, dhamba ki dhambe; woyana damehe.
41003027	"Ogodettsi birayse kantanka dahaa eam yedate dhaxima ooninte kisa ardayse koymonam buurana eedi hayyear damehe. Ogona kantanka dahaa eam yedate yinin dhaxonsa budonte, kida kisa ooninam buure.
41003028	"Inta yena gon ida giye: Eensa seesonbee iirimen wulbeam kena gardha ko gardhe.
41003029	Ko dahaannaar Manpas Gazanam iirea ea rooro wul lay seesonsa baza kidar daane; hamin ko dahaannaar kisa seesonam kina gardhehe" ki hamade.
41003030	Yesus yin kinin giyoono "Beero kidar daane" kenin hamonnane.
41003031	Yesussa indanbee kisa indanaanabe kikal ke nivade; kediar mayante woyayse eedi kidar yittsayse kiam ke elsade.
41003032	Yesuskal dooqoono thoothino eeno kina "Shedaa! Handabee handanaanabe mayante woyayse haam keda zage" ke hamade.
41003033	Yesusaar maasayse "Inda kodi hayne? Indanaana kedi haybene?" kena ki hamade.
41003034	Kalan dooqon eenaam shedayse, "Marrato! Indabee indanaanabe kinane.
41003035	Barjosa bhocchinam ee hamayse waadadhayna wul isa indabee indanaanabe kedi iginane" hamayse kena ki maasade.
41004001	Yesus pir bazinsa aponte eenaam dhettsan ki yedade. Kattsi thoothino eeno kikal nivayse konin bukonna, bazindara sagadhen gonngalansa iinte ardayse ki dooqade. Eeno wul bazinsa gasante ko dahade.
41004002	Kamsikaar thoothi yer keam dhettsite ki dahade. Keam yinin dhettsenkaar kena yin ki giyade:
41004003	-
41004004	"Marrato! Eedi kalaa haaminte yisa bheeta yiithota ki utade. Bheetan kinin yiithenka, bheetano waani goyn aponte ko wavaysaka aptina nivayse ke itsade.
41004005	Waani bheetanoar thoothi peenin qolmon haachandar ko wavade. Pee thoothinin qolmonna saanawa ko baqalade.
41004006	Haynin utayse oydhenkaar, ko halatade; caaciyn yittsaamonna ko wocchade.
41004007	Waani bheetanoar ukumbhansa shaarinte ko wavade. Ukumbhanoar gebhayse baqalon bheetanam konin ishkonna, aapi ushima ko shidhade.
41004008	Waani bheetano peen payyandar ko wavade. Gebhaysear aapi ko ushade; waa kisa aapi eedi kalaa kaysa apo tabhi, waa kisa pir aapi eedi makkam kaysa, waa kisa pir aapi eedi dong kaysa ke ushade.
41004009	"Keeda qansen qaamiysa dahaa ki qanse" kena ki hamade.
41004010	Yesus yimal ki daaka, kalan theedaana eenabee kisa paanan yivayna tabhi lamaana eenabe kinka dahayse kena kinin giyon kamsin goynsa kiam ke oysade.
41004011	Yesusaar, "Yena Barjo bitamonsa aachin dhalqinam yenin dhesoadettsi imbhidine; waani eenna ko hanna,
41004012	'Sheda ke shede, kenin shedonam kenin haapoamadettsi, qansa ke qanse, kenin qansonam kenin bhocchoamadettsi, Barjodar kenin maatoamadettsi, kesa seesonoar kena ko shidhe konin hambhoamadettsi' yer wulam kena kamsika koda giidhe" kena ki hamade.
41004013	Yesusaar kena yin ki giyade: "Kamsin ogoam dhesattenu? Ta yin ko hanna, yedi keeda kamsin wulam hamin hayaysee dheso?
41004014	Bheetan yiithea agaa Barjosa upsinam kida yiithe.
41004015	Upsinoar yiithadhoono goyn aponte wovoono konone: Barjosa upsinam kenin qansen wodanka Seethaan saana nivayse kesa woylaminte yiithadhon Barjosa upsinam kekalanka kida tiye.
41004016	Tapir peen haachandar yiithadhaana bheetana Barjosa upsinam qansayse saanawa wozanka tiyayna eenane.
41004017	Eena igina caaci kenin yittsaamonna, kesa woyano likka wodanane; Barjosa upsinna gaale way oytaydha kedar konin yeskenka saanawa keda gare.
41004018	Ukumbhansa shaarinte yiithadhaana bheetana igina Barjosa upsinam qansayna eenane.
41004019	Peen kosa bhocchinbee, wodimmakkon anngarmanbee, thoothi yersa anngarmanbeka Barjosa upsino kenin qansoono kesa woylaminte sun ishkimayse aapi ushima koda shidhe.
41004020	Peen payyandar wavaana bheetana Barjosa upsinam qansayse bhocchika tiyayna eena, antina eedi kalaa kaysa apo tabhi, waaniar eedi makkam kaysa, waaniar eedi dong kaysa aapi ushayna eenane" ki hamade.
41004021	Yesus kena yin ki giyade: "Shaakanam shashkayse yer daran guupa ko guupadho? Way algan demente ko wodadho? Dheg hamon raqindartayu konin wodadhayno?
41004022	Ogona aachimayse may maatima, aachadhaysakaar dhesimima shidhehe.
41004023	Ta keeda qansen qaamiysa dahaa ki qanse" ki hamade.
41004024	Pir Yesus kena yin ki giyade: "Yenin qansen yerinam payya hayayse edee. Yenin kahaa shaaqaka yenaar kaadha ko kaadhe; ogoraar sagi yena kaadha ko kaadhe.
41004025	Yisa dahaana kisa dohondar kina imbha ko imbhe; yisa qolmakalanka kisa dohonam kikala tiidha ko tiidhe" kena ki hamade.
41004026	Yesus yin ki giyade: "Barjosa bitamono eedi bheeta yiitheadettsine.
41004027	Ea sootinka raata ki raate; rooronka dhaabha ki dhaabhe; hamin konin dohonam ki dhesima bheetano koda baqale; gebhanaar koda gebhe.
41004028	Peeno yinti birayse baqalin koda baqalse; baqalloar gebhayse pudha ko pudhe; yinin pudhonsa budonte aapi koda wode.
41004029	Aapinin ushonsa budobar patadhen wodanin yeskonna, ea saanawa halpan tiyate patan kida yede" ki hamade.
41004030	Yesus yin ki giyade: "Barjosa bitamonam yer harka wo yeekinso? Way yer harka wo koam kamso?
41004031	Saliithasa aapidettsine; kodiar peendar koam yiithadhen wodanka peendar dahaana bheetana wuldara likkane.
41004032	Peendar konin yiithadhon wodanka baqalayse konin gebhenka, peendar dahaana haaqana wuldara gebhate koda bashe; aptinaar nivayse kosa shiponsa iinte antindar ooni kenin woysoadettsi kattsi antino koda gebhe" ki hamade.
41004033	Yesusaar zarsinin bhocchana dameaka yekka kinadettsina thoothina kamsinaka Barjosa upsinam kena kida giye.
41004034	Kamsi qolma kena giyehe; ko dahaannaar kimbesana yimal kenin dehenka, kamsinasa bulin goyn wulam yisa paanan yivayna eenana kida giye.
41004035	Rooroa agaaka peen sootima shaakinan Yesus yisa paanan yivaynana "Bazinsa saabar wo sage" kena ki hamade.
41004036	Kisa paanan yivayna eenaar thoothin zarsin garayse Yesusin gidir dohon bazindara sagadhen gonngalandar dooqayse yinka kiam tiyate ke yivade; waaniar gonngalana bazindar kimbesana kinka ke dahade.
41004037	Gembho wurano dhaabhayse noqono gonngalanka konin thoothenka yekka wurano bazindar dohon gonngalanam koda juge.
41004038	Ogo wodanka Yesus bazindara sagadhen gonngalansa budonte qoocante yisa yer wodayse raatayse ki dahade. Kisa paanan yivayna kiam dhaasayse, "Woam Dhettsea, wonin kayenka ya lay ha hamo?" kina ke hamade.
41004039	Kidiar dhaabhayse wuranam ki bitade; bazinkaar "Lay! Shoan garaa!" ki hamade. Wuranoar jibarshan ko garade; bazinoar kalon lay ko hamade.
41004040	Yesusaar "Yin yenin kurtumbhayno hare? Kinaka yekka idar woylam yenin qajea yesa qolaaw?" kena ki hamade.
41004041	Kediar kattsi kurtumbhayse, "Wuranbee bazinbe yininna ee hamea kaa kidi hayne?" kinka kikal ke hamade.
41005001	Kediar bazinsa saabar Gerasenon peendar ke nivade.
41005002	Yesus bazindara sagadhen gonngalara kinin utenka, eedi beeroyn yedaa duukin raqira utayse daran ki keerade.
41005003	Ea agaasa dayntano duukin raqintene; eedi hayyear yedate kiam sansalaka dhaxana damehe.
41005004	Thoothi rooro roonte dhaxadhen sansalanbee zawnbeka kiam koda dhaxadhe. Ko dahaannaar sansalanbee roon zawnbeam qunthate kida dhabe; ogonante kiam yedana damea eedi qolehe.
41005005	Rooro wul sootinbee rooronbe duukin raqintebee dhukanbedar dahayse kida ilate, yisa bishinamaar seeninka kida taxe.
41005006	Kidiar Yesusam pegeka haapayse, gobaka kalan hatte kumpurdhayse kina ki goodimade.
41005007	Upsin yisa dheg hayayse ilataate "Wuldara sagea Barjosa Naasa Yesuso, hambesana isa dohoono hare? Iam hanin galshoamadettsi Barjosa naabenka inta haam maridine" ki hamade.
41005008	Yin kinin giyoono Yesus "Ya beeroa, ea kaara utaa!" kanka hamite kinin dohonnane.
41005009	Yesusaar "Hasa nammo hayne?" hamayse kiam ki oysade. Kidiar "Thoothi wonin dohonna isa nammo Legoonne" hamayse kina ki giyade.
41005010	Keam ko peera oytate kinin yittsoamadettsi kiam kattsi ki miskade.
41005011	Raqin ogote laasadar thoothi wurkupa gishadhayna kenin dohonna,
41005012	beerona "Wurkupana iginadar wonin ardoadettsi woam yittsaa" hamayse kiam ke miskade.
41005013	Yesusaar "Yedi yivee" kena ki hamade; beeronaar eadara utayse wurkupanadar yivayse ke ardade. Shii lamaaddhana wurkupanaar bazinsa aponte dahayse laasandara diirimayse bazinte ke itsadhade.
41005014	Wurkupanaam gishayna eenaar gobate yivayse ogo yinin haaponam katamanbee gurdan eenbena kenin giyenka, eenoar har konin dohon shedota ko utade.
41005015	Yesuskal kenin nivenka, Legoon hambhea beeronin yedaa easa gemmon mesken paashaysaka apala qaadhayse dooqayse ki daaka kiam haapayse ke kurtumbhade.
41005016	Ogoam haapaana eenaar beeronin yedaa ea goynbee wurkupanadar yeskonbeam eenna ke giyade.
41005017	Eenoar Yesuska "Wosa peera utaa" hamayse kiam miskan ko yedade.
41005018	Yesus bazindara sagadhen gonngalante kinin ardenka, beeronin yedaa ea "Hambesana doota i yive" hamayse kiam ki miskade.
41005019	Ko dahaannaar Yesus kina ee hamadehe. "Oonin hannondar yivayse Barjo hamin dohon gebhi yer hana kinin waadadhonbee hamin hayayse haam kinin pacchonbeam hasa oonin eenana giyaa" kina ki hamade.
41005020	Ear yivayse Yesus hamin dohon gebhi yer kina kinin waadadhonam Tabhi Katamana hambhen peente giyan ki yedade; kinin giyenka qansoono eeno wul targadhidine.
41005021	Yesusaar lansi bazindara sagadhen gonngalante dooqayse bazinsa saabar kinin sagonsa budonte, thoothi eedi kikal nivayse ko bukade; kidiar bazinsa aponte ki dahade.
41005022	Ayiwd eensa bukin raqinam wottsayna eenasa eedi kalaa Yayroos hambhea Yesuskal ki nivade. Yesusam kinin haapenkaar kisa roon demente dhambayse,
41005023	"Naano isa likkono hajadhayse diyaba koda haye. Bannzo! Paashayse sadaka konin doadettsi nivayse hasa aaninam kosa bishindar wodaa" hamayse kattsi kiam ki miskade.
41005024	Yesusaar eabete kinka ki yivade; thoothino eenoar Yesussa paanan kupimaate koda yive.
41005025	Layme hajimoka leve tabhi lamaa hajadhayse kappoono maa kallo ko dahade.
41005026	Kodiar thoothin dheeshan imayna eenasa aaninte gaalite ko dahade; dheeshanna yisa dohon koymon wulam imate konin macchonsa budonte, burqono waandar kosa gebhaate ko yivade, kodi paashadehe.
41005027	-
41005028	Kodiar Yesussa eenin giyen qansayse, "Apalan kisa hattear kaamidi i hanna, inta paashayda paashe" hamayse thoothin eensa shaarinka kisa budobar nivayse apalanam ko kaamade.
41005029	Laymayno zombhino kosa saanawa ko woyade; yisa burqora konin paashoono waante kona dhesimidine.
41005030	Yesusaar pacchen kantan yikala utonam saanawa dhesayse eensa shaarinte wal hamayse, "Isa apalanam kaamaa hayne?" hamayse ki oysade.
41005031	Kisa paanan yivayna eenaar "Thoothino eeno kupimite konin yivenam ya haapayse, 'Iam kaamaa hayne?' hamaysea oyso?" kina ke hamade.
41005032	Ogoam hayaa hay kinin dohon dhesota budoka wal ki hamade.
41005033	Edonoar yinin paashonam konin dhesenna kurtumbheka gibazaate hatte, Yesussa demente dhambayse, yidar yeskon wulsa goninam kina ko giyade.
41005034	Kidiar "Isa naano, idar woylamin hanin qajoono haam ko pacchade. Nagaya yivaa; hasa gaaleraar ukunsaa" kona ki hamade.
41005035	Kidiar ogoam giyte ki daaka, Ayiwd eensa bukin raqinam wottsea Yayroos oonira eedi nivayse, "Hasa naano diydine; ta keeda Dhettseam harrnaa galshe?" kina ke hamade.
41005036	Yesusaar eenin kina giyonam qansayse bukin raqinam wottseana, "Kurtumbhaabhode! Idar bish woylam qajaa" kina ki hamade.
41005037	Bhethiroosbee, Yayqoobbee, Yayqoobsa kana Wannisbedara ab eedi hayyear kisa paananka easa oonindar ke yive zagadehe.
41005038	Bukin raqinam wottsea easa ooninte kenin nivenka, Yesus eeno ilatayse konin waajenbee eepenbeam ki haapade.
41005039	Oonintear ardayse, "Harrnee ilatayse eepe? Naano raata ko raatade, diyadehe" kena ki hamade.
41005040	Eenoar kiam ko hancade. Yesusaar een wulam mayanka bulayse naansa imbaabee, indanbee, kimbesana kinka dahaana eenabeam yikal entsayse naanin raqin dohonte ki ardade.
41005041	Naansa aanin yedayse, "Thaalitaa quumi!" kona ki hamade; ogosa bulino "Naano, ya dhaabhaa! hanka ida hame" hamintane.
41005042	Naanoar saanawa dhaabhate woyayse osbee orabe yaayan ko yedade. Kodiar tabhi lamaa leve naasine. Eenoar gebhi ko targadhade.
41005043	Yesus yinin waadadhonam eedi hayyear dhesoamadettsi upsi wocchika kena giyayse, "Gala kona imee" kena ki hamade.
41006001	Yesus raqin ogora dhaabhayse yinin gebhon peendar ki yivade; kisa paanan yivayna eenaar kimbesana kinka ke yivade.
41006002	Ukunsen rooroaka Ayiwd eensa bukin raqinte eenam dhettsan ki yedade. Thoothino eenoar kisa dhalqinam qansayse gebhi ko targadhade. "Ea kaa yerin ko wulam hamora ki haapaa? Kina imbhoono pakalmakkono yer hare? Ogo yin tarshen yerinam kinin hayayno hamin dahaa goytikane?
41006003	Kaa haaqan qarsea Mayriyamsa naasatayu? Yayqoobbee, Yoosabee, Yiwdabee, Simoonbesa indanaasatayu? Kisa indanaana anzana wombesana kinka kote dahaanatayu?" hamayse kisa dhalqinam bagayse eeno tiyma ko garade.
41006004	Yesusaar "Barjokala qansayse eenna giyea kinin gobshadhimino peen een yinnonbee, muldhana yinnabee, oonin eena yinnabekal bishne" kena ki hamade.
41006005	Raqin ogote hajadhaana eena tokaana eenadar kidi aanin wodayse keam yinin pacchondara tarshea yer ab waadadhana damadehe.
41006006	Kinin giyenam gonne hamayse kenin tiyaamonna kidi targadhidine. Ogosa budonte, Yesus kesa gurdan gurdante yaayte Barjosa upsin eenna kida dhettse.
41006007	Yesus tabhi lamaana yisa paanan yivayna eenaam yikal eelayse, lama lamaa hayayse eendar keam yinin yittsenka, beeronaam eendara kenin bulea hayamo kena imayse,
41006008	"Yenin yivenka yenka haljo bish tiymate. Yer ab, gala ko hannaar, surba ko hannaar, korbhoka koymo yenka beveebhode.
41006009	Roonte yesa dunngurin arsee; shuraab lanso qaadheebhode.
41006010	Raqin hamotear eenkal yenin ardenka, birayse yeam chocchamon tiyaa ea ooninte arda ye hanna, raqin ogora yenin utenka yekka ogote dooqee.
41006011	Eenin yeam chocchamon tiymonbee yekal konin qansimonbe raqin ye hanna, ogora yenin utenka kedar tarja konin maatoadettsi yesa roondar dohon silalinam dinsee" hamayse kena ki giyade.
41006012	Kediar ogo raqira utayse eeno seeson waadimanam garayse Barjodar konin maatoadettsi eenna ke giyade.
41006013	Thoothi beeronin yedaana eenadara beeronam ke bulade; thoothi hajadhaana eenaamaar waqatika qadhada keam ke pacchade.
41006014	Yesussa naabeno raq wulir konin qansimonna, Bitaa Herodisaar qansidine. Waani waani eeno "Shivea Wannis diira dhaabhidine; ko wul tarshen waadiman wulam waadadhana kantan kinin haapoono ogokane" ke hamade.
41006015	Waani eenoar "Eeliasne" ko hamade; waani eenoar "Ena Barjokala qansayse eenna giyayna eenasa iira eedi kalaadettsine" ko hamade.
41006016	Bitaa Herodisaar ogoam qansayse, "Agaa qorcin ininsa taskaa Wannisne; kidi diira dhaabhidine" ki hamade.
41006017	-
41006018	Herodis iishima Pilbhoos geshon Herodiyadaam kinin keemonna, Wannis "Hambanaasa geshonam keema haam zaskehe" hamayse birayse kina giyte ki dahade. Ogona Herodis Herodiyada goynka kiam yettsate dhaxin ooninte ki dhaskade.
41006019	Ogona Herodiyada Wannisdar guula wodayse kiam dettsana konin zagenka kona agadehe.
41006020	Herodis Wannis tipabee gazabe eedi kinin dohonam kinin dhesonna, kina kurtumbhintaka kiam deesadhoamadettsi kida gishe. Kisa dhalqinamaar qansite thoothi qaabite kida gaale. Ko dahaannaar kisa dhalqinam wozaka kida qanse.
41006021	Bitaa Herodisin adhadhaa rooroayn gobshadhea sedhaaka, peen wottsayna eenabee, shii alaqanabee, Galila peente dahaana dhesimaana eenabena kumma ki ashkade; ogono wodano Herodiyadana agoonone.
41006022	Herodiyadasa naano kummandar dooqaana eenakal ardayse kesa birante yiigaate konin kirbenka, Bitaa Herodisbee kimbesana kinka dooqaana eenabeam ko wozisade. Bitaa Herodisaar naanna, "Iam hanin oyson yerinam hana imayda ime" ki hamade.
41006023	"Bitamon innonsa antin ko hannaar, ikal hanin misken wulam hana imayda ime" hamayse kona malla ki ardade.
41006024	Naanoar mayan utayse indankal "Hariy kalan misko?" ko hamade. Indanoar " 'Shivea Wannissa metenam taxate ina imaa' hamayse miskaa" ko hamade.
41006025	Naanoar saanawa bitaakal ardayse, "Shivea Wannissa metenam taxate sharqaka taaki saana ina hanin imoadettsi ida zage" hamayse ko kiam oysade.
41006026	Bitaar qaabenka kattsi yi ataakaar, kimbesana kinka kummandar dooqaana eenasa birante malla kona kinin ardonna, konin miskonam koam marota nashadehe.
41006027	Saanawa Bitaa Herodis poolisanasa kalaam Wannissa metenam taxate kinin bovoadettsi ki yittsade. Poolisaar dhaxin oonin yivayse Wannissa metenam ki taxade.
41006028	Kisa metea kinin taxaam sharqaka bavate hatte, naanna ki imade; naanoar indanna ko imade.
41006029	Wannissa paanan yivayna eenaar kisa dembhinam kenin qanson wodanka, nivayse kisa leesinam tiyate ke duukade.
41006030	Yesus yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaana eenaar Yesuskal nivate bukayse, kenin waadadhonbee eenaam kenin dhettsonbe wulam kina ke giyade.
41006031	Kidiar "Yedi yemal eediyn qolmon raqinte nivayse likka ukunsee" kena ki hamade. Yin kinin giyoono kekal nivayse maatayno eeno thoothi konin dohonna gala kummana wodayn kesa qolmonnane.
41006032	Bazindara sagadhen gonngalante ardayse raq eedinin qolma kalaate yimal bish ke yivade.
41006033	Kenin yivenka thoothino eeno keam haapayse konin dhesonna, kataman wulra dhaabhayse gobada saanawa keam birayse kekal ko bukade.
41006034	Yesusaar bazindara sagadhen gonngalara utayse thoothin eenam haapayse, gishea eediysa qolmina yaanadettsi konin dohonna, kona ki burqadhade; thoothi yerar koam dhettsan ki yedade.
41006035	Ogo wodanka peenin ibanonsa budonte, kisa paanan yivayna eena kikal nivayse, "Kono ranqo eedinin gidir qolminone; ta peenoar ibanidine.
41006036	Ogonante igina wosa gasante dahaana gurdanadar yivayse gala kenin shanoadettsi keam yittsaa" kina ke hamade.
41006037	Kidi kena maasayse "Yedi kenin itsen galan kena imee" ki hamade. Kediar "Yivayse birre mato lamaaka gala shanayse kenin itsoadettsi kena wo imo?" kina ke hamade.
41006038	Kidiar "Balasha meemayne yekal dahaana? Yivayse shedee" kena ki hamade. Kediar shedayse maatate hatte, "Balasha dongbee kaara lamaabene dahaana" kina ke hamade.
41006039	Yesusaar yisa paanan yivaynana "Een wulam shudhin caagindar kashate kashate dottsee" kena ki hamade.
41006040	Eeno eedi dong kaysabee eedi lamaa kaysa apo tabhibe maatayse ko dooqade.
41006041	Yesusaar balashana dongnabee kaarana lamaanabeam tiyayse, tura cecin shedayse Barjoam miskeka ki gobshade. Balashanamaar qunthayse yisa paanan yivayna eenana eenna kenin yeskisoadettsi ki imade; taar kaarana lamaanaam een wulna ki kashade.
41006042	Eeno wulaar itsayse ko mishade.
41006043	Kisa paanan yivayna balashanbee kaaranbesa itsadhaka shidhon dirmanam kenin dhaasoono sharqa tabhi lamaane.
41006044	Ogo balashanam itsaana eena anngina bish paydadhana shii dongne.
41006045	Ogora saanawa Yesus yisa paanan yivayna eenana "Inta eenam onnadar inin yittsenka, yedi bazindara sagadhen gonngalanka bazira sus Beetesayda katamandar iam birayse sagee" ki hamade.
41006046	Eenam yinin yittsonsa budobar Barjo misko dhukandar ki utade.
41006047	Peenin sootenka, bazindara sagadhayno gonngalano bazinsa gidinte ko dahade. Yesus kembesana gonngalante ardadehe; yimal peente ki dahade.
41006048	Kisa paanan yivayna eenaar bazindara sagadhen gonngalanka kenin yivenka, jibarro kesa birante dahayse keam yittsan konin maronna, kenin gaalenam ki haapade. Sootin peenin sedhamba hamenka, Yesus bazindar rooka tigate kekal nivite ki dahade; kesaar demeka yivota ki zagade.
41006049	Ko dahaannaar bazindar rooka tigate kekal kinin nivenka kiam haapayse meeshi wo haapade hamayse ke ilatade.
41006050	Kedi wul kiam kenin haapenka kattsi targadhayse ke gibazade. Kidiar saanawa "Hay! Intane; kurtumbheebhode" kena ki hamade.
41006051	Kidiar bazindara sagadhen gonngalante kekal ki ardade. Ogo wodanka wurano jibarshan ko garade; kediar gebhi ke targadhade.
41006052	Ogonoar woylamin kesa duudonna, Yesus balashan keam kinin kunsenka tarshen waadimanam kinin waadadhonam kedi bhocchadehe.
41006053	Yesusbee kisa paanan yivayna eenabe bazinam sagayse Gensareth peendar ke yivade; bazindara sagadhen gonngalanamaar bazinsa gasante ke dhaxade.
41006054	Bazindara sagadhen gonngalara kenin utenka, eeno saanawa Yesus kinin dohonam ko dhesade.
41006055	Eenoar peen ogo wuldar gobaka yivayse Yesusin dohon raqindar hajadhaana eenaam haaqaka bavate kikal nivan ko yedade.
41006056	Kinin yiven raqin wul gidir gurdante ko hannaar, katamante ko hannaar, hajadhaana eenaam bukin raqindar bavate nivayse koda wode. Kediar Yesusna "Hasa apalansa nukin hattear wo kaame" hamayse kiam keda miske. Kisa apalansa nukinam kaamaana eena wul hajimora paashite ke dahade.
41007001	Yerusaalem katamara Parisa eenabee Musesa yigginam dhettsayna eenasa waanibe Yesuskal nivayse ke bukade.
41007002	Kisa paanan yivayna eenasa waani waani eena aaninsa dakanka galan kenin itsenka ke haapade. "Aaninsa dakanka" hambhoono goyno kosa aanin shiidhima kenin itsennane ko hambhade.
41007003	Parisa eenabee Ayiwd eenabe wul ena eykena dambinam toolana yisa aaninam payya shiidhima gala itsehe.
41007004	Kedi gabara yi maatanna shiidhima gala itsehe; pir yinin wucen sharqanbee, daanbee, galan yinin itsen sharqanbeam, [yinin wodhen algan raqinamaar] kenin shivendettsi, abaar dambi hayayse toolana kenin buloono yer thoothine dohoono.
41007005	Parisa eenabee Musesa yigginam dhettsayna eenabe "Hasa paanan yivayna eena eykena dambinam kenin toolimino harrnane? Yisa aaninam shiidhima galan keda itse" hamayse kiam ke oysade.
41007006	Kidi kena yin ki giyade: "Ena Barjokala qansayse eenna giyea Isias Barjoyn giyonam, 'Kina eena yisa aponka bish iam keda gobshe, woylammo kesa ikalanka kattsi pegadhidine.
41007007	Eenin bulon dambinam Barjoyn imaa yiggidettsi hayayse eenaam dhettsaate sun guuri ina keda goodime' hamayse ye kina maltina eena goynam gon ki giyade.
41007008	Yedi Barjoyn giyonam garayse eenin bulon dambinam yeda toole" ki hamade.
41007009	Tapir kena yin ki giyade: "Yennon dambinam toolota Barjoyn giyonam bagayse ye garade.
41007010	Muse yi giyna: 'Hambabee handabeam gobshaa' pir, 'Imbaabee indanbeam iirea ki deesadhe' ki hamade.
41007011	Yedi eedi imbabee indabena yinin kelshen yer wulam kena 'Yeam inin kelshen yerin wulam inta Barjona iminto hayayse ida ime' ki hamanna,
41007012	os birante imbaabee indanbeam yer harka ko hannaar kinin kelshoamadettsi yeda mare.
41007013	Ogonante yedi yesa dambinam toolota Barjoyn giyonam yeda gare; ogodettsiar thoothi yer yeda waadadhe" hamayse kena ki giyade.
41007014	Pir Yesus eenaam yikal eelayse, "Yedi wul inin giyenam qansee, ogoam payya hayayse bhocchee.
41007015	Eediam minngisayno eessa iira utaynone; mayara iinte arden yerinsa kala hattear eediam minngisea qolehe.
41007016	[Qansen qaamiysa dahaa ki qanse]" kena ki hamade.
41007017	Eenkalaar edimayse ooninte kinin ardonsa budonte, kisa paanan yivayna eena kamsinsa goynam kalan ke oysade.
41007018	Kidiar, "Yedi taar ogo een waanidettsi qaabeysa qolminaw? Mayara eedisa iir ardayno eediam hamin ko dahaannaar minngisana konin damimonam yedi dheseete?
41007019	Harrna hambhidianna, iinte ardayse woylaminte yeskima os mayanka konin utennane" kena ki hamade. Yesus ogo yin kinin giyoono galano wul payya konin dohonam ki giyade.
41007020	Kidiar "Eediam minngisayno eedisa woylamra utayno yerrone.
41007021	Eedisa woylamra utayno siya qaabobee, sharmucimakkobee, dimmakkobee, eediam deesintabee,
41007022	anngarmabee, seeso waadimabee, maltamobee, tagachbee, woogintabee, wuupobee, pormakkobee, boosamobene.
41007023	Igina siyana yerra wul eedisa woylamra keda ute, eediamaar keda minngise" kena ki hamade.
41007024	Yesus raqin ogora dhaabhayse Thiroos katamansa gasante dohon gurdandar ki yivade. Ogote ooninte ardayse kinin dohonam eedinin dhesoadettsi zagadehe, ko dahaannaar aadhimana damadehe.
41007025	Ogoraar naan likkon yisa beeronka yedadhoono edono Yesussa qansayse saanawa hatte kisa roon demente ko dhambade.
41007026	Edonsa apono Girik apone, adhadhinoar kosa Siropiniqa muldharane. Naan konnondara beeronam kinin buloadettsi kiam ko miskade.
41007027	Kidi yi giyna: "Birayse naana ke mishe; naanasa galanam tiyayse qaskinana dhaba zaskehe" kona ki hamade.
41007028	Kodiar kina maasayse "Gonne, Imbo! Ko dahaannaar naananin itsenka diinenam demente dahayse qaskina kamate itsa ke itse" ko hamade.
41007029	Yesusaar "Ogo yin hanin giyonna, beerono hasa naandara utidine. Hasa oonindar yivaa" kona ki hamade.
41007030	Edonoar yisa oonindar ko yivade; oonin konin yeskenka, naandara beeron utaysaka naano algadar raatayse ko daaka koam ko haapade.
41007031	Yesus pir Thiroos katamara Sidoona katamanbar sagayse Tabhi Katamana hambhen peensa shaarinka Galila bazindar ki yivade.
41007032	Ogotear dahaana eena qaaminbee aponbeyn kayaa eedi kalaam Yesuskal entsate ke nivade. Kedi aanin yisaam kidar wodayse kinin pacchoadettsi kiam ke miskade.
41007033	Yesus eensa iira kiam edayse raq ab qalte yisa aanin surkenam kisa qaaminte ki arsade. Ogoraar pathimayse kisa atabhinam ki kaamade.
41007034	Tura cecin shedaate woopayse, "Eppitaa!" ki hamade. Ogonoar "Bulimaa!" hamintane.
41007035	Qammoar kisa saanawa ko qansade, kisa atambho dhalqiminoar payya dhalqan ko yedade.
41007036	Yesus "Eedina giyeebhode" hamayse eenana ki giyade. Ko dahaannaar kedi "Giyeebhode" hamayse kinin maronam kalon giyan ke yedade.
41007037	Eenoar kattsi targadhayse, "Yer wulam payya kida haye; qaamin kayaanaar kenin qansoadettsi, apon kayaanaar kenin dhalqoadettsi kida haye" ko hamade.
41008001	Ogo wodanka pir thoothino eeno kikal ko bukade. Yer kenin itsea kesa konin qolmonna kisa paanan yivaynaam yikal eelayse,
41008002	"Eeno kono imbesana rooro makkam dooqayse konin itsea yer kosa qolmonna, inta kona burqadhidine.
41008003	Yer ke itsima onnadar keam i yittsidianna goynte shiitayse dhambasane; kesa waani waani eena pee pegera ke nivade" kena ki hamade.
41008004	Kisa paanan yivayna eenaar "Ko eenin qolmon darante zarsin kona yeekea gala hamora ko haapadhe?" hamayse kina ke maasade.
41008005	Kidiar "Balasha meemayne yekal dahaana?" hamayse keam ki oysade. Kediar "Balasha tobbhaa wokal dahade" kina ke hamade.
41008006	Ogora Yesus eenka "Peendar dooqee" hamayse balashana tobbhaanaam tiyate Barjoam miskeka gobshayse balashanaam qunthayse yisa paanan yivayna eenana eenna kenin yeskisoadettsi ki imade; kediar eenna ke imade.
41008007	Kaara shaaqa tokaa waaniar kekal dahade. Iginaamaar tiyate Barjoam miskeka gobshayse eenna kenin imoadettsi yisa paanan yivaynana ki giyade.
41008008	Eenoar itsayse ko mishade. Ko itsaysaka shidhoono dirmano Yesussa paanan yivayna eena sharqa tobbhaa thoosayse ke dhaasade.
41008009	Itsoono eenoar shii oydiaddhane. Ogosa budonte Yesus keam onnadar ki yittsade.
41008010	Ogora saanawa yisa paanan yivaynabete bazindara sagadhen gonngalante ardayse Dalmanuta peendar ke yivade.
41008011	Parisa eenoar Yesuskal nivayse kiam taysate shedota, "Barjokala nivaa hanin dohonam woninkay dhesea tarshea milkit wona hayaa" hamayse kimbesana ke palimade.
41008012	Yesus yisa qaabonkaar atayse "Uuh!" hamada, "Wodan koka dohoono eeno tarshea milkit haydhoadettsi harrna ko zage? Inta yena gon ida giye: Wodan koka dohon eenna tarshea milkit haydhehe" ki hamade.
41008013	Ogora keam garayse pir bazindara sagadhen gonngalante ardayse bazinsa saabar ki sagade.
41008014	Yesussa paanan yivayna eena balasha yinka bavima walayse kenin nivonna, bazindara sagadhen gonngalante balasha kalaara ab balasha qolehe.
41008015	Yesusaar "Shedee! Parisa eenabee Herodisbesa irshora mete yesaam gishee" hamayse kena ki giyade.
41008016	Kediar kinka kinka "Ogono yin kinin giyoono balashayn wosa qolmonnane" ke hamade.
41008017	Yesusaar kesa qaabonam dhesayse kena yin ki giyade: " 'Balashanin wosa qolmonnane' hamayse harrnee kikal dhalqe? Akar bhocchattenu? Dhesattenu? Woylammoar yesa duudiw?
41008018	Yesa aapi daaka yedi haapattenu? Qaami yesa daaka yedi qansattenu? Hamin ko yena bhoqan garaa?
41008019	Balasha dongnam shii dongin eenam inin kunson wodanka, dirmano sharqa meemayne thoosayse yenin dhaasoono?" kena ki hamade. Kediar "Sharqa tabhi lamaane wonin dhaasoono" ke hamade.
41008020	"Balasha tobbhaanaamsin shii oydin eenna inin kunson wodanka, dirmano sharqa meemayne thoosayse yenin dhaasoono?" kena ki hamade. Kediar "Sharqa tobbhaane wonin dhaasoono" ke hamade.
41008021	"Ta ogono akar yena bhoqayu?" kena ki hamade.
41008022	Beetesaydar kenin nivenka, eedi aapi kayaa kalaam Yesuskal entsate nivayse kiam kinin kaamoadettsi Yesusam ke miskade.
41008023	Yesusaar aapin kayaa easa aaninam yedayse entsate kiam gurdara ki bulade. Ogotear aapindar kisa pathimayse aaninka yisa kinin kaamonsa budonte, "Yer hakal haapa ko haapadho?" hamayse kiam ki oysade.
41008024	Ear dheg kinin hamonsa budonte, "Eeno isa aapinte haaqadettsi dahayse konin yaayenam ida haape" kina ki hamade.
41008025	Yesus pir lansi yisa aaninka kisa aapinam kinin kaamonsa budonte, payya hayayse ki haapade; kalon paashaysear yer wulam may may haapan ki yedade.
41008026	Ogosa budonte Yesus eam "Gurdante ardaabhode" hamayse oonindar kiam ki yittsade.
41008027	Yesusbee kisa paanan yivayna eenabe Pilbhisoos Qesaaria peensa gasante dohon gurdandar ke yivade. Ogo goynkaar kenin yivenka Yesus "Eeno iam hay ko hame?" hamayse keam ki oysade.
41008028	Kediar " 'Shivea Wannisne' koda hame; waani eenoar 'Eeliasne', waani eenoar 'Barjokala qansayse eenna giyayna eenasa kalaane' koda hame" kina ke hamade.
41008029	"Yedi iam hay yeda hame?" hamayse keam ki oysade. Bhethiroosaar kina yinin maasenka, "Ya Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoosne" ki hamade.
41008030	Yesusaar "Innon goynam eedi haynaar giyeebhode" hamayse upsi wocchika kena ki giyade.
41008031	Yesusaar yisa paanan yivayna eenana "Inta Eedi Naas thoothi gaale tiyayda tiye; peensa donzanabee, gudullasa hayonabee, Musesa yigginam dhettsaynabe iam baga ke bage; iam deesa ko deesadhe. Ogora rooro makkamsa budobar dembhira dhaabhayda dhaabhe" hamayse keam dhettsan ki yedade.
41008032	Dhalqinamaar may hayayse kena ki giyade. Bhethiroosaar yimal kiam entsate yivayse waciman ki yedade.
41008033	Yesus budoka yisa wal hamayse kisa paanan yivayna eenaam shedayse Bhethiroosam "Ya Seethaan, isa aapira os yivaa! Barjoyn qaabenam qaaban garayse eedinin qaabenam hada qaabe" hamayse kiam ki wacimade.
41008034	Yesus een waanibee yisa paanan yivaynabeam yikal eelayse kena yin ki giyade: "Isa paanan nivana nashea hay ki dahaannaar yinnon qaabon ki gare; yinindar ziitate deesadhen masqalinam kedayse isa paanan ki nive.
41008035	Sadan yinnonam dhacchana nashea hay ki hannaar koam kaysa ki kayse; imbee Barjosa dhacchintan upsinbena sadan yinnonam kaysea hay ki dahaannaar koam dhaccha ki dhacche.
41008036	Eedi peen kodar dohon yer wulam haapayse sadan yinnonam kaysidi ki hanna, kina har ko poote?
41008037	Eedi yisa sadanna baza yer har ki kashe?
41008038	"Ko wodanka Barjoam garayna seeson eenasa shaarinte imbee isa upsinbeka ooshimbhea wul, inta Eedi Naas Imbaasa gobshinka gazana gaananabesana inin nivenka, inta kanka ooshimbhayda ooshimbhe" hamayse kena ki giyade.
41009001	Yesusaar, "Inta yena gon ida giye: Barjosa bitamonin kantanka nivenam yinin haapenka yekka, kote woyaana eenasa shaarinte dembhi diymina eedi daane" kena ki hamade.
41009002	Yesus ogoam yinin giyonsa budobar laskoa rooroaka Bhethiroosbee, Yayqoobbee, Wannisbeam bish yinka entsate dhukan gudubhondar ki utade. Raqin ogotear Yesussa dantano kesa birante ko ookimade.
41009003	Kisa apallo cawlayse kosa bhalqantanoar peen kodar apalan shivaynayn shivate calshana damaamadettsi kattsi ko cawlade.
41009004	Wodan ogoka Eeliasbee Musebe Yesuskal dahayse kimbete kenin dhalqenam ke haapade.
41009005	Bhethiroosaar Yesusna yi giyna: "Woam Dhettsea, raqin kote wonin dahayno wona payyane; ogona baara kalaam hana, kalaam Musena, kalaam Eeliasna hayayse baara makkam wo kee" ki hamade.
41009006	Ogo wodanka kedi makkamma kattsi kenin kurtumbhonna, Bhethiroos har giya kiam zaskenam kidi dhesadehe.
41009007	Pir liilo nivayse keam ko ishkade; liilonsaar iir "Inin nashea isa Naasa kaane; kina qansee" hamea upsi ko qansimade.
41009008	Saanawa wal hamayse kenin shedenka, kembee Yesusbekalanka eedi ab kedi haapadehe.
41009009	Dhukara kenin hanchenka Yesus kena yi giyna: "I Eedi Naas dembhira inin dhaabhenka yekka ta yenin haapon koam eedi haynaar giyeebhode" ki hamade.
41009010	Ogo yin kinin giyonam qansayse, yisa woylaminka yedayse " 'Dembhira dhaabha' hamintano kisa hamin giyntane?" hamayse kinka kiam kiam oysan ke yedade.
41009011	Kediar "Musesa yigginam dhettsayna eena 'Birayse niva zaskea Eeliasne' harrna ke hamaa?" hamayse Yesusam ke oysade.
41009012	Kidiar kena "Ogono gonne; Eelias birayse niveane; kidi yer wulam ashka ki ashke. Ko dahaannaar i Eedi Naasina 'Gebhi gaale tiya ki tiye; pir kiam baga ko bagadhe' hamayse thaapadhoono harrnane?
41009013	Ko dahaannaar inta yena ida giye: Gon Eelias ena kosa birayse nividine; kisaar thaapadhondettsi eeno yinin nashon yerin wulam kidar ko hayade" kena ki hamade.
41009014	Yesusbee makkamma kisa paanan yivaynabe waani kisa paanan yivayna shidhaanakal maatate kenin nivon wodanka, thoothino eeno kesa gasante buka ko hattaka ke haapade. Musesa yigginam dhettsayna eenaar kembesana kinka kenin palimenka keam ke haapade.
41009015	Eeno wul Yesusam konin haapenka targadhidine; kikalar gobate nivayse kiam ko nagaysade.
41009016	Yesusaar "Kembesana kinka yenin palimayno yer harsane?" hamayse keam ki oysade.
41009017	Eensa shaarira eedi kalaa yinin maasenka, "Woam Dhettsea, beeron yedaysaka apon kayaa isa naasaam hadar bavate i nivade.
41009018	Ruminin kisa dhaabhen wodanka hamote ko hannaar kiam dhaba ko dhabe; aponkaar kisa dubo koda nive; atsinin qiicimenka bishinoar kisa zaba ko zabe. Ogo beeronam kidara ke bule hamayse hasa paanan yivaynana i giyaysaka bulana damadehe" hamayse kina ki giyade.
41009019	Yesusaar yinin maasenka, "Yedi idar woylamin qajimina adhadhinato, hamaaka yekka yembesana ida dee? Yena hamaaka yekkay darsho? Yinda naasaam ikal bevee" kena ki hamade.
41009020	Kediar naasaam kalan bavate ke nivade. Beeroar Yesusam yinin haapenka, naasaam saanawa ki gibattsade; kidiar peente dhambayse aponka dubon nittsite qaptiman ki yedade.
41009021	Yesus naasasa imbaam "Kaa burqea naasaam ki yedaysaka leve meemayne?" hamayse ki oysade. Kidiar kina yinin maasenka, "Naasamora yedaysene.
41009022	Thoothi woda kiam deesana nuunbee noqonbesa iir kiam koda dhabe. Ko dahaannaar ha damidianna bannzo! Wona burqadhayse woam kelshaa" ki hamade.
41009023	Yesusaar "Ha damidiannaa hamo? Barjodar woylamin qajeana yer wul kina dandima ko dandime" kina ki hamade.
41009024	Saanawa naasasa imbaa upsin yisaam dheg hayayse "Barjodar woylamin qajayda qaje; ko dahaannaar isa qothimenam ikalanka pegisaa!" kina ki hamade.
41009025	Yesusaar eenin thoothada kalan nivenka keam haapayse beeroam "Ya aponin dhalqoamadettsi, qaaminin qansoamadettsi hayaa beeroa, naasa kaara utaa! Lansi maatate hanin ardoamadettsi" hamayse ki bitade.
41009026	Beeroar ilatayse naasaam kattsi qaptisada kidara ki utade. Thoothino eenoar "Naasa diydine" kenin hamenka yekka diyaadettsi ki maatade.
41009027	Ogora Yesus naasasa aaninam yedayse ki dhaasade; kidiar dhaabhayse ki woyade.
41009028	Yesus oonin kinin ardonsa budonte, kisa paanan yivayna yimal kinin dohonte, "Beeronam naasadara bulana wonin damaammo harrnane?" hamayse kiam ke oysade.
41009029	Yesusaar kena yinin maasenka, "Kodettsin beeronam [itsima] Barjoam miskintakatay hamidi ko hanna, goyti abka bulana dandimehe" ki hamade.
41009030	Yesusbee kisa paanan yivaynabe raqin ogoam garayse Galilaka hayayse ke yivade. Ogoam eedi kalaar ki dhese zagadehe.
41009031	Harrna hambhidianna, "I Eedi Naasaam eensa aaninte saskate iam koda imbhe; iamaar deesa ko deesadhe; ogosa budobar makkansoa rooroaka diira dhaabhayda dhaabhe" hamada yisa paanan yivaynaam dhettsite ki dahade.
41009032	Kena kinin giyoonoar ardadehe; kediar kiam oysana ke kurtumbhade.
41009033	Yesusbee kisa paanan yivaynabe Qipirnaahoom katamandar ke nivade. Ogote oonir kenin ardonsa budobar Yesus "Ini goynte wonin nivenka yenin palimayno hare?" hamayse keam ki oysade.
41009034	Kediar ini goynte "Wo wuldara sagea hayne?" hamayse kinka kinka kenin palimonna, Yesusin oysenka lay ke hamade.
41009035	Yesus dooqayse tabhi lamaanaam yikal eelayse, "Eedi hay ki hannaar, bira maatana nashea een wulsa budonte ki dee. Een wulsaar erge eedi ki maate" kena ki hamade.
41009036	Naasi kalaam bavate nivayse kesa shaarinte woysayse naasaam shupayse,
41009037	"Kaa naasadettsiam isa naabenna hamayse tiyea iam kida tiye; iam tiyea ibisheam dayma iam nittsaamaar kida tiye" kena ki hamade.
41009038	Wannisaar Yesusna, "Woam Dhettsea, eedi kalaa hasa naabenka beeronaam kinin bulenka kiam wo haapade; wombesana kinka kinin dahaamonna kiam wo marade" kina ki hamade.
41009039	Yesusaar yin ki giyade: "Isa naabenka yer tarshen waadadhayse saana idar yer siya giyana dameayn qolmonna kiam garee; mareebhode!
41009040	Harrna hambhidianna, woam jibbimina wul wombesana kinka ke dahade.
41009041	Inta yena gon ida giye: Kiristoossa yenin dohonna sharqa kalaa noqo yeam wushea wulsa baza shidhehe.
41009042	"Idar woylamin qajayna igina likkanasa iira kalaana goa maatea eedi hayyear daa ki hanna, deesime seeni gaari kisa qorcindar dhaxayse bazinte kiam dhabadhidi ki hanna, kina payyane.
41009043	-
41009044	Ogona anno hanno hana goa maatea ko hanna, koam taxate dhabaa. Aan lamaaka dahayse [qayonin diymon] lay dikimon nuunte hanin ardenna, gundi dahayse sadanka daadhen raqinte hanin ardayno hana payyane.
41009045	-
41009046	Roono hanno hana goa maatea ko hanna, koam taxate dhabaa. Roo lamaaka dahayse [qayonin diymon] lay dikimon nuunte hanin ardenna, gundi dahayse sadanka daadhen raqinte hanin ardayno hana payyane.
41009047	-
41009048	Aapino hanno hana goa maatea ko hanna, koam bulate dhabaa. Aapi lamaaka dahayse qayonin diymon, lay dikimon nuunte hanin ardenna, aapi kalaka dahayse Barjosa bitamonte hanin ardayno hana payyane.
41009049	"Gala sooqoka konin daathisadhendettsi, een wulam nuuka koqate koda ashkadhe.
41009050	"Sooqo payyane. Ko dahaannaar daathan garidi ko hanna, harka ko daathisadhe? Ogona yesa shaarinte sooqodettsi daathea daathamo yesa ko dee; kinka kinkaar payyamoka dehee" kena ki hamade.
41010001	Yesus ogora dhaabhayse Yordaanoos baynsa saabarka hayayse Yiwda peente dohon raqindar ki yivade; ogo baynsa saabar thoothino eeno pir kikal ko bukade. Kidiar yisa dambindettsi eenaam dhettsan ki yedade.
41010002	Parisa eenaar kikal nivayse, "Eedi geshon yinnonam bulate kinin yittsoadettsi Musesa yigginte giidhidu?" hamayse taysate shedana kiam ke oysade.
41010003	Kidi yi giyna: "Muse ena yena hamin ki giyaa?" kena ki hamade.
41010004	Kediar "Muse 'Eedi geshon yinnonam yinin bulenka, bulayse yinin oytensa tarja maatea warqat kona thaapate imayse ki bule' hamayse ki giyade" ke hamade.
41010005	Yesus kena maasayse yi giyna: "Muse yena yin giyayse kinin thaapoono yedi woylaminka yesa Barjona ee hamimina yenin dohonnane.
41010006	Ko dahaakaar pijadhinsa birayse Barjo 'Anngibee maabe hayayse keam ki pijade.
41010007	Ogonante eedi imbabee indabeam gara ki gare; [geshon yinnonbete kinka kida dee;]
41010008	kedi lamaanaar waa kalaa keda maate' hamayse ko thaapadhade. Kedi keeda kaara os waa kalaa keda maate, lamaa maatehe.
41010009	Ogona Barjo kidar kalaa kinin hayonam eedi ko kidara edabhoode" kena ki hamade.
41010010	Ooninte kinin ardonsa budonte, kisa paanan yivayna eena yerin ogo goynam lansi dhaasayse kiam ke oysade.
41010011	Kidiar "Eedi hay ki hannaar, geshon yinnonam bulate yittsayse maa ab keemea kidi ta yinin keemonka sharmucimayse biron geshondar seeso waadadhidine.
41010012	Geshono geshoa yinteam garayse anngi abka kembhidi ko hanna, kodi sharmucimidine" kena ki hamade.
41010013	Yesus yisa aaninam kedar kinin wodoadettsi eeno yisa naason shaaqanam daran bavate ko nivade; ogona kisa paanan yivayna eena eenaam ke wacimade.
41010014	Yesus ogoam kesa yinin haapenka, yisa paanan yivayna eenaam wacimayse, "Naasono shaaqano idar ko nive; koam mareebhode. Harrna hambhidianna, Barjosa bitamono igina naanadettsi maataana eenasane.
41010015	Inta yena gon ida giye: Barjosa bitamonam naasidettsi maatayse tiymina wul yer hamin hambhaakaar iir ardehe" kena ki hamade.
41010016	Yin kinin giyonsa budobar naanaam yidar tiyate shupayse, kedar yisa aaninam wodaate kena Barjoam ki eelade.
41010017	Yesus ogora goyti yivo kinin dhaabhenka, eedi kalaa gobaka kalan nivayse hatte birante kisa kumpurdhayse, "Ya Payya Dhettsea, rooro wul lay dehen sadan haapota yer har haynta ko iam zaske?" hamayse kiam ki oysade.
41010018	Yesusaar "Payya ea inka harrnaa hamaa? Barjo bishkalanka ab eedisa payya hama eedi qolehe.
41010019	Barjoyn giyonam dhesaada dhese: Deesaabhode, sharmucimaabhode, dimmaabhode, buudamoka tarjaabhode, maltimaabhode, hambabee handabeam gobshaa" kina ki hamade.
41010020	Ear "Woam Dhettsea, igina wulam inta isa naasamora yedayse toolidine" kina ki hamade.
41010021	Yesusaar kiam shedayse nashabh hayayse "Hanin hayaama yer kalaa bishne hasa joogaa. Ogonoar yivayse hasa dohon koymonam shanshayse qambhinana imaa. Ya hasa bazanam cecinte hada haape. Ogora maatayse isa paanan nivaa" kina ki hamade.
41010022	Ear koymo thoothinin kisa dohonna, ogoam yinin qansenka qaaboka wotin yisa ki thipsade. Ogoraar yisa iinka ataate ki yivade.
41010023	Yesus yisa gasanam shedayse paanan yivayna eenana "Wodimma eenasa Barjo bitamonte ardano hamin dohoono gaalene" kena ki hamade.
41010024	Kisa paanan yivayna eenaar ogo yin kinin giyenka kedi targadhidine. Yesus pir kena yin ki giyade: "Ye naanato, Barjosa bitamonte ardano hamin dohoono gaalene.
41010025	Eedi wodimoyn Barjosa bitamonte kinin ardenna gamaleyn marpisa pulaka konin utayno deegane" kena ki hamade.
41010026	Kediar kattsi targadhayse kinka kikal yi giyna: "Yin ko hanna, ta keeda hayne dhaqana damea?" ke hamade.
41010027	Yesusaar keam shedayse, "Ogono eedina dandimehe; Barjona koda dandime. Harrna hambhidianna, Barjona yer wul dandima ko dandime" kena ki hamade.
41010028	Bhethiroos yi giyna: "Shedaa! Wodi yer wulam garayse hasa paanan wo nivade" kina ki hamade.
41010029	Yesus maasayse kena yin ki giyade: "Inta yena gon ida giye: Imbee Barjosa dhacchintan upsinbena hamayse indanaana annginabee anzanabeam, pir imbaabee, indanbee, naana yinnabee, oonin yinnonbee, haamin yinnonbeam garaa,
41010030	ta peen kodar oytaydhanka indanaana annginabee anzanabeam, pir indanbee, naana yinnabee, oonin yinnonbee, haamin yinnonbeam iginara sagi mato goyt tiyma garea eedi qolehe; os niven wodankaar rooro wul lay dehen sadan haapa ki haape.
41010031	Ko dahaannaar thoothino birono eeno budo koda maate; budonte dohoono eeno pir bira koda maate" kena ki hamade.
41010032	Yerusaalemdar yivota goyn utayse ke daaka, Yesus kesa birante kinin yivenka, kisa paanan yivayna eenaar Yerusaalemdar kinin yivenna targadhite ke dahade; pir waani eeno kesa tudhin yivaynoar kurtumbhidine. Ogo wodanka kisa paanan yivayna tabhi lamaana eenaam pir eensa iira keam eelate bulayse yidar yesko dohon gaalensa kena giyan ki yedade:
41010033	"Marrato! Wodi ta keeda Yerusaalemdar woda yive. I Eedi Naasiam gudullasa hayonabee Musesa yigginam dhettsayna eenabena saskate imbha ko imbhe; kediar inin deesadhoadettsi idar pirda ke pirde; Ayiwdtay hamma eena yettsate iam ima ke ime.
41010034	Ayiwdtay hamma eena iam bagayse idar pathima ke pathime; iam qana ke qane; ogoraar pir iam deesa ke deese; intaar rooro makkamsa budobar dembhira dhaabhayda dhaabhe" kena ki hamade.
41010035	Zabdoos naana Yayqoobbee Wannisbe Yesuskal nivayse, "Woam Dhettsea, haam wonin misken wulam wona hanin waadadhoadettsi woda nashe" hamayse ke giyade.
41010036	Kidiar kena "Yena yer har i waadadhee zage?" ki hamade.
41010037	Kediar "Gobshinka hanin bitimenka, wosa iira kalaam hasa mizaqimbar, kalaam hasa warkatambar hayayse woam dottsaa" kina ke hamade.
41010038	Yesusaar kena "Yedi yenin miskenam dhesattene. Inin wucen gaalen wucimanam yedi wucana damaw? Inin shiidhen gaalen shiidhimenam yedi shiidhimbhana damaw?" ki hamade.
41010039	Kediar "Damooda dame" ke hamade. Yesusaar "Inin wucen gaalen wucimanam wuceeda wuce; inin shiidhimbhen shiidhimenam yedi shiidhimbheeda shiidhimbhe.
41010040	Ko dahaannaar isa mizaqimbee warkatambebar dottsea intatehe; raqin ogoam yinnante ashkadhaanana imbha ko imbhe" kena ki hamade.
41010041	Waani tambha Yesussa paanan yivayna eenaar yin giyayse kenin miskenam qansayse Yayqoobbee Wannisbeam waciman ke yedade.
41010042	Yesus ke wulam yikal eelayse kena yin ki giyade: "Barjoam dhesimina eenaam wottsaynane hamayse qaabadhayna eenaam kantaka kenin wottsenbee entsaynaar kedar kesa hayamo kenin dhehenbeam dheseeda dhese.
41010043	Yennon shaarinte yin konin doadettsi zaskehe. Yennon shaarinte eedi hayyear gebhi doota zagea yesa waadima eedi ki dee.
41010044	Yesa iira eedi hayyear bira doota zagea wulsa choobar dehea eedi ki dee.
41010045	Harrna hambhidianna, inta Eedi Naasear eenna waadadhanabee isa sadanamaar thoothin eensa seeson bazan kashotabe i nivade; eeno ina konin waadadhoadettsi nivaatine" kena ki hamade.
41010046	Ogosa budonte, Yesusbee kisa paanan yivayna eenabe Iyarko katamandar ke nivade. Ogora waani thoothin eenbesana Iyarkora utaate kenin yivenka, Themoos naasa aapin kayaa Barthemoos goyn aponte dooqayse miskimite ki dahade.
41010047	Kidiar goyn ogoka sagate yivea Naazret peen Yesus kinin dohonam qansayse, "Dawt Naasa Yesuso, bannzo! Ina burqadhayse iam pacchaa" hante gebhi ilatite miskiman ki yedade.
41010048	Eensa iira thoothino eeno kanka "Ya lay hamaa!" hamayse kiam ko wacimade. Kidi pir "Dawt Naasa, bannzo! Ina burqadhayse iam pacchaa" hante ini yinin ilaterra kalon sagi ilatan ki yedade.
41010049	Yesusaar woyayse, "Kiam eelee" ki hamade. Eena ea aapin kayaaka "Hay, dhaabhaa! Haam eela ki eele" hamayse kina ke giyade.
41010050	Kidiar yisa apalanam dhabayse saana dhaabhayse Yesuskal ki nivade.
41010051	Yesusaar "Hana yer har i hayea zage?" kina ki hamade. Aapin kayaa ear "Dhettsea, shedana ida zage" ki hamade.
41010052	Yesusaar "Ya yivaa, idar woylamin hanin qajoono haam ko pacchade" kina ki hamade. Easaar aapino saanawa ko shedade. Ogosa budonte, kidi goynka Yesussa paanan yivan ki yedade.
41011001	Yesusbee kisa paanan yivayna eenabe nivite Yerusaalemkal theedayse Dabirezayt dhukansa gasante dohon Bitaaniabee Betepaagebe gurdankal kenin theeden wodanka, Yesus yisa paanan yivayna eenasa lamaanaam yin giyayse keam ki yittsade:
41011002	"Ogo yesa birante dohon gurdandar yivimate. Ogote yenin yeskenka, eedin yindar dooqate shedaama ukulisa ooto dhaxadhaa haapeeda haape; agaam bulayse ina kiam kote qanate nivee.
41011003	Eedi hay ki hannaar, 'Harrnee ukuliam bule?' hamayse yeam oysidi ki hanna, 'Imbaa wonteana kinin zaskonnane; kidiar saanawa yena kiam maasate nittsasane' kina hamee" kena ki hamade.
41011004	Kediar yivayse eedi kalaasa mayan kerinsa goyn aponte dhaxadhaa ukuliam haapayse ke bulade.
41011005	Ogo raqinte woyayse dohoono eeno waani "Ukuliam har hayee bule?" hamayse keam ke oysade.
41011006	Kediar Yesusin giyon kena ke giyade. Eenaar qansayse ukuliam kena ke garade.
41011007	Yesussa paanan yivaynaar ukuliam qanate Yesuskal nivayse ukuliasa zulondar yisa apalanam ke wodaysaka, Yesus daran ki dooqade.
41011008	Thoothino eeno yisa apalanam goyndar ko apade; waani eenoar haaqansa hacchan taxate goyndar ko apade.
41011009	Kisa birante yiven eenbee budonte niven eenbe "Gobshi hana ko dee; Barjo Imbasa naabenka nivea ya gobshadhaane!
41011010	Nivayno imba wontea Dawtsa bitamonoar gobshadhoonone! Cecinte Barjona gobshi ko dee!" hamaate upsi gebhika kiam ke gobshade.
41011011	Yesusaar Yerusaalem yeskayse Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayante kinin ardonsa budobar, gidir kosa dohon yerinam shedada hayayse haynin wovonna kisa paanan yivayna eena tabhi lamaanabete kinka Bitaania gurdandar ke yivade.
41011012	Burin Bitaaniara kenin maatenka Yesusam daaqi bashade.
41011013	Haaqa shaap kallo goobayse konin dohonam pegeka haapayse, "Aapi kosa dook?" hamayse kodar ki nivade. Ko dahaannaar wodano hatton ogosa aapi konin ushea wodatay konin dohonna, kinin shedenka haccha bish kodar dahade; aapi haapadehe.
41011014	Ogo wodanka Yesus hattonna yi giyna: "Keeda kaara os macchi eedi ko hasa aapi itsabhoode" ki hamade. Kisa paanan yivayna eenaar ogo yin kinin giyenam qansidine.
41011015	Kediar Yerusaalemdar ke nivade. Ogotear Yesus Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayante ardayse koymonam shanshaynabee shanayna eenabeam ooninsa mayara oytan ki yedade. Birren ookayna eenasa tharbhezanbee waleen shanshayna eenasa borkotonbeam kupate ki dhabade.
41011016	Ogoraar gaba koymo bavayse eedi hay ki hannaar, Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayanka sagate kinin yivoamadettsi ki marade.
41011017	Guttsayse " 'Onno isa zarsin wulin Barjoam miskayno misken onno koda hambhe' hamayse thaapadhadaa? Yedi eensa koymon buurate itsaynasa aadhime raq koam ye hayade" hamayse keam dhettsite ki dahade.
41011018	Gudullasa hayonabee Musesa yigginam dhettsayna eenabe ogoam kisa qansayse, "Hamin hayayse wo kiam deeso?" hante goyti zagan ke yedade. Harrna hambhidianna, kisa dhettsidinka eeno wul konin targadhenna, kedi Yesusna kurtumbhite ke dahade.
41011019	Yesusbee kisa paanan yivayna eenabe peenin sootonsa budonte, katamara ke utade.
41011020	Burin kenin yivenka hattono shaapino ke hanna, yisa caacinka wocchayse konin dohonam ke haapade.
41011021	Bhethiroos yer kina bhoq hamaysaka, "Woam Dhettsea, shedaa! Hattono shaapino hanin ashoono wocchidine" kina ki hamade.
41011022	Yesusaar kena yin giyayse ki maasade: "Barjodar woylamin qajee.
41011023	Inta yena gon ida giye: Eedi hay ki hannaar, woylaminka yisa qothimima yerro kinin giyoono kina konin maateadettsi woylam qajidi ki hanna, ko dhukanam 'Agaara dhaabhayse bazinsa iinte wavaa!' hamidi ki hanna kina maata ko maate.
41011024	Ogonante yena ida giye: Barjoam yenin misken yerin wulam yenin haapaadettsi hayayse woylam daran qajimate, yenaar maata ko maate.
41011025	Barjoam misko yenin woyen wodanka, cecinte dahaa Imbaa yentea yennon seesonam yena kinin garoadettsi, yediar eedidar yesa dohon wacen wulam kena garmate.
41011026	[Ye kena garaamma cecinte dahaa Imbaa yentea yennon seesonam yena garehe]" kena ki hamade.
41011027	Pir kedi Yerusaalemdar ke nivade. Ogotear Yesus Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayante kinin yaayenka, gudullasa hayonabee, Musesa yigginam dhettsayna eenabee, peensa donzanabe kinka kikal nivayse,
41011028	"Yerra iginaam hanin hayayno hasa yer har hayamokane? Kina yerra wulam hanin hayoadettsi hana hayamon imaa hayne?" hamayse kiam ke oysade.
41011029	Yesus "Intaar yer kalaa yeam ida oyse. Yedi ina inin oysonam maasee; intaar yerra iginaam yer har hayamoka inin hayenam yena giyayda giye.
41011030	Wannis eenaam kinin shivoadettsi kinin nittsadhoono Barjokalankamoo? Eedikalankaw? Inin oyson oysimensa malsin ina maasee" kena ki hamade.
41011031	Kediar yin giyayse kinka kikal ke dhalqade: " 'Barjokalankane' wo hamanna, 'Ta harrnee kisa dhalqinam gonne hamayse tiyan garaa?' wona kida hame.
41011032	Ta 'Eedikalankane' wo hamo?" ke hamade. Eeno wul "Wannis gon Barjokala qansayse eenna giyeane" hamayse kenin giyenna, eenna ke kurtumbhade.
41011033	Ogonante Yesusna "Hamora konin dohonam wodi dhesattone" hamayse ke maasade. Yesusaar "Ta keeda intaar har hayamoka yerra iginaam inin hayenam yena giyattine" kena ki hamade.
41012001	Yesusaar kamsika kena yin ki giyade: "Eedi kalaa woynin haaqanaam yisa haaminte thoothi ki korade. Kidiar haaminsa gasanam aygi cavayse, haaqanasa aapinam cuubadhea oolo koyayse ki ashkade; haaminam toolana pir kattsi dheg hama tulee ki kahade. Ogosa budonte, haaminte waadadhayna eenana elqimayse pee abdar ki yivade.
41012002	Woynin haaqanasa aapin kambhen wodan yeskaysaka, aapin ki beve hamayse yisa erge eedi kalaam haaminte waadadhayna eenadar ki yittsade.
41012003	Haaminte waadadhaynaar kisa ergen eam yedate qanayse aan guuri ke yittsade.
41012004	Pir haaminsa imbaa ab yisa erge eedi kalaam ki yittsade; haaminte waadadhaynaar kiam qanate meten kisa torsayse kiam ooshinsayse ke yittsade.
41012005	Pirar eedi ab ki yittsaysaka, kiamaar ke deesade. Ogoraar haamin imba eedi thoothi ki yittsaysaka, waani waaniam ke qanade; waaniam ke deesade.
41012006	"Keeda haaminsa imbaayn adhaa naasi kalaa kisa kinin nashea dahade. 'Kedi naasa inteana bookindhasane' hamayse macchindar kiam kedar ki yittsade.
41012007	Haaminte waadadhaynaar kinka kinka yinin giyenka, 'Kaa kisa haamindar sagea naasa toydiane. Nivee, kiamaar wo deese; hammoar wona ko shidhe' ke hamade.
41012008	Ogora naasaam yedayse ke deesade; deesaysear woynin haaminsa iira kiam bulayse ke dhabade.
41012009	"Ta keeda haaminsa imbaa hamin ki haye? Kidi yinti nivayse haaminte waadadhaynaam kida deese; ogoraar woynin haaminam eedi abna kida ime.
41012010	-
41012011	'Seeninka oonin woysayna eena kenin bagaa seenia senna wulra ooninna kattsi zaskea ki maatade. Ogonoar Barjosa waadimane; wonin shedenkaar yer woam tarshaynone' hamayse Mathaap Gazante thaapadhonam yedi nabbabeete?" hamayse keam ki oysade.
41012012	Ayiwd eenasa entsana Yesusin kamsinka giyaa dhalqa keam kaamea kinin dohonam kenin dhesonna, kiam yedana ke zagade; ko dahaannaar thoothin eenam kenin kurtumbhonna kiam garayse ke yivade.
41012013	Ayiwd eenasa entsana Yesussa dhalqinka kiam yedana Parisa eenabee Herodissa bitamonam nashayna eenabera eedi daran ke yittsade.
41012014	Kedi kikal nivayse, "Woam Dhettsea, ya gon hama eedi hanin dohonam wodi dhesooda dhese; eedisa wotina bookindhayse hanin hayminna, eessa woti shedayse hanin hayea yer qolehe. Barjosa goynam gon hada dhettse. Ta Roome peen bitaana gibirin kashadhoadettsi giidhidimoo? Giidhadayne? Ta wodi gibirinam kina kashoo kashoomoo? Garoo garo?" hamayse kiam ke oysade.
41012015	Yesus woylaminka siyon bavayse aponka bish kenin ashkenam kesa dhesayse, "Harrnee iam tayse? Yinda i shede santup kote ina bevee" kena ki hamade.
41012016	Kediar kina ke bavade. Kidiar "Santupa kaadar dahaa pootoabee daran thaapadhaa naabeabe haysane?" hamayse keam ki oysade. Kediar "Roome peen bitaasane" kina ke hamade.
41012017	Yesusaar kena maasayse "Roome peen bitaa gaynam kina imee, Barjo gaynam Barjona imee" ki hamade. Kediar kisa dhalqinka targadhidine.
41012018	"Dembhira dhaabhadhea yer qolehe" hamayna Saduqa eenara eedi waani Yesuskal nivayse yin giyayse kiam ke oysade:
41012019	"Woam Dhettsea, Muse yin giyayse wona ki thaapade: 'Eedi kalaa maa keemayse naasi adhima diydi ki hanna, kisa kana koam keemayse diyaa iishimasa oolonte kina ki adhe' ki hamade.
41012020	Eedi kalaasa naasi tobbhaa waani ke dahade. Ke wulsa iishima gebhaa maa keemayse naasi adhima ki diyade.
41012021	Kisa kana lansoa iishimaa geshonam keemayse naasi adhima ki diyade; makkansoar iishimmadettsi koam keemayse naasi adhima ki diyade;
41012022	ogodettsi naana tobbhaana edon ogoam keemayse naasi adhima ke diyade. Ke wulsa macchinte edono ko diyade.
41012023	Igina indanaana tobbhaana wul koam kenin keemonna, diyaana eena dembhira kenin dhaabhen wodanka, kodi hamaa easa maa koda maate?" hamayse kiam ke oysade.
41012024	Yesusaar kena yi giyna: "Yenin dhaddhisayno Mathaap Gazanbee Barjosa kantanbeam yenin dhesiminnatayu?
41012025	Harrna hambhidianna, eedi dembhira yinin dhaabhonsa budonte, cecinte dahaana Barjosa gaananadettsi keda maate; kedi yina kembhehe, tapir keemehe.
41012026	Diyoono eeno ko hannaar, konin dhaabhoadettsi Barjo Museyn thaapon mathaapinte hatta kodoadar nuunin yedenka Musena 'Inta Abraamsa Barjoa, Yisaaqsa Barjoa, Yayqoobsaar Barjoane' hamayse kinin giyonam yedi nabbabeete?
41012027	Barjo sadanka dahayna eenasa Barjone; diyaana eenasa Barjotehe. Yedi kattsi yeda dhaddhise" kena ki hamade.
41012028	Musesa yigginam dhettsaynara eedi kalaa nivayse kenin palimenka qansayse, Yesus payya malsi kena kinin maasaadettsi shedayse, "Barjo yinin giyaana upsina wulra sagea hamaane?" hamayse kiam ki oysade.
41012029	Yesusaar "Wulra sagea upsea 'Israveel eenato, qansee! Barjoa Imbaa wontea kalaane;
41012030	ya Barjo Hambaam gonin hamon woylaminka, gonin hamon sadanka, gonin hamon qaabenka, gonin hamon kantanka kiam nashaa' hamaynone.
41012031	Lansoar 'Een wulam hadettsi hayayse nashaa' hamaynone. Iginaranka ab sagi upsi qolehe" kina ki hamade.
41012032	Musesa yigginam dhettsear "Woam Dhettsea, gonaa giyade! Barjo kidi kalaane; kidara ab barjo qolehe hamayse hanin giyoono gonne.
41012033	Ogona gonin woylaminka, gonin bhocchinka, [gonin sadanka,] gonin kantankaar Barjoam nashintabee pir eedi wulam yidettsi hayayse nashintabe, Barjona koqadhen marshanbee abin imbhen marshanbera kattsi sagine" kina ki hamade.
41012034	Yesusaar yiggin dhettsea qaabayse kinin maasonam shedayse, "Ya Barjosa bitamora pegadhaatehe" kina ki hamade. Ogosa budonte, hayyear Yesusam oysime oysana kurtumbhidine.
41012035	Yesusaar Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayante yinin dhettsenka yin ki giyade: "Musesa yigginam dhettsayna 'Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoos Dawt naasine' hamayse hamin ke giyaa?
41012036	Dawt yinti Manpas Gazan yiam entsaysaka, 'Barjo isa Imbana "Haam jibbayna eenaam hasa hayamonsa demente inin hayenka yekka isa mizaqimbar dooqaa" kina ki hamade' kida hame.
41012037	Ta Dawt yinti kiam, 'Isa Imba' hamidi ki hanna, Kiristoos hamin ki Dawtsa naasi dee?" kena ki hamade. Thoothino eenoar wozaka kinin giyenam qansite ko dahade.
41012038	-
41012039	Yesus yinin dhettsenka yin ki giyade: "Gudubhon apalan qaadhayse osbee orabe hamota, pir gabante gobshadhon gisimenam gisimbhota nashayna Musesa yigginam dhettsaynakala yeam gishee. Kedi Ayiwd eensa bukin raqinte gobshadhon borkotonbee kumman kummadhen raqinte gobshadhon raqinbeam tiyota keda nashe.
41012040	Miskenam kesa eedinin qansoadettsi hamayse gudubhsintaka maltimaate maana qambhinasa ooninam keda buure; ogona kedar sagi pirdi koda yeske" kena ki hamade.
41012041	Yesus koymon Barjona dhabadhen saathininsa birante dooqayse zarsinin saathininte koymon hamin konin dhabenam shedite ki dahade. Thoothina wodimmaar thoothi koymo saathininte dhabite ke dahade.
41012042	Maa qambhi kalloar nivayse santup kala maatea bakkanda lamaa saathininte ko dhabade.
41012043	Yesusaar yisa paanan yivaynaam yikal eelayse, "Inta yena gon ida giye: Kono edono qambhino koymon saathininte dhabayna eena wuldara sagi ko dhabade.
41012044	Harrna hambhidianna, eeno wul yisa dohon koymon thoothinsa iira yina shiishayse ko dhabade; kodi qambhi dahayse yina kala hattear shiishima, yisa dohon koymon wulam ko dhabade" kena ki hamade.
41013001	Yesusaar Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayara kinin utenka, kisa paanan yivayna eenasa eedi kalaa "Woam Dhettsea, senna kina hamin kenin dohonbee seeninka woysadhaana onna kina hamin kenin haydhonbeam shedaa" ki hamade.
41013002	Yesusaar "Senna kina gembhaka woysadhaana onnaam ya shedaa shedo? Senna kina kidar dordhaanasa hamin hambhaakaar, kesa kala hattear kidara povayse kottsimima shidhea qolehe" kina ki hamade.
41013003	Yesus Barjosa gazan ooninka yekka dhari Dabirezayt dhukandar dooqayse ki daaka, Bhethiroosbee, Yayqoobbee, Wannisbee, Indiriasbe kalan theedayse,
41013004	"Ogono yerro haa ko yin maate? Ogono yerro wul yin maatanba konin dohonam dhettsayno milkitino kosa hare? Wona giyaa" hamayse yimal ki daaka kiam ke oysade.
41013005	Yesusaar kena yi giyna: "Eedi hayyear yeam kinin dhaddhisoamadettsi mete yesaam gishee.
41013006	Thoothino eeno 'Inta Kiristoosne' hamaate isa naabenka niva ko nive; thoothin eenamaar dhaddhisa ko dhaddhise.
41013007	Yekal banqinin dhaabhenkabee pegente banqisa upsinam yenin qansenkabe kurtumbheebhode. Ogono yin konin maatayno shidha shidhiminone; ko dahaannaar macchin wodano akarne.
41013008	Zarsino zarsindar, binnaar binnadar dhaabhayse banqi keda kiam uxe; raq waani waanir peesa ziga koda maate; daaqiar koda maate. Ogono yerro edon sirmanin adhimanna birayse burqadheadettsi gaalen rooronsa biranone.
41013009	"Yedi yeam gishimate. Pirdin pirdayna eenasa birante yeam saskate ima ke ime; Ayiwd eenasaar bukin raqinte yeam qana ke qane. Isa tarja kena yenin doadettsi, goyn innonka peen wottsayna eenabee binnabesa birante yedi woyeeda woye.
41013010	Macchin wodan nimbha birayse Barjosa dhacchintan upsino een wulna giidha ko giidhe.
41013011	Yeam yedate pirdinna woysadhen wodanka, yenin giyoadettsi ogo wodanka yena imbhon upsinam giymate. Birayse 'Yer haroo giyo?' hamayse qaaboka gaaleebhode; harrna hambhidianna, yenka maatayse giyayno Manpas Gazanone, yeditehe.
41013012	Ogo wodanka indanaasaar indanaasaam, imbaar naasa yinteam dembhinna saskate ima ki ime; naanaar imbanadar dhaabhayse keam dettsa ke dettse.
41013013	Yedi isa naabenna hamayse een wulkal jibbadhaana yeda maate. Macchin wodanka yekka wocchimbhayse darshea kidi dhaqa ki dhaqe.
41013014	"Eenaam minngisayno siyono yerro zaskaamon raqinte woysadhaysaka yenin koam haapen wodanka (koam nabbabea ea ki bhocche), wodan ogoka Yiwda peente dohoono eeno dhukanadar ko gobe.
41013015	Ooninsa zulondar dahaa ea ooninsa zulora hanchayse yer tiyo ki ooninte ardabhoode.
41013016	Haaminte yisa dahaar apalan yinnon tiyota budoka ki maatabhoode.
41013017	Ogo wodanka maana sirmanabee amin qooshaynabena hay!
41013018	Ko dahaannaar gobeno yesa bargin wodanka konin doamadettsi Barjoam miskimate.
41013019	Ogo wodanka Barjo peen koam kinin pijorra yedayse ta koka yekka eedinin haapaammo gaale niva ko nive; os birantear kodettsino gaaleno yer hamin hambhaakaar nivehe.
41013020	Barjo galshen rooronaam ki orgisaamma, eedi kala hattear dhaqana damehe. Ko dahaannaar kinin kamayse edaana eenana hamayse ki rooronaam orgisade.
41013021	"Ogo wodanka eedi hay ki hannaar 'Marrato! Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoos kote ki dahade' way 'Saa ogote ki dahade' yena hamea ki hanna, gonne hamayse tiyeebhode.
41013022	Ogonoar buudamoka 'Inta Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoosne' hamayna eenabee buudamoka 'Inta Barjokala qansayse eenna giyeane' hamayna eenabe eensa iira dhaabha ke dhaabhe; kena dandimea ko hanna, Barjoyn kamayse edaana eenaam kenin dohon goyra keam dhaddhisota yer milkitbee yer tarsheabe waadadhayse dhaa ke dhee.
41013023	Ogona yedi mete yesaam gishee. Inta ko yerin wulam yena birayse giydine.
41013024	-
41013025	"Igina rooronaka, gaalen ogosa budonte, cecinte dahaana kantana wul shoa ke shoe; hayno thipa ko thipe; arpinoar shaakehe; wanconoar cecira wava ko weve.
41013026	Ogo wodanka inta Eedi Naas gebhon kantanbee gobshinbeka maatayse polonka inin nivenka iam haapa ke haape.
41013027	Wodan ogoka isa gaananaam yittsayse, peensa gasara yedayse macchinka yekka peen wulsa iira inin kamaana eenaam pucchayda pucche.
41013028	"Hatton shaapinsa kamsinam dhesee: Ogonoar hattonsa antindar hacchanin utayse caagenka, ogo wodanka bargin wodanin yeskonam dheseeda dhese.
41013029	Ogodettsi yedi igina yerraam yenin shedenka, i Eedi Naasisa nivan wodano theedayse ooninte ardota kerinte konin dohonam dhesimate.
41013030	Inta yena gon ida giye: Ogo wul yin maatenka yekka wodan koka dohoono adhadhino diyate maqehe.
41013031	Cecinbee peenbe saga ko sage; inin giyoono upsino sagehe.
41013032	"Rooron ogobee savaatin ogobeam Barjo Imbakalanka ab dhesea eedi hay ki hannaar qolehe; cecinte dahaana Barjosa gaanana ke hannaar, Naasa kintea ki hannaar, dhesehe.
41013033	Wodano haa ko hannaar yenin dhesimonna, qaymayse toolee!
41013034	Ogonoar oonin yinnonam garayse goyn utaate yivaa eadettsine. Kidiar kalaa kalaa waadiman eenaam waana waana waadimabee hayamobedar ki wodade; kerin tooleanaar qaymayse kinin tooloadettsi kina ki elqimade.
41013035	Ogonante oonin imba ta keeda shaakinan ko hannaar, way sootin kiaddha laman, way baachan qiiqenka way burburi ko hannaar, haa kinin nivenam yenin dhesimonna, qaymayse toolee.
41013036	Ye dhesima nivayse yenin raatonte ki yeam haapabhoode.
41013037	"Yena inin giyenam een wulna ida giye: Qaymayse toolimate!" kena ki hamade.
41014001	Ayiwd eenasa Paasikanbee irshonin qolmon balashan gaadhea bavallabeyn gobshadhanna yeskota rooro lamaayn shidhenka, gudullasa hayonabee Musesa yigginam dhettsayna eenabe Yesusam cubboka hamin hayayse yedate kiam kenin deesensa goyti zagite ke dahade.
41014002	"Eeno goore konin dhaasoamadettsi, Paasikan gobshadhea wodanka ko dahabhoode" hamayse kinka ke dhalqade.
41014003	Yesus Bitaania gurdante lamthin burqonka ena dahaa Simoon ooninte kummadar dooqayse ki dahade. Maa kalloar koymo gebhika shandhen naardoosira bish ashkadhon gaamen shittonam seeni cawlira ashkadhon bilqaathinka bavate Yesuskal nivayse, bilqaathasa aponam deesate bulayse gaamen shittonam Yesussa metendar ko kahade.
41014004	Raqin ogote dohoono waani waani eenoar wacimaate, "Ko gaamen shittonam harrna ko sun yiigadhe?
41014005	Ko gaamen shittonam mato makkamdara sagi birredar shanshayse koymo ogoam qambhinana imano koda damadhika!" hamayse kinka gundumite edonam ke bagade.
41014006	Yesus kena "Koam harrnee galshe? Garee! Kodi ina yer payya ko hayade.
41014007	Qambhina rooro wul yembesana kenin dehenna yenin nashon wodanka kena yer payya hayana dameeda dame. Inta rooro wul yembesana dahattine.
41014008	Kodi yina dandimonam ko hayade; waan isa duukadhima birayse iam ashkota shittonka ko qadhade.
41014009	Inta yena gon ida giye: Edon koyn hayonam konin bhocchadhoadettsi, peen wul gidir Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam giidhen raqin hamote ko hannaar, kosa waadimanam giidha ko giidhe" ki hamade.
41014010	Tabhi lamaana Yesussa paanan yivayna eenasa kalaa Asqoronto peen ea Yiwda Yesusam yettsate imota gudullasa hayonadar ki yivade.
41014011	Kediar ogoam kenin qansen wodanka wozadhayse, "Koymo hana woda ime" hamayse kimbesana kinka ke dhalqade. Yiwdaar kiam yettsate kena kinin imen goynsa kina agea woda zagite ki dahade.
41014012	Paasikan yaaton machadhen, irshon qolmon balashan itsadhensa biraa rooroaka, Yesussa paanan yivayna eena "Paasikan galanam hamote yivayse wonin ashkoadettsia zage?" hamayse kiam ke oysade.
41014013	Yesus yisa paanan yivayna eenasa lamaanana yin giyayse keam ki yittsade: "Katamandar yivee. Ogotear daaka noqo kedaa eedi kalaam yeda haape; ea agaasaar paanan yivimate.
41014014	Kinin arden oonindar yivayse ooninsa imbaam 'Woam Dhettsea "Isa paanan yivayna eenabete Paasikan galanam wonin itsayno ranqo hamotene?" hanka ki hamade' kina hamee.
41014015	Kidiar ooninsa zulonte woysadhon, pir kosa iinaam payya apayse ashkadhon workin ooninam yena kida dhee; ogote wona ashkee" kena ki hamade.
41014016	Kediar utaate katamandar yivayse Yesusin kena giyondettsi ke haapade; Paasikan galanamaar ogote ke ashkade.
41014017	Peenin sootonsa budonte, Yesus tabhi lamaana yisa paanan yivayna eenabesana kinka ki nivade.
41014018	Dooqaysear kenin kummenka Yesus kena "Inta yena gon ida giye: Yesa shaarira kalaa imbesana kinka kummea, kidi iam yettsate ima ki ime" ki hamade.
41014019	Kediar ogo yin kinin giyon goynka iinka burqadhaate kedi kalaa kalaana "Inta i doo?", "Inta i doo?" hante kiam oysan ke yedade.
41014020	Kidiar kena yi giyna: "Ye tabhi lamaanasa iira, kalaa imbesana kinka sharqante aanin arseane.
41014021	Inta Eedi Naas ena birayse innon goynsa thaapadhondettsi diyayda diye. Ko dahaannaar i Eedi Naasiam yettsate imea ea agaana hay! Ea agaa ki adhadhaamma kina payyane" kena ki hamade.
41014022	Galanam kenin itsenka, Yesus balashanam tiyayse Barjoam ki gobshade; qunthayse yisa paanan yivayna eenana "Kay, kono isa waanone" hamayse kena ki imade.
41014023	Wucadhenamaar tiyate Barjoam gobshayse, kena ki imade; kedi wulaar ogoam ke wucade.
41014024	Kidiar kena yin ki giyade: "Kono isa thoothin eenna laymayno mallan eshkayno zombhinone.
41014025	Inta yena gon ida giye: Barjosa bitamonte woynea hattasa aapin cuubadhon haalin wucadhenam inin wucenka yekka, keeda kaara os inta koam wucattine" kena ki hamade.
41014026	Ogosa budonte, mazmur yinin zammaronsa budonte Dabirezayt dhukanam ke utade.
41014027	Yesus yisa paanan yivayna eenana yin ki giyade: "Barjo 'Yaana gisheam qanate deesayda deese; gishadhayna yaanaar thar thar hama ke hame' hamayse thaapadhondettsi, yedi wul iam gareeda gare.
41014028	Ko dahaannaar diira inin dhaabhonsa budonte, Galila peendar yeam birayse ida yive" kena ki hamade.
41014029	Bhethiroosaar "Eeno waani wul haam garea ko hannaar, inta haam garattine" kina ki hamade.
41014030	Yesus maasayse "Inta hana gon ida giye: Kina sootin koam baacha biraa lamaa goyt qiiqima 'Inta kiam dhesattine' hamayse makkam goyt marimaada marime" kina ki hamade.
41014031	Bhethiroosaar dhalqam wocchi hayayse "Dembhi ko hannaar, hambete diyayda diye; hamin ko dahaakaar 'Inta kiam dhesattine' hamayse marimattine" kina ki hamade. Eeno waani wulaar yin ko giyade.
41014032	Ogora Getesemaane hambhen raqindar ke yivade. Ogotear Yesus yisa paanan yivayna eenana "Barjoam inin miskenka yedi kote dooqee" ki hamade.
41014033	Bhethiroosbee, Yayqoobbee, Wannisbeam yinka entsate yivayse Yesus targadhite gaalan ki yedade.
41014034	Kenaar yin ki giyade: "Qaabono idar thoothayse iam deesamba koda haye; ogona yedi kote dooqayse wocchimbhayse toolee" ki hamade.
41014035	Kekala likka pegadhayse peendar kumpurdhayse, dandimea ko hanna, kaa wodaka maatota dohoono yerro kidara konin sagoadettsi Barjoam ki miskade:
41014036	"Imbo, yer wul hana dandima ko dandime. Ko gaalen wucimanam inin wucoamadettsi ikalanka pegisima! Ko dahaannaar hanin nashaadettsi ko dee; inin nashaadettsi ko dahabhoode" ki hamade.
41014037	Ogosa budonte maatate kinin nivenka, raatayse ke daaka keam haapayse, Bhethiroosna yi giyna: "Simoon, ya raatidu? Savaat kala hattear wocchimbhayse toolano haam bashidu?
41014038	Taysate yeam siyonsa iinte arsente yenin ardoamadettsi wocchimbhayse Barjoam miskee. Eedisa qaabe ashkimbhine; ko dahaannaar waano eedisa qajadhine" kina ki hamade.
41014039	Tapir yivayse ini yinin miskon upsinka Barjoam ki miskade.
41014040	Pir yisa paanan yivayna eenakal kinin nivenka, gindhe keam bashonna raatayse kenin dohonte keam ki haapade. Kediar kina kenin giyenam dhesadehe.
41014041	Makkanso goyt kekal nivayse kena yin ki giyade: "Taar yedi raatidu? Tapir lay ukunsee ukunso? Keeda yena yeekidine, wodanoar yeskidine. Marrato! I Eedi Naaseam seeson eenasa aaninte yettsate iam koda imbhe.
41014042	Keeda dhaabhee! Wo yive; iam yettsate imea kash, theedidine" ki hamade.
41014043	Yesus ogoam akar giyte ki daaka, marrato! Tabhi lamaana kisa paanan yivayna eenasa kalaa Yiwda saana ki nivade; kimbesana kinka halpabee haljobe bovoono thoothino eeno gudullasa hayonabee, Musesa yigginam dhettsayna eenabee, donzanabekalanka nittsadhaysaka ko nivade.
41014044	Yesusam yettsate imea Yiwda eenana birayse "Inin sunqea kidine; kiam yedate payya toolayse bavate yivee" hamayse milkit kena imidine.
41014045	Kidiar saanawa kalan nivayse hatte, "Dhettsea" hamayse kiam ki sunqade.
41014046	Eenaar ogosa budobar kiam ke yedade.
41014047	Theedin kikal woyayse dahaana eenasa eedi kalaa halpanam yisa gochayse gudullasa gebhaasa waadiman ea qaaminam taxate ki dhabade.
