41014048	Yesusaar "Eedisa koymo buurate itsea eedidettsi hayayse iam yedana halpabee haljobe bavatee nivaaw?
41014049	Rooro wul Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayante eenaam dhettsada yembesana kinka inin dehenka iam yedeetene; ko dahaannaar Mathaap Gazante thaapadhoono konin thoothoadettsi ko yin maatade" kena ki hamade.
41014050	Kisa paanan yivayna eena wulaar kiam garayse gobate ke yivade.
41014051	Lathana bish qaadhaa naasi barsh kalaa kisa paanan nivite ki dahade; eenaar kiam ke yedade.
41014052	Kidiar lathanaam kedar garayse pundiri gobate ki yivade.
41014053	Yesusamaar gudullasa gebhaakal entsate ke yivade. Ogotear gudullasa hayonabee, donzanabee, Musesa yigginam dhettsayna eenabe wul kinka bukayse ke dahade.
41014054	Bhethiroosaar gudullasa gebhaa kerminsa iinte kinin yeskenka yekka, Yesussa paanan pegeka ki nivade; ogotear poolisanabete nuun kicardhite ki dooqade.
41014055	Gudullasa hayonabee Yiwda peensa donzana wulbe Yesusam dembhi pirdina yeskisea tarja haapana ke zagade; ko dahaannaar haapadehe.
41014056	Ogonoar thoothino eeno buudamoka kidar tarjite ko dahade; ko dahaannaar eensa tarjamono kinka kidar upsi kalaa maatadehe.
41014057	-
41014058	Eensa waani waaniar dhaabhayse, " 'Inta ko aaninka woysadhon Barjosa gazan ooninam kottsayse rooro makkamka ab aanka woysadhaamon ooni woysayda woyse' kinin hamen wodi qansidine" hamayse buudamoka kidar ke tarjade.
41014059	Yin giyayse kenin tarjenkaar kesa tarjamono kinka kidar upsi kalaa maatadehe.
41014060	Gudullasa gebhaa kesa shaarira dhaabhayse, "Yer kala hattear malsi maasattanu? Eena kina hadar kenin tarjayno kono yer hare?" hamayse Yesusam ki oysade.
41014061	Kidi lay hamayse yer kala hattear maasadehe. Pir gudullasa gebhaa "Gobshadhaa Barjoyn qadhaa kisa Naasa Kiristoos yaw?" hamayse kiam ki oysade.
41014062	Yesusaar "Intane; Eedi Naas kantanka dahaa Barjosa mizaqimbar dooqayse kinin dohonbee cecira polonka kinin nivenbeam haapeeda haape" kina ki hamade.
41014063	Gudullasa gebhaa dhagaka yisa apalanam hattsayse, "Keeda os tarja ab wona harrna ko zaske?
41014064	Yedi kisa iirimenam qansidine. Yena har ko maate?" ki hamade. Kedi wulaar "Dembhi ko kiam zaske" hamayse ke kidar pirdade.
41014065	Waani waani eenoar kidar pathimaate, aapinamaar kisa ochayse kiam gutaate, "Hamota dohon yerinam wona giyaa" kina ke hamade. Poolisanaar kiam cavada entsate ke yivade.
41014066	Bhethiroosaar gudullasa gebhaa mayan kerminsa iinte choobar ki daaka, gudullasa gebhaa ooninte waadadhayna maanasa maa kallo nivayse,
41014067	nuun kinin kicardhenka kiam haapayse shirshate shedayse, "Ya pir Naazretra nivaa Yesusbete dahaane" kina ko hamade.
41014068	Kidiar "Hanin giyayno yer har konin dohon dhesattine; inaar bhoqehe" hamayse ki marimade. Ogora mayanka ki utade. [Baacha ki qiiqade.]
41014069	Waadiman edonoar kiam shedayse ogote woyaana eenana "Ea kaar kembesana kinka ki dahade" hamayse lansi pir giyan ko yedade.
41014070	Kidi pir marimidine. Likka kap hamayse ogote woyayse dahaana eena tapir Bhethiroosna "Ya Galila eedi hanin dohonna, gon ya kembesana kinkaa dahade" kina ke hamade.
41014071	Kidi "Yenin giyea eam inta dhesattine!" hamayse yiam ashite malliman ki yedade.
41014072	Saanawaar baacha lanso goyt ki qiiqade. Bhethiroosaar "Baacha lamaa goyt qiiqima makkam goyt 'Inta kiam dhesattine' hamayse iam marimaada marime" hamayse Yesusin kina giyoono kalan bhoq ko hamaysaka ki eepade.
41015001	Burin peen sedhaysaka saanawaar gudullasa hayona Musesa yigginam dhettsayna eenabee, Ayiwd peensa donzana wulbe kinka kenin dhalqonsa budonte, Yesusam yedate dhaxayse bavate kiam Bhilathoosna ke imade.
41015002	Bhilathoosaar "Ayiwd eenasa bitaa yaw?" hamayse kiam ki oysade. Kidiar "Inta hanin giyaadettsine" hamayse kina ki maasade.
41015003	Gudullasa hayona yer thoothi goytika kiam ke bersade.
41015004	Bhilathoos pir "Ya yer kala hattear giyattanu? Kedi yer meemay goytika haam kenin bersenam shedaa" hamayse kiam ki oysade.
41015005	Yesus Bhilathoosin targadhenka yekka yer kala hattear kina maasadehe.
41015006	Bhilathoos levenka levenka Ayiwd eensa Paasikan wodanka, eedi kalaa dhaxira kena kinin buloadettsi eenin oysaa eam kida bule.
41015007	Ogo wodanka wobamo waadimaka peendar banqi dhaasintaka eedi deesayse dhaxin ooninte dhaxadhaana eenasa eedi kalaa Barbaan hambhea dahade.
41015008	Eenoar bukayse Bhilathoos yisa dambindettsi kena ki haye kiam miskan ko yedade.
41015009	Bhilathoosaar "Ayiwd eensa bitaam yena dhaxira inin buloadettsi yedi nashee nasho?" hamayse keam ki oysade.
41015010	Yin giyayse keam kinin oysoono gudullasa hayona Yesusam sun woogintaka kenin yettsate imonam kinin dhesennane.
41015011	Gudullasa hayona "Kintea ooloate Barbaan ki dhaxira wona buldhe" hamayse zarsinin miskoadettsi zarsinam ke sobarsade.
41015012	Bhilathoos pir maasayse "Ta keeda 'Ayiwd eenasa bitaane' yenin hamea eam hamin i hayo?" hamayse keam ki oysade.
41015013	Kediar tapir maasayse "Kiam ziitayse deesima!" hante ke ilatade.
41015014	Kidiar "Hare? Har ki seesaa?" kena ki hamade. Kediar "Kiam ziitayse deesima!" hamayse ini hamora sagi ilatite ke waajade.
41015015	Bhilathoosaar zarsinam wozisota hamayse Barbaanam kena ki bulade; Yesusam qansayse kinin ziitadhoadettsi saskate ki imade.
41015016	Poolisanaar peen wottsea easa kermin Piraytoriyon hambhente kiam entsate ke ardade; ogotear shidhaana poolisana wulam eelate ke buskade.
41015017	Apala zoo kiam ke qattsade; ukumbha qorayse kisa metendar ke wodade.
41015018	"Ayiwd eenasa bitaa, payyamo hana ko dee" hamaate bagada kiam gobshan ke yedade;
41015019	kisa metentear haljoka qanada kidarar ke pathimade. Pir kumpurdhayse goodimayna maatayse kiam keda bage.
41015020	Kiam kenin bagonsa budonte, apalan zoonam kidara bulayse kinnon apalanam tapir kidar ke qattsade; kiamaar masqalindar konngayse ziitate deesana entsate ke yivade.
41015021	Kenin yivenka, Iskindirosbee Rupoosbesa imbaa Qerena peen ea Simoon hambhea gurdara katamandar kinin nivenka, Yesusam ziitadhen masqalinam kantaka kiam ke kettsade.
41015022	Ogora Golgotta hambhen raqindar kiam entsate ke yivade; "Golgotta" hamintano "Eedisa Metedettsi Maataa Raq" hamintane.
41015023	Ogote kenin yeskon wodanka kerbe hambhea dheeshaam woynea hattasa aapira cuubate ashkadhon wucadhensa iinte worsayse kinin wucoadettsi kina ke imade; kidiar wucadehe.
41015024	Masqalindar kiam konngayse ke ziitade; kisa apalanamaar hayna hayna ko yeskeatto hamayse itha daran dhabayse ke kashimade.
41015025	Kiam masqalindar kenin ziitenka burin savaat makkamne.
41015026	Kidar pirdadhon dhettsayno thaapino yin giyaynone: "Ayiwd eenasa bitaane" hamayno thaapine.
41015027	Pir eedi lamaa eedisa koymo sarite itsaynasa, kalaam kisa mizaqimbar, lansoam kisa warkatambar konngayse ke ziitade.
41015028	[Mathaap Gazantear, "Seeson eenbete kiam ko paydadhade" hamayse giidhoono dhalqino ko thoothade.]
41015029	Ogoka sagate yivayna eenaar Yesusam iiraate metenka yisa jugimaate "Eyv! Ya 'Barjosa gazan ooninam kottsayse rooro makkamka pir ida woyse' hamea,
41015030	masqalindara hanchayse ta haam dhacchaa!" hamaate kiam ke bagade.
41015031	Ogodettsi pir gudullasa hayonabee Musesa yigginam dhettsaynabe kinka kikal yin giyada kiam ke bagade: "Een waaniam dhacchayse yiam dhacchana damadehe.
41015032	Kidi Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoos, Israveel eensa bitaa ki hanna, yinda ta ko kiam ziitadhon masqalindara ki hanche; wodiar shedayse kidar woylamin qajooda qaje" ke hamade. Kimbesana kinka ziitadhaana eenaar kiam ke iirade.
41015033	Rooron savaat laxra yedayse savaat salin thoothenka yekka peen wuldar thipa ko maatade.
41015034	Savaat salka Yesus "Elohe, Elohe! Lama sabaqtani?" hamayse upsin yisaam kattsi dheg hayayse ki ilatade. Kosa bulinoar "Isa Barjoa, isa Barjoa! Harrnaa iam garaa?" hamintane.
41015035	Ogotear woyon eensa waani eeno Yesusin giyenam qansayse, "Marrato, Eeliasam kida eele" ke hamade.
41015036	Kesa iira kalaa gobayse woyni thorkaasa iir saaro tittsate bavayse ki wuce malkaka Yesussa apondar wodayse, "Yinda Eelias nivayse kiam kinin dhacchenam wo shede" ki hamade.
41015037	Yesusaar upsin yisa dheg hayayse ilatayse ki diyade.
41015038	Barjosa gazan ooninsa gidin kashadhoono apallo bhaara choo nukindar kiaddha raq lamaadar ko havade.
41015039	Ogotear kisa birante woyaa mato alaqa Yesus hamin kinin diyonam yinin haapon wodanka, "Gon ea kaa Barjo Naasine" ki hamade.
41015040	-
41015041	Pegeka woyayse shedayna maa waani raqin ogote ke dahade. Kediar Galila peente kinin dohonka kisa paanan yivaynabee kina waadadhayna Megdela peen edon Mayriyambee, Ilpoos naasa Yayqoobbee Yoosabesa indan Mayriyambee, Seelomebe kembesana kinka ke dahade; kimbesana kinka Yerusaalemdar utaana thoothi maa waani ke dahade.
41015042	Peen sootaysaka, ashkimbhen rooron maqayse ukunsen roorondar ardota konin hayenka,
41015043	Ayiwd peen donzanasa gobshadhaa, Armatias kataman ea Yoseep ki nivade. Kidiar Barjosa bitamonam wozaka toolite ki dahade. Kurtumbhima Bhilathooskal yivayse Yesussa leesinam kina kinin imoadettsi ki miskade.
41015044	Bhilathoosaar "Saanawa hamin ki diyaa?" hamayse ki targadhade. Mato alaqaamaar eelayse, "Gon diyayse kappidu?" hamayse kiam ki oysade.
41015045	Mato alaqakal qansayse Yesussa leesinam Yoseepna ki imade.
41015046	Yoseepaar apala shanayse leesinam masqalindara hanchayse apalanka ki ochade. Ogoraar seeni layta palsayse ashkadhon duukin oolonte kiam ki duukade; seeni gaari gunngate duukinsa aponam ki shupade.
41015047	Megdela peen edon Mayriyambee Yoosa indan Mayriyambe hamote kiam kenin wodenam shedite ke dahade.
41016001	Ayiwd eensa ukunsen rooroayn maqonsa budonte, Megdela peen edon Mayriyambee, Yayqoobsa indan Mayriyambee, Seelomebe kinka yivayse Yesussa leesinam qadhota shitto gaamea ke shanade.
41016002	Wuudi burin haynin utenka duukindar ke yivade.
41016003	Kediar kinka kikal "Duukin oolonsa apon shupadhon seeninam wona hayne gunngate maroa?" ke hamade.
41016004	Senno kattsi gaari konin dohonna, dheg hamayse kenin shedenka duukinsa apora gunngumayse konin dohonam ke haapade.
41016005	Duukin oolonsa iinte ardayse apala cawli qaadhaa naasi barsh kalaa mizaqimbar dooqayse ki daaka, kiam haapayse ke targadhade.
41016006	Kidi kena "Targadheebhode! Yedi masqalindar konngate ziitayse deesadhaa Naazret peen Yesusam yeda zage. Kidi dhaabhidine; kote qolehe. Leesinam wodadhoono ranqo koshee, shedee.
41016007	Ko dahaannaar yedi yivayse kisa paanan yivaynabee Bhethiroosbena 'Kidi yeam birayse Galila peendar kida yive; yena kinin giyondettsi yedi kiam ogote yeda haape' hamayse kena giyee" ki hamade.
41016008	Ogora igina maana gibattsite keam yer tarshan konin yedonna utaate duukin raqira ke gobade; kattsiar kenin kurtumbhonna yer kala hattear eedina giyadehe.
41016009	[Gabansa biraa rooroaka Yesus burburi seddhiman dembhira yinin dhaabhonsa budonte, birayse tobbhaana beeronaam kinindara bulon Megdela peen edon Mayriyamna ki haapadhade.
41016010	Kodi yivayse kisa paanan yivayna eena bukayse qaabitebee eepitebe kenin dohonte, ogo yin maaton yerinam kena ko giyade.
41016011	Kediar sadaka dahayse kona kinin haapadhonam kenin qansenka, gonne hamadehe.
41016012	Ogosa budontear, kisa paanan yivayna eenasa lamaana katamara utaate os gurdandar kenin yivenka, Yesus goynte kedar eedi abdettsi maatayse kena ki haapadhade.
41016013	Kediar yivayse waani eenana ke giyade; igina eenaar pir gonne hamadehe.
41016014	Ogosa budontear, kummandar dooqayse ke daaka tabhi kalaana yisa paanan yivayna eenana ki haapadhade. Dembhiraar kinin dhaabhonsa budonte, kiam haapaana eena "Wodi kiam haapidine" hamayse kena kenin giyenka, gonne hamayse kenin tiyaamon goynbee kesa qaaben kaymakkon goynbeka keam ki wacimade.
41016015	Kenaar yin ki giyade: "Peen wulsa iinte yivayse Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam een wulna giymate.
41016016	Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam gonne hamayse tiyaabee shiidhaabe dhaqa ki dhaqe; tiyaamadar pirda ko pirdadhe.
41016017	Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam tiyaanana imbhayna milkitina kinane: Naaben innonka beeronaam bula ke bule, apo haalikaar dhalqa ke dhalqe.
41016018	Guninam aaninka yeda ke yede; een deesen davininam ke wucaakaar yer keam hayehe. Hajadhaana eenadar aaninam yisa keda wode; kediar paasha ke paashe" ki hamade.
41016019	Imbaa wontea Yesusaar ogoam kena yinin giyonsa budonte, Barjo cecindar kiam ki tiyade; ogora Barjosa mizaqimbar ki dooqade.
41016020	Kisa paanan yivayna raqin wulir yivayse Barjosa upsinam ke giyade; Imbaa Yesusaar kembesana kinka waadadhite ki dahade; kenin giyenka, kidi yisa upsinsa gonamonam tarshen waadimanka kida wocchise.]
42001001	-
42001002	Gobshadhaa Toploos, birara yedayse yisa aapinka shedayse tarja maataana, Barjosa dhacchintan upsinkaar waadadhayna eena wona kenin saskaadettsi wonnon shaarinte maaton yerinam thoothina eena ashkayse thaapidine.
42001003	-
42001004	Inta taar ogodettsi birara yedayse payya hayayse bhocchayse inin dhesonna, hanin dheson timmirinam ha tipise guttsi guttsi hana thaapana payya maatayse ina ko haapadhade.
42001005	Herodis Yiwda peente kinin bitimon levenka, Abiya muldhara gudula Zakkarias hambhea dahade. Kisa geshonoar gudula Aaron muldhara dohoono Elsaabeth hambhaynone.
42001006	Kedi lamaanaar Barjo yinin giyonbee kisa yigginbeka yer siya yindar haapadhimina maatayse Barjo birante tipa ke dahade.
42001007	Elsaabethaar seeki konin dohonna, kesa naasi qolehe; pir kedi lamaanaar kattsi gecchidine.
42001008	Zakkariasaar yisa muldhanabesana Barjosa gazan ooninte kinin waadadhayno wodan yeskonna Barjosa birante kinin waadadhenka,
42001009	Barjosa gazan ooninte ardayse qunyan ki cubshe gudulmakkon goynka kidar itha ko yeskade.
42001010	Barjosa gazan ooninte qunyan cubshadhenka eeno wul mayante woyayse Barjoam koda miske.
42001011	Barjosa gaanaa qunyan daran cubshate imbhen raqinsa mizaqimbar woyayse ki daaka, Zakkariasna ki haapadhade.
42001012	Zakkariasaar kiam yinin haapenka, targadhayse kattsi ki kurtumbhade.
42001013	Barjosa gaanaa kina yin ki giyade: "Zakkariaso, kurtumbhaabhode! Barjo hasa miskenam qansidine; geshono hasa Elsaabeth naasi anngi adha ko adhe; kisa naabenamaar Wannis hamayse hada wode.
42001014	Kinin adhadhonna hana kattsi woza koda dee; thoothino eenoar kisa adhadhinka koda wozadhe.
42001015	Harrna hambhidianna, Barjosa birante eedi gebhi kida maate. Woynea hattasa aapin cuubadhonbee waani een barsen wucadhenbeam wucehe; ki adhadhima indansa iinte ki daaka, Manpas Gazanka kida thoothe.
42001016	Kidi Israveel eensa thoothin eenaam Imbaa kesa Barjodar keam kida maase.
42001017	Kidi Barjoyn nivensa birayse manpasinbee kantanbeka Eeliasdettsi maatayse Wannis eendar kida nive. Imbanasa woylaminam naanadar kida maase; ee hamimina eenasa woylaminam tipana eenasa pakalmakkondar kida maase. Ogoka eeno Barjona ashkimbhoono konin doadettsi koam kida haye" kina ki hamade.
42001018	Zakkariasaar Barjosa gaanaana "Inta gecchidine, isa geshonoar gecchidine. Keeda ogono gon konin maatenam hamin ida dhese?" kina ki hamade.
42001019	Barjosa gaanaar kina yinin maasenka, "Inta Barjosa birante woyea Gabreelne. Ogo wozisen dhalqinam hana inin giyoadettsi Barjo iam kinin nittsonna hakal i nivade.
42001020	Yaar wodan yeskenka maaten isa dhalqinam hanin tiyaamonna, ogo inin giyon wul konin maatea rooroaka yekka apo kaya hada maate; dhalqana damattane. Inin giyoono wul thootha ko thoothe" kina ki hamade.
42001021	Eenoar Zakkariasam kaalite ko dahade. Barjosa gazan ooninte kinin kapponna, "Hamin ki hamaa?" hamayse ke bhocchade.
42001022	Zakkarias Barjosa gazan oonira yinin utenka eenna giyana damadehe. Ogonante Barjosa gazan ooninte Barjokala yer kinin haaponam kedi dhesidine; kidiar milkitka kena eshkaate apo kaya maatayse ki shidhade.
42001023	Barjosa gazan ooninte kinin waadadhen wodan maqaysaka, yisa oonindar ki yivade.
42001024	Ogosa budonte kisa geshono Elsaabeth sirmayse arpi dongna ooninte aadhimbhayse ko dooqade.
42001025	Kodiar "Barjo yisa nashimmakkonka iam kinin shedaa wodaka ogodettsin yerin payyan ina ki hayade; eensa shaarinte idar dohon ooshimbhenam ki shiishade" ko hamade.
42001026	Elsaabeth konin sirmonsa laskoa arpeaka Barjo yisa gaanaa Gabreelam Galila peen Naazret hambhen katamandar,
42001027	Dawtsa muldhara Yoseep hambhea yinin seeson anngika wodhaamon naandar kiam ki yittsade. Naan ogosa naabeno Mayriyam koda hambhe.
42001028	Barjosa gaanaar kokal nivayse, "Ya Barjosa nashadhoono, payyamo hana ko dee; Barjo hambetene. [Ya maanasa shaarinte gobshadhoonone]" kona ki hamade.
42001029	Kodiar kisa dhalqinka kattsi targadhayse, "Kono hamin dohoono nagaymakkone?" hamayse ko qaabade.
42001030	Ogora Barjosa gaanaar kona yin ki giyade: "Mayriyam, Barjosa birante gobshi hanin haaponna kurtumbhaabhode.
42001031	Shedaa! Ya sirmaada sirme; naasi anngiar adhaada adhe; kisa naabenamaar Yesus hamayse hada wode.
42001032	Kidi eedi gebhi kida maate; kanka Wuldara Sagea Barjo Naasine koda hambhe. Imbaa Barjo kisa imbaa Dawtsa bitamon borkotonam kina kida ime.
42001033	Yayqoobsa muldhandar rooro wulna lay kida bitime; kisa bitamonsaar macchi qolehe" kona ki hamade.
42001034	Mayriyamaar Barjosa gaanaana "Inta anngika wodhayse inin dhesaamonna, ogono hamin ko yin dee?" kina ko hamade.
42001035	Kidiar kona yin ki giyade: "Manpas Gazano hadar niva ko nive; Wuldara Sagea Barjosa kantano hadar koda shipe. Ogonante hanin adhea gazaa naasa Barjo Naasine kida hambhe.
42001036	Shedaa! Hasa muldhano Elsaabethaar ta yisa gecchamondar naasi anngi kodi sirmidine; seekine hambhayno ko sirmaysaka kono kosa arpi laskone.
42001037	Harrna hambhidianna, Barjoam bashea yer qolehe" kona ki hamade.
42001038	Mayriyamaar, "Barjosa waadiman edono intane. Hanin giyondettsi ina ko dee" kina ko hamade. Barjosa gaanaar kokalanka edimayse ki yivade.
42001039	Ogo wodanka Mayriyam dhaabhayse Yiwda peente dhukanka dohon katama kallondar saana yivayse,
42001040	Zakkariassa ooninte ardayse Elsaabethaam ko nagaysade.
42001041	Elsaabethaar Mayriyamin nagaysenam konin qansenka, iinte kosa dahaa naasa kattsi ki ruqumade; Elsaabethaar Manpas Gazanka ko thoothade.
42001042	Kodiar upsi gebhika yin ko giyade: "Ya mansen naana wulra gobshadhoonone; hanin adhea naasaar gobshadhaane.
42001043	Barjoyn qaadhaa Imbaam adhayno ikal hanin nivayno hamin dohoono ina gobshine.
42001044	Shedaa! Hanin nagaysenam qansite i daaka, isa iinte dahaa naasa wozaka ki ruqumade.
42001045	Barjo Imbayn hana giyon wulam maata ko maate hamayse hanin tiyonna, ya gobshadhoonone!" kona ko hamade.
42001046	Mayriyam yin ko giyade: "Isa sadano Barjo Imbaam koda gobshe;
42001047	isa woylammoar iam Dhacchea Barjoka koda wozadhe.
42001048	Inin wozadhayno Barjo i ko tokaa maaton yisa waadiman edonam kinin haaponnane. Kinara yedayse adhadhino wul gobshadhoono iam koda hame.
42001049	Ogonoar kantanka dahaa Barjo ina yer gebhi kinin hayonnane; naabenoar kisa gazane.
42001050	Barjoam kurtumbhen eenna adhadhira adhadhinka yekka, Barjo kena burqadhayse yer payya kida haye.
42001051	Kidi yisa kantanka gebhi waadima haydine. Yisa bhocchinka poorimbhaynaam kidi kekalanka thar thar haydine.
42001052	Peen wottsaynaam kesa bitamora keam hanchidine; yirk hamaynaam gobshika keam dheg haydine.
42001053	Daaqardhaanaam yer payyaka kidi micchidine; wodimma eenaam aan guuri keam ki yittsade.
42001054	-
42001055	Barjo wosa eykena Abraambee kisa muldhanabena 'Rooro wul lay yena burqadhayse yer payya ida haye' hamayse kinin giyon wozanam bhocchintaka, kina waadadhayna Israveel eenaam kidi kelshidine" ko hamade.
42001056	Mayriyamaar Elsaabeth ooninte arpi makkamaddha dooqayse yisa oonindar maatate ko yivade.
42001057	Elsaabethaar adhiman arpin kosa yeskaysaka naasi anngi ko adhade.
42001058	Kosa gurdan eenabee muldhanabe Barjo yisa nashimmakkonam kona thoosayse kinin hayonam qansayse kombesana kinka ke wozadhade.
42001059	Kediar lankaysoa rooroaka naasasa qaamanam taxana ke nivade; imbaasa naabenka Zakkarias hamayse kisa naabenam wodana ke qaabade.
42001060	Indano "Yin dehehe; nammo kisa Wannisne" kena ko hamade.
42001061	Kediar "Hasa muldhante naabea agaaka eldhea hay ki hannaar qolehe" kona ke hamade.
42001062	Ogora imbaam "Hasa naasaam hay hamayse eldhoadettsi ha nashe?" hamayse milkitka kiam ke oysade.
42001063	Zakkariasaar milkitka yer thaapi thaapadhea oysayse, "Kisa nammo Wannisne" hamayse ki thaapade. Eeno wulaar targadhidine.
42001064	Ogo wodanka saanawa Zakkariassa apono ko bulimade; Barjoamaar gobshaate dhalqan ki yedade.
42001065	Gurdante dohon een wulna kurtumbhe ko maatade. Ogono yerro wul Yiwda peen dhukanka dohon wul gidir ko giidhade.
42001066	Qansaana wulaar, "Ta naasa kaa hamin hamea ki doo?" hamayse yisa woylaminte ke yedade; ogonoar Barjosa kantano kimbesana kinka konin dohonnane.
42001067	Naasasa imbaa Zakkarias Manpas Gazanka thoothayse hamota dohonam yin giyan ki yedade:
42001068	"Israveel eenasa Barjo Imbaa wo kisa eedanakal nivayse wodar dohon bazanam kashayse woam kinin dhacchonna ki gobshadhe.
42001069	Yisa waadiman ea Dawtsa muldhara dhacchea kanta eam kidi dhaasidine;
42001070	enara yedayse Barjokala qansayse eenna giyayna gazana eenasa aponka kinin giyondettsi,
42001071	woam jibbaynabee wosa banqin eenabe wulsa aanira woam dhacchidine.
42001072	Ogoamaar yin kinin hayoono wosa eykenana burqadhayse yer payya hayotabee yinin giyon gazan yisa mallanam bhocchintakabene.
42001073	Ogo yisa mallanam eykea wosa Abraambesana kinin ardoono
42001074	-
42001075	woam jibbaynasa aanira dhaqayse wonin dehen rooron wulka kurtumbhe qolma Barjosa birante gazamobee tipamobeka kina wonin waadadhoadettsine.
42001076	Ta ya naasa kaa, Wuldara Sagea Barjokala qansayse eenna giyeane hada hambhe. Ogonoar kisa goynam ashkana Barjo Imbasa birante hada yive.
42001077	Ogona kesa seesono kena ko shidhe hambhenam Barjokalanka kenin haapen dhaqintasa timmirinam keam hada dhettse.
42001078	Ogono yin konin dohoono Barjo eedisa seesonam kinin garenbee kisa lemmakkonbekane. Ogonante dhaqintasa hay cecira wona utana koda haye.
42001079	Thipante dahayse diyanna dohon een wulna kidi shaaka ki shaake; roonam wosa payyan goyndar kida entse" ki hamade.
42001080	Naasaar gebhidine. Woylaminkaar ki wocchimbhade. Israveel eenana yinin haapadhenka yekka, darante ki dooqade.
42002001	Ogo wodanka Roome peensa bita kinin bitimon peen wulir dohoono eeno wul naaben konin thaapadhoadettsi Bitaa Awgisthoos oosh ki ooshade.
42002002	Qerenoos Sooria peenam kinin wottsen wodanka, naaben thaapadhayno ogono bironone.
42002003	Ogonante zarsino wul yisa eykena peendar naaben thaapsota ko yivade.
42002004	-
42002005	Yoseep Dawt muldhara kinin dohonna, Galila peen Naazret katamara dhaabhayse Yiwda peen Betelem hambhen Dawtin adhadhon katamante kinin seeson naan sirmon Mayriyambete thaapadhota ki yivade.
42002006	Ogote ke daaka, kosa adhiman arpino ko yeskade.
42002007	Yisa biraa naasaam ogote ko adhade. Shonnayn wodhen ooninte raq kena konin qolmonna, kiam apalanka ochayse wanngayn galan itsen gonngalante ko wottsade.
42002008	Peen ogote katamansa gasante yisa yaatonam gishite wodhayna gishiman gishayna eena ke dahade.
42002009	Iginakal Barjosa gaanaa ki haapadhade; Barjosa gobshin shaakanoar kesa gasante ko shaakade; ogona kedi kattsi ke kurtumbhade.
42002010	Barjosa gaanaar yin ki giyade: "Hay! Kurtumbheebhode! Een wulna maatea kattsi wozisea upsi yena ida giye.
42002011	Ogonoar kina Dawtin adhadhon katamante Dhacchea, kidiar Imbaa Kiristoos yena ki adhadhade.
42002012	Milkitino kisa yinne: Naasi apalaka ochayse wanngayn galan itsen gonngalante wottsadhaam haapeeda haape" kena ki hamade.
42002013	Ke dhesima thoothina Barjo cecira kinin nittsaana gaanana agaa gaanaakal theedi haapadhayse, Barjoam gobshaate
42002014	"Cecinte Barjona gobshi ko dee; payyamonoar peendar Barjo nashimmakkonka kinin sheden eenna ko dee" ke hamade.
42002015	Barjosa gaanana kekala edimayse cecindar kenin yivonsa budonte, kedi yaana gishayna eena kinka kikal "Betelem yivayse Barjoyn wona giyon ogo yerinam wo shede" ke hamade.
42002016	Saanawa yivayse Mayriyambee, Yoseepbee, wanngayn galan itsen gonngalante wottsadhaa naasabeam ke haapade.
42002017	Shedayse, naasa agaasa kena giidhon yerinam eenna ke giyade.
42002018	Ogoam qansaana eena wul yaana gishaynayn kena giyon yerinka ke targadhade.
42002019	Mayriyam ogo yerin wulam yisa woylaminka qaaban ko yedade.
42002020	Yaana gishayna kena giidhondettsi, kenin qansonbee kenin haaponbe wulna Barjoam gobshada yisa raqindar maatayse ke yivade.
42002021	Naasa adhadhaysaka kisa qaamanam taxana rooro lankay konin thoothonna, kisa indano sirmima Barjosa gaanaa kinin giyaadettsi, kisa naabenam Yesus hamayse ko wodadhade.
42002022	Musesa yigginka gazimbhanna kenin waadadhen wodan yeskaysaka, naasaam Barjosa birante thettsana yinka bavate Yerusaalem ke yivade.
42002023	Ogoamaar kenin hayayno Barjosa yiggin mathaapinte "Birayse adhadhaa naasi anngi wul Barjona edimaa gaza eedi kida maate" hamayse thaapadhondettsine.
42002024	Ogodettsi Barjosa yigginka "Walee likka lamaa way walee gebhisa naasi lamaa Barjona marsha machadhea hayayse bava koda zaske" hamen upsinna ogoam imana ke yivade.
42002025	Ogo wodanka Yerusaalemir Simoon hambhea eedi kalaa ki dahade. Ea agaar Israveel eenaam dhacchayse wocchinseam toolaate dahaa eedi tipabee Barjoam gobshintaka wocchimbheabe ki dahade; Manpas Gazanoar kimbesana ko dahade.
42002026	Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoosam haapima dembhi kinin diiminam Manpas Gazano ena birayse kina giydine.
42002027	Ogo wodanka Manpas Gazano kiam konin dhaasonna, Barjosa gazan oonindar ki yivade. Muse yigginsa dambinam toolana, naasa Yesusam imbaabee indanbe yinka tiyayse Barjosa gazan ooninte ke ardade.
42002028	Ogo wodanka Simoon naasaam yidar tiyate incayse, Barjoam gobshada yin ki giyade:
42002029	"Imbo, 'Hayayda haye' ina hanin hamoono payyan upsino ko thoothade; ta keeda i hasa waadiman eam peen kora payyaka tiyaa.
42002030	-
42002031	Ogonoar een wulsa birante hanin ashkon hasa dhacchintanam isa aapinka inta haapidine.
42002032	Kidiar Ayiwdtay hamma eenana goninam eshkea shaaka kida maate; hasa eedana Israveel eenanaar gobshine" ki hamade.
42002033	Imbaabee indanbe naasa Yesussa giidhon yerin wulka ke targadhade.
42002034	Simoonaar kena Barjo eelayse indan Mayriyamna yin ki giyade: "Shedaa! Kaa naasaka Israveel eensa thoothino kanka koda kaye; pir thoothino eeno kanka koda dhaqe; thoothino eenoar kiam kenin jibbensa milkit kena kinin maatoadettsi Barjo kiam kamidine.
42002035	Ogoam Barjo kinin hayoono thoothin eensa woylaminte aachimon qaabenam may hayanane; hasaar woylaminsa iinte qaabono halpadettsi koda uxe" kona ki hamade.
42002036	-
42002037	Ogo wodanka Aseer zarsira Panuveel naano Hanna hambhayno Barjokala qansayse eenna giyayno ko dahade. Kodiar yisa geshoabesana kinka leve tobbhaa dooqayse, geshoa kokala diyaysaka kosa lendho eedi oydi kaysa apo oydi levenin maatenka yekka, yimal bish dahada kattsi gecchoonone. Itsima Barjoam miskada sootinbee rooronbe Barjona waadadhaate Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayara kodi edimehe.
42002038	Ogo wodanka nivayse Barjoam gobshaate Barjo Yerusaalemir eendar dohon bazanam kashayse keam kinin dhacchenam toolayna wulna naasa goynsa ko giyade.
42002039	Barjosa yigginka giidhon wulam kenin macchonsa budonte, Yoseepbee Mayriyambe naasaam tiyayse Galila peensa kenin dohon Naazret katamandar ke maatade.
42002040	Naasaar waanka gebhaate bhocchinkaar wocchimbhaate ki yivade; pakalmakkonkaar ki thoothade. Barjosa sunin imintono kimbesana kinka ko dahade.
42002041	Yesussa imbaabee indanbe leven levenka Paasika rooroa gobshadheaka Yerusaalemdar keda yive.
42002042	Yesus leve tabhi lamaa naas ki daaka, ogo Paasikan rooroaka Ayiwd eenasa dambindettsi Yerusaalemdar ke yivade.
42002043	Rooronaamaar yinin macchonsa budonte kenin maatenka, naasa Yesus Yerusaalemir shidhidine; imbaabee indanbe ogo kinin shidhonam dhesadehe.
42002044	Eenbesana kinka yivite ki dahade hamada rooro kalaa goyti ke yivade; ogora yisa muldhanabee yinin dhesayna eenabekal kiam ke zagade.
42002045	Yinin bashadhonsa budonte kiam zagaate Yerusaalemdar ke maatade.
42002046	Rooro makkamsa budonte Barjosa yigginam dhettsaynasa shaarinte dooqayse kekalanka kinin qansenbee keamaar kinin oysenbeka Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayante ke haapade.
42002047	Kinin giyenam qansayna wul kisa qaabenbee kisa malsinbeka kattsi kedi targadhidine.
42002048	Imbaabee indanbe kiam kenin haapenka, kedi targadhidine. Indano "Isa naasa, harrnaa yin wodar hayaa? Shedaa! Imbee hambabe kattsi gaalite haam wo zagade" kina ko hamade.
42002049	Kidiar kena yinin maasenka, "Harrnee iam zagaa? Inta Imbasa ooninte daa iam konin zaskenam yedi dheseete?" ki hamade.
42002050	Kediar kena kinin giyon dhalqinam bhocchadehe.
42002051	Kembesana kinka dhaabhayse Naazretdar ki yivade; kenaar ee hamaate ki dahade. Kodi indanoar igina yerra wulam yisa woylaminte yedite ko dahade.
42002052	Yesus pakalmakkonbee gebhintanbeka, shawkadhaa maatayse Barjobee eedibesa birante gebhaate ki dahade.
42003001	Roome peen bitaa Thibaroos bitimaysaka tabhi dongsoa leveaka, Bhenthenaawi Bhilathoos Yiwda peenam wottsea ki dahade; Herodisaar Galila peenam wottsea ki dahade; iishima Pilbhoosaar Thurasbee Ithirakondoosbe peenam wottsea ki dahade; Lisaaniyosaar Abileene peenam wottsea ki dahade.
42003002	Hannabee Qayappabe gudullasa gembha ke dahade. Ogo wodanka Zakkarias naasa Wannis darante ki daaka, Barjosa upsino kikal ko nivade.
42003003	Ogonante Wannis Yordaanoos baynsa gasante dohon peen wulir "Yesa seesonin shidhoadettsi, seeson waadimanam garayse Barjodar maatayse shiidhee" hamaate Barjosa upsinam giyada ki yaayade.
42003004	-
42003006	Ogonoar yin konin dohoono Barjokala qansayse eenna giyea Isiasin giyenka: "Marrato! 'Barjoyn yekal nivenna, yesa woylaminam ashkee; goynamaar kina gaz hayee. Qanana wul ke thoothe; dhukanabee kuttonabe yirk ke hame. Wobona goynaar gaz ke hame; agaammo goynoar agaa ko maate. Eeno wul Barjosa dhacchintanam koda shede' hamayse ilatea easa upsino darante koda qansime" hamayse ena birayse Isiassa mathaapinte thaapadhondettsi ko maatade.
42003007	Ogonante kikal shiidhanna nivon eenna Wannis yin ki giyade: "Yedi qarshi naanato, niven Barjosa wacimera gobayse yenin dhaqoadettsi yeam kiilaa hayne?
42003008	Ta keeda seeson waadimanam garayse Barjodar yenin maatonam dhehen payyan waadiman waadadhee. Yesa woylaminkaar 'Wodi Abraam naasine' hamayse erimeebhode. Yena ida giye: Barjo yi zaganna kina sennara Abraamna naasi hayayse dhaasana dama ki dame.
42003009	Ta haaqanaam taxate dhabayno tesimbho demente kesa wodadhidine; ogonante payyan aapin ushimina haaqana wulam taxate nuunte koda dhabadhe" kena ki hamade.
42003010	Eenoar "Ta har haya ko woam zaske?" hamayse Wannisam oysite ko dahade.
42003011	Kidiar "Apala lamaa yisa dahaa kalaam qolmaana ki ime; gala yisa dahaar ogodettsi ki haye" hamayse kena ki maasade.
42003012	Gibirin kacchaynaar kikal shiidhanna nivayse, "Woam Dhettsea, woam ta har haya ko zaske?" hamayse kiam ke oysade.
42003013	Kidiar "Yena yigginte giidhorra saskayse koymon tiyeebhode" hamayse kena ki maasade.
42003014	Poolisanaar nivayse, "Woamsin ta har haya ko zaske?" hamayse kiam ke oysade. Kidiar "Eensa koymonam kantaka buurate tiyeebhode; hayyeamaar buudamoka berseebhode; yesa waadimanna yena imbhayno bazano yena ko yeeke" hamayse kena ki maasade.
42003015	Ogo wodanka eenoar Wannissa dhalqinam bhocchaate wozaka kaalite, "Kaa ea Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoos doo ki dew?" hamayse yisa woylaminka qaabite ko dahade.
42003016	Wannisaar ke wulna yin ki giyade: "Inta noqoka yeam ida shive; ko dahaannaar idara kantanka sagea niva ki nive. Inta kisa dunngurinsa dhaxinam hattear bulana damimane. Kidi Manpas Gazanbee nuubeka yeam kida shive.
42003017	Gazgonam qanayse puqulara aapinam kinin bulea anngamo kisa aaninte ko dahade. Aapinam payya ashkayse yisa kononte kida kee; puqulanamaar dikimon nuunte kida koqe" ki hamade.
42003018	Ogonante eenaam thoothi waana waana hama goytika kiilaate Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam kena giyte ki dahade.
42003019	Ko dahaannaar, Galila peenam wottsea Herodis iishima Pilbhoossa geshon Herodiyadaam kinin keemonnabee kinin waadadhon siyon waadiman wulbena Wannis kiam ki wacimade.
42003020	Ogona Herodis yinin waadadhon siyon waadiman wulra saskayse, pir Wannisam dhaxin ooninte ki dhaskade.
42003021	Een wulin shiidhenka Yesusaar ki shiidhade. Barjoam kinin miskenka cecino ko bulimade,
42003022	Manpas Gazanoar waleedettsi maatayse kidar ko hanchade. "Inin nashea isa Naasa yane; hanka ida wozadhe" hamea upsi cecira ko qansimade.
42003023	Yesus eenaam dhettsan kinin yedenka lendho kisa eedi kalaa kaysa apo tabhiaddhane. Eenna Yesus Yoseep naasi kida maate. Yesussa eykena kinane:
42003024	(38) Barjo naasa Addaam, Addaam naasa Seet, Seet naasa Henoos,
42003025	(37) Henoos naasa Qaynan, Qaynan naasa Malaliveel, Malaliveel naasa Yaared, Yaared naasa Henook, Henook naasa Matusaala,
42003026	(36) Matusaala naasa Laamex, Laamex naasa Nohe, Nohe naasa Seem, Seem naasa Arpakisaad, Arpakisaad naasa Qaynim,
42003027	(35) Qaynim naasa Sheela, Sheela naasa Ebeer, Ebeer naasa Peleeg, Peleeg naasa Revu, Revu naasa Serug,
42003028	(34) Serug naasa Naakor, Naakor naasa Taara, Taara naasa Abraam, Abraam naasa Yisaaq, Yisaaq naasa Yayqoob,
42003029	(33) Yayqoob naasa Yiwda, Yiwda naasa Paarees, Paarees naasa Hethroon, Hethroon naasa Arni, Arni naasa Raam, Raam naasa Aminaadaab,
42003030	(32) Aminaadaab naasa Navasoon, Navasoon naasa Selimoon, Selimoon naasa Boveez, Boveez naasa Iyobeed, Iyobeed naasa Isey,
42003031	Isey naasa Dawt, Dawt naasa Naataan, Naataan naasa Maathaat, Maathaat naasa Maynaan, Maynaan naasa Meelia,
42003032	(30) Meelia naasa Eliyaqem, Eliyaqem naasa Yonaan, Yonaan naasa Yoseep, Yoseep naasa Yiwda, Yiwda naasa Simoon,
42003033	(29) Simoon naasa Lewi, Lewi naasa Mathaat, Mathaat naasa Yooraam, Yooraam naasa Elivezar, Elivezar naasa Yoseev,
42003034	(28) Yoseev naasa Eer, Eer naasa Elmodaam, Elmodaam naasa Qosaam, Qosaam naasa Haadi, Haadi naasa Milki,
42003035	(27) Milki naasa Neeri, Neeri naasa Selatial, Selatial naasa Zerubaabeel, Zerubaabeel naasa Rees, Rees naasa Yonaan,
42003036	(26) Yonaan naasa Yooda, Yooda naasa Yoseep, Yoseep naasa Semey, Semey naasa Matatiyo, Matatiyo naasa Mavat,
42003037	(25) Mavat naasa Naage, Naage naasa Eslim, Eslim naasa Nahoom, Nahoom naasa Amoth, Amoth naasa Matatiyo,
42003038	(23-24) Matatiyo naasa Yoseep, Yoseep naasa Yoona, Yoona naasa Milki, Milki naasa Lewi, Lewi naasa Maati, Maati naasa Eeli, Eeli naasa Yoseepne.
42004001	Yesusaar Manpas Gazanka thoothayse Yordaanoos bayra kinin maatenka, Manpas Gazano darandar kiam entsaate konin yivenka,
42004002	eedi lamaa kaysa rooro Seethaanka taysadhate ki dahade. Roorona iginaka yer kala hattear itsadehe. Roorona igina maqaysaka ki daaqardhade.
42004003	Seethaanaar Yesusna "Ya Barjo Naas ha daana, seenin koka 'Balasha maataa' hamaa" kina ki hamade.
42004004	Yesusaar kina yinin maasenka, " 'Eedi balasha itsayse bish dehehe' hamayse thaapadhidine" ki hamade.
42004005	Ogora Seethaan Yesusam yinka dheg hamon raqindar entsate utayse, peendar haapadhen bitamon wulam woda likkasa iir kina dhahayse,
42004006	"Ogo kesa hayamonbee gobshin wulbeam hana imayda ime. Harrna hambhidianna, ina imbhidine; inin nasheana imayda ime.
42004007	Ogonante ya ina kumpurdhayse ha goodimidianna, kono wul hanti koda maate" kina ki hamade.
42004008	Yesusaar kina yinin maasenka, " 'Hasa Imbaa Barjona kumpurdhayse kibisheana goodimaa!' hamayse thaapadhidine" ki hamade.
42004009	-
42004011	Ta pir Seethaan Yesusam Yerusaalem entsayse Barjosa gazan ooninsa illindar bulate woysayse kina yin ki giyade: " 'Haam kenin tooloadettsi Barjo yisa gaananana giya ki giye; kediar roon hannonam seenin qanoamadettsi yisa aaninka keedhayse haam yeda ke yede' hamayse thaapadhidine. Keeda ya Barjo Naasi hanna, kora mia bhulate hanchaa!" kina ki hamade.
42004012	Yesusaar kina yinin maasenka, " 'Hasa Imbaa Barjoam taysate shedaabhode!' hamayse thaapadhidine" ki hamade.
42004013	Seethaanaar yinin taysen wulam kinin macchonsa budonte, pir kiam taysate shedana agea woda haapadhenka yekka kikalanka ki pegimbhade.
42004014	Yesus Manpas Gazansa kantanka thoothayse Galila peendar ki maatade; kisa waadimano Galila peenbee kosa gasante dohon peen wul gidirbe ko qansimade.
42004015	Kesa bukin raqinte keam dhettsite ki dahade; kinin dhettsenkaar eeno wul kiam ko gobshade.
42004016	Ogosa budonte Yesus yinin gebhon kataman Naazretdar ki yivade. Ogotear yisa dambindettsi ukunsen rooroaka Ayiwd eensa bukin raqinte ki ardade; Mathaap Gazanam nabbabana ki dhaabhade.
42004017	Barjokala qansayse eenna giyea Isias mathaapin kina imbhaysaka yin giyayse thaapadhaa raqadar bulayse:
42004018	-
42004019	"Barjosa Manpasino idar ko dahade; qambhinana Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam inin giyoadettsi iam ki qadhade. Dhaxadhaanayn buldhen, aapin kayaanayn sheden i giye, gaalensa iinte dahaanaam gaalera inin buloadettsi, ogo Barjo yisa nashimmakkonam kinin dhehen levenin yeskonam inin giyoadettsi iam ki nittsade" hamayse ki nabbabade.
42004020	Yesus mathaapinam diithayse Ayiwd eensa bukin raqinte waadiman eana imayse ki dooqade. Bukin raqinte dohoono eeno wul bhocchaate kibisheam koda shede.
42004021	Kidiar "Marrato! Ta kono nabbabadhenka yenin qansoono mathaapinsa upsino kina thoothidine" kena ki hamade.
42004022	Kinnon goynsa eeno wul yer payya koda giye; kinin giyen payyan dhalqinka targadhayse, "Kaa Yoseep naasatayu?" ke hamade.
42004023	Yesusaar kena yin ki giyade: " 'Ya akkimia, ta haam pacchaa!' hamen kamsin koam idar bavima shidhattene. Ogodettsi 'Qipirnaahoomir hanin waadadhon wonin qanson kotear hasa peente waadadhaa' ina yeda hame.
42004024	Inta yena gon ida giye: Barjokala qansayse eenna giyeam kisa peente dahayna eena hamin ko dahaakaar kiam tiyehe.
42004025	Inta yena gon ida giye: Eelias wodanka leve makkambee arpi laxbe doobin qanima shidhonna peen wuldar gebhi daaqi dahaysaka, Israveel peente thoothina qambhina maana ke dahade.
42004026	Ko dahaannaar Eelias Sidoona peente dohon Sirabhta gurdante edon qambhinkal kiam ko yittsadhade; Israveel peente dahaana maana waanikal kiam yittsadhadehe.
42004027	Barjokala qansayse eenna giyea Elsav wodanka Israveel peente thoothino lamth burqoka hajadhaana ke dahade; Sooria peente Niviman bishne paashaa, kesa iira eedi hay dahaannaar paashadehe" kena ki hamade.
42004028	Ayiwd eensa bukin raqinte dahaana wul dhalqin ogoam qansayse kattsi ke wacimade.
42004029	Dhaabhayse katamara mayanka Yesusam yedate ke bulade; kiam boodante kupate dhabota zagayse katamanin ashkadhon ashondar ke yivade.
42004030	Kidiar kesa shaarinka utate ki yivade.
42004031	Ogosa budonte Yesus Galilar dohon Qipirnaahoom katamandar ki yivade. Ogote Ayiwd eensa ukunsen rooroaka eenaam dhettsite ki dahade.
42004032	Kidi yisa hayamonka kinin giyenna eeno wul kinin dhettson timmirinka targadhidine.
42004033	Ayiwd eensa bukin raqinte beeronin yiam yedaa eedi kalaa ki dahade. Upsin yisa dheg hayayse ilataate:
42004034	"Naazret peen Yesuso, hambesana wosa dohoono hare? Woam kaysana nivaaw? Hay hanin dohonam inta dhesidine; ya Barjokala nivaa Gazaane!" hamayse ki ilatade.
42004035	Yesusaar beeroaka, "Lay hamayse eadara utaa!" hamayse kiam ki bitade. Beeroar kesa birante eam dhabayse gaale kidar yeskisima kidara ki utade.
42004036	Eeno wulaar targadhayse kinka kikal "Kono kinin giyayno yer hamin dohoonone? Yisa hayamonbee yisa kantanbeka beeronana kisa giyanka eendara uta ke ute" hamayse ke dhalqade.
42004037	Yesusin shawkadhoono Qipirnaahoomsa gasante dohon peen wulir ko qansimade.
42004038	Yesus kesa bukin raqira utayse Simoon ooninte kinin ardenka, Simoonsa baysino kattsi bishi occhea hajimoka wodhayse ko dahade. Ogonante koam kinin pacchoadettsi kiam ke miskade.
42004039	Kokal theedi woyayse bishin occhenam ki bitade. Bishin occhaynoar koam ko garade; kodiar saanawa dhaabhayse kena gala baxan ko yedade.
42004040	Hayn wevenka waana waana burqenin yedaana wulam kikal ko baadhade; kidiar kalaa kalaanadar yisa aanin wodayse keam ki pacchade.
42004041	Beeronaar pir "Ya Barjo Naasine" hamayse ilatada thoothin eendara ke utade. Kedi Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoos kinin dohonam kenin dhesonna Yesus yer kalaar kenin giyoamadettsi keam ki bitade.
42004042	Peen sedhaysaka, Yesus utayse eedinin qolmon raqindar ki yivade. Eenoar kiam zagada kikal ko nivade; kekala edimayse kinin yivoamadettsi kiam marana ko zagade.
42004043	Kidiar "Waani katamante dohon eenna wozisen Barjo bitamonsa upsinam inin giyoadettsi iam koda zaske; harrna hambhidianna, iam nittsadhoono ogonane" kena ki hamade.
42004044	Ogonante Yiwda peente dahaana kesa bukin ranqar Barjosa upsinam giyte ki dahade.
42005001	Eeno Barjosa upsinam qansaate kiam kupite ko daaka, Yesus Gensareth bazinsa gasante woyayse ki dahade.
42005002	Bazinsaar gasante bazindara sagadhayna gonngala lamaa woyayse ke daaka keam ki haapade. Kaaran zaanin qazayna eenaar gonngalanara utayse kaaranna kenin qazen zaaninam keda shive.
42005003	Igina gonngallasa Simoon gonngalante Yesus ardayse bazinsa gasara likka bazindar kinin yittsoadettsi kiam ki miskade; ogo bazindara sagadhen gonngalante dooqayse eenaam dhettsite ki dahade.
42005004	Yisa dhalqinam yinin macchonsa budonte Simoonna "Bazindara sagadhen gonngalanam bazinsa theerin raqindar yittsayse kaaranam yenin qazen zaaninam bazinte dhabee" kina ki hamade.
42005005	Simoonaar kina yinin maasenka, "Imbo, sootin woda qazika sunoo qajadhade, kala hattear yedootone; ta hanin giyonna, kaaranam wonin qazen zaaninam bazinte ida dhabe" kina ki hamade.
42005006	Yin giyayse kenin dhabenka kattsi thoothi kaaraam ke yedade; kaaran kenin qazayno zannoar havan ko yedade.
42005007	Waani bazindara sagadhen gonngalante dahaana aanamma nivayse keam kenin kelshoadettsi milkitka keam ke eelade. Nivayse bazindara sagadhayna gonngalla lamaanayn itsadhanna hayenka yekka, kaaranam iir ke thoosade.
42005008	Bhethiroos hambhea Simoon ogoam yinin haapenka, Yesussa birante kumpurdhayse, "Imbo, inta seeso eedi inin dohonna, ikalanka pegadhaa!" kina ki hamade.
42005009	Ogoam yin kinin giyoono kimbesana kinka dahaana wul kenin yedon kaaransa thoothamora dhaabhonka kattsi yinin targadhonnane.
42005010	Ogodettsi Simoonsa aanamma Zabdoos naana Yayqoobbee Wannisbe kediar targadhidine. Yesusaar Simoonna, "Kurtumbhaabhode! Keeda kaara os kaaranam hanin yedendettsi eenaam Barjosa bitamondar maasea eedi hada maate" kina ki hamade.
42005011	Kediar bazindara sagadhayna gonngallaam yisa bazinsa gasandar yeskisayse yer wulam garayse Yesussa paanan yivan ke yedade.
42005012	Yesus katama kalaate ki daaka, lamth burqo yiam kattsi yedaa eedi kalaa ki dahade. Ea agaa Yesusam yinin haapenka, kisa roonte dhambayse, "Imbo, ha nashidianna, iam pacchana damaada dame" hamayse kiam ki miskade.
42005013	Yesusaar yisa aaninam kidar wodayse, "Haam pacchana nashayda nashe, paashaa" kina ki hamade. Saanawaar kisa lamthin burqono kiam ko garade.
42005014	Yesus "Hanin paashonam eedi haynaar giyaabhode! Ko dahaannaar yivayse hasa bishinam gudulana dhahaa; eennaar hanin paashoono tarja konin maatoadettsi Museyn giyon Barjona machadhen marshanam imaa" kina ki hamade.
42005015	Yesusin shawkadhoono ena gayra sagi ko dhesimade. Thoothino eeno kinin giyenam qansanabee yisa burqoraar paashanabe kikal ko bukade.
42005016	Kidiar thoothi wodana darandar yimal edimate yivayse Barjoam miskaate ki dahade.
42005017	Rooro kalaa Yesus eenaam kinin dhettsenka, Parisa eenabee Musesa yigginam dhettsayna eenabe kisa gasante ke dahade. Kediar Galila peenbee Yiwda peenbesa gurdan wulra, pir Yerusaalem katamaraar nivaana ke dahade. Yesus hajadhaanaam kinin pacchayno Barjosa kanta kidar ko dahade.
42005018	Marrato! Eedi hajimoka malgimaa kalaam eena haaqaka kedate Yesuskal ke bavade; ooninte kiam arsayse Yesussa birante wodana ke zagade.
42005019	Eensa thoothamora dhaabhoono ooninte arsan keam konin bashonna, ooninsa illindar bulayse ooninsa illinam dhaasayse eensa shaarinte Yesus birante haaqanka eam ke hanchade.
42005020	Yesus kidar woylamin kenin qajonam shedayse hajimon eana yi giyna: "Ya eedi kaa, hasa seesono hana gardhidine" kina ki hamade.
42005021	Musesa yigginam dhettsaynabee Parisa eenabe "Ea kaa Barjo maato qaabea kidi hayne? Eedisa seesoam garana damea Barjo bishkalanka ab hayne?" hamayse ke qaabade.
42005022	Yesusaar kesa qaabenam dhesayse kena yinin maasenka, "Yesa woylaminka yin harrnee qaabe?
42005023	'Hasa seesono hana gardhidine' hamarabee 'Dhaabhayse yivaa' hamarabesa hamaane deegaa?
42005024	Ko dahaannaar i Eedi Naasina peendar eenna seesonam garana hayamo isa konin dohonam yenin dhesoadettsi yeam koda zaske" hamayse hajimonka malgimaa eaka "Inta hana ida giye: Dhaabhayse haam baadhon haaqanam hanka bavate hasa oonindar yivaa" kina ki hamade.
42005025	Hajimonka malgimaa ea saana kesa birante dhaabhayse, yininka baadhon haaqanam bavate Barjoam gobshada yisa oonindar ki yivade.
42005026	Ogote dahaana eena wul Barjoam gobshaate "Kina yer tarshen wo haapade" hamayse kattsi targadhayse ke kurtumbhade.
42005027	Ogosa budonte Yesus ogora utayse Lewi hambhea gibirin kacchea gibirin kinin kacchen raqinte dooqayse ki daaka kiam haapayse, "Isa paanan nivaa" kina ki hamade.
42005028	Lewiar dhaabhayse yerin wulam garayse Yesussa paanan yivan ki yedade.
42005029	Ogosa budonte Lewi yisa ooninte Yesusna gala gebhi ki ashkaysaka, kimbesana kinka galandar dooqaana gibirin kacchaynarabee waani eenbera thoothino eeno ko dahade.
42005030	Parisa eenabee kesa muldhara dahaana Musesa yigginam dhettsaynabe Yesussa paanan yivayna eenana "Eena cubbona gibirin kacchaynabee igina seeson eenabesana kinka galanam yenin itsenbee wucenbe harrnane?" hamayse kekal ke gundumade.
42005031	Yesusaar kena yinin maasenka, "Hajadhaanaam akkimi koda zaske; payyanaam akkimi zaskehe.
42005032	Inin nivoono seeson eena yisa seeson waadimanam garayse Barjodar kenin maatoadettsi keam eelota i nivade; tipana eenaam eelota nivaatine" kena ki hamade.
42005033	Ogora Parisa eenabee Musesa yigginam dhettsaynabe Yesusna yi giyna: "Shivea Wannissa paanan yivaynabee Parisa eenasa paanan yivaynabe thoothi rooro itsima qoomayse Barjoam keda miske. Hasa paanan yivayna rooro wul kenin itsenbee wucenbe harrnane?" kina ke hamade.
42005034	Yesusaar kena yin ki giyade: "Uutaa kembesana kinka ki daaka, gaydonna nivaana eenaam itsima kenin qoomoadettsi yedi haye hayo?
42005035	Ko dahaannaar uutaanin kekalanka edadhayno woda niva ko nive; ogo wodanka ko hanna itsima keda qoome" kena ki hamade.
42005036	Pir kamsika kena yin ki giyade: "Apala haaleam hattsayse apala gecchoadar lashea eedi qolehe. Yin ki haydianna, apala haaleam sun ki hattsade; haalea lashadhaa gecchoabesana kidar agehe.
42005037	Jambin gecchonsa iinte zia haali shabhea eedi qolehe. Shabhadhidianna ziano jambinam bhattsa ko bhattse; zianoar layma ko layme, jambinoar bhaqayse sun guuri koda shidhe.
42005038	Ogona zian haalin shabhadhenna, jambi haali koda zaske.
42005039	Zian oydhonam wucaa ea oydhaamon zianam wucana nashea hayyear qolehe. Harrna hambhidianna, 'Ziano oydhino kattsi payyane' kinin hamennane" kena ki hamade.
42006001	Ayiwd eensa ukunsen rooroaka Yesus gazgon ushon haaminsa shaarinka kinin yivenka, kisa paanan yivayna eena gazgon tishanam qunthate qadhayse gavite ke dahade.
42006002	Parisa eenasa waani waani eena "Ukunsen rooroaka zaskimon waadimanam harrnee waadadhe?" kena ke hamade.
42006003	Yesusaar yin giyayse kena ki maasade: "Ena Bitaa Dawtbee kimbesana kinka dahaana eenabe kenin daaqardhonka kinin hayonam yedi nabbabeete?
42006004	Kidi Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayante ardayse gudullakalanka een abinin itsimon Barjosa birante wodadhon balashanam tiyayse ki itsade; kimbete dahaana eenanaar ki imade.
42006005	Inta Eedi Naas ukunsen rooroasa Imbaane" kena ki hamade.
42006006	Ukunsen rooro abka Yesus Ayiwd eensa bukin raqinte ardayse eenaam dhettsan ki yedade. Raqin ogotear anta mizaqaysa wobaa eedi kalaa ki dahade.
42006007	Musesa yigginam dhettsaynabee Parisa eenabe Yesusam bersana zagayse, "Ukunsen rooroaka Yesus eediam paccho ki dew?" hamayse kiam shedite ke dahade.
42006008	Yesusaar kesa qaabenam dhesayse, aaniysa woboa eana "Dhaabhayse eensa shaarinte woyaa!" kina ki hamade. Ear dhaabhayse ki woyade.
42006009	Yesus kena yi giyna: "Yeam ida oyse: Ukunsen rooroaka Musesa yiggino har wonin waadadhoadettsi wona ko giye? Payya yermoo? Siya yeru? Eediam wonin dhacchoadettsimoo? Eediam wonin deesoadettsine?" kena ki hamade.
42006010	Yesusaar kisa gasante dohon een wulam shedayse, yisa aanin woboaka "Aanin hannonam pishkaa!" kina ki hamade. Ear yisa aaninam ki pishkade. Kisa annoar ko paashade.
42006011	Musesa yigginam dhettsaynabee Parisa eenabe ogoka kattsi wacimayse, "Hamin kiam wo hayanna wona ko paydhe?" hamayse kinka kikal ke dhalqade.
42006012	Ogo wodanka Yesus Barjoam miskana dhukandar ki utade; ogotear Barjoam miskaate ki wodhade.
42006013	Ogora peen sedhaysaka yisa paanan yivaynaam yikal keam ki eelade; kesaar iira tabhi lamaanaam ki kamade. Pir "Tarjamonnante Yittsadhaana" hamayse kena naabe ki wodade.
42006014	Kediar: Bhethiroos hamayse kisa naabe kinin wodaa Simoonbee, indanaasa Indiriasbee, Yayqoobbee, Wannisbee, Pilbhoosbee, Bartelemoosbee,
42006015	Maatoosbee, Toomaasebee, Ilpoos naasa Yayqoobbee, "Peen yinnonna bish qaabeane" hamayse giidhea Simoonbee,
42006016	Yayqoob naasa Yiwdabee, Yesusam dembhinna saskate imea Asqoronto peen ea Yiwdabene.
42006017	-
42006018	Yesus igina tabhi lamaanabete kinka dhukara hanchayse torente ki woyade; kisa paanan yivayna eenasaar thoothino eeno ogote ko dahade. Taar kisa dhalqinam qansanabee yisa burqoraar paashanabe Yiwda peen wulbee, Yerusaalem katamanbee, bazinsa aponte dahaana Thiroosbee Sidoonabera kikal nivoono thoothino eeno ko dahade. Beero yiam yedaysaka gaalaynaar ke paashade.
42006019	Pacchansa kantano kikalanka utayse ke wulam pacchite konin dohonna, eeno wul Yesusam kaamana koda zage.
42006020	Yesusaar yisa paanan yivaynaam shedayse yin ki giyade: "Yedi qambhinato, Barjosa bitamono yenti konin dohonna wozadhee;
42006021	yedi ta daaqardhaynato, yenin mishenna wozadhee; yedi ta eepaynato, yenin hancenna wozadhee.
42006022	I Eedi Naasina hamayse eeno yeam konin jibbenkabee, yembesana kinka kalaa maatintanam garayse yeam konin edenkabee, yeam konin iirenkabee, yesa naabenam konin genenkabe, wozadhee.
42006023	Marrato! Yena kashadhayno bazano cecinte gebhi konin dohonna, ogo wodanka wozadhee, wozaka bhulee. Ena kesa eykenaar Barjokala qansayse eenna giyaynaam agaadettsi keam ke hayade.
42006024	Yedi wodimbhaanato, yena maaten yerin wulam ta yenin haaponna, os birante yenin haapiminna hay!
42006025	Yedi ta mishaanato, yenin daaqardhenna hay! Yedi ta hancaynato, qaabonka yenin atennabee yenin eepennabe hay!
42006026	Eeno wul yeam shawkaate payyamon yesa konin giyenka hay! Ena buudamoka 'Wodi Barjokala qansayse eenna giyaynane' hamaynaam yesa eykenaar yin ke shawkade" kena ki hamade.
42006027	Yesus pir "Inin giyenam qansaynana yin ida giye: Yeam jibbayna eenaam nashee; kena yer payya hayee.
42006028	Yeam ashaynana payya malsi kena maasee; yeam genaynanaar Barjoam miskee.
42006029	Hasa karcanam ceveana karca waam kina shirshayse dhahaa; hasa kotteam tiyeana shuraabeamaar kina imaa.
42006030	Hakal miskayna wulna imaa; hasa yer tiyaar hana kinin maasoadettsi kiam oysaabhode.
42006031	Eenin yena hayoadettsi yenin nashenam yediar kena ogodettsi hayee.
42006032	"Ta yeam nashaynaam bish ye nashina yeam shawkadhok? Seeson eena yiam nashaynaam keda nashe.
42006033	Yer payya yena hayaynana payya ye hayna yeam shawkadhok? Seeson eenaar ogodettsi keda haye.
42006034	'Maasate ina kasha ki kashe' hamayse yenin qaabe hayaynana yenin bazenna yeam shawkadhok? Seeson eenaar ogo yinin bazonam tiyana seeson eenana keda baze.
42006035	"Yediar yesa banqin eenaam nashee; yer payyaar kena hayee. 'Maasate ina kasha ki kashe' hamayse woylam qajima kena bazee. Yin yenin hayenka, yesa bazano gebhi koda maate; Wuldara Sagea Barjo naana maateeda maate. Kidi kiam gobshiminabee seesaynabena payyane.
42006036	Yesa Imbaa eedina burqadhea kinin dohondettsi, yediar eedina burqadhayna maatee.
42006037	"Eedisa seesoam paydeebhode; yesaar seesonam paydadhehe. Eedidar pirdeebhode; yedarar pirdadhehe. Eedina garee; yenaar koda gardhe.
42006038	"Imee; yena imbha ko imbhe. Yenin kahaaka maasate yenaar kaadha ko kaadhe; payya uxate thoothayse konin laymenka yekka yena kaadha ko kaadhe" kena ki hamade.
42006039	Ogora Yesus kamsika kena yin ki giyade: "Aapin kaya ea aapin kaya eam entsana dama ki damo? Lamaana kinka oolontetayu kenin dhambayno?
42006040	Dhettsadhea ear kiam dhettseadara sagehe. Ko dahaannaar payya hayayse dhesidi ki hanna, kiam dhettsaadettsi kida maate.
42006041	"Hannon aapinte dohon haaqanam shedima, ha aanantasa aapinte dohon kosonam harrnaa shede?
42006042	Hannon aapinte dohon haaqanam shedima, ha aanantana 'Imbanaasa, aapin hannora hana kosonam i bule' hamayse giyana haminaa damaa? Ya maltia ea, birayse hannon aapinte dohon haaqanam bulaa; ogosa budonte ha aanantasa aapinte dohon kosonam bulana payya hayayse hada shede.
42006043	"Payya hatta siya aapi ushehe; tapir hatta siya payya aapi ushehe.
42006044	Haaqa wul yisa aapinka koda dhesime. Ukumbhara shaapsa aapi kambhehe; buukira woynisa aapi kambhehe.
42006045	Ea payyaa woylaminte yisa dohon yerin payyara yer payyaam kida giye; ea siyaa woylaminte yisa dohon yerin siyora yer siyaam kida giye. Harrna hambhidianna, yisa woylaminte thoothora yisa aponka kida giye.
42006046	"Ta keeda harrnee 'Imbo, Imbo!' iam hame? Inin yena giyenam hayattene.
42006047	Ikal nivayse isa upsinam qansayse hayayna wul hayyeam kenin maatenam yena ida giye.
42006048	Kidiar oonin yinin woysenka oolonam payya koyayse haachan peendar woysea eam kida maate. Mirro nivayse oonin ogoam ko kupade. Onnoar haachan peendar konin woysadhonna shoana damadehe.
42006049	Isa upsinam qansayse haymina peendar payya hayayse oolonam koyma yisa ooninam woysea eam kida maate. Doobin qanaysaka mirro nivayse oonin ogoam konin kupenka, kodiar saanawa ko dhambade. Dhambidinoar kosa kattsi siyane" kena ki hamade.
42007001	Yesus ogo wulam eenna giyate macchayse Qipirnaahoom katamandar ki yivade.
42007002	Raqin ogote mato alaqa kalaa ki dahade. Kinin nashea kisa ergen ear hajadhayse diyanna ki yeskade.
42007003	Kidiar Yesussa qansayse, "Yesus nivayse isa ergen eam ina kinin pacchoadettsi kiam miskee" hamayse Ayiwd eenasa donzanaam kidar ki yittsade.
42007004	Kediar Yesuskal yivayse, "Koam hanin hayoadettsi zaskea eedine.
42007005	Harrna hambhidianna, kidi eenaam wosa nasha ki nashe; wonin buki bukea ooni wona ki woysade" hamayse upsi wocchika Yesusam ke miskade.
42007006	Yesusaar kembesana kinka ki yivade. Kisa ooninkal kenin theedenka, mato alaqa yisa nashonaam yin giyayse Yesuskal keam ki yittsade: "Imbo, oonin innonte ha arde inta eedi zaskaatehe; ikal nivite qajadhaabhode.
42007007	Intaar hakal nivana zaskea eedine hamayse iam qaabaatine. Ogonante ya 'Hasa ergen ea ki paashe' ina hamaa; kidiar paasha ki paashe.
42007008	Intaar iam wottsaynana ee hamayda hame; isaar choobar ina ee hamayna poolisana ke dahade. Kesa kalaana 'Yivaa!' inin hamenka, yiva ki yive; ea waanaar 'Nivaa!' inin hamenka, niva ki nive; isa ergen eanaar 'Koam hayaa!' inin hamenka, haya ki haye" hamayse kikal ki yittsade.
42007009	Yesusaar agaa easa dhalqinam yinin qansenka, kanka targadhidine. Kimbesana yiven zarsindar budoka wal hamayse, "Inta yena ida giye: Israveel eenasa shaarintear kaadettsi gebhi idar woylamin qajea hamin ko dahaakaar haapaatine!" kena ki hamade.
42007010	Yesuskal yiam yittsadhaana eenaar mato alaqa oonindar maatayse kenin yeskenka, kisa ergen ea paashayse ki daaka kiam ke haapade.
42007011	Woda likkasa budonte Yesus Nayn hambhen katama kallondar ki yivade; kisa paanan yivayna eenabee thoothin eenbe kimbesana kinka ke yivade.
42007012	Yesus katamansa kerinte theedi kinin yeskenka, marrato! Eeno leesi bavate koda ute. Diyaar yindasa naasi kalaane. Kodiar maa qambhi ko dahade. Katamaraar thoothino eeno kombesana kinka ko dahade.
42007013	Imbaa wontea Yesus koam yinin haapenka, kona burqadhayse, "Eepaabhode" kona ki hamade.
42007014	Yesus nivayse leesin baadhon haaqanam ki kaamade; leesinam bavaana eenaar ke woyade. Yesusaar leeseaka "Ya naasa, dhaabhaa hana ida hame" kina ki hamade.
42007015	Diyaar dhaabhate dooqayse dhalqan ki yedade. Yesus naasasa indanna "Hasa naasa kash!" hamayse kona ki giyade.
42007016	Een wulam kurtumbhe yedaysaka, "Barjokala qansayse eenna giyea gebha ea wosa shaarira dhaabhidine; Barjo yisa eenaam dhacchana nividine" hamayse Barjoam ke gobshade.
42007017	Ogono Yesussa waadimano Yiwda peenbee kosa gasante dohon peen wul gidirbe ko qansimade.
42007018	Shivea Wannissa paanan yivaynaar ogo wulam Wannisna ke giyade. Wannisaar yisa paanan yivaynasa lamaanaam yikal eelayse,
42007019	"Barjokala niva ki nive hambhaa yaw? Way eedi ab wo toolo?" hamayse kiam kenin oysoadettsi Imbaa wontea Yesuskal keam ki yittsade.
42007020	Eenaar Yesuskal nivayse, " 'Barjokala niva ki nive hambhaa yaw? Way eedi ab wo toolo?' hamayse haam wonin oysoadettsi Shivea Wannis hadar woam ki nittsade" kina ke hamade.
42007021	Ogo wodanka Yesus waana waana burqoka gaalaynaam ki pacchade; beeronin yiam yedaanadaraar beeronaam ki bulade; thoothina aapin kayaanaamaar ki pacchade.
42007022	Yesusaar Wannisin nittsaanana "Yivayse yenin haaponbee yenin qansonbeam Wannisna giyee: Aapin kayaana haapa ke haape; roonsa wobonaar pika ke pike; lamthin burqonka dahaanaar paasha ke paashe; qaamin kayaana qansa ke qanse; diyaanaar dembhira dhaabha ke dhaabhe; qambhina eenanaar Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam giidha ko giidhe.
42007023	Ogonante inka qothimima kidi gobshadhaane" hamayse kena ki maasade.
42007024	Wannisin nittsaana ergen eena maatayse kenin yivenka, Yesus thoothin eenna Wannissa giyan ki yedade: "Ta har shedee darante yivaa? Jibarenka shohen piiqan shedota ye yivaaw?
42007025	Ta har shedee yivaa? Apalan gooben qaadhaam shedee yivaaw? Yin ko hanna, agen apalan qaadhaynabee yina agaysaka dahaana eena peensa binna ooninte ke dahade.
42007026	Ta har shedee yivaa? Barjokala qansayse eenna giyeam shedee yivaaw? Hahaa! Yena ida giye: Kidi Barjokala qansayse eenna giyeadara sagiane.
42007027	'Shedaa! Hasa goynam birayse ashkea isa ergen eam hasa birante yittsayda yittse' hamayse yinna thaapadhaa kidine.
42007028	Yena ida giye: Peente adhadhon een wulsa iira Shivea Wannisdara sagea eedi qolehe. Ko dahaannaar Barjosa bitamonte een wulsa choobar dahaa Wannisdara saga ki sage" kena ki hamade.
42007029	Dhalqin ogoam yinin qansenka eena wul, gibirin kacchayna eenaar shidhima, Wannis aaninte yinin shiidhonna, Barjo tipa kinin dohonam ke dhesade.
42007030	Parisa eenabee Musesa yigginam dhettsaynabe ke hanna, Barjoyn kena qaabonam jibbayse, "Wannis aaninte shiidhattone" hamayse ke garade.
42007031	Yesus yi giyna: "Ta keeda adhadhin koam harka keam i kamso? Har ke maate?
42007032	Bhookante dooqayse yiigayna naanaam keda maate. Kediar kinka kiam kiam eelada 'Ye kirbe hamayse yena pashko wo pugade, yediar kirbeetene; ye eepe hamayse yena wo zilimade, yediar eepeetene' keda hame.
42007033	Shivea Wannis gala itsimabee yer wucimabe qoomayse kinin dehenka, 'Kaa eadar beero daane' kiam ye hamade.
42007034	Ta keeda i Eedi Naas itsaatebee wucaatebe inin dehenka, 'Marrato! Kaa ea galabee wucamobe nasheane, cubbona gibirin kacchayna eenabee seeson eenabesa yettsine' iam ye hamade.
42007035	Ogona pakalmakkono gon konin dohonam dhesadhayno kanka waadadhayna kosa naanakane" kena ki hamade.
42007036	Parisa eenasa eedi kalaa Yesus kimbesana gala kinin itsoadettsi kiam ki eelade. Yesusaar Parisa easa ooninte ardayse kummandar ki dooqade.
42007037	Marrato! Kataman ogote seeso hayayno maa kallo ko dahade. Kodiar Yesus Parisa easa ooninte kummandar kinin dohonam yinin dhesenka, gaamen shittonka thoosadhon seeni cawlira ashkadhon bilqaathinam ko bavade.
42007038	Kodiar Yesussa budobar roonkal kisa woyayse, eepada kosa ermitinin kisa roondar thokkenka, kisa roonam yisa metensa sitinka ko qodade; kisa roonamaar sunqaate gaamen shittonka kisa roonam qadhite ko dahade.
42007039	Yesusam yisa oonindar kummanna eelaa Parisa ea koam shedayse, "Ea kaa Barjokala qansayse eenna giyea yi daana, ogo kiam kaamen edonam hamin dohoono seeso eedi konin dohonam ini kidi dhesa ki dhese" hamayse yisa woylaminka ki qaabade.
42007040	Yesusaar "Simoon, hana inin giyea yer kalaa dahade" kina ki hamade. Kidiar "Dhettsea, ee ina giyaa" kina ki hamade.
42007041	Yesusaar "Eedi kalaakal eedi lamaa birre baddaraana ke dahade. Ea kalaa mato dong, waa ea bondi dong birre ke baddarade.
42007042	Kediar eana koymon kashan ke bashadhaysaka, ear kena ki garade. Ta ke lamaanasa kalon kiam saskayse nashea hamaa eane?" kina ki hamade.
42007043	Simoonaar "Thoothi bazan yindar dahaa ea kalon kiam nashima garehe" kina ki hamade. Yesusaar "Gonaa giyade" kina ki hamade.
42007044	Yesus edonam maatate shedayse, Simoonna yin ki giyade: "Edon koam shedaa shedo? Inta hasa ooninte i ardaysaka, ya isa roonna noqo hattear imaatane; kodi yisa ermitinka isa roonam shivayse yisa meten sitinka ko qodade.
42007045	Ya iam sunqaatane; kodi inin ardorra yedayse isa roonam sunqan garadehe.
42007046	Ya isa metenam waqatika qadhaatane; kodi isa roonam gaamen shittonka ko qadhade.
42007047	Ogonante hana yin ida giye: Kattsi konin nashonna, kosa seeson thoothinaam kona gardhidine; yisa seeson likkonam yina gardhea likkaka kida nashe" kina ki hamade.
42007048	Ogora edonna "Hasa seesonam hana ko shidhe hambhidine" kona ki hamade.
42007049	Kimbesana kinka kummandar dooqaanaar "Eedisa seesoam shiishea kaa kidi hayne?" hamayse yisa woylaminka qaaban ke yedade.
42007050	Yesus edonna "Idar woylamin hanin qajoono haam ko dhacchade; nagaya yivaa" kona ki hamade.
42008001	Ogosa budonte Yesus katamantebee gurdantebe Barjo bitamonsa wozisen upsinam giyaate yaayte ki dahade. Tabhi lamaana kisa paanan yivayna eenaar kimbesana kinka ke dahade.
42008002	Tapir beeronaam yindara kinin bulaanabee kesa burqora keam kinin pacchaana maanabe kimbesana kinka ke dahade; kesaar iira beero tobbhaa yindara utoono Megdela peen edon Mayriyambee,
42008003	Herodissa waadiman eenaam wottsea Kuzasa geshon Yohannabee, Soosinnabee, waaniar thoothina maanabe ke dahade. Kediar Yesusbee kisa paanan yivayna eenabena koymon yisa imada keam keda kelshe.
42008004	Thoothino eeno kataman wulra kikal nivayse kenin bukenka, Yesus kamsika kena yin ki giyade:
42008005	"Eedi kalaa haaminte bheeta yiithota ki utade. Kinin yiithenka, bheetano waani goyn aponte ko wavaysaka, eenoar koam ko tigade; aptinaar koam ke itsade.
42008006	Waani bheetanoar peen haachandar ko wavade; ko baqalaysakaar pee capinin qolmonna ko wocchade.
42008007	Waani bheetanoar ukumbhansa shaarinte ko wavade; ukumbhanoar kombesana kinka gebhayse koam ko ishkade.
42008008	Waani bheetanoar peen payyandar ko wavade; kodiar baqalayse eedi dong kaysa aapi ko ushade. Keeda qansen qaamiysa dahaa ki qanse" hamayse upsi gebhika yisa dhalqinam ki macchade.
42008009	Yesussa paanan yivayna "Kamsin ogosa bulino hare?" hamayse kiam ke oysade.
42008010	Yesusaar "Barjo bitamonsa aachin dhalqinam yenin dhesoadettsi yena imbhidine; waani eenna ko hanna, sheda sheda dahayse, kenin haapoamadettsi qansa qansa dahayse, kenin bhocchoamadettsi kamsika kena koda giidhe.
42008011	"Kamsinsa bulino yinne: Bheetano Barjosa upsinone.
42008012	Goyn aponte wavaa bheetasa kamsino Barjosa upsinam qansayna eenane. Kenin qansonsa budonte Barjodar woylam qajayse kenin dhaqoamadettsi Seethaan nivayse kenin qanson upsinam kesa woylamra tiya ki tiye.
42008013	Peen haachandar wavaa bheetasa kamsino Barjosa upsinam qansayse wozanka tiyayna eenane. Eena igina caaci kenin yittsaamonna, Barjodar woylam kenin qajayno likka wodanane; kesa caacinin qolmonna, keam taysate sheden gaalenin nivenka dhamba ke dhambe.
42008014	Ukumbhansa shaarinte wavaa bheetasa kamsino Barjosa upsinam qansayna eenane. Ko dahaakaar wodhaate wodhaate kenin yivenka peen kosa qaabonbee, wodimbhanna kenin bhocchenbee, kena agaysaka daadhen bhocchinbeka ishkadhayse aapi ushima keda shidhe.
42008015	Peen payyandar wavaa bheetasa kamsino payyamonbee gazamon woylaminbeka Barjosa upsinam qansayse kaalayna eenane. Kediar Barjosa upsinka wocchimbhayse aapi keda ushe" kena ki hamade.
42008016	Ogora Yesus yin ki giyade: "Shaakanam shashkayse yer daran guupea way algansa demente wodea eedi qolehe; ooninte ardaynana shaakano may konin haapadhoadettsi dheg hamon raqindar koda wodadhe.
42008017	Ogodettsi aachimayse may haapadhima, aadhimayse shaakandar utayse may dhesimima shidhea yer qolehe.
42008018	Ta keeda yenin qansen upsinkaar mete yesaam gishee; harrna hambhidianna, yisa dahaana kisa dohondar imbha ko imbhe; yisa qolmakalanka 'isa daane' kinin hameamaar kikala tiidha ko tiidhe" kena ki hamade.
42008019	Yesussa indanbee kisa indanaanabe kikal ke nivade; eenin kattsi thoothonna, kikal theedana damadehe.
42008020	Eenoar Yesusna "Shedaa! Handabee handanaanabe mayante woyayse haam shedana keda zage" hamayse kina ke giyade.
42008021	Kidiar kena yinin maasenka, "Barjosa upsinam qansayse hayayna eena indabee indanaanabe kedi iginane" hamayse kena ki maasade.
42008022	Rooro kalaa Yesus yisa paanan yivaynabesana kinka bazindara sagadhen gonngalante ardayse, "Bazinsa saabar wo sage" kena ki hamade; kediar yivanna ke dhaabhade.
42008023	Bazindar kenin yivenka Yesus gonngalansa iinte ki raatade. Wura gebhi bazindar ko dhaabhade; bazindara sagadhen gonngalante noqono thoothan ko yedade; ogona gaale kedar ko yeskade.
42008024	Kediar Yesuskal theedayse, "Imbo, Imbo, wodi kayoobhe!" hamayse kiam ke dhaasade. Kidiar dhaabhayse, wuranbee bazinbeam ki bitade; ogora wuranbee bazin shohenbe lay ko hamade.
42008025	Ogora Yesus yisa paanan yivaynana "Idar woylam yenin qajayno yesa hamin ko hamaa?" kena ki hamade. Kediar kattsi kurtumbhaate targadhayse kinka kikal "Wuranbee bazinbear yinna ee hamea kaa kidi hayne?" ke hamade.
42008026	Galila peera bazindara sagayse saabar Gerasenon peendar ke yivade.
42008027	Yesus bazindara sagadhen gonngalara peendar ki utaysaka, kataman ogote beeronayn yedaa ea Yesusdar ki keerade. Ea agaa apala qaadha ki garaysaka thoothi woda maatidine. Kinin dahaynoar duukin raqintene; oonir dooqehe.
42008028	Kidiar Yesusam yinin haapenka, ilatayse kisa birante dhambayse upsi gebhika "Wuldara Sagea Barjosa Naasa Yesuso, hambesana isa dohoono hare? Iam hanin galshoamadettsi ida haam miske" kina ki hamade.
42008029	Ogoamaar yin kinin giyoono Yesus beeronaam "Eadara utee!" hamayse kinin giyonnane. Kosa birayse rumino thoothi wodana eadar dhaabhite ko dahade; sansalabee zawbeka kiam dhaxayse koda toldhe. Ko dahaannaar sansalanbee zawnbeam takkayse kinin dhabenka, kantaka beerona darandar kinin yivoadettsi keda haye.
42008030	Yesusaar "Hasa nammo hayne?" hamayse kiam ki oysade. Kidiar thoothi beero yidar dohonna, "Nammo isa Legoonne" kina ki hamade.
42008031	Beeronaar "Woam kattsi theeri maaton oolondar oytate yittsaabhode" hamayse Yesusam ke miskade.
42008032	Raqin ogote dhukansa demendar thoothi wurkupa gishiman gishadhayna kenin dohonna, beerona "Wurkupanasa iinte wo arde" hamayse kiam ke miskade. Kidiar kena ee ki hamade.
42008033	Beeronaar eadara utayse wurkupanasa iinte ke ardade; wurkupanaar bazinsa gasante dahayse, targadhayse laasandara diirimayse bazinsa iir ke itsadhade.
42008034	Wurkupan gishaynaar ogo yerin wulam yinin haaponsa budonte, gobate yivayse katamantebee gurdantebe dohon eenna ke giyade.
42008035	Eenoar yerin ogoam shedota yisa onnara utayse Yesuskal ko nivade. Beeronayn yindara utaa ear barin kisa maataysaka apala qaadhayse Yesussa roon demente dooqayse ki daaka kiam haapayse ke kurtumbhade.
42008036	Beeronayn yiam yedaa eayn paashonam aapinka haapaana hamin hamayse kinin paashonam eenna ke giyade.
42008037	Gerasenon peente dohoono eeno wul kattsi konin kurtumbhonna, Yesus kesa peera utayse kinin yivoadettsi kiam ko miskade. Yesusaar bazindara sagadhen gonngalante ardayse yinin nivon peendar maatayse ki yivade.
42008038	-
42008039	Beeronayn utaa ear Yesusbete daana kiam ki miskade. Yesusaar "Hasa oonindar yivayse Barjo hamin dohon yer hana kinin hayonam eenna giyaa" hamayse kiam ki yittsade. Ear Yesus hamin dohon yer gebhi kina kinin hayonam katamante dohon een wulna giyaate ki yivade.
42008040	Eeno wul kiam konin kaalonna Yesus maatayse kekal ki nivaysaka, wozaka kiam ke tiyade.
42008041	Ogo wodanka Ayiwd eensa bukin raqinam wottsea Yayroos hambhea eedi kalaa ki nivade; Yesussa roon demente dhambayse, yisa oonindar kinin nivoadettsi kiam ki miskade.
42008042	Harrna hambhidianna, leve tabhi lamaaddha maatoono naasi kisa kallo bish dahade; kodiar hajadhayse diyanna yeskidine. Yesusaar kimbesana kinka kinin yivenka, thoothino eeno kiam kupada koda yive.
42008043	Layme hajimoka tabhi lamaa leve hajadhayse kappoono maa kallo ko dahade. Kodiar yisa dohon wulam dheeshanna imada ko macchade; eedi hayyear koam pacchana damadehe.
42008044	Kodiar Yesussa budobar nivayse kisa apalansa nukinam ko kaamade; saanawaar kosa zombhino laymayno ko woyade.
42008045	Yesusaar "Iam kaamaa hayne?" hamayse ki oysade. Kedi wulaar "Wodi haam kaamootone" ke hamade. Bhethiroos "Woam Dhettsea, eeno cibhimayse haam konin kupenka ['Hayne iam kaamaa' ha hamo?]" kina ki hamade.
42008046	Yesusaar "Pacchasa kanta idara konin utonam inta dhesidine; eedi iam kaamidine" ki hamade.
42008047	Edonoar aadhimbhana yinin damaamonam yinin dhesenka, gibazada nivayse Yesussa demente ko dhambade. Harrna kiam konin kaamonbee saanawa konin paashonbeam een wulsa birante ko giyade.
42008048	Yesusaar "Isa naano, idar woylamin hanin qajoono haam ko pacchade; nagaya yivaa" kona ki hamade.
42008049	Yesusaar ogoam giyte ki daaka, eedi kalaa Ayiwd eensa bukin raqin wottsea Yayroos oonira nivayse, "Hasa naano diydine; ta keeda dhettseam galshaabhode" kina ki hamade.
42008050	Yesusaar dhalqin ogoam qansayse Yayroosna "Kurtumbhaabhode! Idar bish woylam qajaa; hasa naano dhaabha ko dhaabhe" kina ki hamade.
42008051	Yesus Yayroos ooninte kinin yeskenka Bhethiroosbee, Yayqoobbee, Wannisbee, naansa imbaabee indanbe, igina eenara eedi ab kimbesana kinka ooninte konin ardoamadettsi ki marade.
42008052	Eeno wul naanna burqadhayse koda eepe. Yesusaar "Eepeebhode; naano raata ko raatade, diyadehe" kena ki hamade.
42008053	Kediar konin diyonam yinin dhesenna, kiam ke hancade.
42008054	Kidiar naansa aanin yedayse upsi gebhika "Ya naano, dhaabhaa" kona ki hamade.
42008055	Kosa sadanin maatonna saanawa kodi dhaabhidine. Yesusaar "Gala kona imee" ki hamade.
42008056	Naansa imbaabee indanbe targadhidine. Yesusaar "Ko yerinam haynaar giyeebhode!" kena ki hamade.
42009001	Yesus tabhi lamaana yisa paanan yivayna eenaam yikal eelayse, beeron wulam eendara kenin buloadettsibee burqadhaanaam kenin pacchoadettsibe kantabee hayamobe kena ki imade.
42009002	Barjo bitamonsa upsinam eenna kenin giyoadettsibee hajadhaanaam kenin pacchoadettsibe keam ki yittsade.
42009003	Yin kena ki giyade: "Yesa goynna haljo ko hannaar, surba ko hannaar, gala ko hannaar, birre ko hannaar, yer kala hattear yenka beveebhode; shuraab lansoar beveebhode.
42009004	Raqin hamotear birayse yeam chocchamon tiyaa ea ooninte arda ye hanna, raqin ogora yenin utenka yekka ogote dooqee.
42009005	Eeno yeam yikal tiymino ko hanna, gurdan ogora yenin utenka, kedar tarja konin maatoadettsi yesa roondar dohon silalinam dinsee" kena ki hamade.
42009006	Kediar raqin ogora utayse Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam eenna giyada, hajadhaanaamaar pacchada gurdan wulir ke yaayade.
42009007	-
42009008	Galila peenam wottsea Herodis ogoyn maaton wulam kidi qansidine. Kidiar waani waani eeno "Shivea Wannis diira dhaabhidine", waani eeno "Eelias maatate ki nivade", waani eeno "Ena birayse Barjokala qansayse eenna giyaynasa kalaa diira dhaabhidine" konin hamenna, kina dhesiman konin garonna, qothimite ki dahade.
42009009	Herodisaar "Inta Wannissa qorcin taskidine. Ta 'Yin kida waadadhe' hamayse kinnon goynsa giidhea kaa kidi hayne?" hamayse kiam shedana zagite ki dahade.
42009010	Yesus yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaana eenaar yinin yittsadhorra maatayse hatte, yinin waadadhon wulam Yesusna ke giyade. Kidiar yinka kebishinam entsayse Beetesayda hambhen katamansa gasandar ki yivade.
42009011	Eenoar ogoam dhesayse Yesuskal dhaabhayse ko yivade. Kidiar yidar keam tiyayse Barjosa bitamon upsin kena giyaate ki dahade; burqora paasha keam zaskaynaamaar ki pacchade.
42009012	Hayn ibanayse sootanna hayenka, tabhi lamaana Yesussa paanan yivayna kikal nivayse, "Ta wonin dohoono eedinin qolmontene; ogona wosa gasante dohon katamanbee gurdantebe yivayse galabee wodhinta raqbe kenin haapoadettsi eenaam yittsaa" kina ke hamade.
42009013	Kidiar "Yedi kenin itsen galan kena imee" kena ki hamade. Kediar "Wodi yivayse een ko wulna gala wo shanaamma, wosa dahaana balasha dongbee kaara lamaabe bishne" kina ke hamade.
42009014	Eenaar shii dongaddhane. Yesus yisa paanan yivayna eenana "Eenaam eedi lamaa kaysa apo tabhi, eedi lamaa kaysa apo tabhi hayayse dottsee" kena ki hamade.
42009015	Yesussa paanan yivaynaar kena giidhondettsi eenaam ke dottsade.
42009016	Yesus balashana dongnabee kaarana lamaanabeam tiyayse tura cecin shedayse Barjoam miskeka ki gobshade. Kidiar kashayse eenna kenin yeskisoadettsi yisa paanan yivayna eenana ki imade.
42009017	Eeno wulaar itsayse ko mishade; een itsaysaka shidhoono dirmano sharqa tabhi lamaa thoothi ke dhaasade.
42009018	Yesus yimal Barjoam kinin miskenka, kisa paanan yivayna eenaar kimbesana kinka ke dahade. Kidiar "Zarsino iam hay ko hame?" hamayse keam ki oysade.
42009019	Kediar " 'Shivea Wannisne' koda hame; waani eenoar 'Eeliasne', waani eenoar 'Ena birayse Barjokala qansayse eenna giyaynasa kalaa diira dhaabhidine' koda hame" kina ke hamade.
42009020	"Yedi iam hay yeda hame?" kena ki hamade. Bhethiroosaar kina yinin maasenka, "Ya Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoosne" ki hamade.
42009021	Yesus ogoam haynaar kenin giyoamadettsi upsi wocchika giyntaka,
42009022	"Inta Eedi Naas thoothi gaale tiyayda tiye; peensa donzanabee, gudullasa hayonabee, Musesa yigginam dhettsaynabe iam baga ke bage; iam deesa ko deesadhe; makkansoa rooroakaar dembhira dhaabhayda dhaabhe" kena ki hamade.
42009023	Yesus ke wulna yin ki giyade: "Isa paanan nivana nashea hay ki dahaannaar yinnon qaaben ki gare; yinindar ziitate deesadhen masqalinamaar rooroa rooroaka kedayse isa paanan ki nive.
42009024	Sadan yinnonam dhacchana nashea hay ki dahaannaar koam kaysa ki kayse; ina hamayse yisa sadanam kaysea hay ki dahaannaar koam dhaccha ki dhacche.
42009025	Eedi peen kodar dohon yer wulam haapayse sadan yinnonam kaysidi ki hanna, kina har ko poote?
42009026	Imbee isa upsinbeka ooshimbhea wul, i Eedi Naas isa gobshinbee, Imbaasa gobshinbee, Barjosa gazana gaananasa gobshinbeka inin nivenka, kanka inta ooshimbhayda ooshimbhe.
42009027	Inta yena gon ida giye: Barjosa bitamonam yinin haapenka yekka kote woyaana eenasa shaarinte dembhi diymina eedi daane" ki hamade.
42009028	Yesus ogoam yinin giyonsa budobar rooro lankayaddha Bhethiroosbee, Wannisbee, Yayqoobbeam yinka entsate Barjoam miskota dhukandar ki utade.
42009029	Kinin miskenkaar kisa aapin kerro ko ookimade; kisa apalloar bhalqantidettsi cawli ko maatade.
42009030	-
42009031	Marrato! Eedi lamaa, kediar Musebee Eeliasbe, gobshinkaar haapadhayse Yerusaalemir maatota dohon Yesus dembhinsa kimbesana kinka keda dhalqe.
42009032	Bhethiroosbee kimbesana kinka dahaanabe gindhe keam yedonna, kedi raatidine. Kenin dhaabhenka, Yesussa gobshinbee kimbesana kinka woyayse dahaana eena lamaanabeam ke haapade.
42009033	Eenaar Yesuskalanka edimayse kenin yivenka, Bhethiroos Yesuskal, "Imbo, raqin kote wonin dahayno wona payyane; ogona baara kalaam hana, kalaam Musena, kalaam Eeliasna hayayse baara makkam wo kee" kina ki hamade. Bhethiroos har kinin giyenam kidi dhesehe.
42009034	Bhethiroosaar ogoam yin kinin giyenka, liilo nivayse keam ko ishkade. Liilonin keam ishkenkaar ke kurtumbhade.
42009035	Liilonsa iir "Inin kamaa isa Naasa kaane; kina qansee" hamea upsi ko qansimade.
42009036	Upsinin qansimonsa budonte, Yesus yimal ki daaka kiam ke haapade; kediar ogo wodanka yinin haaponam haynaar giyma lay ke hamade.
42009037	Peen sedhaysaka dhukara kenin hanchenka, thoothino eeno Yesusbekal goynte ko keerade.
42009038	Eenara eedi kala yin giyayse ki ilatade: "Woam Dhettsea, isa naasa kalaa bishne. Bannzo! Ina kiam shedaa.
42009039	Ruminin kisa dhaabhenka, ki bhocchima koda kiam ilattse; aponka kisa dubo nittsaate koda qaptinse; bishinam kisa hajinsada galshayse koda kiam gare.
42009040	Hasa paanan yivayna beeroam kidara kenin buloadettsi keam inin miskenka bulana damadehe" kina ki hamade.
42009041	Yesusaar kena yinin maasenka, "Yedi idar woylamin qajimina, bhocchinka yesa wobaana adhadhinato, hamaaka yekka yembesana ida dee? Yena hamaaka yekkay darsho? Hasa naasaam kote bavaa" kina ki hamade.
42009042	Naasaam Yesuskal entsate kinin nivenka rumaa peendar kiam dhabayse ki qaptisade. Yesusaar beeroam ki bitade. Naasaamaar pacchayse imbaana kiam ki imade.
42009043	Eeno wul Barjosa gebhon kantanam yinin shedenka kodi targadhidine. Eeno wulaar Yesusin waadadhon wulka targadhayse ko daaka, Yesus yisa paanan yivaynana
42009044	"Inin yena giyen koam yesa woylaminka bhocchee: I Eedi Naasaam eensa aaninte saskate iam koda imbhe" kena ki hamade.
42009045	Kisa dhalqino kena ardima aachi dhalq kekal konin maatonna, kedi ogo kinin giyenam bhocchadehe; yerin ogosa kiam oysanaar ke kurtumbhade.
42009046	Yesussa paanan yivaynaar "Wosa iira sagi maatea hayne?" hamayse palime ke yedade.
42009047	Yesus kesa woylaminsa qaabenam dhesayse naasi kalaam bavayse yikal ki woysade.
42009048	Yin ki giyade: "Naasa kaam isa naabenna hamayse tiyea iam ki tiyade; iam tiyear iam nittsaam kida tiye. Yesa shaarira wuldara tokea kidi sagia eane" kena ki hamade.
42009049	Wannis Yesusna "Imbo, eedi kalaa hasa naabenka beeronaam kinin bulenka kiam wo haapade; wombesana kinka kinin dahaamonna, kiam wo marade" kina ki hamade.
42009050	Yesusaar "Yeam jibbimina wul yembesana kinka kenin dohonna, kiam mareebhode" kina ki hamade.
42009051	Yesus cecindar kinin yiven wodan yeskaysaka Yerusaalem yivima shidhattine hamayse ki dhaabhade.
42009052	Yisa birantear ergen eenaam ki yittsade; kediar raq kina ashkota Sammaria peente dohon gurda kallondar yivayse ke ardade.
42009053	Yesus Yerusaalem kataman kinin yivenam kenin dhesenna, gurdan ogote dahayna eena kiam tiyana nashadehe.
42009054	Kisa paanan yivayna eenara Yayqoobbee Wannisbe ogoam yinin haapenka, "Imbo, [Eeliasin hayondettsi] cecira nuu hanchayse keam ko koqe wonin hamoadettsi ya nashaa nasho?" kina ke hamade.
42009055	Yesusaar ora kedar wal hamayse keam ki wacimade. ["Yedi hamin dohon manpaskalanka yenin dohonam dhesattene.
42009056	I Eedi Naasin nivoono eenaam dhacchanane; kaysana nivaatine" ki hamade.] Ogora dhaabhayse gurda abdar ke yivade.
42009057	Yesusbee kisa paanan yivayna eenabe goynka kenin yivenka, eedi kalaa "Inta hanin yiven hamote ko hannaar, hasa paanan yivayda yive" kina ki hamade.
42009058	Yesusaar kina yi giyna: "Shedaa! Gaamirenasa kenin wodhea kesa oolo daane; aptinasaar ooni daane; i Eedi Naas meten innon inin daasea raq isa qolehe" kina ki hamade.
42009059	Yesus ea waanaar "Isa paanan nivaa" kina ki hamade. Kidiar "Imbo, birayse imbaam duukayse inin nivoadettsi iam yittsaa" kina ki hamade.
42009060	Yesusaar "Shedaa! Diyaana diyaanaam kenin duukoadettsi kena garaa; ya yivayse Barjo bitamonsa upsinam eenna giyaa" kina ki hamade.
42009061	Ta pir eedi kalaa "Imbo, inta hasa paanan yivayda yive; ko dahaannaar birayse oonin innon eenana elqimayse inin maatoadettsi iam yittsaa" ki hamade.
42009062	Yesus "Haamin koysanna irpin aaninka yedayse budoka maatate shedea ea Barjosa bitamonna maateatehe" kina ki hamade.
42010001	Ogosa budonte Imbaa wontea Yesus tabhi lamaana kisa paanan yivayna eenadar eedi makkam kaysa apo tabhi lamaa waani eenaam ki kamade. Kidiar yina yivota yinin qaabaana katamanabee ranqa wulbedar lamaa lamaa hayayse yisa birante keam ki yittsade.
42010002	Yin kena ki giyade: "Buuradhayno isinno thoothine; buurayna eena tokaane. Ta keeda isininsa Imbaa buurayna eenaam haamindar kinin nittsoadettsi kiam miskee.
42010003	Marrato! Inta yeam yaanadettsi yaayonasa shaarinte ida yittse; ta keeda yivee.
42010004	Birre yedea korbhobee, surbabee, dunnguribe yenka beveebhode; goynka yenin yivenka haykalar nagaysite kappeebhode.
