42010005	"Onna yenin ardayna wulir, birayse 'Payyamo oonin kona ko dee' hamayse kena giyee.
42010006	Oonin ogote payyamon nashea eedi daa ki hanna, yesa payyamono kina payya koda maate; yintay ko hamma yesa payyamono yedar koda maate.
42010007	Waadadheana damooz kasha ko kashadhe. Ogona oonin ogote yena kenin imenam itsadabee wucadabe kembesana kinka dooqee; oonin waara oonin waadar yaayeebhode.
42010008	"Yenin arden kataman wulir eenin yeam tiyayse yena kenin imenam itsee.
42010009	Raqin ogote hajadhaana wulam pacchee; eenna 'Barjosa bitamono yekal theedidine' hamayse kena giyee.
42010010	Ko dahaannaar yenin arden katamante eeno yeam ko tiyaamma, kataman ogosa goynadar utayse,
42010011	'Kataman yennora wosa roondar yedoono silallo tarja yena konin maatoadettsi yena woda dinse; Barjosa bitamono yekal konin theedonam dhesee' kena hamee.
42010012	Yena yin ida giye: Pirdin rooroaka kataman ogora Sodoomdar yeskayno pirdino tokaane" kena ki hamade.
42010013	Ogora Yesus yin ki giyade: "Korazin katamante dahaana eenato, yedi hay! Beetesayda katamante dahaana eenato, yedi hay! Yekal haydhoono tarshayno waadimano Thiroosbee Sidoonaber haydhada hatte ko hanna, siyinna goobintonam yidara yiikayse dibiniar dumate yisa metendar kahayse ena wodda seeson waadimanam yisa garayse Barjodar maatidi keda dee.
42010014	Pirdin pirdadhenka yedar yesken pirdindara Thiroosbee Sidoonabedar yeskayno pirdino tokaane.
42010015	"Ta yedi Qipirnaahoom katamante dahaana eenato, tura cecindar dheg dheg hamo ye qaabaa? Yin dayma mia diyaana eenayn dohon raqindar yedi hancheeda hanche" ki hamade.
42010016	Pir yinin yittsaynakal "Yena qansea ina kida qanse; yeam bagea iam kida bage; iam bagear iam nittsaam kida bage" kena ki hamade.
42010017	Eedi makkam kaysa apo tabhi lamaana eena Yesusin keam yittsorra wozaka maatate ke nivade. Yesusnaar "Imbo, beeronaar hasa naabenka wona ee hamidine" kina ke hamade.
42010018	Yesusaar kena yin ki giyade: "Seethaan cecira bhalqantidettsi kinin dhambenka kiam i haapade.
42010019	Marrato! Gunibee qolpobeam yenin tigoadettsi, yesa banqin eenaam yenin bashen hayamo yena inta imidine. Yeam kaamea yer qolehe.
42010020	Ko dahaannaar beerona yena ee kenin hamenna wozadheebhode; yesa naabenin cecinte dohon warqatinte thaapadhonna wozadhee" kena ki hamade.
42010021	Ogo wodanka Yesus Manpas Gazanka wozadhayse, "Cecinbee peenbesa Imba maataa Imbo, ko yerinam eena pakallabee yerin dhesaanabekalanka aachayse naana likkanana hanin dhohonna haam ida gobshe. Gonne, Imbo, yin hayana hasa payya qaabe ko maatade.
42010022	"Yer wulam Imbakalanka ina imbhidine. Barjo Imbaakalanka ab Barjo Naasa hay kinin dohonam dhesea hayyear qolehe. Ogodettsi Barjo Naasabee Naasa yinti dhaana kinin zagaana eenabekalanka ab Barjo Imba hay kinin dohonam dhesea hayyear qolehe" kena ki hamade.
42010023	Yesus yisa paanan yivayna yimal ke daaka kekal maatayse, "Yenin shedenam shedayna eena gobshadhaanane.
42010024	Inta yena gon ida giye: Thoothina Barjokala qansayse eenna giyayna eenabee binnabe yenin shedenam shedana keda zage, ko dahaannaar shedadehe; yenin qansenam qansana keda zage, ko dahaannaar qansadehe" kena ki hamade.
42010025	Marrato! Eedi kalaa Musesa yigginam dhettsea Yesusam taysate shedana dhaabhayse, "Woam Dhettsea, rooro wul lay dehen sadanam haapana yer har i hayo?" kina ki hamade.
42010026	Yesusaar "Musesa yigginte thaapadhoono hare? Ogoam hanin nabbabenka haraa bhocchaa?" kina ki hamade.
42010027	Ear kina yi maasina, " 'Ya Imbaa hantea Barjoam gonin hamon woylaminka, gonin hamon sadanka, gonin hamon kantanka, gonin hamon qaabenka kiam nashaa; ha aanantaam hadettsi hayayse nashaa' koda hame" kina ki hamade.
42010028	Yesusaar, "Gonaa giyade; yinaa hayna rooro wul lay dehen sadanam hada haape" kina ki hamade.
42010029	Ea yiam tipa hayana zagayse Yesusna "Isa aananta kidi hayne?" hamayse kiam ki oysade.
42010030	Yesus maasayse kina yin ki giyade: "Eedi kalaa Yerusaalemra Iyarko kinin yivenka, eena eensa koymon buurate itsayna kiam haapayse, kisa apalanam kidara bulayse kiam yinin qanonsa budonte, ea diyanna kinin hayenka garayse kiam ke yivade.
42010031	Dhesima gudul kalaa goyn ogoka ki nivade; eamaar shedayse ki sagade.
42010032	Ogoraar tapir Lewi eedi kalaa goyn ogoka kinin nivenka kiam shedayse ki sagade.
42010033	Sammaria eedi kalaa goyn ogoka nivite eam shedayse kina ki burqadhade.
42010034	Eakal theedayse waqatibee woynea hattasa aapin cuubadhonbeam kisa hajimindar qadhayse apalaka ki dhaxade. Yisa ukuliadar kiam bulayse shonnayn wodhen raqindar tiyate yivayse kiam payya hayayse shedaate ki wodhade.
42010035	Peen sedhaysakaar birre lamaa bulayse shonnayn wodhen ooninsa imbaana imayse, 'Ea kaam payya hayayse shedaa; ogora inta nivayse hanin kina bulon koymon wulam hana kashayda kashe' kina ki hamade.
42010036	"Ta keeda igina makkamma eenasa koymon buurite itsaynayn qanate dhabaasa kina aanamo maataa hakal hamaa ki maate?" kina ki hamade.
42010037	Kidiar "Kina burqadhayse kiam kelshaane" ki hamade. Yesusaar "Yaar yivayse yin hayaa" kina ki hamade.
42010038	Yesus yisa paanan yivaynabesana kinka goyti yivite gurda kallonte ke yeskade. Raqin ogote Marta hambhayno maa kallo yisa oonindar keam ko tiyade.
42010039	Mayriyam hambhayno kosa indanaas kallo ko dahade; kodiar Imbaa wontea Yesussa roon demente dooqayse kinin giyen dhalqinam qansite ko dahade.
42010040	Martaar waadimanin kodar thoothenka os ora hamada ko qajadhade. Yesuskal theedayse, "Imbo, indanaano waadiman wulam idar ko garaysaka inin waadadhenka koam haapayse ya lay ha hamo? Ogonante iam konin kelshoadettsi kona giyaa" kina ko hamade.
42010041	Yesusaar kona yinin maasenka, "Marta, Marta, yer thoothi qaabite hada gaale.
42010042	Ko dahaannaar yer zaskea kalaa bishne. Mayriyam yer payyanam ko kamade; ogoamaar kokala tiidhehe" kona ki hamade.
42011001	Yesusaar raq kalaate Barjoam miskite ki dahade. Misken ki macchaysaka kisa paanan yivaynasa kalaa, "Imbo, Wannis yisa paanan yivaynaam Barjoam miskadhen keam kinin dhettsondettsi, yaar hamin wonin miskenam woam dhettsaa" kina ki hamade.
42011002	Yesusaar "Barjoam yenin miskenka yin giyayse miskee: '[Cecinte dahaa] Imbaa wontea, nammo hasa ko gazisadhe; bitamono hanno ko nive.
42011003	Wona zasken galanam rooroa rooroaka wona imaa.
42011004	Woam seesaynana wonin garendettsi, wonnon seesonamaar wona ya garaa. Siyondar arsota taysayno wodar konin nivoamadettsi woam gishaa' hamayse miskee" kena ki hamade.
42011005	-
42011006	Ogora Yesus kena yin ki giyade: "Yesa iira eedi nashoysa dahaa sootin kiaddha laman kisa oonindar yivayse, 'Isa nashoa, bannzo! Isa eedi nasho kalaa goytibar ikal ki nivade; kina inin imea gala ikal qolehe. Gala hasa daana ina imaa' kina kinin hamenka,
42011007	ta keeda ea agaa ooninte dooqayse, 'Iam galshaabhode! Inta kerin diithidine; isa naanaar imbesana raatidine; dhaabhayse hana imana damattine' kina hamok?
42011008	Kisa nashoa yinin dohonna dhaabhayse kina imana yi zagaammaar, miskite kinin galshenna dhaabhayse kinin zagon wulam kina ima ki ime ida hame.
42011009	"Ogonante yena ida giye: Miskee, yena imbha ko imbhe; zagee, haapeeda haape; kerinam kokkee, yena buldha ko buldhe.
42011010	Harrna hambhidianna, miskea wul tiya ki tiye; zagear haapa ki haape; kerinam kokkeanaar kerro buldha ko buldhe.
42011011	"Yedi ta imba dahayse yesa iira eedi kalaa naasa kintea kiam [balasha kinin miskenka, seeni kina ima ki imo?] Kaara kinin miskenka, kaaran oolonte guni kina ima ki imo?
42011012	Bhula kinin miskenka, qolpo kina ima ki imo?
42011013	Ta keeda yedi siyana dahayse yesa naanana yerin payyan iman ye dhesidianna, cecinte dahaa Imbaa yentea kiam miskaynana Manpas Gazanam yedara sagi hamin ki imimine?" kena ki hamade.
42011014	Yesus beeronin apo kaysa eedi kalaadara beeroam bulite ki dahade. Beeroar eadara utonsa budonte, ea apon dhalqima dhalqan ki yedade; ogona eenoar targadhidine.
42011015	Ko dahaannaar kesa iira waani waani eena "Beeronaam kinin bulayno beeronasa hayoa Bevelzebulsa kantankane" ke hamade.
42011016	Waani eenoar kiam taysate shedota zagayse Barjokalanka tarshea milkit kena kinin dhoadettsi zagite ke dahade.
42011017	Kidiar kesa qaabonam dhesayse kena yin ki giyade: "Bita kalaasa eena kinka kikalanka edimidi ke hanna, bitamono kisa kaya ko kaye; oonin kallon eena kinka kikalanka edimidi ke hanna, onno ogono kottsima ko kottsime.
42011018	Inta beeronasa hayoa Bevelzebul kantanka inin beeronaam buleadettsi yeda giye. Seethaan taar kinka kikalanka edimidi ki hanna, bitamono kisa hamin ko woye?
42011019	Beeronaam inin bulayno Bevelzebul kantanka ko hanna, ta eena yenna beeronaam hay kantanka ke bule? Ogonante kedi yedar pirda ke pirde.
42011020	Inta beeronaam inin bulayno Barjosa kantanka ko hanna, ta keeda Barjosa bitamono yekal nividine hamintane.
42011021	"Kantanka dahaa eedi kalaa banqibee lonngabe yedayse oonin yinnon toolea ki hanna, onno kisa burdhehe.
42011022	Ko dahaannaar kidara sagea nivayse kiam bashidianna, kinin woylamin qajaana banqin koymonaam kikalanka tiyayse kisa koymonam buurayse een waanina kasha ki kashe.
42011023	"Imbetetay hama hayyear iam jibba ki jibbe; imbete kinka kamima hayyear thar thar kida haye" kena ki hamade.
42011024	Yesus pir "Beero eeddara yinin uton wodanka, ukunse raq zagayse noqoyn qolmon raqinte kida yaaye; ko dahaannaar ukunse raq haapehe. Ogona 'Inin uton oonindar isa maatate ida yive' kida hame.
42011025	Maatate kinin nivenka, ooninam sahate ashkadhon kida haape.
42011026	Ogora yivayse yidara kalon sagaana waani tobbhaana beeronaam yinka entsate nivayse easa iinte ardayse keda dee. Ogonante ea agaasa dayntano ena hamora kattsi siyane" ki hamade.
42011027	Yesus ogoam kinin giyenka, maa kallo eenasa iira upsi gebhika "Haam adhayse amin qooshoono handa hamin gobshadhoonone!" kina ko hamade.
42011028	Yesusaar kona "Gobshadhaana Barjosa upsinam qansayse toolaynane" kona ki hamade.
42011029	Eeno Yesuskal nivada thoothaate konin yivenka, kona yin ki giyade: "Wodan koka dohoono eeno siyonone; kodi tarshea milkit shedana koda zage. Ena Barjokala qansayse eenna giyea Yoonaassa milkitira milkit ab kona haydhehe.
42011030	Ena Yoonaas Nenewe katamante dohon eenna milkit kinin dohondettsi, yin inta Eedi Naasiar wodan koka dohon eenna milkit ida maate.
42011031	"Hayn utensa mizaqimbar dohon peensa binno ko wodanka dohon eenbesana kinka dembhira dhaabhayse pirdin rooroaka kedar koda pirde; harrna hambhidianna, kodi Bitaa Solomoon yisa pakalmakkonka kinin giyenam qansana peensa gasara ko nivade. Marrato! Solomoondara sagea ea kote daane.
42011032	"Ena Nenewe katamante dahaana eenaar pirdin rooroaka, wodan koka dohon adhadhinbete dhaabhayse kodar keda pirde. Harrna hambhidianna, Nenewe katamante dohon eenna Yoonaas Barjosa upsinam kinin giyenka qansayse seeson waadimanam garayse Barjodar ko maatade. Marrato! Yoonaasdara sagea ea kote daane" kena ki hamade.
42011033	Ogora Yesus "Shaakanam shashkayse aachea way daran yer guupea eedi qolehe. Ooninte ardaynana konin shaakoadettsi dheg hamon raqindar kida wode.
42011034	Hasa bishinsa shaakano aapine. Aapino hanno payya konin dohonna, hasa bishino wul shaakante koda dee. Aapino hanno hajidi ko hanna, hasa bishino wul thipante koda dee.
42011035	Ta hadar dohoono shaakano thipa konin maatoamadettsi mete hasaam gishaa.
42011036	Ta keeda hasa bishino wul thipa yindar qolmino shaakaka dohoono ko hanna, bishino hasa wul shaaka yindar kattsi shaakayno koda maate" ki hamade.
42011037	Yesus ogoam kinin giyonsa budonte Parisa eenasa shaarira eedi kalaa gala yikal kinin itsoadettsi kiam ki eelade. Kidiar kisa ooninte kummanna ardayse ki dooqade.
42011038	Yesus galan yinin itsensa birayse yisa aaninam kesa dambindettsi kinin shiidhaamonam Parisa ea haapayse ki targadhade.
42011039	Ogonante Imbaa wontea Yesus kina yin ki giyade: "Ta yedi Parisa eena galan yenin itsen sharqanbee karambhanbesa zulonam payya hayayse yeda shive; ko dahaannaar iinka yesa saribee siyamobe thoothidine.
42011040	Yedi kina malgimmato, zulonam pijaa Barjo iinaam pijadaa?
42011041	Ko dahaannaar sharqanbee karambhanbesa iinte dohonam qambhinana imee. Ogosa budonte yer wul yena payya koda maate.
42011042	"Yedi Parisa eenato, hay! Harrna hambhidianna, mayante yenin yiithaana basibilabee thaltinabe, yerra likkana woothin dheeshana wulsa iira shiishima tambhasa iira kalaam Barjona yeda ime; tipan pirdinbee Barjoam nashintanbeam yeda gare. Ko dahaannaar waaniam yenin hayenka kinaam garinta yeam zaskehe.
42011043	"Yedi Parisa eenato, hay! Harrna hambhidianna, Ayiwd eensa bukin raqinte gobshadhon borkotondar dooqotabee gabante gobshadhon gisimenam gisimbhotabe yeda nashe.
42011044	Milkitinsa qolmina duukinaam yenin maatonna hay! Eeno dhesima igina duukinadar koda yaaye" ki hamade.
42011045	Musesa yigginam dhettsayna eenasa eedi kalaa kina yi giyna: "Woam Dhettsea, yin hanin giyenka woamaar kembesana ha iirade" kina ki hamade.
42011046	Yesus kina yin ki giyade: "Yedi taar Musesa yigginam dhettsayna eenato, hay! Dethan basken eenaam baskisayse yedi yena baskenam aansa surkenka hattear kaamattene.
42011047	Ena eykena yennayn deesaana Barjokala qansayse eenna giyaynasa duukindar seenin bunkaate yenin ashkenna yena hay!
42011048	Ta keeda yedi eykena yenna waadiman yeda tarje; kesa waadimanamaar keedhayse yeda waadadhe. Kedi keam ke deesade; yedi kesa duukinam yeda ashke.
42011049	Ogonante Barjo yisa pakalmakkonka yin ki giyade: 'Ikala qansayse eenna giyaynabee isa tarjamonnante inin yittsaynabeam kedar yittsayda yittse; kesa waaniam deesa ke deese, waaniamaar oyta ke oyte' ki hamade.
42011050	Ogonoar peen pijadhorra yedayse Barjokala qansayse eenna giyayna eenasa zombhino wodan ko eeno pirdin wodanka oysa ko oysadhe.
42011051	Inta yena ida giye: Aabeelsa zombhira yedayse Barjona marshan daran machadhen raqinbee Barjosa gazan ooninbesa shaarinte deesadhaa Zakkariassa zombhinka yekka, wodan ko eeno gon pirdin wodanka oysa ko oysadhe.
42011052	"Yedi Musesa yigginam dhettsayna eenato, hay! Timmirinsa kerin bulen qulpinam ye tiyade; yedi yenaar gidir ardeetene, ardanna zagaynaamaar ye marade" kena ki hamade.
42011053	-
42011054	Yesus raqin ogora yivota kinin dhaabhenka, Musesa yigginam dhettsaynabee Parisa eenabe kattsi kiam yinin jibbenna, kisa dhalqinka kiam yedota thoothi kiam dhattsan ke yedade.
42012001	Ogo wodanka thoothino eeno Yesuskal ko bukade; eensa thoothamora dhaabhoono kinka kiam kiam tigada koda kupime. Yesus birayse yisa paanan yivaynana yin ki giyade: "Parisa eenasa irshora mete yesaam gishee; ogonoar kesa maltamora pegadhee isa hamintane.
42012002	Aachimayse may maatima, aachadhaysakaar dhesima shidhea yer qolehe.
42012003	Ogonante aachika yenin giyoono wul may koda qansime; ooninsa gulinte hashkimeka qaaminte yenin giyaynoar eensa shaarinte may koda ooshadhe" ki hamade.
42012004	Yesusaar "Ye isa nashonana yin ida giye: Yesa waanam deesayse yer ab hayana damiminana kurtumbheebhode.
42012005	Ko dahaannaar inta hayna kurtumbha yeam konin zaskenam yena ida giye; ogonoar yinin deesonsa budonte, lay dikimon nuunte dhabana hayamoysa dahaa Barjoam kurtumbhee. Bannzo! Kiam kurtumbhee ida yena hame.
42012006	"Aptina suutana dongnam santup kalaadar shanshadhitetayu? Aptina iginasa iira kalaam hattear Barjo walehe.
42012007	Meten yennonsa sitin wulam shiishima Barjo paydidine. Ogonante yedi kurtumbheebhode; aptina suutana thoothinadara yedi sageeda sage" kena ki hamade.
42012008	Yesus pir "Yena yin ida giye: Een birante isa tarjea wulna inta Eedi Naasiar Barjo gaananasa birante kina tarjayda tarje.
42012009	Een birante 'Inta Yesus eeditehe' hamayse giyeana intaar Barjo gaananasa birante 'Kidi inti eeditehe' ida hame.
42012010	"I Eedi Naasdar siya giyea wul kisa seesonam kina gardha ko gardhe; Manpas Gazanam iirea ki hanna kisa seesonam kina gardhehe.
42012011	"Eena Ayiwd eensa bukin raqintebee, peen wottsaynakalbee, hayonasa birantebe pirdinna yeam yedayse kenin yivenka, 'Hamino palimo? Yer haroo giyo?' hamayse qaabeebhode.
42012012	Harrna hambhidianna, giyana yeam zaskenam ogo wodanka Manpas Gazano yena giya ko giye" kena ki hamade.
42012013	Eensa shaarira eedi kalaa Yesusna "Woam Dhettsea, imbasa koymora ina kinin kashoadettsi iishimna giyaa" kina ki hamade.
42012014	Yesusaar "Ya ea kaa, yesa shaarinte pirdin pirdeabee koymon kasheabe hayayse iam wodaa hayne?" kina ki hamade.
42012015	Maasayse eenana yin ki giyade: "Eensa sadano koymo thoothamokatehe. Ogonante yeam toolee; anngarma wulra mete yesaam gishee" kena ki hamade.
42012016	Ogora kamsika kena yin ki giyade: "Eedi wodimo kalaasa haaminte isin thoothi ko ushade.
42012017	Kidiar 'Isinin koam inin kehea kono isa qolmonna hamin i hayo?' hamayse yisa woylaminka ki qaabade.
42012018	'Yin ida haye: Isa konnaam kottsayse ab kono worki ida woyse; ogote isa isininbee waani koymonbeam kesa iir ida kee.
42012019	Innon sadanna "Isa sadano, thoothi levena maatea koymo thoothi i pucchade. Ta keeda ukunsaa, itsaa, wucaa, wozadhaa" kona ida hame' ki hamade.
42012020	Barjoar 'Ya kaa malgimea, kina sootin hasa sadanam hakalanka tiidha ko tiidhe; ta ogo hanin pucchoono wul hayna koda shidhe?' kina ki hamade.
42012021	Yinaqa peendar koymonam pucchada Barjosa birante qambhi dahaa eedi ea wodimoa agaadettsi kida maate" ki hamade.
42012022	Yesus yisa paanan yivaynana yin ki giyade: "Ogonante yena ida giye: Yesa dayntanna 'Haroo itso? Haroo qaadho?' hamayse qaabeebhode.
42012023	Harrna hambhidianna, galara dayntano, apalara bishino saga ko sage.
42012024	Ayronaam shedee; kedi bheeta yiithehe, shikaar shikehe, konoar kesa qolehe. Ko dahaannaar Barjo keam kida kunse. Ta yedi aptinadara hamaddha yenin sagenam bhocchee!
42012025	Yesa iira qaabayse leven yinnondar rooro kalaa arsea eedi hayne?
42012026	Yerin likkonam yemal hayana ye damaamma, ta keeda yerin waaniam harrnee qaabe?
42012027	"Aamana hamin kenin gebhenam shedee; kedi waadimaka qajadhehe, puttoar qanehe. Ko dahaannaar yena ida giye: Ena Bitaa Solomoonaar yisa gobshin wulka igina aamanasa kalaadettsi hattear goobadehe.
42012028	Barjoar kina haapadhayse saka nuunte yiam koqadhayna peendar dahaana shundhaam yin gobshayse qattsea ki hanna, ta yedi Barjodar woylamin qajadhen joogaanato, yeam hamin saskayse ki qattsimine?
42012029	"Ta 'Wodi haroo itso? Haroo wuco?' hamayse qaabeebhode.
42012030	Ogo wulam haapota Barjoam dhesimino eeno koda zage. Ogono wul yeam konin zaskenam Imbaa yentea dhesa ki dhese.
42012031	Yediar kisa bitamonam zagee; ogono wul yena imbha ko imbhe" kena ki hamade.
42012032	Yesus yi giyna: "Yedi tokaa maataana eenato, Imbaa yentea yisa bitamonam yena imana kinin nashonna kurtumbheebhode.
42012033	Yesa dohon koymonam shanshayse birrenam qambhinana imee; diibiyn yeskimon, ulavulonin itsimon cecinte maqa maqimin gecchar gecchiminte koymo yenante wodee.
42012034	Harrna hambhidianna, koymonin yesa dohonte woylammoar ogote koda dee" kena ki hamade.
42012035	Yesusaar kena "Apala karnante orgo dhaximbhaana maatee; yesa shaakanoar shaakoono ko dee.
42012036	Yedi yisa imbaa gaydon oonira maatate nivayse kerinam kinin kokkenka, saana kina bulota toolayna waadiman eena maatee.
42012037	Igina yisa imbaanin niven wodanka, wocchimbhayse toolite ke daaka kinin haapayna waadiman eena gobshadhaanane. Inta yena gon ida giye: Kidi apalan orgo dhaximbhayse kummandar keam dottsayse keam kida kunse.
42012038	Sootin kiaddha laman nivayse keam kinin shedenka, wocchimbhayse dahaana waadiman eena gobshadhaanane.
42012039	Ko dahaannaar, yedi ta koam dhesee: Ea ooninsa imbaa diibiyn yisa oonindar wodaa hamaaka kinin nivenam dhesidi yi hanna, ooninsa kerin qunthadhoadettsi hayehe.
42012040	Inta Eedi Naas yenin bhocchaamon wodanka inin nivenna, yedi taar ashkimbhayse toolee" kena ki hamade.
42012041	Bhethiroosaar "Imbo, kamsin koam wo binnanaa giymoo? Een wulnaa giye?" hamayse kiam ki oysade.
42012042	Imbaa wontea Yesusaar yin giyayse kina ki maasade: "Ta keeda oonin eenaam payya hayayse ki wottsebee waadiman eenanaar galanam kena ima zaskea wodaaka kinin imoadettsibe kisa imbaa kiam kamayse kinin wodea gon hama pakala kunsea kidi hayne?
42012043	Yisa imbaanin niven wodanka, kina giidhon waadimandar haapadhea ea kidi gobshadhaane.
42012044	Inta yena gon ida giye: Agaa waadiman easa imbaa yisa dohon yerin wuldar wottsea hayayse kiam kida wode.
42012045	"Ko dahaannaar agaa waadiman ea 'Imba saana nivehe' hamayse yisa woylaminka qaabayse, waadiman eena annginabee maanabeam qanaate, pir itsadabee wucadabe bardhan ki yedanna,
42012046	agaa waadiman easa imbaa kinin bhocchaamon rooronbee kinin dhesaamon wodanbeka niva ki nive. Kiam kattsi kida qane; ogora ithanam kisa Barjodar woylamin qajiminabesana kida haye.
42012047	"Yisa imbaanin giyonam dhesayse ashkimbhaama, kinin giyonamaar hayaama agaa waadiman ea kattsi kida qandhe.
42012048	Yisa imbaa yinin giyonam dhesima, qandhan yiam zasken waadiman waadadhaa ea likka kida qandhe. Harrna hambhidianna, thoothi yina imbhaakalanka thoothi koda zagadhe; thoothi yina elqimbhadhakalankaar thoothi koda toldhe" kena ki hamade.
42012049	Yesus yin ki giyade: "Peendar nuu dhabota bavate i nivade; ta keeda saana ko yedidianna hare dohoono?
42012050	Ko dahaannaar inin shiidhayno gaale shiidhime daane; ogoyn thoothenka yekka isa ukunse qolehe.
42012051	Inta peendar payyamo hayana inin nivoono yena maata ko maato? Eenaam kikalanka edota i nivade, payyamo hayana nivaatine.
42012052	Ta keeda kaara yedayse oonin kallonte dahaana dongna eenasa shaarira makkamma lamaanadar, lamaanaar makkammadar dhaabhayse kinka kikala edima ke edime.
42012053	Imbaa naasadar, naasaar imbaadar; indano naandar, naanoar indandar; indano naasa geshondar, naasa geshonoar aakandar dhaabhayse kinka kikala edima ke edime" ki hamade.
42012054	Tapir Yesus eenna yin ki giyade: "Liilono haynsa wavambar konin dohonam yenin haapenka, 'Kina doobi qana ko qane' yeda hame; gon qana ko qane.
42012055	Tapir jibarro hayn utensa mizaqimbar konin jibarshenka, 'Kina peeno oydha ko oydhe' yeda hame; gon oydha ko oydhe.
42012056	Yedi maltinato, cecinbee peenbesa milkitinam shedayse edana dameeda dame; ko dahaannaar ko wodanka maaten yerinam edana yenin damimino harrnane?
42012057	"Yedi tipan yerinam dhesayse yemal yenin pirdimino harrnane?
42012058	Hambesana wacimaa haam bersayse peen wottseakal tiyate haam kinin yivenka, akar goynte dahayse kimbesana kinka qaashimana zagaa. Yin ha hayaamma, kidi pirdin pirdea eakal kantaka gochate haam kida yive; pirdin pirdea ear haam poolisana saskate kida ime. Poolisaar dhaxin ooninte haam kida arse.
42012059	Inta hana ida giye: Hanka kashaa hambhon bazan wulam kashate hanin macchenka yekka, dhaxin oonira hamin ko dahaakaar utattane" ki hamade.
42013001	Ogo wodanka Yesuskal dahaana eena waani "Galila eenasa shaarira waani waani eena Barjona marsha machayse kenin imen wodanka, Bhilathoos keam deesayse kesa zombhinam kesa marshanbesana ki worsade" hamayse kina ke giyade.
42013002	Yesus kena yinin maasenka yin ki giyade: "Igina Galila eena yin kenin gaaloono Galila peen een wuldara sagi seeson waadadhaana eena kenin maatonnane hamaysee qaabo?
42013003	Yintehe! Ko dahaannaar seeson waadimanam yesa garayse Barjodar ye maataamma, yedi wulatte yin kayeeda kaye.
42013004	"Pir Seeloom gurdante seeninka woysadhon oonin yidar yiipaysaka diyaana eena tabhi lankayna Yerusaalemir dohon een wuldara sagi seeson waadadhaana eenane hamaysee qaabo?
42013005	Yintehe! Ko dahaannaar seeson waadimanam yesa garayse Barjodar ye maataamma, yedi wulatte yin kayeeda kaye" kena ki hamade.
42013006	Ogora Yesus kena kamsika yin ki giyade: "Eedi kalaasa haaminte kordhoono haaqa shaap kallo ko dahade. 'Kodi aapi kaydu?' hamayse koraa imbaa shedota kinin nivenka, kodi kala hattear aapi kaadehe.
42013007	Haamin imbaar haamin tooleana 'Shedaa! Hatton kosa aapi shedota ida nivika kinaka leve makkam konin maatonna, aapi kala hattear kodar inin haapaamonna, ta koam taxaa. Harrna ko haaminam gene?' ki hamade.
42013008	Toolea ear kina yinin maasenka, 'Imbo, demenam kosa koyayse duba inin kehenna, taar kina leven koam garaa.
42013009	Niven levenka aapi ushea ko hanna, payyane; ushima ko hanna, hada koam taxe' kina ki hamade" hamayse Yesus ki giyade.
42013010	Yesus ukunsen rooroaka Ayiwd eensa bukin raqinte dhettsite ki dahade.
42013011	Marrato! Tabhi lankay levenka yekka beero zulo wobsaysaka dheg hamayse woyana damaammo maa kallo ko dahade.
42013012	-
42013013	Yesusaar koam haapayse yikal koam ki eelade. Yisa aaninam kodar wodayse, "Ya edono kono, hanin woborra ya pikidine" kona ki hamade. Saanawa kodiar dheg hamayse Barjoam ko gobshade.
42013014	Ayiwd eensa bukin raqin ogoam wottsea ea Yesus ukunsen rooroaka eenaam kinin pacchonna wacimayse, "Waadadha yeam zaskayno rooro laxne. Ta roorona iginaka nivayse paashee; ukunsen rooroaka ko dahabhoode" ki hamade.
42013015	Imbaa wontea Yesusaar kina yinin maasenka, "Yedi maltinato, yedi wul ukunsen rooroaka yesa wanngabee ukullabeam kenin dohon raqira bulayse noqo wusho yivattenu?
42013016	Kono edono Abraamsa muldhara dahayse, tabhi lankay levena Seethaanin koam wobsorra ukunsen rooroaka pika koam zaskayu?" ki hamade.
42013017	Ogoam kinin giyenka kiam jibbayna wul ke ooshimbhade; kinin hayon yerin tarshen wulka eeno ko wozadhade.
42013018	Yesusaar "Barjosa bitamono har ko maate? Harka koam i kamso?
42013019	Saliithasa aapi eedi kalaa yisa haaminte kinin yiithon bheetandettsi koda maate. Kodiar haaqa gaari koda maate; aptinaar kosa antindar ooni keda woyse" kena ki hamade.
42013020	Tapir "Barjosa bitamonam harka i kamso?
42013021	Maa kallo dhiili sharqa makkam tiyate kanka konin taapaa irshodettsine; irshono konin dhiilin taapon taapanam konin oydhoadettsi ko hayade" kena ki hamade.
42013022	Yesus Yerusaalem yinin yivenka katamante dahaanabee gurdante dahaana eenabeam dhettsaate yivite ki dahade.
42013023	Ogo wodanka eensa iira eedi kalaa "Imbo, dhaqayna eena tokaaw?" kina ki hamade. Kidiar kena yin ki giyade:
42013024	"Qiiqan kerinka ardana mashimee. Inta yena ida giye: Thoothina eena ardana keda zage; ko dahaannaar kedi damehe.
42013025	Ooninsa imbaa dhaabhayse kerinam kinin diithonsa budonte, yedi mayante woyayse, 'Imbo, Imbo, wona bulaa!' hante kerinam kokkeeda kokke. Kidiar yena 'Hamora yenin nivonam inta yeam dhesattine' hamayse yena kida maase.
42013026	Ogo wodanka yedi 'Hambesana kinka wo itsade, wo wucade; wonin bukon raqintear woam ha dhettsade' yeda hame.
42013027	Kidiar 'Hamora yenin nivonam inta yeam dhesattine. Yedi kina siyon hayayna eenato, yedi wul ikalanka os pegadhee!' yena kida hame.
42013028	"Abraambee, Yisaaqbee, Yayqoobbee, Barjokala qansayse eenna giyayna wulbeam Barjosa bitamonte yenin haapen wodanka, yedi mayante dhabadhayse yenin shidhenka, ogote eepibee atsi qiicabe koda maate.
42013029	Peen wulra eeno nivayse Barjosa bitamonte kummandar koda dooqe.
42013030	Marrato! Budona eenasa waani birana keda maate; birana eenasa waaniar budona keda maate" kena ki hamade.
42013031	Ogo wodanka Parisa eenasa shaarira waani eena Yesuskal nivayse, "Herodis haam deesana kinin zagenna, kora dhaabhayse yivaa" kina ke hamade.
42013032	Kidiar kena yin ki giyade: "Yivayse dhalqinka uxea ea agaana '#"Shedaa! Kinabee sakabe beeronam eendara ida bule; hajadhaanaamaar ida pacche; makkansoa rooroaka inin waadadhenam ida macche" Yesus ki hamade' kina hamee.
42013033	Ko dahaannaar Barjokala qansayse eenna giyea Yerusaalemra raq abir kinin diyoadettsi konin zaskimonna kinabee, sakabee, oshaalabe Yerusaalemdar yiva iam koda zaske.
42013034	"Yerusaalemo, Yerusaalemo! Ya Barjokala qansayse eenna giyayna eenaam deesayno, hadar yittsadhaana eenaam seeninka paxayno! Baacha yisa naasiam kaapin demente konin yedeadettsi, intaar hasa naanaam yedana thoothi woda i zagade; ya nashaatane.
42013035	Ta keeda yesa gazan oonira Barjo utaysaka onno guuri koda shidhe. Inta yena ida giye: 'Barjo Imbasa naabenka nivea gobshadhaane' yenin hamenka yekka, keeda kaara os iam haapattene" kena ki hamade.
42014001	Yesus ukunsen rooroaka Parisa eenasa entsanasa kalaa ooninte gala itsota ki ardade; Parisa eena kinin hayenam toolayse shedite ke dahade.
42014002	Ogo wodanka burqoka bishiysa ettsaa eedi kalaa Yesussa birante ki dahade.
42014003	Yesusaar "Ukunsen rooroaka eenaam pacchano Musesa yigginte giidhidimoo? Giidhadayu?" hamayse Musesa yigginam dhettsaynabee Parisa eenabeam ki oysade.
42014004	Kediar lay ke hamade. Yesus eam yedate pacchayse oonindar maasate kiam ki yittsade.
42014005	Ogora Yesus "Yesa iira yisa naasa way yisa waxa tuular wavidi ki hanna, ukunsen rooroaka saanawa gochate bulima hayne?" kena ki hamade.
42014006	Dhalqin ogosa malsin maasana kedi damadehe.
42014007	Yesus kummanna yiam eldhaana eena gobshadhon raqinte dooqana kenin zagenka keam shedayse, kamsika kena yin ki giyade:
42014008	"Eedi hay ki hannaar naan anzanin imbhen gaydon raqinte kummanna haam eelidi ki hanna, gobshadhon raqinte dooqaabhode; way hadara sagi gobshadhaa eldhidi daasane.
42014009	Ko dahaannaar ye lamaanaam eelaa ea nivayse, 'Kaa raqaam ea kaana garaa' haam kida hame. Ogo wodanka yaar gebhi ooshimbheka wuldara token raqinte hada dooqe.
42014010	Ogona haam eldhon wodanka, yivayse wuldara token raqinte dooqaa. Ogora haam eelaa nivayse, 'Isa nashoa, kote nivaa' haam kida hame. Ogo wodanka hambesana kinka dooqaana eena wulsa birante gobshi hana koda maate.
42014011	Yisa metenam dheg hayea wul toka ki toke; yisa metenam toskear dheg dheg kida hame" ki hamade.
42014012	Yesus kummanna eelaa eana yin ki giyade: "Rooron kummanna way sootin kummanna eenaam hanin eelen wodanka ha aanantabee, hambanaanabee, hasa muldhanabee, wodimma gurdan eenabeam eelaabhode. Ha eelidianna, kedi maasate haam eelayse hana bazanam maasa ke maase.
42014013	Ogona eenaam kummanna hanin eelen wodanka qambhinabee, aaninsa wobonabee, roonsa wobonabee, aapin kayaanabeam eelaa.
42014014	Hana yer kenin maasea kesa qolmonna, ya gobshadhaa hada maate; eena tipana dembhira kenin dhaabhen wodanka, Barjo hana bazanam maasa ki maase" kina ki hamade.
42014015	Yesusbesana kummandar dooqaanasa eedi kalaa dhalqin ogoam qansayse, "Barjosa bitamonte kummandar dooqea hamin gobshadhaane!" kina ki hamade.
42014016	Yesusaar kina yin ki giyade: "Eedi kalaa gala gebhi baxayse thoothin eenaam ki eelade.
42014017	Kumman wodan yeskaysaka, yinin eelaanadar 'Yerro wul ashkadhidine; keeda nivee' hamayse kena apon giyea yisa waadiman eam kedar ki yittsade.
42014018	"Eldhaana eena wul shidhana kenin zagonna, 'Wokal yeskimehe' haman ke yedade. Biraar kesa 'Haami inin shanonna, shedaba yiva iam koda zaske. Bannzo! Hakal nivana damattine' kina ki hamade.
42014019	Waa ear 'Haami waak haaqa dong inin shanonna, keam koysate shedota ida yive. Bannzo! Hakal nivana damattine' kina ki hamade.
42014020	Waar 'Maa inin keemonna, ikal yeskimehe' kina ki hamade.
42014021	"Kisa waadiman ear maatate nivayse ogo wulam yisa imbaana ki giyade. Ogo wodanka ooninsa imbaa wacimayse yisa waadiman eana, 'Kataman goynabee roon goynabedar saanawa yivayse qambhinabee, aaninsa wobonabee, aapin kayaanabee, roonsa wobonabeam kote keam arsaa' kina ki hamade.
42014022	"Waadiman ear yinin yivorra nivayse, 'Imbo, hanin giyondettsi i hayaysaka akar ranqo daane' kina ki hamade.
42014023	Imbaar waadiman eana 'Isa oonin thoothoadettsi katamandar yivayna goynabee gurdan goynabedar yivayse eenin ardoadettsi hayaa.
42014024	Inta hana gon ida giye: Igina birayse eldhaana eenasa kala hattear ogo inin ashkon galanam itsehe' kina ki hamade" hamayse Yesus ki giyade.
42014025	Thoothino eeno Yesusbesana kinka konin yivenka, budoka wal hamayse kena yin ki giyade:
42014026	"Imbesana nivana zagea imbaabee, indanbee, geshon yinnonbee, naana yinnabee, indanaanabee, sadan yinnonbeam idara saskayse nashea ki hanna, isa paanan nivea maatana damehe.
42014027	Yinindar ziitate deesadhen masqalinam kedayse isa budobar nivima ea isa paanan nivea maatana damehe.
42014028	"Yesa iira seeninka oonin woysota zagea 'Koymo hamaddha ko zasko?' pir, 'Isa yeekea koymo daaw?' hamayse dooqayse qaabimaa hayne?
42014029	-
42014030	Ogotay ko hamma, oonin yindar woyen raqin meeshayse ooninam daran woysate macchana damaday ki hamma, haapaana eena wul 'Kaa ea woysan yedayse macchano kiam ko bashade' hamaate keda hance.
42014031	"Pir bit kalaa bita waabesana banqi kansana zagidi ki hanna, 'Isa shii tabhi banqin eenaam entsayse eedi kalaa kaysa shii banqin eenaam entsea bita waabesana banqi kansana inta damaw?' hamayse dooqayse qaabima bit hayne?
42014032	Kansana yi damimina, kansota nivea bitaadar pege ki daaka donza daran yittsayse qaashimana kida zage.
42014033	"Ta ogodettsi yesa iira eedi hay ki hannaar, yisa dohon wulam garaama isa paanan nivea maatana damehe.
42014034	"Sooqo payyane; daathan garidi ko hanna, harka ko daathisadhe?
42014035	Ogodettsino sooqono haamibee dubabena konin maatiminna, os mayante koda dhabadhe. Qansen qaamiysa dahaa ki qanse" kena ki hamade.
42015001	Gibirin kacchaynabee Musesa yigginam tooliminabe igina wul Yesusin giyenam qansana kikal keda buke.
42015002	Parisa eenabee Musesa yigginam dhettsaynabe "Kaa ea seeson eenaam yidar tiyayse kembesanaar kinka kida itse" hamayse keda gundume.
42015003	Ogonante Yesus kamsika kena yin ki giyade:
42015004	"Eedi dong kaysa yaanaysa dahaa ea igina yaanasa iira yaati kala kaydianna, eedi oydi kaysa apo tabhi salla yaanaam qawnte garayse kayaam yinin haapenka yekka zagate yivima yesa iira hayne?
42015005	Yinin haapen wodanka, kattsi wozadhayse yisa gelendar kida kede.
42015006	Ogora yisa ooninte yeskayse yisa muldhanabee gurdan eenabeam eelayse, 'Kayon isa yaanam inta haapidine; ogonante imbesana kinka wozadhee' kena kida hame.
42015007	Inta yena yin ida giye: Ogodettsi 'Seeson waadimanam garayse Barjodar maatee' hambha zaskimina eedi oydi kaysa apo tabhi sal tipana eenadara seeson ea kalaa yisa seeson waadimanam garayse Barjodar kinin maatenka cecinte gebhi woza koda dee" kena ki hamade.
42015008	Yesus yin ki giyade: "Santup tabhi yisa dohoono maa kallo igina santupinasa kalaa kaydianna, nuu shashkayse ooninam yisa sahayse yinin haapenka yekka payya zagimino maa hayne?
42015009	Yinin haapen wodanka, yisa muldhanabee yisa gurdan eenabeam eelayse, 'Isa kayaa santupaam inta haapidine; ogonante imbesana kinka wozadhee' kena koda hame.
42015010	Inta yena yin ida giye: Ogodettsi seeso eedi kalaa seeson waadimanam garayse Barjodar kinin maatenka Barjo gaananasa birante woza koda dee" kena ki hamade.
42015011	Pir Yesus yin ki giyade: "Eedi kalaasa naasi lamaa ke dahade.
42015012	Iginaranka naasa kana imbaaka, 'Imbo, koymon hannonsa iira ina yeskaynam imaa' kina ki hamade. Ogonante imbaar yisa koymonam naanana ki kashade.
42015013	"Rooro likkasa budonte kana yisa koymon wulam yinka tiyayse pee pege ki yivade. Ogote koymonam yer pootimondar sun ki macchade.
42015014	Koymon wulam kinin macchonsa budonte, peen ogote kattsi daaqin utonna, kidiar gaalan ki yedade.
42015015	Ogora peen ogo eensa eedi kalaakal yivayse daan ki yedade. Ear yisa haaminte wurkupanaam kinin gishoadettsi kiam ki yittsade.
42015016	Wurkupanayn itsen qurthonam itsayse mishana anngardhan ki yedade; ko dahaannaar ogoam hattear kina imea eedi qolehe.
42015017	"Ogora yisa woylaminka eedi bardhaadettsi yinin qaaborra maatayse yin ki giyade: 'Imbasa ooninte balashanam itsate macchima mishayna waadiman eena meemayne dahaana? Inta ta keeda kote daaqinka isa diyanone.
42015018	Dhaabhayse imbaakal yivayse, "Imbo, Barjobee hambeam inta genidine.
42015019	Os birantear hasa naasi inin hambhoadettsi iam zaskehe. Hanante waadadhaynasa kalaadettsi iam hayaa" ida hame' ki hamade.
42015020	"Ogora dhaabhayse imbaakal ki yivade. Kidiar akar pege ki daaka imbaa kiam yinin haapenka, kina burqadhayse gobate nivayse yidar kiam incayse ki sunqade.
42015021	Naasaar 'Imbo, Barjobee hambeam inta genidine; keeda os birante hasa naasi inin hambhoadettsi iam zaskehe' kina ki hamade.
42015022	Imbaa yisa waadiman eenana yi giyna: 'Saana apalla wulra kattsi payyan bavayse kiam qattsee; kisa aanintear worqi arsee; roontear kina dunnguri hayee;
42015023	durpisadhaa ootaam bavayse kina taxee. Wo itse, wo wozadhe.
42015024	Harrna hambhidianna, isa naasa kaa diydine inin hamaa ta sadaka ki dahade; kaydine inin hamaa ta kidi haapadhidine' kinin hamenka, kediar wozadhan ke yedade.
42015025	"Ogo wodanka iishima haaminte ki dahade. Maatate ooninkal kinin theedenka, goolabee warsabesa upsi ki qansade.
42015026	Waadadhaynasaar kalaam eelayse, 'Ogono yer hare?' hamayse ki oysade.
42015027	Kidiar 'Hakana nividine; ta sadaka dahayse kinin nivonna, hamba durpisadhaa ootaam ki taxade' kina ki hamade.
42015028	"Ogora iishima wacimayse 'Ooninte ardattine' ki hamade. Imbaa mayanka utayse kinin ardoadettsi kiam ki miskade.
42015029	Kidiar imbaana yi giyna: 'Shedaa! Koka yekka upsin hasaam garma hana inin waadadhenka inna aanammabesana kinka inin wozadhoadettsi qole anqas hattear ina imaatane.
42015030	Ko dahaannaar kaa naasa hasa koymonam maana sharmucanabesana kinka itsate macchayse kinin nivenka, durpisadhaa ootaam kina ha taxade' kina ki hamade.
42015031	Imbaa kina yinin maasenka, 'Isa naasa, ya rooro wul imbesana kinka ha dahade; isa dohoono wul hantine.
42015032	Kaa hakana diydine hambhaa ta sadaka ki dahade; kaydine hambhaa ta kidi haapadhidine. Ogonante kattsi wozadha woam koda zaske' ki hamade" hamayse Yesus ki giyade.
42016001	Pir Yesus yisa paanan yivaynana yin ki giyade: "Eedi wodimo kalaasa ooninam wottsea eedi kalaa dahade. Eeno 'Kaa ea oonin wottsea hasa koymonam kida kayse' hamayse ea wodimoana ke giyade.
42016002	Ea wodimoa oonin wottseam eelayse, 'Kono inin hasa qansayno hare? Keeda kaara os isa ooninam wottsea daana damattane. Ta hanin wottsenka koymonin utonbee ardonbeam hanin thaapaa warqatam ina imaa' kina ki hamade.
42016003	Wottsear yisa woylamka bhocchaate, 'Imba inin wottsen waadimanam ikala kinin tiyenna ta hamini hayo? Haami koyayse itsana kanta isa qolay; miskayse itsano iam koda ooshinse.
42016004	Ta waadiman kora inin buldhenka, eenin onna yinnadar iam kenin tiyoadettsi inta inin hayenam dhesayda dhese' ki hamade.
42016005	"Yisa imbaasa bazan yindar dahaana eena wulam kalaa kalaa yikal eelayse, ea biraam 'Imbasa hanin kashayno bazano hadar dohoono meemayne?' hamayse kiam ki oysade.
42016006	Kidiar 'Zayt eedi dong kaysa daa idar daane' kina ki hamade. Wottsear 'Saana dooqayse "Eedi lamaa kaysa apo tabhine" hamayse warqatindar thaapaa' kina ki hamade.
42016007	Ea lansoam eelayse, 'Hadar meemayne bazana daana?' hamayse kiam ki oysade. Kidiar 'Surba eedi dong kaysa gazgo idar daane' kina ki hamade. Wottsear '#"Eedi oydi kaysaane" hamayse warqatindar thaapaa' kina ki hamade.
42016008	"Ea wodintaar siyan wottsea easa pakalmakkonam kattsi ki shawkade. Ogonoar Barjodar woylamin qajimina eena yinna aanammabesana kesa dohon dayntanka Barjo eenakala kedi sagi pakallane.
42016009	Inta yena ida giye: Yesa peen ko koymonin maqen wodanka rooro wul lay yenin dehen ooninte yeam tiidhoadettsi, peen ko koymonka yena payya maatayna muldhanaam zagayse haapee.
42016010	"Yer likkaka woylam yindar qajadhea eedi yer gebhikaar woylam yindar qajadhea eedi kida maate; yer likkaka siya waadadhea eedi tapir yer gebhikaar siya waadadhea eedi kida maate.
42016011	Ta peen ko koymonka woylam yindar qajadhayna ye daymina, gonin hamon koymonam yena imea hayne?
42016012	Eedi koymoka woylam yindar qajadhayna ye maataamma, yena maaten koymonam yena imea hayne?
42016013	"Eedi kalaa bit lamaasa demente daana damehe. Harrna hambhidianna, kalaam jibbayse lansoam kida nashe; ogotay ko hamma, kalaakal theedayse lansoam kida bage. Ogodettsi Barjobee koymonbesa demente daana damattene" kena ki hamade.
42016014	Parisa eena koymo nashayna kenin dohonna, Yesusin giyen wulam qansayse kiam ke bagade.
42016015	Yesus kena yin ki giyade: "Eensa birante tipana eena yeam yeda haye; ko dahaannaar Barjo yesa woylaminam dhesa ki dhese. Ogonante eedi birante gobshadhoono yerro Barjo birante bagadhoono koda maate" kena ki hamade.
42016016	Yesus yi giyna: "Musesa yigginbee Barjokala qansayse eenna giyaynabe Shivea Wannis wodanka yekka giyte ke dahade. Keeda kaara os wozisen Barjo bitamonsa upsinam koda giidhe; eeno wul ogote ardota gebhi koda mashime.
42016017	Ko dahaannaar Muse yigginsa zaaka kala hattear konin shidhenna cecinbee peenbesa kayano deegane.
42016018	"Geshon yinnonam bulate yittsayse maa ab keemea wul kidi sharmucimidine; geshoayn bulon maynam keemea ea kidi sharmucimidine" kena ki hamade.
42016019	Tapir Yesus yin ki giyade: "Koymo gebhika shandhen apalanam qaadhea eedi wodimo kalaa dahade. Rooro wulka yina ko agaysaka wozaka kida dee.
42016020	Alaazar hambhea qambhi kalaa bishin yisa hajimi bish hama ea wodintasa kerinte ki raatade.
42016021	Ea wodimoayn itsenka kisa aanira diinonam itsana anngardhite ki dahade. Qaskinaar kikal nivayse kisa hajiminam keda leve.
42016022	"Ogosa budonte qambhia Alaazar ki diyade. Barjosa gaanana nivayse Abraamkal kiam ke tiyade. Pir ea wodinta diyaysaka kiam ko duukadhade.
42016023	Diyaana eenayn dohon raqinte gaalite dahayse, tura dheg hamayse Abraambee kikal dahaa Alaazarbeam pegeka ki haapade.
42016024	Kidiar ilataate 'Imbo Abraamo, ina burqadhaa! Inta ko nuunsa iinte kattsi gaalite i dahade; ogonante yisa aaninsa surkenam noqonsa iinte arsayse isa atabhinam kinin capshoadettsi Alaazaram ina nittsaa' kina ki hamade.
42016025	Abraamaar 'Isa naasa, ya sadanka dahayse payyan yerinam hanin tiyonam bhocchaa. Ogoka Alaazar siyonam ki tiyade. Ta kidi kote kinin wozadhenka, yaar ogote gaalite hada dee.
42016026	Ogo bish dayma, wokala yedar sagana zagayna kenin sagoamadettsi, yekalaar wodar eedinin sagoamadettsi yembee wombesa shaarinte geeti gebhi ko ashkadhade' kina ki hamade.
42016027	Kidiar 'Keeda imbo, imbasa oonindar Alaazaram hanin yittsoadettsi haam ida miske.
42016028	Harrna hambhidianna, imbasa naasi dong sadaka ke dahade; kedi ko gaalen raqinte kenin nivoamadettsi kena ki giye kiam yittsaa' kina ki hamade.
42016029	Abraamaar 'Musebee Barjokala qansayse eenna giyaynabeyn thaapoono mathaapino kekal ko dahade; kedi nabbabadhaka ke qanse' kina ki hamade.
42016030	Kidiar 'Imbo Abraamo, yintehe! Ko dahaannaar eedi kalaa diira dhaabhayse kekal yivayse, "Seeson waadimanam garayse Barjodar maatee!" hamayse giydi ki hanna, kedi maata ke maate' kina ki hamade.
42016031	Abraamaar 'Musebee Barjokala qansayse eenna giyaynabeyn thaapon mathaapinaam ke qansimina, diira eedi kalaa dhaabhayse ki giyaakaar kedi qansehe' kina ki hamade" hamayse Yesus ki giyade.
42017001	Yesus yisa paanan yivaynana yin ki giyade: "Eenna goa maatayno hamin ko dahaakaar nivima shidhehe; ko dahaannaar eenna goa maatea eana hay!
42017002	Igina likkanasa iira kalaana goa kinin maatenna, deesime seeni yisa qorcindar dhaxayse bazinte dhabadhidi ki hanna, kina payyane.
42017003	Ogonante mete yesaam gishee. "Ha aanantayn haam genenka kiam wacimaa; yinnon seesora pegadhidi ki hanna kina garaa.
42017004	Rooron kallon tobbhaa goyt haam genayse, pir hakal tobbhaa goyt nivayse, 'Haam inta genidine' ki hamina, kina garaa" kena ki hamade.
42017005	Imbaa Yesus yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsayna eena "Barjodar woylam qajintanam wona thoosaa" kina ke hamade.
42017006	Imbaa Yesusaar kena yi giyna: "Saliithasa aapiaddha hama idar woylam yenin qajea yesa daa ko hanna, 'Ya hattono kono wombhono, kaara buucimayse bazinte yivayse korimaa' ye hamanna, yena ee hama ko hame" kena ki hamade.
42017007	Ogora pir Yesus yin ki giyade: "Yesa waadima eedi kalaa haami koyea way yaati gishea dahaa ki hanna, waadimara kinin maatenka, 'Saanawa galan kummo dooqaa' kina hamea hayne?
42017008	'Inin itsen galanam ina ashkaa; inin itsenkabee wucenkabe ya dhaximbhayse waadadhaa; ogosa budobar hada kumme' hamayse giyaynatayu?
42017009	Agaa waadiman eana giidhonam kinin waadadhonna, kiam wottsea shawka ki shawko?
42017010	Ogodettsi yediar yena giidhon wulam yenin waadadhon wodanka, 'Wodi shawkadhimina waadiman waadadhaynane; wona giidhon waadiman bish wo waadadhade' hamee" kena ki hamade.
42017011	Yesus Yerusaalem yinin yivenka, Sammaria peenbee Galila peenbesa shaarinka ki yivade.
42017012	Gurda kalaate kinin ardenka, tambha lamthin burqonka dahaana eena kikal hatte pegeka woyayse,
42017013	yisa upsinam dheg hayayse "Imbo Yesuso, bannzo! Wona burqadhayse woam pacchaane" kina ke hamade.
42017014	Kidiar keam shedayse, "Yivayse yesa bishinam gudullana dhehee" kena ki hamade. Kediar goynte gudulladar yivite dahayse ke paashade.
42017015	Kesaar iira kalaa yisa burqora yinin paashonam yinin haapenka, upsi gebhika Barjoam gobshaate maatate Yesuskal ki nivade.
42017016	Kiam gobshaate yisa wotinka kisa roondar ki dhambade. Ea kidi Sammaria peen eedine.
42017017	Yesusaar kina yinin maasenka, "Burqora paashaana eena tabhitayu? Ta salla eena hamote ke dahaa?
42017018	Barjoam gobshota maatate nivaa een peen ea kaara eedi ab qolayu?" ki hamade.
42017019	Eana "Dhaabhayse yivaa; idar woylamin hanin qajoono haam ko dhacchade" kina ki hamade.
42017020	Parisa eena Yesusam "Barjosa bitamono haa ko nive?" hamayse kiam ke oysade. Kidiar kena yinin maasenka, "Barjosa bitamono eenna haapadhen milkitinka nivehe.
42017021	Ogodettsi 'Marrato! Barjosa bitamono kote ko dahade' way 'Ogote ko dahade' yiam hambhaynotehe. Harrna hambhidianna, Barjosa bitamono ta yesa shaarinte ko dahade" kena ki hamade.
42017022	Ogora Yesus yisa paanan yivaynana yin ki giyade: "I Eedi Naas rooronasa kalaam shedana yenin anngardhea woda niva ko nive; ko dahaannaar haapattene.
42017023	Eeno 'Marrato! Kiristoos kote ki dahade' way 'Ogote ki dahade' yena koda hame; hamin ko dahaakaar kenin giyendar utayse kesa paananka yiveebhode.
42017024	Harrna hambhidianna, cecindar dohon bhalqantinin bhalqantenka peen wuldar konin shashkendettsi, i Eedi Naasin niven wodanka yin koda maate.
42017025	Yin ko dahaakaar birayse i Eedi Naas thoothi gaale tiyabee wodan ko eenkal bagadhabe iam koda zaske.
42017026	"Ena Nohe wodanka maatondettsi, i Eedi Naasin niven wodanka yin koda maate.
42017027	Nohe gonngalante kinin ardea rooroaka yekka, eeno itsadabee wucadabe, keemadabee kembhadabe ko dahade. Kayen noqono nivayse ke wulam ko kaysade.
42017028	"Tapir ena Loothe wodanka yin ko dahade. Eeno itsaatebee wucaatebe, shanaatebee shanshaatebe, thoothi yer koraatebee ooni woysaatebe ko dahade.
42017029	Loothe Sodoomra kinin utea rooroaka, cecira nuubee nuusa qolshinadettsinbe hanchayse een wulam ko kaysade.
42017030	I Eedi Naasin may haapadhea rooroaka ogodettsi koda maate.
42017031	"Agaa rooroaka ooninsa zulon utaa ea hanchayse oonira yisa yer tiyota ki ardabhoode; ogodettsi yisa haaminte dahaar budoka ki maatabhoode.
42017032	Loothesa geshonam bhocchee.
42017033	Sadan yinnonam dhacchota zagea wul kaysa ki kayse; sadan yinnonam kaysea wul dhaccha ki dhacche.
42017034	"Inta yena ida giye: Sootin ogoka eena kinka raataana lamaanasa kalaam tiyayse, lansoam gardha ko gardhe.
42017035	Maana lamaana kinka deesimaynasa kallonam tiyayse, lansonam gardha ko gardhe.
42017036	[Eena haamin kallonte lamaana kinka waadadhaynasa kalaam kikala tiyayse, lansoam gardha ko gardhe]" kena ki hamade.
42017037	Kisa paanan yivayna eenaar "Imbo, ogono hamote ko yin dee?" kina ke hamade. Kidiar kena yinin maasenka, "Yerin diyonin dohon raqinte kuthoda buke" kena ki hamade.
42018001	Ogora Yesus yisa paanan yivaynana toozadhima rooro wul Barjoam kenin miskoadettsi kena kamsika ki giyade:
42018002	"Katama kalaate Barjoamaar kurtumbhima, eedinaar ooshimbhima pirdi pirdea eedi kalaa ki dahade.
42018003	Taar kataman ogote maa qambhi kallo ko dahade. Kodiar pirdin pirdeakal nivaate, 'Imbee isa wuuqan eabesa shaarinte dohon dhalqinna ina tipa pirdi pirdaa' hamite ko dahade.
42018004	Kidiar konin giyon yerinna thoothi wodana pirdin imana nashadehe. Ogosa budonte yisa woylaminka yin giyayse ki bhocchade: 'Barjona i kurtumbhiminaar, eedinaar i ooshimbhiminaar,
42018005	kono mayno qambhino iam konin galshenna, kona pirdayda pirde. Ogotay ko hamma rooro wul nivayse iam koda galshe' ki hamade" hamayse Yesus ki giyade.
42018006	Ogora Imba Yesus yin ki giyade: "Siya ea pirdin pirdeanin giyonam bhocchee.
42018007	Ta keeda Barjo kinin kamaana sootinbee rooronbe kattsi kiam miskayna eenana pirdayu? Kenin oysonam imima kappa ki kappo?
42018008	Inta yena ida giye: Saana kena kida pirde; ko dahaannaar i Eedi Naasin niven wodanka, peen kodar dohon eensa idar woylam qajea eedi inta haapaw?" kena ki hamade.
42018009	Ogora Yesus "Wodi eedi tipane" hamayse meten yinnondar woylamin qajayna, een waaniam bagayna eenana kamsika kena yin ki giyade:
42018010	"Eedi lamaa Barjoam miskota Barjosa gazan oonindar ke yivade; kalaa Parisa eedine; lansoa gibirin kaccheane.
42018011	Parisa ea woyayse yisa woylaminka yin giyayse ki miskade: 'Barjo, eena waani taysaate itsaynabee, hana ee hamiminabee, sharmucimaynabee, way agaa cubboa gibirin kaccheadettsibe inin dahaamonna haam ida gobshe.
42018012	Gaba kalaasa iir rooro lamaa itsima ida qoome; inin haapayna yerra tambha wulsa iira kalaam hana ida ime' ki hamade.
42018013	"Gibirin kacchea yinin miskenka, pegeka woyayse tura cecin shedana zagadehe. Ko dahaannaar, 'Barjo, i kaa seesonka dahaa ea ina garaa' hamaate yisa aaninka sadanam ki gutade.
42018014	Inta yena ida giye: Agaa Parisa ea daymaka, kaa gibirin kacchea Barjo birante tipamonam haapayse yisa oonindar ki maatade. Yisa metenam dheg dheg hayayna wul toka ke toke; yisa metenam toskayna wul dheg dheg keda hame" kena ki hamade.
42018015	Yesus yisa aaninam kedar kinin wodoadettsi eena yisa naana likkanaam kikal keda beve; kisa paanan yivayna eenaar ogoam shedayse eenaam ke wacimade.
42018016	Yesusaar naanaam yikal eelayse yisa paanan yivaynana "Naana idar ke nive; keam mareebhode. Harrna hambhidianna, Barjosa bitamono igina naanadettsi maataana eenasane.
42018017	Inta yena gon ida giye: Barjosa bitamonam naasidettsi maatayse tiymina wul yer hamin hambhaakaar iir ardehe" kena ki hamade.
42018018	Ayiwd eenasa entsanasa shaarira eedi kalaa Yesusna "Ya Payyaa Dhettsea, rooro wul lay dehen sadan haapota yer har haynta iam ko zaske?" hamayse kiam ki oysade.
42018019	Yesusaar "Payya ea inka harrnaa hamaa? Barjo bishkalanka ab eedisa payya hama eedi qolehe.
42018020	Barjo yinin giyonam dhesaada dhese: Sharmucimaabhode, deesaabhode, dimmaabhode, buudamoka tarjaabhode, hambabee handabeam gobshaa" kina ki hamade.
42018021	Ear "Igina wulam naasamora yedayse inta toolidine" kina ki hamade.
42018022	Yesus ogoam qansayse, "Ta yer kalaa hakalanka ki shidhade. Ogonoar hasa dohon koymon wulam shanshayse qambhinana imaa; hasa bazanam cecinte hada haape. Ogora maatayse isa paanan nivaa" kina ki hamade.
42018023	Kidiar dhalqin ogoam yinin qansenka, eedi kattsi wodimo yinin dohonna gebhi yisa woylaminka ki atade.
42018024	Yesus ea qaabonka kattsi kinin atonam shedayse, "Wodimma eenasa Barjo bitamonte ardano hamin dohoono dethane!
42018025	Ogona eedi wodimoyn Barjosa bitamonte ardenna gamaleyn marpisa pulaka utayno deegane" kena ki hamade.
42018026	Dhalqin ogoam qansaanaar "Yin ko hanna, ta hayne dhaqana damea?" ke hamade.
42018027	Yesusaar "Eedina dandimimino Barjona dandima ko dandime" kena ki hamade.
42018028	Bhethiroosaar "Shedaa, wodi wosa dohon wulam garayse hasa paanan wo nivade" kina ki hamade.
42018029	Kidiar "Inta yena gon ida giye: Barjosa bitamonna hamayse geshon yinnonbee, indanaanabee, imbaabee, indanbee, naana yinnabee, oonin yinnonbeam garaa ea
42018030	ta peen kodar thoothi sagi tiyma garea eedi qolehe; os niven wodanka, rooro wul lay dehen sadan haapa ki haape" hamayse kena ki giyade.
42018031	Yesus tabhi lamaana yisa paanan yivaynaam eensa iira waana edayse kena yin ki giyade: "Marrato! Wodi ta keeda Yerusaalemdar woda yive; Barjokala qansayse eenna giyayna i Eedi Naasisa kenin thaapoono wul koda thoothe.
42018032	Ayiwdtay hamma eenana saskate ida imbhe; iam baga ke bage; iam galshaate idar pathima ke pathime.
42018033	Iam qanayse deesa ke deese. Makkansoa rooroakaar inta dembhira dhaabhayda dhaabhe" kena ki hamade.
42018034	Kinin giyon wulsa kala hattear kena ardadehe. Ogono dhalqinoar kena konin aachimonna, kinin giyenam kedi bhocchadehe.
42018035	Yesus Iyarko katamante kinin yesken wodanka, eedi aapi kaya kalaa yer miskaate goyn aponte ki dooqade.
42018036	Zarsinin ogoka sagenka qansayse, "Ogono hare?" hamayse keam ki oysade.
42018037	Kediar "Naazret peen Yesus koka kida sage" hamayse kina ke giyade.
42018038	Kidiar "Dawt Naasa Yesuso, bannzo! Ina burqadhayse iam pacchaane!" hamayse upsi gebhika kiam ki miskade.
42018039	Eensa birante yivaynaar "Ya lay hamaa!" hamayse kiam ke wacimade. Kidiar "Dawt Naasa, bannzo! Ina burqadhayse iam pacchaa!" hante ini yinin ilaterra kalon sagi ilatan ki yedade.
42018040	Yesusaar woyayse yikal kiam kenin entsoadettsi kena ki giyade. Kikal ki nivaysaka,
42018041	"Hana yer har i hayea zage?" hamayse kiam ki oysade. Kidiar "Imbo, shedana ida zage" kina ki hamade.
42018042	Yesusaar "Aapino hasa ko shede; idar woylamin hanin qajoono haam ko pacchade" kina ki hamade.
42018043	Saanawa kisa aapino ko shedade. Barjoam gobshaate Yesussa paanan yivan ki yedade. Eeno wulaar ogoam shedayse Barjoam ko gobshade.
42019001	Yesus Iyarko katamante ardayse kosa shaarinka yivite ki dahade.
42019002	Kataman ogotear Zekkoos hambhea eedi kala dahade; kidiar gibirin kacchayna eenasa hayobee eedi wodimobene.
42019003	Yesus hambhea hamaa kinin dohonam shedana ki zagade; kidi yisa woyntanka eedi orgo yinin dohonnabee eenin kattsi thoothonbena kiam haapana damadehe.
42019004	Yesus goyn ogoka kinin yivenna kiam shedota hamayse os birante gobate yivayse haaqa shaap kallondar ki utade.
42019005	Yesusaar raqin ogote yinin yeskon wodanka, tura kiam shedayse, "Zekkooso, kina hasa ooninte haaqa iam konin zaskenna, saanawa hattorra hanchaa" kina ki hamade.
42019006	Zekkoosaar saanawa hanchayse wozaka kiam ki tiyade.
42019007	Ogoam haapaana eena wul "Kidi seeson easa ooninte kummana ki ardade" hamayse Yesusdar ke gundumade.
42019008	Zekkoosaar woyayse Imbaa Yesusna yin ki giyade: "Imbo, isa dohon koymon wulsa iira kiaddhanam kashayse qambhinana ida ime; eedi haysaar buudamoka inin tiyaa koymo dahaa ko hanna, maasate kina adhimaka oydi goyt ida kashe" ki hamade.
42019009	Yesus kina yin ki giyade: "Kina oonin kodar dhaqinta ko nivade; kidi tapir Abraam naasine.
42019010	Harrna hambhidianna, inta Eedi Naas kayaanaam zaganabee dhacchanabe i nivade" ki hamade.
42019011	Eenoar dhalqin ogoam qansite ko daaka, Yesus Yerusaalemkal kinin theedonna, eenna Barjosa bitamono saanawa konin haapadhea kena ko maatade. Ogona Yesus kamsi kalaa kena ki giyade:
42019012	"Bitamon hayamonam tiyayse maatate nivana pee pege yivaa eedi gebhi kalaa dahade.
42019013	Kidiar yinin yivensa birayse, eedi tabhi yisa waadima eedi waaniam yikal eelayse, eena iginana birre mato kalaa kalaa ki imade. 'Maatate inin nivenka yekka, ko koymonka naggadee' kena ki hamade.
42019014	"Peen eena kiam kenin jibbonna, 'Kaa ea wodar kinin bitimoadettsi zagattone' hamayse kisa paananka apo ke yittsade.
42019015	"Bitamon hayamonam tiyayse yinin maaton wodanka, koymon kininna imaana igina kisa waadiman eena hamaddha kenin naggadayse thoosonam dhesana yikal keam ki elsade.
42019016	"Biraa ea kikal nivayse, 'Imbo, hanin ina imon koymonka naggadayse tabhi goyt i thoosade' kina ki hamade.
42019017	Imbaar 'Ya payyaa waadiman ea, payyaa hayade; yer likkaka woylamin yinindar qajadhea eedi maatayse hanin haapadhonna, tabhi katamanadar haam ida haynse' kina ki hamade.
42019018	"Lansoar kikal nivayse, 'Imbo, hanin ina imon koymonka naggadayse dong goyt i thoosade' kina ki hamade.
42019019	Imbaar kina yi giyna: 'Haamaar pir dong katamanadar ida haynse' kina ki hamade.
42019020	"Waar waadiman ea nivayse, 'Imbo, hanin ina imon koymonam ochate i wodade; kosha.
42019021	Ya eedina burqadhima eedine; hanin wodaamonam tiyeabee yiithima buureabene. Ogonante haam kurtumbhayse i wodade' kina ki hamade.
42019022	Imbaar kina yin ki giyade: 'Ya siyaa waadiman ea, hasa dhalqinka hadar ida pirde. Inta wodima inin tiyenbee, yiithima inin buurenbee, eedina inin burqadhimonbeam ha dhesidianna,
42019023	harrnaa isa koymonam adhimanka maasaynana iman garaa? Inta nivayse isa koymonam adhimaka ida tiye' kina ki hamade.
42019024	"Ogote woyaana eenana, 'Koymonam kikalanka tiyayse tabhi goyt thoosaa eana imee' kena ki hamade.
42019025	Kediar 'Imbo, birre shii kisa daane!' kina ke hamade.
42019026	Imbaar, 'Inta yena ida giye: Yisa dahaana daran arsayse kina imbha ko imbhe; yisa qolmakalanka kisa dohonam kikala tiidha ko tiidhe.
42019027	Ko dahaannaar kedar inin bitimoadettsi zagimina igina iam jibbayna eenaam kote bavayse isa birante keam deesee' ki hamade" hamayse Yesus kena ki giyade.
42019028	Yesus kamsin ogoam yinin giyonsa budonte, Yerusaalem yivite yisa paanan yivaynasa birante ki dahade.
42019029	Dabirezayt hambhen dhukansa gasante dohon Betepaagebee Bitaaniabe gurdankal yinin theeden wodanka, yisa paanan yivayna eenasa lamaanaam yin giyayse keam ki yittsade:
42019030	"Ogo yesa birante dohon gurdandar yivimate. Ogote yenin ardenka, eedin yindar dooqate shedaama ukulisa ooto dhaxadhaa yeda haape; agaam bulayse ina kote bevee.
42019031	Eedi hay ki hannaar 'Harrnee bule?' hamayse yeam ki oysina, 'Imbaa wonteana kinin zaskonnane' hamayse giyee" kena ki hamade.
42019032	Yittsadhaanaar yivayse kinin kena giyondettsi ko maataysaka ke haapade.
42019033	Kediar ukulinsa ootonam kenin bulenka, ukulinsa imbana "Ukuliam harrnee bule?" hamayse keam ke oysade.
42019034	Kediar "Imbaa wonteana kinin zaskonnane" kena ke hamade.
42019035	Ogora Yesuskal ke bavade; ukulia ootadar yisa apalanam wodayse Yesusam daran ke dottsade.
42019036	Yesus yivite ki daaka, eeno apalanam yisa goyndar ko apade.
42019037	Dabirezayt dhukara mia hanchen goynkal kinin theeden wodanka, kisa paanan yivayna eena wul yinin haapon tarshen yerin wulka wozadhayse upsi gebhika Barjoam gobshan ke yedade.
42019038	Ogonoar "Barjo Imbasa naabenka nivea bitaa gobshadhaane! Cecinte payyamo ko dee! Cecin wulsa bhaabar dahaa Barjona gobshi ko dee!" ke hamade.
42019039	Eensa shaarinte dahaana Parisa eenasa waani waani eena "Dhettsea, hasa paanan yivaynaam lay kenin hamoadettsi keam wacimaa!" kina ke hamade.
42019040	Yesusaar "Inta yena ida giye: Kedi lay ke hamaakaar, senna kina ilata ke ilate" kena ki hamade.
42019041	Yesus Yerusaalem katamankal theedayse, katamanam yinin haapenka kona eepaate
42019042	yin ki giyade: "Hana payya maaten yerinam kina ha dhesidianna, hana payyane. Ta hasa aapira kodi aadhimidine.
42019043	Haam jibbayna hasa gasanka kermi woysayse haam kobarbee obarbe ishkayse kenin galshayna roorona niva ke nive.
42019044	Hambee hasa iinte dahaana naanabeam peendar dhaba ke dhabe; kottsimima seeni kala hattear raqinte hana garehe. Harrna hambhidianna, Barjo haam dhacchana kinin nivon wodanam hanin dhesaamonnane" ki hamade.
42019045	Yesus Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayante ardayse, gaban gabimaynaam oytan ki yedade.
42019046	Keam oytaate yin ki giyade: " 'Onno isa miske ooni koda dee' hamayse thaapadhidine; yediar eensa koymon buurate itsaynasa aadhime raq koam ye hayade!" kena ki hamade.
42019047	Yesus rooro wulka Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayante dhettsite ki dahade; ko dahaannaar gudullasa hayonabee, Musesa yigginam dhettsaynabee, zarsinsa eena gembhabe Yesusam deesana zagite ke dahade.
42019048	Ko dahaannaar kenin hayonsa goyti kekalanka ko kayade; harrna hambhidianna, eeno wul Yesusin giyenam qansana zagayse yisa woylamin wulam daran konin hayonnane.
42020001	Rooro kalaa Yesus Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayante eenaam dhettsaatebee Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam giyaatebe ki dahade. Gudullasa hayonabee, Musesa yigginam dhettsaynabee, peensa donzanabe daran ke nivade.
42020002	"Ta wona giyaa: Yerra iginaam hanin hayayno hasa yer har hayamokane? Hayamon koam hana imaa hayne?" hamayse kiam ke oysade.
42020003	Kidiar kena yinin maasenka, "Intaar yer kalaa yeam ida oyse; yediar kosa malsinam ina giyee.
42020004	Wannis eenaam kinin shivoadettsi nittsadhoono Barjokalankamoo? Eedikalankaw?" ki hamade.
42020005	Kediar yin giyayse kinka ke dhalqade: " 'Barjokalankane' wo hamanna, 'Ta harrnee kisa dhalqinam gonne hamayse tiyan garaa?' wona kida hame.
42020006	'Eedikalankane' wo hamanna, eeno wul woam seenika paxate koda deese; harrna hambhidianna, 'Wannis gon Barjokala qansayse eenna giyeane' hamayse kenin giyennane" ke hamade.
42020007	Ogonante "Hamora ko dahaannaar wodi dhesattone" hamayse kina ke maasade.
42020008	Yesusaar "Ta intaar har hayamoka yerra iginaam inin hayenam yena giyattine" kena ki hamade.
42020009	Ogora Yesus eenana kamsika yin ki giyade: "Eedi kalaa woynin haaqanaam yisa haaminte thoothi ki korade. Haaminte waadadhayna eenana elqimayse, 'Yediar yena maatenam kosa iira itsaate, waani aapinam ina imee' hamayse, thoothi wodana pee abdar ki yivade.
42020010	Woynin haaqanasa aapin kambhen wodan yeskaysaka, kinaqa yeskayna aapinam kenin imoadettsi yisa erge eedi kalaam haaminte waadadhayna eenadar ki yittsade. Haaminte waadadhayna kisa ergen eam yedate qanayse aan guuri ke yittsade.
42020011	Tapir ab yisa erge eedi ki yittsade; kediar kiam pir qanate ooshinsayse aan guuri ke yittsade.
42020012	Tapir yisa makkansoa ergen eam ki yittsaysaka, kiamaar gebhi qanayse haamira bulate ke dhabade.
42020013	"Woynin haaminsa imbaa 'Hamini hayo? Ta inin nashea isa naasaam ida yittse; way kina bookindhasane' ki hamade.
42020014	Haaminte waadadhayna eena kisa naasaam yinin haapenka, kinka dhalqayse yin ke giyade: 'Kaa kisa haamindar sagea naasa toydiane. Hammo kisa wona konin shidhoadettsi nivee; wo kiam deese' ke hamade.
42020015	Woynin haaqanasa haamira bulayse kiam ke deesade. "Ta haaminsa imbaa keam hamin ki haye?
42020016	Kidi yinti nivayse igina haaminte waadadhayna eenaam deesa ki deese. Yisa haaminamaar eedi abna kida ime" ki hamade. Eeno ogoam yinin qansenka, "Yin ko dahabhoode!" ko hamade.
42020017	Yesusaar keam shedayse yin ki giyade: " 'Seeninka oonin woysayna eena kenin bagaa seenia senna wulra ooninna kattsi zaskea ki maatade' hamayse thaapadhoono bulino hare?
42020018	Seenia agaadar dhambea wul aya ki aye; seenia agaa yindar dhambaa ea giicima ki giicime" kena ki hamade.
42020019	Gudullasa hayonabee Musesa yigginam dhettsaynabe Yesus kamsinka kinin giyaa dhalqa keam kaamea kinin dohonam kenin dhesonna, agaa savaataka kiam yedana ke zagade; ko dahaannaar eenaam ke kurtumbhade.
42020020	Ogonante Yesusam yedana zagayse kiam toolite ke dahade. Peen wottsea yisa hayamonka kinin pirdoadettsi saskate imana kena maatea upsi apora kisa ke zagade. Ogonante tipana eena maatayse kisa dhalqinam tiyayna doyanaam ke yittsade.
42020021	Igina doyana Yesusam yin giyayse ke oysade: "Woam Dhettsea, hanin giyenbee hanin dhettsenbe gon konin dohonam wodi dhesooda dhese. Pir Barjosa goynam gon hada dhettse; eedi haysaar woti shedima hanin hayenam wodi dhesidine.
42020022	Ta Musesa yigginka Roome peen bitaana gibiri kashadhoadettsi giidhidimoo? Giidhadayne?" hamayse kiam ke oysade.
42020023	Yesusaar kenin taysenam dhesayse kena yin ki giyade:
42020024	"Ta santup ina dhehee. Santupa kaadar dahaa pootoabee daran thaapadhaa naabeabe haysane?" hamayse keam ki oysade. Kediar "Roome peen bitaasane" kina ke hamade.
42020025	Yesusaar "Ta Roome peen bita gaynam kina imee; Barjo gaynam Barjona imee" kena ki hamade.
42020026	Kediar eensa birante dhalqinka kiam yedana damadehe; ogona kisa malsinka targadhayse lay ke hamade.
42020027	"Dembhira dhaabhadhea yer qolehe" hamayna Saduqa eenara eedi waani Yesuskal nivayse yin giyayse kiam ke oysade:
42020028	"Woam Dhettsea, Muse yin giyayse wona ki thaapade: 'Eedi kalaa maa keemayse naasi adhima diydi ki hanna, kisa kana koam keemayse diyaa iishimasa oolonte kina ki adhe' ki hamade.
42020029	Ta keeda eedi kalaasa naasi tobbhaa waani ke dahade. Ke wulsa iishima gebha maa keemayse naasi adhima ki diyade.
42020030	Kana lansoa agaadettsi yisa iishima geshonam keemayse ki diyade.
42020031	Makkansoar koam keemayse ki diyade; ogodettsi tobbhaana indanaana wul koam keemayse, naasi adhima ke diyade.
42020032	Ke wulsa macchinte edono ko diyade.
42020033	Ogonante igina tobbhaana indanaana wul koam kenin keemonna, diyaana eena dembhira kenin dhaabhen wodanka kodi hamaa easa maa koda maate?" hamayse kiam ke oysade.
42020034	Yesusaar kena yi giyna: "Ta peen kodar dohoono eeno maa keema ko keeme, pir kembha ko kembhe.
42020035	Diira dhaabhayse os niven wodanka daana damayna eena yina kembhehe, tapir keemehe;
42020036	os birante dembhi diyana damehe. Harrna hambhidianna, Barjosa gaananadettsi kenin maatennane. Kedi diira kenin dhaabhonna Barjo naanane.
42020037	Diyaana ke hanna kenin dhaabhenam Musear ki dhettsade. Hatta kodoadar nuunin yedensa kinin thaaponte Imbaa Barjo 'Abraamsa Barjoa, Yisaaqsa Barjoa, Yayqoobsaar Barjoane' hamayse ki thaapade.
42020038	Ta Barjo sadanka dahaana eenasa Barjone; diyaana eenasa Barjotehe. Harrna hambhidianna, wul Barjona sadanka koda dee" kena ki hamade.
42020039	Musesa yigginam dhettsayna waani waani eena kina yinin maasenka, "Woam Dhettsea, payyaa giyade" kina ke hamade.
42020040	Ogora yedayse Yesusam yer kala hattear oysime oysana kedi kurtumbhidine.
42020041	Ogo wodanka Yesus kena yin ki giyade: "Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoosam 'Dawt naasine' hamayse hamin ke giyaa?
42020042	-
42020043	Dawt yinti Mazmur mathaapinte 'Barjo isa Imbana, "Haam jibbayna eenaam hasa hayamonsa demente inin hayenka yekka isa mizaqimbar dooqaa" kina ki hamade' kida hame.
42020044	Ta keeda Dawt yinti kiam 'isa Imba' hamayse ki eelina, Kiristoos hamin ki Dawtsa naasi dee?" kena ki hamade.
42020045	Eeno wul kikal qansite ko daaka, Yesus yisa paanan yivaynana yin ki giyade:
42020046	"Gudubhon apalan qaadhayse os ora hamota zagayna, gabantear gobshadhon gisimenam gisimbhotabee, Ayiwd eensa bukin raqintear gobshadhon borkotondar dooqotabee, kummadhen raqintear gobshadhon raqin tiyotabe nashayna Musesa yigginam dhettsaynakalanka mete yesaam gishee.
42020047	Eedinin qansoadettsi hamayse miskenam keda gudubhse; maana qambhinasa ooninam keda buure. Kedi sagi pirdi keda haape" kena ki hamade.
42021001	Yesus dheg hamayse kinin shedenka, wodimma koymon Barjona dhabadhen saathininte yisa koymonam kenin dhabenka ki shedade.
42021002	Tapir maa qambhi kallo bakkanda lamaa ogote konin dhabenka ki shedade.
42021003	"Yena gon ida giye: Ta kono mayno qambhino een wuldara sagi ko dhabade.
42021004	Harrna hambhidianna, kedi wul yisa dohon koymon thoothinsa iira yina shiishayse ke dhabade; kodi qambhi dahayse yina kala hattear shiishima, yisa dohon koymon wulam ko dhabade" ki hamade.
42021005	Yesussa paanan yivayna eenasa waani waani "Kono Barjosa gazano onno seenin payyanbee Barjona imbhon imintonbeka gobshayse ko ashkadhade" hamayse kenin giyenka,
42021006	Yesus "Igina yenin shedayna senna kina kidar dordhaanasa kala hattear kidara povayse kottsimima kenin shidhima woda niva ko nive; hamin hambhaakaar kesa kala hattear raqaate shidhehe" kena ki hamade.
42021007	Kediar "Woam Dhettsea, ta ogono yerro haa ko yin maate? Ogono yerro konin yeskonam dhettsayno milkitino kosa hare?" hamayse ke oysade.
42021008	Yesus kena yin ki giyade: "Yenin dhaddhisadhoamadettsi mete yesaam gishee. Harrna hambhidianna, thoothino eeno 'Inta Kiristoosne' pir, 'Marrato! Kiristoosin nivayno wodano yeskidine' hamaate isa naabenka niva ko nive. Kesa paananka yiveebhode.
42021009	Banqinbee zarsinin kidar dhaabhenbe yenin qansen wodanka, kurtumbheebhode. Harrna hambhidianna, ogono yer wul birayse konin maatayno shidha shidhiminone. Yin ko dahaakaar macchin wodano saanawa nivehe" ki hamade.
42021010	Ogora Yesus kena yin ki giyade: "Zarsino zarsindar, binnaar binnadar dhaabhayse banqi keda kiam uxe.
42021011	Peendar gebhi zigabee, raq waani waaniar daaqibee, burqobe koda maate. Kurtunsen yerinbee gebhi milkitbe cecindar koda haapadhe.
42021012	"Ogo wulsa birayse, isa naabenna hamayse eeno yeam yeda ko yede; yeam oyta ko oyte; Ayiwd eensa bukin raqintebee dhaxin oonintebe saskate yeam ima ko ime; binnabee peen wottsaynabedar yeam entsate koda yive.
42021013	Ogonoar isa naabenna hamayse yena tarjana agea goyti koda maate.
42021014	Ogonante yeam oysadhen oysimensa malsinna birayse yesa woylaminka qaabeebhode.
42021015	Harrna hambhidianna, yeam jibbayna palimayse yeam kenin bashoamadettsi yena dhalqinbee pakalmakkonbeam ida ime.
42021016	Imbana yennabee, indanaana yennabee, yesa muldhanabee, yesa nashonabe yeam saskate ima ke ime; yesa iira waani waani eenaamaar deesa ke deese.
42021017	Yedi isa naabenna hamayse een wulkal jibbadhaana yeda maate.
42021018	Ko dahaannaar yesa meten sitinsa kala hattear kayehe.
42021019	Wocchimbhaate darshayse yesa sadanam yeda dhacche.
42021020	"Banqin eena Yerusaalemam karaysaka yenin haapen wodanka, kosa kayenin yeskonam dhesee.
42021021	Wodan ogoka Yiwda peente dohoono eeno dhukanadar ko gobe; katamansa iinte dohoono eeno iira ko ute; katamansa mayante dohoonoar katamante ko ardabhoode.
42021022	Harrna hambhidianna, thaapadhoono wul konin thoothoadettsi Barjosa halo woda ko maatade.
42021023	Ogo wodanka maana sirmanabee amin qooshaynabena hay! Harrna hambhidianna, Ayiwd peendar gebhi gaale koda maate; ogo zarsindarar Barjosa wacime koda nive.
42021024	Kesa iira thoothino zarsinoar halpaka koda deesadhe. Waani eenamaar banqi uxate peen wuldar koda yiidhe. Ayiwdtay hamma eenasa wodanin maqenka yekka, Yerusaalem Ayiwdtay hamma eenasa kantanka tigadhoono koda maate.
42021025	"Haynbee, arpinbee, wanconbedar milkit koda haapadhe. Peen wuldar dohoono eeno bazinin shohayse oolenna kurtumbhayse gaala ko gaale.
42021026	Peendar niven yerinam toolaate eeno kurtumbheka koda gibaze. Harrna hambhidianna, cecinte dahaana kantana wul shoa ke shoe.
42021027	Ogo wodanka inta Eedi Naas kantanbee gebhon gobshinbeka polondar dahayse inin nivenam keda haape.
42021028	Ogono wul yin konin maatan yeden wodanka, yedar dohon bazanam kashayse yeam dhacchea nivanna kinin saanonna, dheg hamayse tura shedee" kena ki hamade.
42021029	Ogoraar Yesus kamsika kena yin ki giyade: "Shaapin hattonbee waani haaqanabeam payya hayayse shedee;
42021030	haccha haali kenin bulenka keam haapayse bargin wodanin yeskonam yedi yenti dheseeda dhese.
42021031	Ogodettsi yedi igina yerram yenin shedenka, Barjosa bitamonin theedonam dhesee.
42021032	Inta yena gon ida giye: Ogo wul yin maatenka yekka wodan koka dohoono adhadhino eeno diyate maqehe.
42021033	Cecinbee peenbe saga ko sage; inin giyoono upsino sagehe.
42021034	"Wucadhen thoothamonbee, barinbee, peen kosa dayntan goynbena hamayse yesa woylaminka qaabite yenin gaaloamadettsibee ye dhesima ogono roorono nivayse zaanidettsi yeam konin yedoamadettsibe yeam gishee.
42021035	Harrna hambhidianna, ogono roorono peendar dohon een wulam yeda ko yede.
42021036	Ogonante nivanna hayen yerin wulra yeninka dhaqea kanta haapanabee i Eedi Naasisa birante woyanabe yenin damoadettsi, rooro wul Barjoam miskaate wocchimbhayse toolee" kena ki hamade.
42021037	Yesus rooron rooronka Barjosa gazan ooninte dhettsite ki dahade; peen sootina Dabirezayt hambhen dhukandar yivayse kida wodhe.
42021038	Sedhiman eeno wul kinin giyenam qansota Barjosa gazan ooninte kikal koda nive.
42022001	Paasika hambhen irshonin qolmon balashan gaadhea bavaala yeskidine.
42022002	Gudullasa hayonabee Musesa yigginam dhettsaynabe eenaam kenin kurtumbhonna, aachika Yesusam yinin deesensa goyti zagite ke dahade.
42022003	Ogo wodanka tabhi lamaa Yesussa paanan yivaynasa kalaa Asqoronto peen ea Yiwda hambheasa woylaminte Seethaan ki ardade.
42022004	Yiwdaar yivayse Yesusam hamin hayayse yettsate kena yinin imensa goyti gudullasa hayonabee Barjosa gazan ooninam toolaynabekal ki dhalqade.
42022005	Kediar wozadhayse birre kina imana kimbesana kinka ke dhalqade.
42022006	Yiwdaar kena ee hamayse eedin qolmonte kiam yettsate imana agea woda zagite ki dahade.
42022007	Ogosa budonte Paasikan yaaton machadhen irshon qolmon balashan itsadhayno bavallo ko yeskade.
42022008	Yesus "Paasikansa galanam wonin itsoadettsi yivayse wona ashkee" hamayse Bhethiroosbee Wannisbeam ki yittsade.
42022009	Kediar "Hamote wonin ashkoadettsia zage?" hamayse kiam ke oysade.
42022010	Kidiar kena yin ki giyade: "Katamante yenin ardenka, daaka noqo kedaa eedi kalaam yeda haape; kisa paananka yivayse kinin arden oonindar ardee.
42022011	Ooninsa imbaam 'Woam Dhettsea "Isa paanan yivayna eenabete Paasikan galanam wonin itsayno ranqo hamotene?" hana kida hame' kina hamee.
42022012	Kidiar ooninsa zulonte woysadhon, pir kosa iinaam payya apayse ashkadhon workin ooninam yena kida dhee; ogote wona ashkimate" kena ki hamade.
42022013	Kediar yivayse Yesus kena kinin giyaadettsi ke haapade. Paasikan galanam ogote ke ashkade.
42022014	Galan itsadhen wodan yeskaysaka, Yesus yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaynabesana gala kummota ki dooqade.
42022015	Kidiar "Gaalen inin tiyensa birayse yembesana kinka ko Paasikan galan itsana kattsi anngardhite i dahade.
42022016	Ogona yena ida giye: Barjosa bitamonte kosa aachin dhalqinin may maatenka yekka Paasikan galanam kaara os keeda itsattine" kena ki hamade.
42022017	Wucadhenamaar tiyayse Barjoam gobshayse, "Kay, kinka kashimee.
42022018	Inta yena ida giye: Barjosa bitamono konin nivenka yekka, keeda kaara os woynea hattasa aapin cuubadhonam wucattine" kena ki hamade.
42022019	Ogora balashanam tiyayse Barjoam ki gobshade; qunthayse yisa paanan yivayna eenana "Kono yena hamayse imbhayno isa waanone; iam yenin bhocchea hayee" hamayse kena ki imade.
42022020	Agaadettsi pir galansa budonte, wucadhenamaar tiyayse kena yin ki giyade: "Kono wucadhayno isa yena hamayse laymen zombhinsa haali mallane.
42022021	Ko dahaannaar saskate iam imea ea imbesana kinka itseane.
42022022	Inta Eedi Naas giidhondettsi diyayda diye; ko dahaannaar saskate iam imea ea agaana hay!" kena ki hamade.
42022023	Kediar "Wosa shaarira ogo yerinam hayea eedi hayne?" hamayse kinka kiam oysan ke yedade.
42022024	Ogora kedi "Wo wuldara sagi maatea hayne?" hamaate kinka kikal paliman ke yedade.
42022025	Yesus kena yin ki giyade: "Barjoam dhesimin eensa binna eendar kantanka keda bitime; wottsaynaar 'Eenna payya waadadhaynane' keam koda hambhe.
42022026	Yediar ogodettsi maateebhode; ko dahaannaar yesa iira wuldara gebhi dahaa ye wulsa kanadettsi ki maate; wottsear tapir erge eedidettsi ki maate.
42022027	Kumman raqinte dooqayse itseabee woyayse waadadheabesa gebhaa ea hayne? Kummandar dooqaatayu? Ko dahaannaar inta yesa shaarinte waadima eedidettsi i maatade.
42022028	"Isa gaalen wulka imbesana kinka wocchimbhayse woyaana yedine.
42022029	Ogonante Imba iam kinin bitinsondettsi, intaar yeam bitinsayda bitinse.
42022030	Isa bitamonte kummandar dooqayse itseeda itse, wuceeda wuce; bitamon borkotondarar dooqayse tabhi lamaana Israveel eenasa muldhanadar pirdeeda pirde" kena ki hamade.
42022031	Ogora Yesus "Simoon, Simoon, qansaa! Seethaan isin anqarsadhendettsi yeam anqarsate shedana Barjoam ki miskade.
42022032	Ko dahaannaar idar woylamin hanin qajayno hasa konin kayoamadettsi inta hana Barjoam i miskade. Yaar ora idar hanin maaton wodanka, hambanaanaam wocchinsaa" kina ki hamade.
42022033	Bhethiroosaar "Imbo, dhaxibee dembhibe ko hannaar, hambesana kinka yivana inta ashkimbhidine" kina ki hamade.
42022034	Yesusaar "Bhethirooso, yin ida hana giye: Kina baacha biraa qiiqima, 'Inta kiam dhesattine' hamayse makkam goyt hada marime" kina ki hamade.
42022035	Ogora Yesus yisa paanan yivaynana "Korbhobee, surbabee, dunnguribe qolma yeam inin yittson wodanka yena joogaa yer daaw?" hamayse kena ki giyade. Kediar "Wosa joogaa yer qolehe" hamayse kina ke maasade.
42022036	Yesusaar kena yin ki giyade: "Ta keeda korbhobee surbabe yisa dahaa ki yede; halpa yisa qolmaar apalanam shanshayse halpa ki shane.
42022037	Yena yin ida giye: 'Seeson eenabesana kinka ki paydadhade' hamayse thaapadhoono upsino inka thootha koda zaske; innon goynsa thaapadhonsa macchino yeskidine" kena ki hamade.
42022038	Kediar "Imbo, shedaa! Kote halpa lamaa daane" ke hamade. Kidiar "Yeeka ko yeeke" kena ki hamade.
42022039	Yesus katamara utayse yisa dambindettsi Dabirezayt dhukandar kinin yivenka, kisa paanan yivayna eenaar kimbesana kinka ke yivade.
42022040	Ogotear kenin yeskenka Yesus kena "Taysate yeam siyonsa iinte arsente yenin ardoamadettsi Barjoam miskee" ki hamade.
42022041	Ogora seeni paxadhaysaka yivayse weveaddha kekalanka pegadhayse kumpurdhayse, yin giyayse Barjoam ki miskade:
42022042	"Imbo, ha nashidianna ko gaalen wucimanam inin wucoamadettsi ikalanka saskaa. Ko dahaannaar hanin nashaadettsi ko dee, inin nashaadettsi ko dahabhoode" ki hamade.
42022043	[Barjosa gaana kina haapadhayse kiam wocchinsite ki dahade.
42022044	Yisa woylaminkaar kattsi qaabayse ini hamora sagi Barjoam miskite ki dahade. Kisa ermanoar zombhidettsi maatayse peendar hanchite ko dahade.]
42022045	Miskera dhaabhayse yisa paanan yivaynakal kinin nivenka, kattsi galshea qaaboka qajadhayse raatidi ke hattaka keam ki haapade.
42022046	"Harrnee raataa? Taysate yeam siyonsa iinte arsente yenin ardoamadettsi dhaabhayse Barjoam miskee!" kena ki hamade.
42022047	Yesus ogoam akar giyte ki daaka, marrato! Thoothina eena kikal ke nivade. Keam entsea kisa paanan yivayna eena tabhi lamaanasa kalaa Yiwda hambhea ki dahade. Kidi Yesusam sunqota kikal ki theedade.
42022048	Yesusaar "Yiwda, i Eedi Naasaam sunqayse saskatea imo?" kina ki hamade.
42022049	Yesusbesana dahaana eena ogo maatenam shedayse, "Imbo, halpaka keam wo taxo?" ke hamade.
42022050	Kesa iira kalaa gudullasa gebhaasa waadiman easa qaamia mizaqaam taxate ki dhabade.
42022051	Yesusaar "Garee! Yin haya zaskehe!" hamayse easa qaamiam kaamayse ki pacchade.
42022052	Ogora Yesus kiam yedota nivaana gudullasa hayonabee, Barjosa gazan ooninam toolaynasa hayonabee, donzanabena "Eedisa koymo buurate itsea eedidettsi hayayse iam yedana halpabee haljobe bavatee nivaaw?
42022053	Rooro wul Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayante yembesana kinka inin dehenka iam yedeetene; ta yembee thipansa hayoabesa wodane" kena ki hamade.
42022054	Ogora eena Yesusam yedayse gudullasa gebhaasa oonindar kiam entsate ke yivade. Bhethiroosaar pegeka kesa paanan yivite ki dahade.
42022055	Eena kerminsa iir nuu guttsayse kinka dooqayse ke daaka, Bhethiroosaar nivayse kembesana kinka ki dooqade.
42022056	Bhethiroos nuunsa gasante dooqayse ki daaka, waadima eedi kallo kiam haapayse payya shirshate shedayse, "Ea kaar kimbete ki dahade" ko hamade.
42022057	Bhethiroosaar "Eediwa kono, inta kiam dhesattine!" hamayse ki marimade.
42022058	Likka kap yinin hamonsa budonte, eedi ab kiam shedayse, "Yaar kimbesana kinka ha dahade" kina ki hamade. Bhethiroosaar "Yeria, intatehe!" ki hamade.
42022059	Savaat kalaaddha yinin kapponsa budonte, eedi ab kalaa Bhethirooska "Ea kaa Galila eedi yinin dohonna, gon kimbesana kinka ki dahade" hamayse upsi wocchika ki giyade.
42022060	Bhethiroosaar "Yeria, hanin giyenam dhesattine!" ki hamade. Ogoam giyte ki daaka, baacha biraa ki qiiqade.
42022061	Ogo wodanka Imbaa Yesus budoka wal hamayse Bhethiroosam ki shedade. Bhethiroosaar "Kina baacha biraa qiiqima makkam goyt 'Inta kiam dhesattine' hamayse iam hada marime" hamayse Imbaa Yesus kina giyoono kalan bhoq konin hamenka,
42022062	mayanka utayse qaaboka kattsi ataate ki eepade.
42022063	-
42022064	Yesusam toolayna eena kiam bagaate kisa aapinam ochayse qanada, "Haam qanaa hayne? Wona giyaa!" hamaate kiam keda oyse.
42022065	Waaniar yer thoothi kidar giyada kiam keda iire.
42022066	Peen sedhaysaka peensa donzanabee, gudullasa hayonabee, Musesa yigginam dhettsaynabe kinka bukayse Yesusam yisa pirdin raqindar entsate ke yivade.
42022067	"Ta wona giyaa: Ya Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoosu?" ke hamade. Kidiar "I yena giyaakaar gonne hamayse tiyattene;
42022068	oysimear yeam oysidi i hanna, ina maasattene.
42022069	Ko dahaannaar keeda kaara os inta Eedi Naas kantanka dahaa Barjosa mizaqimbar ida dooqe" kena ki hamade.
42022070	Kedi wulaar "Ta keeda ya Barjo Naasiw?" hamayse kiam ke oysade. Kidiar "Yenin giyaadettsi intane" kena ki hamade.
42022071	Kediar "Ta kisa apora uton upsinam wodi qansidine; keeda kaara os tarja ab wona harrna ko zaske?" ke hamade.
42023001	Pirdin pirdayna wul dhaabhayse Yesusam Bhilathoossa birante kiam entsate yivayse,
42023002	"Ea kaa wosa eenaam kinin dhaddhisenbee, Roome peen bitaana gibiri kenin kashoamadettsi keam kinin marenbee, pir 'Bitaa Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoos intane' hamaate kinin giyenbeka kiam wo haapade" hamayse bersan ke yedade.
