42023003	Bhilathoosaar "Ayiwd eenasa bitaa yaw?" hamayse kiam ki oysade. Yesusaar "Inta hanin giyaadettsine" hamayse kina ki maasade.
42023004	Bhilathoosaar gudullasa hayonabee een waanibena "Ea kaasa seeso kala hattear haapaatine" ki hamade.
42023005	Kediar "Ea kaa Galila peera yedayse koka yekka Yiwda peen wul gidir eenaam dhettsaate eenin kidar konin gooroadettsi kida haye" hamaate wocchisayse kiam ke bersade.
42023006	Bhilathoosaar ogoam yinin qansenka, "Ea kaa Galila eediw?" hamayse ki oysade.
42023007	Yesus Herodisin wottsen peen eedi kinin dohonam yinin dhesenka, Herodisdar kiam ki yittsade. Herodisaar ogo wodanka Yerusaalem katamante ki dahade.
42023008	Herodisaar Yesusam yinin haapenka, kattsi ki wozadhade. Harrna hambhidianna, Yesus goynsa yinin qansonna kiam shedana thoothi wodana anngardhaate ki dahade; ogo yerin tarshen Yesus kinin waadadhenka kiam shedana qaabite ki dahade.
42023009	Herodis Yesusam thoothi oysime ki oysade; kidiar yer kala hattear kina maasadehe.
42023010	Gudullasa hayonabee Musesa yigginam dhettsaynabe raqin ogote woyayse kattsi kiam keda berse.
42023011	Herodisaar yisa poolisanabete kiam bagaatebee boyaatebe ki dahade; apala goobe kiam qattsayse Bhilathoosdar maasate kiam ki yittsade.
42023012	Agaa rooroaka Herodisbee Bhilathoosbe kinka kisa nasho ke maatade; kosa birayse kinka kiam jibbayna ke dahade.
42023013	Ogosa budonte Bhilathoos gudullasa hayonabee, eensa entsanabee, zarsinbeam yikal eelayse,
42023014	kena yin ki giyade: " 'Eenaam goorena kida dhaase' hamayse ea kaam ikal entsate ye nivade. Marrato! Intaar yesa birante kiam marmarayse yenin kiam bersonsa seeso kala hattear kidar haapaatine.
42023015	Ogodettsi Herodisaar kidar seeso haapadehe; ogona wodar maasate kiam ki nittsade. Marrato! Ea kaa dembhi pirdidar yer kiam yeskisea kalaar hayadehe.
42023016	Ogonante kiam micareka qansayse garayda gare" kena ki hamade.
42023017	[Leven levenka Paasikan bavaalinka dhaxadhon eensa eedi kalaam Bhilathoos eenna bula ko kiam zaskade.]
42023018	Eeno wul kinka hamayse "Ea kaam kaysima; Barbaanam wona bulima!" hante ke ilatade.
42023019	Barbaanaar kataman ogote banqi dhaasayse eediam kinin deesonna, dhaxin ooninte ki dhaxadhade.
42023020	Bhilathoosaar Yesusam bulana zagayse tapir eenna kinin giyenka,
42023021	eeno "Kiam ziitaa! Ziitaa!" hamaate ko ilatade.
42023022	Bhilathoosaar makkanso "Ea kaa kinin hayoono seesono kisa hare? Inta dembhina kiam yeskisea kisa seeso haapaatine; ogonante kiam micareka qansayse bulayda bule" kena ki hamade.
42023023	Kediar upsinam yisa dheg hayayse "Kiam ziitaa!" hamaate kattsi ke ilatade; Bhilathoosam ilatinkaar ke bashade.
42023024	Ogona kenin zagoono kena konin haydhoadettsi Bhilathoos ki pirdade.
42023025	"Wona Barbaanam bulaa" hamayse kenin oysaa peenam wottsaynadar eenaam kinin dhaasonnabee eedi kinin deesonnabe dhaxin ooninte dhaxadhaam kena ki bulade. Yesusam kenin zagaadettsi saskate ki imade.
42023026	Ogora Yesusam entsate kenin yivenka, Qerena peen ea Simoon gurdara katamandar kinin nivenka, kiam yedayse Yesusin ziitadhen masqalinam kiam kettsayse Yesussa paananka kinin yivoadettsi ke hayade.
42023027	Thoothino eenoar Yesussa paananka ko yivade; kesaar iira qaytaate eepayna maa waani ke dahade.
42023028	Yesusaar kedar wal hamayse kena yin ki giyade: "Yedi Yerusaalem maana, yennon metenbee yesa naanabena eepee, inante eepeebhode.
42023029	Harrna hambhidianna, marrato! 'Naasi adhimina, amin qooshayse dhesimina seekina ke wozadhe' hambhayno roorono niva ko nive.
42023030	Ogo wodanka eeno dhukanaka 'Wodar yiipee!', kuttonakaar 'Woam aachee!' haman koda yede.
42023031	Ta haaqan eeqindettsi maataa idar yin ke hayna, haaqan wocchindettsi maataana yedar hamin ke hayo?" kena ki hamade.
42023032	Waaniar eedi lamaa seeso waadadhaanaam Yesusbesana kinka keam deesota tiyate ke yivade.
42023033	Ogora "Eedisa Metedettsi" hambhea raqaam yeskayse ogote Yesusam masqalindar konngayse ke ziitade; seeso waadadhaanasa kalaam kisa mizaqimbar, lansoamaar kisa warkatambar keam konngayse ke ziitade.
42023034	Yesusaar "Imbo, yinin hayenam kenin dhesimonna kena garaa" ki hamade. Poolisanaar Yesussa apalandar itha dhabayse kinka ke kashimade.
42023035	Eenaar woyayse keda shede. Peenam wottsaynaar "Een waaniam kidi dhacchidine; ogona Barjo yiam kamayse qadhaa Kiristoos yi daana, ta yiam ki dhacche!" hamaate kiam keda bage.
42023036	Poolisanaar kiam bagada kikal theedayse woyni thorka kina bavayse,
42023037	"Ya Ayiwd eenasa bitaa hanna, ta haam dhacchaa!" kina ke hamade.
42023038	"Kaa Ayiwd eenasa bitaane" hamea [Girikbee, Roomebee, Ibra aponbeka] thaapi Yesussa metensa bhaabar masqalindar ke konngade.
42023039	Yesusbesana kinka ziitadhaana seeson eenasa eedi kalaa Yesuska "Ya Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoostayu? Ta hambee wombeam dhacchaa!" hamaate kiam ki iirade.
42023040	Lansoa ea yinin giyenka, "Ya kidettsi dembhin pirdindar dahayse Barjoam kurtumbhattanu?
42023041	Wodi wonin seesonsa dhabin tiyaate wonin dohonna, zasken pirdindar wo dahade; ea kaa seeso waadadhadehe" hamayse kiam ki wacimade.
42023042	Ogora kidi "Yesuso, bitimayse hanin niven wodanka iam bhocchaa!" kina ki hamade.
42023043	Yesusaar "Inta hana gon ida giye, kina imbesana kinka Barjoyn ashkon ukunsen raqinte hada dee" kina ki hamade.
42023044	-
42023045	Ogo wodanka savaat laxaddhane. Keeda agaara hayn thipaysaka savaat salin thoothenka yekka, peen wuldar thipano ko nivade. Barjosa gazan ooninsa gidin kashadhoono apallo kiaddha raq lamaadar ko havade.
42023046	Yesusaar upsin yisa dheg hayayse "Imbo, isa sadanam hana ida ime" ki hamade. Ogoam giyayse ki diyade.
42023047	Mato alaqaar yerin maatonam yinin haapon wodanka, "Gon ea kaa tipane!" hamayse Barjoam ki gobshade.
42023048	Yerin ogoam shedanna bukaana eena wul maaton yerinam kenin haapon wodanka, yisa woylaminka atayse sadanam gutada ke maatade.
42023049	Yesusam dhesaana wul, Galila peera yedayse kisa paanan nivaana maanabesana pegeka woyayse ogoam keda shede.
42023050	-
42023051	Marrato! Yiwda peensa Armatias kataman ea Yoseep hambhea eedi tipabee payyabe ki dahade. Ayiwd peen donzanasa eedi kalaa ki dahaakaar, Yesusam deesanna kesa bhocchinbee waadimanbeka kidi wormadehe. Barjosa bitamonam wozaka toolite ki dahade.
42023052	Kidi Bhilathooskal yivayse Yesussa leesinam kina kinin imoadettsi ki miskade.
42023053	Leesinamaar masqalindara hanchayse apalaka ochayse seeni layta palsate ashkadhon eedin duukadhaamon duukin oolonte kiam ki duukade.
42023054	Ogoam kinin hayenka ukunsen rooroana ashkimbhadhayno wodane; ukunsen rooroa yeskanna kida haye.
42023055	Galila peera Yesusbete kinka nivaana maana Yoseep paanan yivayse duukinbee kisa leesinam hamaabar kinin duukonbeam ke shedade.
42023056	Onnadar maatate yivayse shitto gaameabee waqatibe ke ashkade; ukunsen rooroakaar Musesa yiggin giyendettsi ukunsada ke haaqade.
42024001	Gabansa rooroa biraa Wuudi burin seddhiman maana yinin ashkon shitton gaamenam tiyate duukindar ke yivade.
42024002	Duukin oolonsa apon shupadhoono sennoar gunnguma ko hattaka ke haapade.
42024003	Ogora duukin oolonsa iinte ardayse Imbaa Yesussa leesinam haapadehe.
42024004	Kediar ogoka targadhayse ke daaka, marrato! Bhalqanten apalan qaadhaana eedi lamaa kekal theedi ke woyade.
42024005	Maanaar kurtumbhayse mia peente kenin shedenka eena kena yin ke giyade: "Sadanka dahaa eam diyaanasa shaarinte harrnee zage?
42024006	-
42024007	Kidi kote qolehe, dhaabhidine. 'I Eedi Naasaam seeson eenasa aaninte saskate imbhaysaka ziitadhayse, makkanso rooroakaar dembhira dhaabha koda zaske' hamayse ena Galila peente dahayse yena kinin giyonam bhocchee" kena ke hamade.
42024008	Maanaar Yesusin giyonam ke bhocchade.
42024009	-
42024010	Duukin raqira maatayse ogo wulam tabhi kalaana Yesus yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaynabee waani eena wulbena ke giyade. Ogoam giyaana maanaar Megdela peen edon Mayriyambee, Yohannabee, Yayqoobsa indan Mayriyambe, tapir maana kembesana kinka dahaanane.
42024011	Maanasa dhalqinam qansaana eenana bari apo konin maatonna, kedi gonne hamayse tiyadehe.
42024012	Bhethiroosaar dhaabhayse duukindar ki gobade. Ogotear yivayse yirk hamayse kinin shedenka, leesin yinka ochadhon apalan bish ki haapade; yinin haapon yerinka targadhayse yisa woylaminka bhocchaate oonindar ki maatade.
42024013	Ogo rooronka Yesussa paanan yivaynasa lamaana eena Emahus hambhen gurdandar yivite ke dahade; Emahus Yerusaalemra roonka yiidhenka savaat lamaaddha goytine.
42024014	Kediar yerin hamon wulam kinka kikal ke dhalqade.
42024015	Ogo kenin dhalqenka Yesus kekal theedayse kembesana kinka yivaate ki dahade.
42024016	Ko dahaannaar kedi aapinka Yesusam shedaate, kidi hay kinin dohonam dhesana damadehe.
42024017	Kidiar "Yivaate kinka yenin dhalqayno ogono hare?" kena ki hamade. Kediar yisa qaabonka ataate ke woyade.
42024018	Kesa iira Qeleyoobha hambhea kina yinin maasenka, "Ya Yerusaalem katamansa shaarinte dahayse ogo rooronka yerin hamonam dhesaama chocchea ya bisheaw?" kina ki hamade.
42024019	Kidiar "Ogono yer hare?" kena ki hamade. Kediar yin giyayse kina ke maasade: "Naazret peen ea Yesus goynsane; kidi Barjobee een wulbesa birante waadimanbee dhalqinbeka kantanka dahaa Barjokala qansayse eenna giyea ki dahade.
42024020	Gudullasa hayonabee woam wottsaynabe dembhin pirdinna saskate ke imaysaka, masqalindar konngayse kiam ke ziitade.
42024021	Wodiar 'Israveel eenadar dohon bazanam kashayse woam dhacchea kidine' hamayse kidar woylam wo hayade. Ogo bish dayma, yerro ogono yin ko maataysaka kina rooro makkansone.
42024022	Tapir wosa shaarinte dahaana maana waani yisa dhalqinka kedi woam tarshidine. Ini seddhiman Yesussa duukindar ke yivade;
42024023	kisa leesinam haapadehe. Maatate nivayse, '#"Sadanka ki dahade" hamayna Barjosa gaananaam haamadettsinka wo haapade' hamada ke nivade.
42024024	Wokalankaar waani waani eena duukindar yivayse maanayn wona giyondettsi ke haapade; Yesusam haapadehe" kina ke hamade.
42024025	Yesusaar "Yedi bhocchiminato, Barjokala qansayse eenna giyayna giyon wulam tiyana boosimbhaanato!
42024026	Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoos gaalen ogoam tiyayse yisa gobshindar arda kiam zaskayu?" kena ki hamade.
42024027	Ogoraar Musebee Barjokala qansayse eenna giyayna wulbera yedayse kinnon goynka giidhonam Mathaap Gazante thaapadhon wulsa bulinam kena ki giyade.
42024028	Kenin yiven gurdanam ke theedaysaka, Yesus kekala sagayse kinin yivea kena ko maatade.
42024029	Kediar "Hayno ibanidine; peenoar sootanna koda haye; ogonante wokal wodhaa" hamayse kattsi ke miskade. Kidiar kembesana kinka wodhana ki ardade.
42024030	Kembesana kinka kummandar ki dooqade; balashanamaar tiyayse Barjoam gobshayse, kashate kena ki imade.
42024031	Ogo wodanka kesa aapinin bhoqenka kiam kedi dhesidine; kidiar kekala ki kayade.
42024032	Kediar kinka kikal yi giyna: "Goynte wonin dohonka wona kinin giyenka, pir Mathaap Gazara giyada wona kinin bulenka, wosa woylaminka wodi kattsi wozadhaate diyttayu?" ke hamade.
42024033	Kediar saanawa dhaabhayse Yerusaalemdar maatayse ke yivade; ogotear tabhi kalaanabee kembesana kinka dahaanabe kedi kikal bukayse ke daaka keam ke haapade.
42024034	Igina kidar bukaana "Imbaa wontea Yesus gon dhaabhidine; Simoonnaar haapadhidine" ke hamade.
42024035	Eena lamaanaar Emahusdar kenin yivenka goynte hamon yerinbee Yesus balashanam kinin kashenka hamin kenin kiam dhesonbeam kena ke giyade.
42024036	Kediar ogoam giyte ke daaka, Yesus yinti kesa shaarinte woyayse, "Payyamo yena ko dee" kena ki hamade.
42024037	Kediar meeshi kenin haapaa kena konin maatonna, targadhayse ke kurtumbhade.
42024038	Yesus "Harrnee gaqatsadhaa? Yesa woylaminkaar harrnee qothimaa?
42024039	Inin dohonam isa aaninbee roonbeam shedee; iam kaamate shedee. Iam yenin shedeadettsi meeshidar waabee lepibe qolehe" kena ki hamade.
42024040	Yin giyayse yisa aaninbee roonbeam kena ki dhahade.
42024041	Kediar wozaka dhaabhoono gonne hamayse tiyma kenin garonna, targadhayse ke daaka, Yesus "Yekal itsadhea dook?" hamayse keam ki oysade.
42024042	Kediar kaarasa waa koqadhaa likka kina ke imade.
42024043	Kidiar tiyayse kesa birante ki itsade.
42024044	Yin kena ki giyade: "Birayse yembesana kinka inin dohonka, 'Musesa yiggin mathaapinabee, Barjokala qansayse eenna giyaynasa mathaapinabee, Mazmur mathaapinabesa iinte innon goynka thaapadhoono wul thoothinta koam koda zaske' hamayse yena inin giyoono dhalqino konone" kena ki hamade.
42024045	Ogo wodanka Mathaap Gazante thaapadhonam kenin bhocchoadettsi woylam kena ki imade.
42024046	-
42024047	Kenaar yin ki giyade: " 'Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoos gaale haapayse diya ki diye; makkansoa rooroakaar dembhira dhaabha ki dhaabhe. Pir kisa naabenka seeson waadimanam garayse Barjodar maatadhenbee seesonam shiishadhenbeam Yerusaalemra yedayse peendar dohon zarsin wulna koda giidhe' hamayse thaapadhidine.
42024048	Yediar yerra iginasa tarjanane.
42024049	Marrato! Imbanin 'imayda ime' hamonam yena nittsayda nittse; yedi kantanam cecira yena imbhenka yekka Yerusaalem katamante dooqee" kena ki hamade.
42024050	Ogora Yesus yisa paanan yivaynaam Yerusaalemra bulayse Bitaaniadar entsate yivayse, yisa aaninam dhaasayse kena Barjo ki eelade.
42024051	Kena Barjoam eelaate kekalanka edimayse cecindar ki yivade.
42024052	Kediar kina goodimayse kattsi wozaka Yerusaalemdar ke maatade.
42024053	Barjoamaar gobshaate rooro wul Barjosa gazan ooninte ke dahade.
43001001	Ena birayse Upsea dahade; agaa Upsear Barjokal ki dahade; Upsea agaar Barjone.
43001002	Upsea agaar ena birayse Barjokal ki dahade.
43001003	Yer wul kanka ko pijadhade; pijadhaanasa shaarinte yer kala hattear ki qolmaka pijadhadehe.
43001004	Kanka dehea sada ko dahade; agaa sadaar eensa shaakaane.
43001005	Ogono shaakanoar thipante shaaka ko shaake; thipanoar koam bashadehe.
43001006	Barjokalanka nittsadhaa Wannis hambhea eedi kalaa dahade.
43001007	Eeno wul kisa tarjamonka ogo shaakandar woylamin konin qajoadettsi shaakan goynsa tarjota ki nivade.
43001008	Wannis kidi yinti shaakatehe; ogo shaakan goynsa tarjota ki nivade.
43001009	Een wulna shaakea gonin hama shaakaa peendar ki nivade.
43001010	Kidiar peendar ki dahade; kidi peenam ki pijade; peendar dohoono eeno kiam dhesadehe.
43001011	Kidi yisa muldhanakal ki nivade; ko dahaannaar kisa muldhana kiam tiyadehe.
43001012	Kiam tiyaana eena wulna, kidar woylamin qajaynana Barjo naana kenin doadettsi hayamo kena ki imade.
43001013	Kediar Barjo naana kenin maatoono Barjo Manpasinkalanka kenin adhadhonnane; eedin adhadhendettsi waabee zombhibeka way eedisa bhocchika adhadhadehe.
43001014	Upsear eedi ki maatade; Barjosa sunin imintonbee goninbeka thoothayse wosa shaarinte ki wodhade. Yimbasa Naasa kalaa Imbaakal kisa dohon gobshinam wodi haapidine.
43001015	Wannisaar " 'Isa budonte nivea idara sagine; harrna hambhidianna, kidi isa birayse ki dahade' hamayse inin yena giyaa, marrato! Kidi kaane" hamaate upsi gebhika kinnon goynsa ki tarjade.
43001016	Wodi wul kisa sunin iminton thoothamora sunin imintondar pir imintonam wo tiyade.
43001017	Yiggino Musebar ko imbhade; Barjosa sunin imintonbee goninbe Yesus Kiristoosbar wona ko imbhade.
43001018	Hamin ko dahaakaar Barjoam haapaa eedi kala hattear qolehe; ko dahaannaar Barjo Imbaabete dahaa, kisa Naasa kalaa kinnon goynsa wona may ki dhahade.
43001019	Ayiwd eenam entsaynaar "Ya hayne?" hamayse Wannisam kenin oysoadettsi Yerusaalemra gudullabee Lewi eenabeam kidar kenin yittson wodanka,
43001020	Wannis "Inta Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoostehe" hamayse may ki tarjade, yiam aachadehe.
43001021	Kediar "Ta ya hayne? Eeliasu?" hamayse kiam ke oysade. Kidiar "Intatehe" hamayse kena ki maasade. Kediar " 'Niva ki nive' hambhea Barjokala qansayse eenna giyea yaw?" kina ke hamade. Kidiar "Aavav" kena ki hamade.
43001022	Kediar "Ta ya hayne? Woam nittsaanana malsinam wonin maasoadettsi haam haynea hame?" hamayse kiam ke oysade.
43001023	Kidiar "Barjokala qansayse eenna giyea Isiasin giyondettsi inta 'Barjoyn yekal nivenna, goyn kina gaz hayayse ashkee' hamayse ilatada darante giyea eane" kena ki hamade.
43001024	Nittsadhaana eenaar Parisa eenakalanka ke dahade.
43001025	Ogonante "Ya Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoos way Eelias way 'Niva ki nive' hambhea Barjokala qansayse eenna giyea ha dahaamma, eenam harrnaa shive?" hamayse kiam ke oysade.
43001026	Wannisaar kena "Inta noqoka ida shive; ko dahaannaar yenin dhesima eedi yesa shaarinte woydine.
43001027	Kisa dunngurinsa dhaxinam hattear bulana inta dameatehe; isa budonte nivea kidine" kena ki hamade.
43001028	Ogono wul yin konin maatoono Wannisin eenam shivayno Yordaanoos baynsa saabar dohon Bitaania gurdantene.
43001029	Kina hamon Wannis Yesus kikal kinin nivenka kiam shedayse, "Marrato! Peendar dohon eensa seesonam shiishea Barjosa Yaata kaane!
43001030	'Eedi kalaa isa budonte niva ki nive; kidiar isa birayse kinin dohonna, idara kalon sagine' inin hamaa kidi kaane.
43001031	Intaar kiam dhesaatine; ko dahaannaar Israveel eenkal kinin dhesimoadettsi ogonante inta eenam noqoka shivaate i nivade" ki hamade.
43001032	Wannisar yin giyayse ki tarjade: "Manpas Gazano waleedettsi cecira konin hanchenbee kidar konin dooqenbeam i haapade.
43001033	Intaar kiam dhesaatine; ko dahaannaar eenam noqoka inin shivoadettsi iam nittsaa 'Kidar Manpasin hanchayse dooqenka hanin haapea Manpas Gazanka shivea kidine' ina ki hamade.
43001034	Intaar ogoam haapidine; kidi Barjo Naas kinin dohonam inta tarjidine" ki hamade.
43001035	Kina hamon Wannis lamaana kisa paanan yivaynabesana kinka pir raqin ogote woyayse ki dahade.
43001036	Wannisaar ogoka Yesusin yivenka kiam shedayse, "Marrato! Barjosa Yaata kaane" ki hamade.
43001037	Igina lamaana Wannissa paanan yivaynaar Wannisin giyenam qansayse Yesussa paanan ke yivade.
43001038	Yesusaar igina eena kisa paanan kenin nivenka budoka keam maatate shedayse, "Haree zage?" kena ki hamade. Kediar "Rebi, hanin dahayno ranqo hamotene?" hamayse kiam ke oysade. "Rebi" hamintano "Dhettsea" hamintane.
43001039	Kidiar "Inin dehenam nivayse shedee" kena ki hamade. Kediar nivayse kinin dehen raqinam ke shedade. Ogo wodanka savaatino savaat tabhine; kediar kimbesana kinka ke haaqade.
43001040	Wannisin tarjenka qansayse Yesussa paanan yivaana eena lamaanasa kalaa Simoon Bhethiroossa indanaasa Indiriasne.
43001041	Indirias birayse yisa indanaasa Simoonam zagate haapayse, "Mesiam wodi haapidine" kina ki hamade. "Mesi" hamintano "Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoos" hamintane.
43001042	Ogosa budonte Indirias Simoonam Yesuskal entsate ki yivade. Yesusaar kiam shedayse, "Ya Wannis naasa Simoonne. Haam 'Keepa' koda hambhe" kina ki hamade. "Keepa" hamintano "Bhethiroos" hamintane.
43001043	Peen sedhaysaka Yesus Galila peendar yivana zagayse Pilbhoosam haapayse, "Isa paanan nivaa" kina ki hamade.
43001044	Pilbhoosaar Indiriasbee Bhethiroosbedettsi Beetesayda kataman eedine.
43001045	Pilbhoos Natinaveelam zagate haapayse, "Musesa yiggin mathaapinte, pir Barjokala qansayse eenna giyayna kisa kenin thaapaa Yoseep naasa Naazret ea Yesusam wodi haapidine" kina ki hamade.
43001046	Natinaveelaar "Naazretra payya yer haapa ko haapadho?" hamayse kiam ki oysade. Pilbhoosaar kina yi giyna: "Hanti nivayse shedaa" kina ki hamade.
43001047	Yesus Natinaveel kikal kinin nivenka kiam shedayse, "Marrato! Gadimmakko yisa woylaminte qolma gon hama Israveel ea kaane" ki hamade.
43001048	Natinaveelaar "Haminkaa iam dhesaa?" kina ki hamade. Yesusaar kina yinin maasenka, "Pilbhoos haam eelima birayse hatton shaapinsa demente ha daaka, haam i haapade" kina ki hamade.
43001049	Natinaveel yi giyna: "Woam Dhettsea, ya Barjo Naasane; ya Israveel eensa bitaane" kina ki hamade.
43001050	Yesusaar kina yinin maasenka, " 'Hatton shaapinsa demente ha daaka haam i haapade' inin hamonnaa idar woylamin qajo? Ta ogora sagi yer akar hada haape.
43001051	Inta yena gon ida giye: Cecin bulimaysaka Barjosa gaanana Eedi Naasikal kenin hanchenbee kenin utenbeam yeda haape" kina ki hamade.
43002001	Makkansoa rooroaka Galila peensa Qaana katamante gaydo ko dahade; Yesussa indanoar ogote ko dahade.
43002002	Yesusbee kisa paanan yivayna eenabeam ogo gaydon raqinte ke eldhade.
43002003	Ogo gaydon raqinte woynin birzinin maqonna, Yesussa indano kina yi giyna: "Shedaa, birzino maqidine" kina ko hamade.
43002004	Yesusaar "Indo, harrnaa iam oyse? Isa wodano akar yeskadehe" hamayse kona ki giyade.
43002005	Ogora kodi indano waadadhaynana "Kinin yena giyen wulam hayee" ko hamade.
43002006	Ayiwd eena yisa gilon kanka kenin waadadhea seenira ashkadhaana daa lax ogote ke dahade; daano kallo mato liitiraddha noqo koda yede.
43002007	Yesusaar waadimaynana yi giyna: "Daana iginaar noqo thoosee" ki hamade. Kediar daanasa aponka noqonin laymana hayenka yekka ke thoosade.
43002008	Ogora Yesus "Ta keeda qolbhayse galanbee birzinbena kamate wodadhaa eana tiyate imee" kena ki hamade. Kediar qolbhayse kina ke imade.
43002009	Galanbee birzinbena kamate wodadhaar ogo woynin birzin maaton noqonam yinin wucenka, hamora konin nivonam dhesadehe. (Noqonam qolbhaana eena kedi dhesa ke dhese.) Galanbee birzinbena kamate wodadhaa ear keemea eam eelayse,
43002010	"Eedi wul birayse payyan birzin koda ime; ogora eenin bardhonsa budonte daathimin birzinam koda ime. Ya payyan birzinam koaddha harrnaa kappisaa?" kina ki hamade.
43002011	Yesus ogo biron tarshen yerinam kinin hayoono Galila peensa Qaana katamantene. Ogoka yisa gobshinamaar ki dhahade; kisa paanan yivayna eenaar kidar woylamin ke qajade.
43002012	Ogosa budonte Yesus indanbee, indanaanabee, kisa paanan yivayna eenabesana kinka Qipirnaahoomir yivayse likka roorona ki dooqade.
43002013	Ayiwd eensa Paasikan bavaalin yeskaysaka Yesus Yerusaalem ki yivade.
43002014	Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayantear wanngabee, yaanabee, waleenbeam shanshaynaam ki haapade; koymon ookaynaamaar dooqayse ke daaka keam haapayse,
43002015	alannga ashkayse yaanabee wanngabe wulam Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayara ki oytade. Koymon ookaynasa koymonam ki laalade; kesa tharbhezanamaar kupate ki dhabade.
43002016	Waleen shanshaynanaar "Koam os tiyee; Imbasa ooninam gaba gabadhea ooni hayeebhode!" kena ki hamade.
43002017	Ogo wodanka Yesussa paanan yivayna "Hasa ooninsa dohoono anngarmano isa iinte nuudettsi koda oydhe" hamayse thaapadhonam ke bhocchade.
43002018	Ayiwd eenam entsaynaar kina "Ya koam hayana hasa hayamonin dohonam wonin dhesoadettsi tarshea yer haraa wona dhee?" kina ke hamade.
43002019	Yesusaar kena yi giyna: "Barjosa gazan oonin koam kottsee; inta koam rooro makkamka pir woysayda woyse" kena ki hamade.
43002020	Ogona Ayiwd eenam entsayna "Ko Barjosa gazan ooninam woysate macchana eedi lamaa kaysa apo lax leve ko tiyade; ya ta koam rooro makkamka haminaa woyse?" kina ke hamade.
43002021	Yesusaar "Barjosa gazan onno" hamayse kinin giyoono yisa waansa ki giyade.
43002022	Ogonante Yesus dembhira kinin dhaabhonsa budonte, kisa paanan yivayna eena ogo kinin giyonam bhocchayse, Mathaap Gazante thaapadhonbee Yesusin giyonbeam gonne ke hamade.
43002023	Yesus Paasikan rooroaka Yerusaalemir ki daaka, thoothino eeno kinin hayen tarshen yerinam shedayse kidar woylam ko qajade.
43002024	Yesusaar een wulam yinin dhesenna, kesa qaabonam gonne hamayse kedar woylam qajehe.
43002025	Kidi yinti eedisa iinte dohonam kinin dhesenna, eedi hay ki hannaar eedisa kina tarjoadettsi zaskehe.
43003001	Parisa eensa shaarira Ayiwd eensa hayoa Niqodimos hambhea eedi kalaa dahade.
43003002	Kidiar sootinka Yesuskal nivayse, "Woam Dhettsea, Barjo kimbesana ki dahaamma, hanin hayayna igina tarshayna yerraam hayana damea eedi qolehe. Ogonante Barjokalanka nivaa dhettsea hanin dohonam dhesooda dhese" kina ki hamade.
43003003	Yesusaar kina yinin maasenka, "Inta hana gon ida giye: Eedi lansi yi adhadhaamma, Barjosa bitamonam haapana damehe" kina ki hamade.
43003004	Niqodimosaar "Eedi yinin gecchonsa budonte hamin ki adhadhe? Lansi indansa iir ardayse adhadhana damaw?" hamayse kiam ki oysade.
43003005	Yesusaar yin giyayse kina ki maasade: "Inta hana gon ida giye: Eedi noqokalankabee Manpas Gazankalankabe yi adhadhaamma, Barjosa bitamonte ardana damehe.
43003006	Waakalanka adhadhaa waane; manpaskalanka adhadhaa manpasne.
43003007	'Lansi adhadha yeam ko zaske' inin hana hamonna ya targadhaabhode.
43003008	Jibare yinin nashaa raqadar koda jibarshe; kosa upsinamaar hada qanse. Ko dahaannaar hamora konin nivenam, pir hamodar konin yivenam ya dhesattane. Manpas Gazankalanka adhadhaa wul yinne" kina ki hamade.
43003009	Niqodimosaar "Ogono hamin ko yin dee?" hamayse kiam ki oysade.
43003010	Yesusaar kina yi giyna: "Ya Israveel eenam dhettsea dahayse ogoam dhesattanu?
43003011	Inta hana gon ida giye: Wonin dhesonam woda giye; wonin haaponamaar woda tarje. Yediar wosa tarjamonam gonne hamayse tiyattene.
43003012	Peendar dohonam inin yena giyenka gonne hamayse ye tiymina, cecinte dohonam i yena giydianna yedi gonne hamayse haminee tiye?
43003013	Cecira hanchaa Eedi Naasira ab hayyear tura cecindar yivaa eedi qolehe.
43003014	"Musear darante guninam kinin ziitaadettsi, Eedi Naasiar agaadettsi ziitadha kiam koda zaske.
43003015	Ogonoar kidar woylamin qajea hayyear rooro wul lay dehen sadanam kinin haapoadettsine.
43003016	Kidar woylamin qajayna wul kenin kayoamadettsi, rooro wul lay dehen sadanam ke haape, Barjo yisa Naasa kalaam yinin imenka yekka peen kodar dohon eenam kattsi ki nashade.
43003017	Barjo peendar yisa Naasaam kinin nittsoono peen kodar dohoono eeno kanka konin dhaqoadettsine; eendar kinin pirdoadettsitehe.
43003018	"Kidar woylamin qajeadar pirdadhehe; kidar woylamin qajimaadar Barjo Naasa kalaadar woylamin kinin qajaamonna, ta kidar pirdadhidine.
43003019	Shaakanoar peendar ko nivade; eeno siya konin hayenna, shaakanam nashadehe. Thipanam konin nashonna, pirdino ogona ko nivade.
43003020	Siya hayea wul shaakanam kida jibbe; kisa waadimanin haapadhoamadettsi shaakandar nivehe.
43003021	Gonin hayea ea kisa waadimano Barjokala konin dohonam haapadhoadettsi shaakandar kida nive" hamayse ki giyade.
43003022	Ogosa budonte Yesus yisa paanan yivaynabesana kinka Yiwda peendar ki yivade; ogotear kembesana kinka dooqayse eenaam kida shive.
43003023	Wannisar Saaleem katamansa gasante Yenoon hambhea raqaate thoothi noqon dohonna, eenam kida shive; eenoar kikal nivayse koda shiidhe.
43003024	Wodan ogoka Wannisam akar dhaxin ooninte dhaxadhadehe.
43003025	Wannissa paanan yivaynabee Ayiwd eedi kalabesa shaarinte ashki gilosa palime ko dhaabhade.
43003026	Wannissa paanan yivaynaar Wanniskal nivayse, "Woam Dhettsea, Yordaanoos baynsa saabar hambesana kinka dahaa, yaar kina hanin tarjaa, kidi eenam kida shive; eeno wulaar kidar koda yive" kina ke hamade.
43003027	Wannisaar kena yinin maasenka, "Eedi haynaar cecira Barjo kina imima yer kala hattear tiyana damehe.
43003028	'Inta Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoostehe; ko dahaannaar kisa birayse i nittsadhade' hamayse inin giyonsa yedi isa tarjanane.
43003029	Uutan yisa dahaa ea kidi uutan imbaane; uutan imbaasa aananta kikal woyayse ki daaka, uutan imbaa uutanbesana kinin dhalqenka kisa upsinam qansayse aananta kattsi kida wozadhe. Ogonante isa wozano ta thoothidine.
43003030	Kidi dheg dheg hama kiam koda zaske; inta yirk yirk hama iam koda zaske" kena ki hamade.
43003031	Bhaara nivaa wuldara sagine. Peente dahaa peensane; peenngayn yerinam kida giye. Cecira nivaa wuldara sagine.
43003032	Kidi yinin haaponbee yinin qansonbeam kida tarje; kinin tarjenamaar tiyea qolehe.
43003033	Kinin tarjonam tiyaa ea Barjosa gonamonam kida tarje.
43003034	Barjoyn nittsaa Barjosa upsinam kida giye; harrna hambhidianna, Barjo yisa Manpasinam kashate imehe.
43003035	Barjo Imbaa yisa Naasaam kida nashe; yer wulam kisa hayamon demente haydine.
43003036	Barjo Naasadar woylamin qajeasa rooro wul lay dehea sada kisa daane. Barjo Naasadar woylamin qajima eadar Barjosa wacime kidar ko dahade; dehen sadanam haapehe.
43004001	Ogosa budonte Yesus Wanniskalanka sagi thoothina eenaam yisa paananka yivayna kinin hayenbee noqonka kinin shivenbeam Parisa eena ke qansade.
43004002	Ko dahaannaar eenaam shivayna kisa paanan yivayna eenane; kidi yinti shivehe.
43004003	Parisa eena kisa giidhaka kenin qansonam Yesusin dheson wodanka, Yiwda peenam garayse Galila peendar ki yivade.
43004004	Ogodar kinin yivenka Sammaria peen goynka yiva kiam ko zaskade.
43004005	Ogonante Sammaria peente dohon Yayqoob yisa naasa Yoseepna ena kinin imon raqinkal theedi Sikaar kataman ki nivade.
43004006	Raqin ogote Yayqoobsa noqo tuula ko dahade. Yesusaar kinin nivon goyn kiam qacchaysaka noqon tuulansa aponte ki dooqade; ogo wodanka savaatinoar savaat laxaddhane.
43004007	Sammaria peen maa kallo noqo qolbhota ko nivade. Yesusaar "Noqo iam wushaa" kona ki hamade.
43004008	Kisa paanan yivayna eena ogosa birayse gala shanota katamandar ke yivade.
43004009	Ogonante edono Yesusna yi giyna: "Ya Ayiwd eedi dahayse i Sammaria edonkal 'Noqo iam wushaa' hamayse haminaa iam miske?" kina ko hamade. Ogonoar Ayiwd eenbee Sammaria eenbe yer kala kaladar kinka kenin agimonnane.
43004010	Yesusaar kona yi giyna: "Barjosa imintonbee 'Noqo iam wushaa' hana hamea hay inin dohonbeam ha dhesidianna, ini ya iam hada miske; inta sadan imen noqonam hana ida ime" kona ki hamade.
43004011	Edonoar "Imbo, haninka qolbhea yer hasa aaninte qolehe; tuulanoar gudubhne. Ta sadan imen noqonam hamoraa tiye?
43004012	Ya ogo noqon tuulanam wona imaa wosa imbaa Yayqoobdara sagaa sago? Kimbee, kisa naanabee, kisa qollabe kora ke wucade" kina ko hamade.
43004013	Yesusaar kona yinin maasenka, "Ogo noqora wucea wul pir kida dheebardhe.
43004014	Inin imen noqonam wucea rooro wul dheebardhehe; ogonoar inin kina imayno noqono rooro wul lay dehen sadan imea noqo maatayse kisa iira koda ele" ki hamade.
43004015	Edonoar "Imbo, keeda kaara os noqo inin dheebardhoamadettsibee noqo qolbhota kote inin nivoamadettsibe ogo noqonam ina imaa" kina ko hamade.
43004016	Yesusaar "Yivayse hasa geshoam eelayse kote nivaa" ki hamade.
43004017	Edonoar "Isa anngi qolehe" kina ko hamade. Yesusaar " 'Isa anngi qolehe' hamayse hanin giyoono payyane.
43004018	Hasa anngi dong ke dahade; ta hambesana kinka dahaar hasa geshoatehe. Ogona ya gonaa giyade" kona ki hamade.
43004019	Edonoar "Imbo, ya Barjokala qansayse eenna giyea hanin dohonam ta inta dhesidine.
43004020	Ena wosa eykena dhukan ogodar Barjona ke goodimade; yedi Ayiwd eenaar 'Eediyn Barjona goodima zaskayno ranqo Yerusaalemirne' yeda hame" kina ko hamade.
43004021	Yesusaar kona yin ki giyade: "Ya edono, inin giyenam gonne hamayse tiyaa. Barjo Imbaana dhukan ogodar way Yerusaalemir yenin goodimima woda koda nive.
43004022	Yedi yenin dhesaama Barjona yeda goodime; wodiar dhaqinta Ayiwd eensa shaarira konin dohonna, wonin dhesea Barjona woda goodime.
43004023	Ko dahaannaar, Barjona goninka goodimayna eena Barjo Imbaana manpasbee goninbeka kina kenin goodimea woda koda nive; ogono wodanoar ta nividine. Barjo Imbaa agaadettsi kina goodimaynaam kida zage.
43004024	Barjo manpasne; kina goodimaynaar manpasbee goninbeka kenin goodimoadettsi keam koda zaske" kona ki hamade.
43004025	Edonoar "Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoos hambhea Mesi kinin nivenam dhesayda dhese; kidi yinin nivon wodanka, yer wulam wona kida giye" kina ko hamade.
43004026	Yesusaar "Shedaa! Ta hambesana dhalqea kidi intane" kona ki hamade.
43004027	Ogo wodanka kisa paanan yivayna eenaar katamara maatate ke nivade; Yesus maa kallonbesana kinka kinin dhalqenka kiam haapayse kedi targadhidine. Ko dahaannaar edonna "Haraa zage?" way Yesusna "Kombesana kinka harrnaa dhalqe?" hamayse keam oysaa eedi kala hattear qolehe.
43004028	Ogo wodanka edono noqon daanam garayse katamandar yivayse eenna yi giyna:
43004029	"Inin hayon wulam ina giyaa eam nivayse shedee! Way kidi Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoos doo ki dew?" ko hamade.
43004030	Eenoar katamara utayse Yesuskal nivite ko dahade.
43004031	Ogo wodanka Yesussa paanan yivayna "Woam Dhettsea, gala wokal itsaa" hamayse kiam ke miskade.
43004032	Kidiar kena yinin giyenka, "Yenin dhesima gala inin itsea isa daane" kena ki hamade.
43004033	Ogonante kisa paanan yivayna eena "Eedi kina gala bavidi doo ko dew?" hamayse kinka kikal ke dhalqade.
43004034	Yesusaar kena yi giyna: "Isa galano iam nittsaasa bhocchinam inin hayoadettsibee kisa waadimanam inin thoosoadettsibene.
43004035	Yedi 'Akar arpi oydi ko shidhade; ogosa budonte isin patadhea rooroa kida nive' yesa hamintatayu? Marrato! Inta yena ida giye: Isinin wocchonam, patadhen wodanin yeskonam dheg hamayse shedee.
43004036	Isinin patea yinin patonsa bazanam kida tiye; rooro wul lay sadanka dehen aapinamaar kida pucche. Ogonante yiitheabee pateabe kinka keda wozadhe.
43004037	Ogona 'Kalaa bheeta kida yiithe; waar pata ki pate' hamayse giidhoono kamsino gonne.
43004038	Intaar qajadhayse yenin waadadhaamonam yenin patoadettsi yeam i yittsade. Waani eena ke qajadhade; yedi kenin qajadhonsa aapinam ye buurade" kena ki hamade.
43004039	Edonoar "Inin hayon wulam ina ki giyade" hamayse konin tarjon goynka kataman ogora thoothino Sammaria eeno Yesusdar woylamin ko qajade.
43004040	Ogonante Sammaria eena Yesuskal yinin nivon wodanka, kekal kinin dooqoadettsi kiam ke miskade; kidiar rooro lamaa kekal ki dooqade.
43004041	Birana eenadara kattsi thoothino eeno kisa dhalqinka kidar woylamin ko qajade.
43004042	Kedi edonna yi giyna: "Keeda kidar woylamin wonin qajayno hanin wona giyonna bish dayma, wodi wonti kinin giyenam wonin qansonnabee kidi gon peendar dahayna eenaam Dhacchea kinin maatonam wonin dhesonnabene" kona ke hamade.
43004043	Yesus raqin ogote rooro lamaa yinin dooqonsa budonte, Galila peendar ki yivade.
43004044	Barjokala qansayse eenna giyea peen yinnonte kinin gobshadhiminam Yesus ena yinti giydine.
43004045	Galila peendar kinin nivon wodanka, Galila eena kiam wozaka ke tiyade. Harrna hambhidianna, Paasikansa bavaala rooroaka kediar yivayse Yerusaalemir kinin hayon wulam kenin haaponnane.
43004046	Yesus ena noqonam woynin birzindar kinin maason Galila peensa Qaana katamandar pir ki nivade. Qipirnaahoom gidir naasa yisa hajadhaa peen wottsea bitaasa choobar hayo kalaa ki dahade.
43004047	Kidiar Yesus Yiwda peera Galila kinin nivonam yinin qanson wodanka, naasa hajadhayse diyota kinin hayonna, nivayse kinin pacchoadettsi Yesuskal yivayse kiam ki miskade.
43004048	Ogonante Yesus kina yi giyna: "Yedi tarsheabee yer haalibeam ye haapaamma, hamin ko dahaakaar idar woylamin qajattene" kina ki hamade.
43004049	Wottsear "Imbo, isa naasa diyma bannzo! Saana ikal nivaa" kina ki hamade.
43004050	Yesusaar "Hasa naasa paashidine; oonindar hasa yivaa" kina ki hamade. Ear Yesusin giyonam gonne hamayse yisa oonindar ki yivade.
43004051	Kinin yivenkaar kisa waadiman eena goynte kidar keerayse, "Hasa naasa paashidine" hamayse kina ke giyade.
43004052	Kidiar "Naasayn paashoono savaat meemaykane?" hamayse keam ki oysade. Kediar "Naa savaat tobbhaaka bishin occhayno kiam ko garaysaka ki paashade" kina ke hamade.
43004053	Naasasa imbaar Yesus "Hasa naasa paashidine" kina kinin hamoono savaatin ogoka konin dohonam dhesayse, kidi yisa oonin eena wulbesana Yesusdar woylamin ke qajade.
43004054	Kono tarshayno yerro Yesus Yiwda peera Galila peendar maatate nivayse kinin hayonsa lansonone.
43005001	Ogosa budonte Ayiwd eensa bavaal rooro konin dohonna, Yesus Yerusaalemir ki yivade.
43005002	Yerusaalemir yaana kerinsa gasante Ibra aponka Beetesayda hambhayno eenin shiidhimbhea dalba ko dahade; ogo dalbansa gasante baara kaadhaa eedin yaayea goyti dong ko dahade.
43005003	-
43005004	Ogotear [noqonsa shoanam kaalada] hajadhaanabee, aapin kayaanabee, wobonabee, bishiysa malgimaanabe thoothina eena iir keda wodhe. [Waani waani rooronaka Barjo gaananasa kalaa nivayse noqonam kida shooshe; noqonin shohonsa budonte birayse noqonte ardaa ea yidar dohon burqora paasha ki paashe.]
43005005	Ogotear eedi kalaa kaysa apo tabhi lankay levenka yekka hajadhaa eedi kala ki dahade.
43005006	Yesus ea agaa raatayse ki daaka kiam haapayse, kinaka yekka thoothi leve hajadhayse kinin dohonam dhesayse, "Paashana zagaa zago?" hamayse kiam ki oysade.
43005007	Hajadhaa ear "Imbo, noqon shohanna noqonsa iinte tiyate iam arsea eedi qolehe; ko dahaannaar inta noqonte ardota inin hayenka, eeno waani iam birayse koda arde" hamayse kina ki maasade.
43005008	Yesusaar "Dhaabhayse haam baadhon haaqanam bavate yivaa!" kina ki hamade.
43005009	Ear saanawa paashayse, kiam baadhon haaqanam yinka bavate ki yivade. Agaa rooroar Ayiwd eensa ukunsen rooroane.
43005010	Ogonante Ayiwd eenam entsayna hajimora paashaa eana "Kina roorono ukunse rooro konin dohonna, haam haaqa bava zaskehe" kina ke hamade.
43005011	Kidi "Iam pacchaa ea 'Haam baadhon haaqanam hanka bavayse yivaa' ina kinin hamonnane" kena ki hamade.
43005012	Kediar " 'Haaqanam bavayse hanka yivaa' hana hamaa hayne?" hamayse kiam ke oysade.
43005013	Ko dahaannaar ogo raqinte thoothi eedi dahade; ogona Yesus eensa shaarinte kinin ardonna, kiam pacchaa ea hay kinin dohonam kidi dhesadehe.
43005014	Ogosa budonte Yesus eam Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayante kiam haapayse, "Shedaa! Ya paashidine; kora sagi yer hadar yeskoamadettsi keeda kaara os seeso hayaabhode!" kina ki hamade.
43005015	Ear yivayse kiam pacchaa Yesus kinin dohonam Ayiwd eenam entsaynana ki giyade.
43005016	Ogonante ukunsen rooroaka yerra iginaam kinin hayonna, Ayiwd eenam entsayna Yesusam oytan ke yedade.
43005017	Yesusaar "Ta koka yekka Imba waadadhite ki dahade; intaar waadadhite i dahade" hamayse kena ki maasade.
43005018	Ogonoar ukunsen rooroam kinin gobshaamonna bish dayma, Barjoam "Kidi Imbane" hamayse yiam Barjoka kinin yeekinsonna, Ayiwd eenam entsayna ena hamora sagi deesana kiam ke zagade.
43005019	Ogonante Yesus kena yin ki giyade: "Inta yena gon ida giye: Imbaanin waadadhenka yinin haaponam bish Naasa kida waadadhe; kidi yisa hayamoka waadadhana kinin damea yer kala hattear qolehe. Imbaa kinin waadadhen wulam Naasa pir agaadettsi kida waadadhe.
43005020	Harrna hambhidianna, Imbaa yisa Naasaam kinin nashenna, yinin waadadhen wulam kina kida dhee. Yediar yenin targadhoadettsi ogora sagi waadima kina kida dhee.
43005021	Imbaa diyaanaam kinin dhaasenbee sadanka daadhenam kena kinin imendettsibe, Naasa yinin kamaana eena wulna sadanka daadhenam kena kida ime.
43005022	-
43005023	Imbaa eedi kalaadar pirdehe; eeno wul Imbaam konin gobshendettsi Naasaamaar konin gobshoadettsi pirdin wulam Naasana ki imade. Naasaam gobshima kiam nittsaa Imbaamaar gobshehe.
43005024	"Inta yena gon ida giye: Isa upsinam qansayse iam nittsaadar woylamin qajea rooro wul lay dehea sada kisa daane. Dembhira sadaka daadhendar ki sagade; kidar pirdadhehe.
43005025	Inta yena gon ida giye: Diyaana eena Barjo Naasasa upsinam kenin qansea woda koda nive; ogonoar taakine. Qansayna wul sadaka keda dee.
43005026	Imbaa sadanka daadhenam imea kinin dohondettsi, yin tapir Naasa sadanka daadhenam imea kinin doadettsi kiam haydine.
43005027	Pir Eedi Naas kinin dohonna, kinin pirdoadettsi Imbaa hayamo kina imidine.
43005028	-
43005029	Ogona targadheebhode; duukinte dahaana wul Naasasa upsinam qansayse duukira kenin dhaabhayno woda niva ko nive. Payyan waadadhaana dembhira dhaabhayse sadaka keda dee; siyon waadadhaana eena dembhira kenin dhaabhonsa budonte kedar pirda ko pirdadhe" kena ki hamade.
43005030	"Inta isa hayamoka yer kalaar hayana damattine; ko dahaannaar Imbaakalanka inin qansonam ida pirde. Iam nittsaasa bhocchinamne, isa bhocchinam hayana inin zagiminna, isa pirdino tipane.
43005031	Inta meten innonna i tarjina, isa tarjamono gontehe.
43005032	Ina tarjea eedi kala daane; kidiar ina kinin tarjayno tarjamono gon konin dohonam dhesayda dhese.
43005033	Yedi eenaam Wanniskal ye yittsade; kidiar goninna tarjidine.
43005034	Ogoam inin yena giyayno yenin dhaqoadettsine; eedikalanka tarjamo iam zaskonnatehe.
43005035	Wannisar kattsi shaakea nuudettsi ki dahade; yediar likka wodana kisa shaakanka wozadhana ye nashade.
43005036	"Wannis ina kinin tarjorra sagi tarja isa daane; isa tarjamonoar Imba inin waadadhoadettsi ina kinin imoono waadimanone. Ogono inin waadadhayno waadimano Imba iam kinin nittsondettsi innon goynsa koda tarje.
43005037	Iam nittsaa Imbaar ina tarjidine. Yediar kisa upsinam qanseetene; kiamaar haapeetene.
43005038	Kinin nittsaadar woylamin yenin qajaamonna, kisa upsinoar yekal qolehe.
43005039	Yedi Mathaap Gazante rooro wul lay sadanam yenin haapea yena konin maatenna, yedi Mathaapinam payya hayayse marmaraate yeda nabbabe; ogono Mathaapinoar ina tarjaynone.
43005040	Ko dahaannaar ogo sadanam haapana ikal nivana zagattene.
43005041	"Inta eedikalanka gobshinam zagattine.
43005042	Ko dahaannaar inta yeam dhesidine; Barjosa nashimmakkonin yekal qolmonam dhesayda dhese.
43005043	Inta Imbasa hayamonka i nivade; yedi iam tiyeetene. Eedi ab yisa hayamonka ki nivina, kiam tiyeeda tiye.
43005044	Yedi kinka kikalanka gobshin zagayna, kalaa Barjokalanka haapadhen gobshinam zagimina eena, haminee idar woylamin qajana dame?
43005045	Inta Imbasa birante yeam inin bersea yena ko maatabhoode. Yeam bersea daane; agaar yenin kidar qaabe hayea Musene.
43005046	Muse innon goynsa kinin thaaponna, kinin thaaponam gonne hamayse tiydi ye hanna, idar woylamin ini qajeeda qaje.
43005047	Kinin thaaponam gonne hamayse ye tiyaamma, isa upsinam gonne hamayse haminee tiye?" kena ki hamade.
43006001	Ogosa budonte Yesus Thibiriyadoos hambhen Galila bazinsa saabar ki sagade.
43006002	Thoothino eenoar Yesus hajadhaanaam pacchaate kinin waadadhon tarshen yerinam konin haaponna, Yesusbesana ko yivade.
43006003	Ogo wodanka Yesus dhukandar utayse yisa paanan yivayna eenabesana kinka ki dooqade.
43006004	Ayiwd eensa Paasikan bavallo ko yeskade.
43006005	Ogo wodanka Yesus dheg hamayse thoothino eeno yikal konin nivenka koam shedayse Pilbhoosna yi giyna: "Ko eenin itsoadettsi gala hamoroo shano?" kina ki hamade.
43006006	Yesus yin kinin giyoono Pilbhoossa bhocchinam dhesannane; yinin hayenam birayse dhesa ki dhese.
43006007	Pilbhoosaar kina yinin maasenka, "Wulna likka likka kashate kena yeskisana mato lamaa birreka shandhea gala hattear yeekehe" hamayse kina ki maasade.
43006008	Yesussa paanan yivaynasa kalaa, Simoon Bhethiroossa indanaasa Indirias yi giyna:
43006009	"Mattsi balasha dongbee kaara lamaabe yedaa naasi kalaa kote daane; ko dahaannaar igina galana koaddhan eenna hamin ke yeeke?" kina ki hamade.
43006010	Yesusaar yisa paanan yivaynaka "Eenam dottsee" kena ki hamade. Ogo raqintear thoothi shudhin dohonna, eeno daran ko dooqade. Anngina gembhasa paydino shii dongaddhane.
43006011	Yesus balashanam tiyayse Barjoam miskeka gobshayse dooqon eenna kenin imoadettsi ki hayade; kaaranamaar agaadettsi yin ki hayade. Eeno wul yina zaskaadettsi ko itsade.
43006012	Itsayse konin mishonsa budonte, Yesus yisa paanan yivaynana "Dirma kalaar shidhoamadettsi wulam pucchee" kena ki hamade.
43006013	Ogonante mattsin balashan dongra een itsaysaka shidhoono dirmano ke pucchaysaka, sharqa tabhi lamaa ko thoothade.
43006014	Eenoar Yesusin hayon tarshen yerinam yinin haapon wodanka, "Kaa gon 'Peen kodar niva ki nive' hambhea Barjokala qansayse eenna giyeane" ko hamade.
43006015	Ogona Yesus eeno kantaka yedayse bitinsana kiam konin zagonam dhesayse, pir yimal dhukandar yivayse ki dooqade.
43006016	Peenin sootenka Yesussa paanan yivayna bazinsa apondar ke yivade.
43006017	Bazindara sagadhen gonngalantear ardayse bazinsa saabar dohon Qipirnaahoomdar yivite ke dahade. Ogo wodanka peeno thipane; Yesusaar akar kekal nivadehe.
43006018	Wura kanta jibarshonna, bazino shoan ko yedade.
43006019	Yesussa paanan yivayna bazindar sagadhen gonngalanka bazinsa shaarinte kenin yeskonsa budonte, Yesus bazindar rooka tigate nivite kenin dohon gonngalansa gasante kinin theedenka kiam haapayse ke kurtumbhade.
43006020	Kidiar "Intane, kurtumbheebhode!" kena ki hamade.
43006021	Ogonante kediar yikal gonngalante kiam arsana ke nashade; saana gonngalano kenin yiven raqindar ko yeskade.
43006022	Kina hamon bazinsa saabar dahaana eena naa bazindar gonngala kalaa bish konin dohonam ke haapade. Yesussa paanan yivaynaar yimal bish kenin yivonbee Yesus kembesana kinka bazindara sagadhen gonngalante kinin ardaamonbeam ke dhesade.
43006023	Ko dahaannaar waani bazindara sagadhayna gonngalana Thibiriyadoos katamara utayse Yesus Barjoam gobshayse eenam balashan kinin kunson raqinte ke nivade.
43006024	Eeno Yesusbee kisa paanan yivayna eenabe raqin ogote kenin qolmonam yinin haapon wodanka, igina bazindara sagadhayna gonngalanar ardayse Yesusam zagate Qipirnaahoomdar ke yivade.
43006025	Bazinsa saabar kiam yinin haapenka, "Woam Dhettsea, kote haa nivaa?" kina ke hamade.
43006026	Yesusaar kena yin ki giyade: "Inta yena gon ida giye: Iam yenin zagayno balashanam yenin itsonnabee yenin mishonnabene; tarshen yerinam yenin haaponnatehe.
43006027	Ko dahaannaar, inta Eedi Naas yena inin imen, rooro wul lay dehen sadanna maaten galanna waadadhee; kayen galanna waadadheebhode. Barjo Imba iam yinin nittsonam dhaydine" kena ki hamade.
43006028	Ta keeda "Barjosa waadimanam waadadhana yer haroo waadadho?" hamayse kiam ke oysade.
43006029	Yesusaar "Barjosa waadimano yinne: Kinin yittsaadar woylamin ye qajene" hamayse kena ki maasade.
43006030	Kediar kina yin ke giyade: "Ta keeda koam shedayse hadar woylamin wonin qajoadettsi tarshea yer haraa wona waadadhe? Haraa wona haye?
43006031	'Kenin itsoadettsi cecira balasha kena ki imade' hamayse thaapadhondettsi ena wosa imbana darante manna hambhen galanam ke itsade" kina ke hamade.
43006032	Yesus "Inta yena gon ida giye: Gonin balashanam cecira yena imea Imbane; cecira balashanam yena imaa Musetehe.
43006033	Barjoyn imea balasha cecira hanchaa, peendar dohon eenna sadan imeane" kena ki hamade.
43006034	Ogonante "Imbo, balashan ogoam rooro wul wona imaa" kina ke hamade.
43006035	Yesusaar kena yin ki giyade: "Sadan imea balashaa intane; ikal nivea hamin ko dahaakaar daaqardhehe; pir idar woylamin qajea hamin ko dahaakaar dheebardhehe.
43006036	Ko dahaannaar yena inin giyaadettsi, yedi iam shedaysear idar woylamin qajeetene.
43006037	Imba ina kinin imoono wul ikal koda nive; ikal nivear hamin ko dahaakaar kiam mayanka bulattine.
43006038	Inta cecira inin nivoono iam nittsaasa bhocchinam hayanane; isa bhocchinam hayana nivaatine.
43006039	Iam nittsaasa bhocchinoar ina kinin imaana eenasa kala hattear inin kaysoamadettsibee macchin rooroakaar keam dembhira inin dhaasoadettsibene.
43006040	Imbasa bhocchino Naasaam shedayse kidar woylamin qajea rooro wul lay dehen sadanam kinin haapoadettsine; intaar macchin rooroaka kiam dembhira dhaasayda dhaase" kena ki hamade.
43006041	Ogonante Yesus "Cecira hanchaa balasha intane" kinin hamon goynka Ayiwd eena kidar gundumite
43006042	yin ke giyade: "Agaa Yoseep naasa Yesustayu? Imbaabee indanbe wonin dhesaynatayu? Ta keeda 'Cecira i nivade' hamayse hamin ki yin giyaa?" ke hamade.
43006043	Yesusaar kena yi giyna: "Kinka kikal gundumeebhode.
43006044	Iam nittsaa Imba yiam eelaamma ikal nivana damea qolehe; intaar macchin rooroaka kiam dembhira dhaasayda dhaase.
43006045	'Kedi wul Barjokalanka dhesaana keda maate' hamayse Barjokala qansayse eenna giyaynasa mathaapinte thaapadhidine; ta keeda Imbakalanka qansayse dhesaana wul ikal keda nive.
43006046	Yin giyntano Imbaam haapaa eedi daane hamintatehe; Imbaam haapaa Barjokalanka nivaa kidi bishne.
43006047	Inta yena gon ida giye: Idar woylamin qajeasa rooro wul lay dehea sada kisa daane.
43006048	Sadan imea balasha intane.
43006049	Yesa imbana darante mannan hambhen galanam ke itsade; ko dahaannaar kedi diydine.
43006050	Cecira taaki hanchaa balashaa kaane; agaa balashaam itsaa ea rooro wul dembhi diyehe.
43006051	Cecira hanchaa sadan imea balashaa intane; agaa balashaam itsea rooro wul lay dehen sadanka kida dee. Peendar dohon eenna sada konin maatoadettsi inin imayno balashano isa waanone" kena ki hamade.
43006052	Ogona Ayiwd eena "Kaa ea kisa waanam wonin itsoadettsi hamin ki wona imana dame?" hamayse kinka palimite ke dahade.
43006053	Ogonante Yesus kena yin ki giyade: "Inta yena gon ida giye: Eedi Naasisa waanam ye itsaamma, kisa zombhinamaar ye wucaamma, sada yesa qolehe.
43006054	Isa waanam itseabee isa zombhinam wuceabesa rooro wul lay dehea sada kisa daane; intaar macchin rooroaka kiam dembhira dhaasayda dhaase.
43006055	Isa waano gon hama galane; isa zombhinoar gon hama wucadheane.
43006056	Isa waanam itseabee isa zombhinam wuceabe inka kida dee; intaar kanka ida dee.
43006057	Sadan imea Imba iam kinin nittsondettsibee inta kinnon goynka sadaka inin dohondettsibe, isa waanam itsea pir innon goynka sadaka kida dee.
43006058	Ta keeda cecira hanchaa balasha kaane. Ena wosa imbana darante mannan hambhen galanam itsayse kenin diyondettsitehe; balashan koam itsea rooro wul lay dehen sadanka kida dee" kena ki hamade.
43006059	Yesus ogoam kinin giyoono Qipirnaahoom Ayiwd eensa bukin raqinte eenam yinin dhettsenkane.
43006060	Yesussa paanan yivayna eenasa thoothina eena kinin giyenam yinin qansenka, "Dhalqa kaa kattsi dethane; hayne tiyana damea?" ke hamade.
43006061	Yesusaar yisa paanan yivayna dhalqin ogoka kenin gundumonam yisa woylaminka dhesayse, "Dhalqa kaa yena goa maatidu?
43006062	Ta keeda Eedi Naas birayse yinin dohondar maatate tura kinin yivenam ye haapidianna, yedi haminee giye?
43006063	Sadan imayno Manpas Gazanone; eedisa kanta yer harrnaar pootehe. Inin yena giyoono upsino sadan imen Manpasinam bavaynone.
43006064	Ko dahaannaar yesa iira inin giyenam gonne hamayse tiymina daane" kena ki hamade. Yesus ogoam kinin giyoono gonne hamayse tiymina haybe kenin dohonbee yettsate imea hay kinin dohonbeam birara yedayse yinin dhesonnane.
43006065	Yesus tapir " 'Barjo Imba ikal ki nive ki hayaamma, ikal hayyear nivana damehe' hamayse inin yena giyoono ogonane" kena ki hamade.
43006066	Ogo wodanka kisa paanan yivayna eensa shaarira thoothina eena budoka ke maatade; ogora yedayse kimbesana kinka yivanam ke garade.
43006067	Yesusaar tabhi lamaana yisa paanan yivaynana "Yediar ta ikala yivana zagee zago?" kena ki hamade.
43006068	Simoon Bhethiroos yi giyna: "Imbo, wodi haydaroo yivo? Rooro wul lay dehen sadan imea upsi hakal daane.
43006069	Barjoyn qaadhaa Gazaa Ea hanin maatonam gonne hamayse wodi tiydine; dhesidine" hamayse kina ki maasade.
43006070	Yesusaar "Ye tabhi lamaanaam kamaa intatayu? Yesa iira kalaa Seethaanne" kena ki hamade.
43006071	Ogoam kinin giyoonoar Asqoronto peen ea Simoon naasa Yiwdasane; kidi tabhi lamaanasa kalaa dahayse os birante Yesusam yettsate kinin imennane.
43007001	Ogosa budonte Yesus Yiwda peente yaayana yinin nashaamonna, Galila peente kida yaaye. Harrna hambhidianna, Ayiwd eenam entsayna kiam deesana kenin zagennane.
43007002	Ayiwd eensaar baarante dooqayse gobshadhayno bavallo ko yeskade.
43007003	Ogonante Yesussa indanaana kina yi giyna: "Hambesana yivayna thoothina eena hanin waadadhen tarshen waadimanam kenin shedoadettsi kora dhaabhayse Yiwda peendar yivaa.
43007004	Harrna hambhidianna, eenkal dhesadhana zagea waadiman yinnonam aachika waadadhehe; yaar iginaam hanin waadadhenna, peendar dohon eenna haam dhahaa" kina ke hamade.
43007005	Kisa indanaana ogoam kenin giyoono kedi yina kidar woylamin kenin qajaamonnane.
43007006	Yesus "Isa wodano akar yeskadehe; yena wodano wul agoonone.
43007007	Peendar dohon eeno yeam jibbana damehe; iam jibba ko jibbe. Harrna hambhidianna, inta eensa waadimano siya konin dohonam kodar inin tarjennane.
43007008	Yedi ogo bavaalindar yivee; isa wodano akar konin yeskaamonna, inta [akar] bavaalindar yivattine" kena ki hamade.
43007009	Ogoam kena yin giyayse Galila peente ki shidhade.
43007010	Kisa indanaana bavaalindar kenin yivonsa budonte, Yesus may dayma aadhimeka ogo bavaalindar ki yivade.
43007011	Ayiwd eenam entsaynaar "Kidi hamote ki dahaa?" hamayse bavaalin gobshota nivon eensa shaarinte zagite ke dahade.
43007012	Zarsinsa shaarinte kinnon goynsa thoothi gundume ko dahade. Waani eenaar "Kidi eedi payyane" kenin hamenka, waani eena "Aavav, kidi eenam kida dhaddhise" hante ke dahade.
43007013	Ko dahaannaar eeno Ayiwd eenam entsaynana yinin kurtumbhonna, hayyear kisa may giyehe.
43007014	Taar baarante dooqayse bavaalin gobshadhayna rooronasa gidi lamante Yesus Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayante yivayse eenam dhettsan ki yedade.
43007015	Ayiwd eenam entsaynaar "Ea kaa yiggin timmirinam timmirima ko wulam hamin ki dhesana damaa?" hamayse targadhite ke dahade.
43007016	Ogonante Yesus "Isa timmirino iam nittsaakalankane; ikalankatehe.
43007017	Iam nittsaa kinin giyonam hayana zagea hayyear ki hanna, ogono timmirino Barjokalanka haapadhoono way inta ikalanka inin giyaa konin maatonam kida dhese.
43007018	Yikalanka giyea yisa metensa gobshinam kida zage. Yiam nittsaasa gobshinam zagea ea kidi gonin eane; buuda kikal qolehe.
43007019	Muse yigginam yena imittayu? Ko dahaannaar yesa shaarira yigginam toolea eedi kala hattear qolehe. Ta deesana iam harrnee zagaa?" kena ki hamade.
43007020	Eenoar kina yinin maasenka, "Beero hadar dahade! Hayne haam deesana zagea?" ke hamade.
43007021	Yesusaar kena yi giyna: "Inta yer kalaa i waadadhade; yedi wul yerin ogoam shedayse yeda targadhe.
43007022	Muse qaaman taxadhensa gilonam yena ki imade; ogono gilono konin nivoono wosa imbanakalankane, Musekalankatehe. Yedi ukunsen rooroakaar eensa qaamanam yeda taxe.
43007023	Ta keeda Musesa yiggino konin shidhoamadettsi eensa qaamanam ukunsen rooroaka taxadhidianna, inta ukunsen rooroaka eensa bishin wulam inin pacchonna, iam wacimee wacimo?
43007024	Pirdinam tipamoka pirdee; eedisa woti shedayse pirdeebhode" kena ki hamade.
43007025	Keeda Yerusaalem eensa shaarira waani waani eena "Hayonayn deesanna zagea ea kaatayu?
43007026	Marrato! Kidi yisa dhalqinam may hayayse kida giye; kediar kikal yer kala hattear giyehe. Way ea kaa Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoos kinin dohonam hayona gon kiam kedi dhesidu?
43007027	Ko dahaannaar ea kaa hamora kinin nivonam dhesooda dhese; Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoosin nivenka, hamora kinin nivonam hayyear kiam dhesehe" ke hamade.
43007028	Ogonante Yesus Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayante eenam yinin dhettsenka upsi gebhika "Iam dheseeda dhese; hamora inin nivonam dheseeda dhese. Isa bhocchika nivaatine. Iam nittsaa gon hamaane. Ko dahaannaar yedi kiam dhesattene.
43007029	Inta kiam dhesayda dhese. Harrna hambhidianna, iam ki nittsaysaka kikalanka i nivade" hamayse ki giyade.
43007030	Ogonante hayona kiam yedana ke zagade; ko dahaannaar kisa wodano akar yeskaamonna, hayyear kiam yedadehe.
43007031	Eensa iira thoothino eeno kidar woylamin ko qajade. "Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoos yinin nivon wodanka, ea kaanin waadadhaana tarshayna yerradara sagi waadadhok?" hamayse ke giyade.
43007032	Thoothino eeno kinnon goynka konin gundumenka Parisa eena ke qansade; ogonante gudullasa hayonabee Parisa eenabe Yesusam kenin yedoadettsi yisa poolisanaam ke yittsade.
43007033	Ogo wodanka Yesus "Likka wodana yembesana kinka ida dee; ogosa budonte iam nittsaadar ida yive.
43007034	Iam zageeda zage, iam haapattene; inin dohon raqinte yedi nivana damattene" kena ki hamade.
43007035	Ogonante Ayiwd eensa entsana yin ke giyade: "Wonin kiam haapoamadettsi ea kaa hamodar yivana ki haye? Way Ayiwdtay hamon eensa shaarinte wanthimayse dahaana Ayiwd eenakal yivayse Ayiwdtay hamon eenam dhettsana ki hayo?
43007036	Kidiar 'Iam zageeda zage, haapattene; inin dohon raqinte nivana damattene' hamayse kinin giyoono upsino kisa hamin giyntane?" hamayse kinka kikal ke dhalqade.
43007037	Bavaalinsa macchea rooroa gebhaaka Yesus woyayse, "Hayyear dheebardhaa dahaa yi hanna, ikal nivayse ki wuce.
43007038	Idar woylamin qajea Mathaap Gazanin giyendettsi sadan imayno noqono kisa iira koda ele" hamayse upsi gebhika ki giyade.
43007039	Ogoam kinin giyoonoar kidar woylamin qajayna kenin tiyen Manpas Gazan goynsane. Yesus akar kinin gobshaamonna, Manpas Gazano akar eendar hanchadehe.
43007040	Ogonante eensa iira waani eeno dhalqin ogoam yinin qansen wodanka, "Kaa gon 'niva ki nive' hambhea Barjokala qansayse eenna giyeane" ke hamade.
43007041	Waani eeno "Kaa Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoosne" ke hamade. Waani eeno tapir "Gon Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoos Galila peera niva ki nivo?
43007042	Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoos Dawtsa muldhara kinin adhadhendettsibee Dawtin adhadhon kataman Betelemra kinin nivendettsibe Mathaap Gazante thaapadhittayu?" ke hamade.
43007043	Ogonante kinnon goynka eensa shaarinte edime ko dhaabhade.
43007044	Kesa shaarira waani waani eeno yedana kiam ke zagade; ko dahaannaar hayyear kiam yedadehe.
43007045	Gudullasa hayonabee Parisa eenabekal poolisana maatate ke nivade. Gudullasa hayonabee Parisa eenabe "Yedi kiam harrnee bavima garaa?" kena ke hamade.
43007046	Poolisanaar "Ea agaanin giyendettsi eedi hayyear giyayse dhesehe" hamayse kena ke maasade.
43007047	Parisa eena, "Yedi keeda taysee taysadhaaw?
43007048	Hayona eenasa way Parisa eensa shaarira kidar woylamin qajaa daaw?
43007049	Ko dahaannaar Musesa yigginam dhesimino eeno ogono ashadhoonone" hamayse kena ke maasade.
43007050	Parisa eenasa kalaa kosa birayse Yesuskal nivaa Niqodimos yi giyna:
43007051	"Wonnon yigginka eedi kalaa birayse kinin giyenam qansimabee har kinin waadadhonam dhesimabe kidar pirda ko pirdadho?" kena ki hamade.
43007052	Kediar kina yi giyna: "Yaar Galila peeraw? Barjokala qansayse eenna giyea Galila peera kinin dhaabhiminam marmarayse dhesaa!" kina ke hamade.
43007053	[Ogora kedi wul yisa onnadar ke yivade.
43008001	Yesus raqin ogora dhaabhayse, Dabirezayt dhukandar ki yivade.
43008002	Burin sedhiman Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayante maatate ki nivade; eeno wulaar kikal ko nivade; kidiar dooqayse keam dhettsite ki dahade.
43008003	Musesa yigginam dhettsaynabee Parisa eenabe sharmucimakkoka yedadhon edonam kikal bavate nivayse eensa shaarinte koam woysayse,
43008004	"Dhettsea, edon koam sharmucimakko ko hayaka ko yedadhade.
43008005	Muse ogodettsi sharmucimakkon hayen edonam seenika paxate wonin deesoadettsi yigginte wona giydine; ya ta kosa haminaa giye?" kina ke hamade.
43008006	Ogono kenin giyoono kiam bersana goyti haapana zagayse kiam taysayse ke shedade. Yesusaar yirk hamayse yisa aaninka peendar ki thaapade.
43008007	Maasayse maasayse kiam kenin oysenka, tura dheg hamayse, "Yesa shaarira seesoysa qolmaa birayse koam seenika ki paxe" kena ki hamade.
43008008	Tapir yirk hamayse peendar ki thaapade.
43008009	Kediar dhalqin ogoam yinin qansen wodanka, donzanara yedayse agaa raqara kalaa kalaa yivate ke maqade; Yesusbee edonbe bish ke shidhade.
43008010	Ogosa budonte Yesus tura dheg hamayse, "Ya edono, haam bersayna eena hamote ke dahaa? Hadar pirdea eedi qolaaw?" kona ki hamade.
43008011	Kodiar "Imbo, eedi kala hattear qolehe" kina ko hamade. Yesusaar "Intaar hadar pirdattine. Yivaa; keeda kaara os seeso hayaabhode" kona ki hamade.]
43008012	Tapir Yesus eenna yi giyna: "Peen kodar dohon eensa shaakaa intane. Isa paanan nivea eana sadansa shaakano kina shaaka ko shaake; thipante yaayehe" hamayse kena ki giyade.
43008013	Parisa eenaar "Ya hannon metenna hada tarje; hasa tarjamonam gonne hamayse tiidhehe" kina ke hamade.
43008014	Yesusaar yin giyayse kena ki maasade: "Meten innonna i tarjina, hamora inin nivonbee hamodar inin yivenbeam inin dhesenna, isa tarjamono gonne. Yediar hamora inin nivonbee hamodar inin yivenbeam dhesattene.
43008015	Yedi eedi bhocchika pirdinam yeda pirde; inta eedi kaladar hattear pirdattine.
43008016	I pirdidianna, inta imal bish dayma, iam nittsaa Imba imbete kinin dohonna, isa pirdino gonne.
43008017	Eedi lamaasa tarjamono gonne hamayse konin tiidhayno yesa yigginte thaapadhidine.
43008018	Innon goynsa tarjea intane; iam nittsaa Imbaar innon goynsa kida tarje" kena ki hamade.
43008019	Kediar "Hamba hamote ki dahaa?" kina ke hamade. Yesusaar yin giyayse kena ki maasade: "Iamaar way Imbaamaar dhesattene; iam ye dhesidianna, Imbaamaar ini dheseeda dhese" ki hamade.
43008020	Yesus Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayante eenam yinin dhettsenka, koymon dhabadhen saathininkal theedi dahayse dhalqin ogoam ki giyade. Kisa wodano akar yeskaamonna, hayyear kiam yedadehe.
43008021	Yesus tapir "Yivayda yive; yediar iam zageeda zage; yesa seesonkaar diyeeda diye. Inin yiven raqindar yedi yivana damattene" kena ki hamade.
43008022	Ayiwd eenam entsaynaar " 'Inin yiven raqindar yedi yivana damattene' kinin hamoono yiam deesanaw? Haydhe!" ke hamade.
43008023	Yesusaar "Yedi choobarne, inta bhaabarne; yedi peen korane, inta peen koratehe.
43008024	Ta keeda 'Yedi yesa seesonka diyeeda diye' yena i hamade. Inta hay inin dohonam gonne hamayse ye tiyaamma, yedi yesa seesonka diyeeda diye" kena ki hamade.
43008025	Kediar "Ya hayne?" kina ke hamade. Yesusaar "Birara yedayse yena inin giyaadettsine.
43008026	Yesa inin giyeabee yennon goynsa inin pirdeabe thoothi yer daane. Ko dahaannaar, iam nittsaa gon hamaane; intaar kikala inin qanson ogoam peen kodar dohon eenna ida giye" kena ki hamade.
43008027	Kediar Imbaasa kena kinin giyenam dhesadehe.
43008028	Ogonante Yesus kena yin ki giyade: "Eedi Naasiam yenin ziiten wodanka, inta hay inin dohonbee, Imbaar iam kinin dhettsonam inin giyenbee, isa meteka yer kala hattear inin hayminbeam ogo wodanka dheseeda dhese.
43008029	Iam nittsaa imbesanane; inta kiam wozisenam rooro wul inin waadadhenna, imal iam garadehe" kena ki hamade.
43008030	Yesus dhalqin ogoam kinin giyenka, thoothino eeno kidar woylamin ko qajade.
43008031	Yesus yidar woylamin qajaana Ayiwd eenna, "Yedi isa upsinka dahaana ye hanna, gon isa paananka yivayna eenane.
43008032	Goninam dheseeda dhese, gonnoar worsho maatayse yenin deherra yeam bula ko bule" kena ki hamade.
43008033	Kediar kina yinin maasenka, "Wodi Abraamsa muldharane; eedi kalana hattear worsho maatootone. Ta ya 'Worsho maatayse yenin deherra yeam bula ko bule' hamayse haminaa wona giyaa?" kina ke hamade.
43008034	Yesus yin giyayse kena ki maasade: "Inta yena gon ida giye: Seeso waadadhea wul seesosa worshone.
43008035	Eedi worsho eedisa ooninte rooro wul dehehe; naasi yi hanna, rooro wul daa ki dee.
43008036	Ta keeda Naasa eedisa worsho maatayse yenin deherra yeam kinin bulenna, gon uteeda ute.
43008037	"Abraamsa muldhara yenin maatenam dhesayda dhese; ko dahaannaar isa upsinam yenin tiyaamonna, iam deesana yeda zage.
43008038	Inta Imbakal inin haaponam ida giye; yediar imbaa yenteakalanka yenin qansonam yeda waadadhe" kena ki hamade.
43008039	Kediar kina yinin maasenka, "Wosa imbaa Abraamne" kina ke hamade. Yesus kena yin ki giyade: "Abraam naana ye hanna, Abraamin waadadhen waadimanam ini yeda waadadhe.
43008040	Ko dahaannaar Barjokalanka inin qanson goninam yena giyea iam deesana yeda zage; Abraam yin hayadehe.
43008041	Yedi imbaa yenteasa waadimanam yeda waadadhe" kena ki hamade. Kediar "Wodi baskamoka adhadhootone. Imba kalaa wosa daane; kidiar Barjone" kina ke hamade.
43008042	Yesusaar kena yin ki giyade: "Barjo yesa Imba ki hanna, iam ini nasheeda nashe. Harrna hambhidianna, inta Barjokalanka i nivade; kidi iam ki nittsade; inta innon bhocchinka nivaatine.
43008043	Inin giyenam yenin bhocchimino harrnane? Isa upsinam qansana yenin damaamonnane.
43008044	Yedi yesa imbaa Seethaankalankane; kisa anngarmanam waadadhana yeda nashe. Kidi ena birara yedayse eediam deeseane; gonin kikal qolmonna, kidi goninka woyadehe. Buudaabee buudansa imbaa yinin dohonna, buudanam yinin giyenka yisa bhocchira kida giye.
43008045	Intaar goninam inin giyenna, inin giyenam gonne hamayse tiyattene.
43008046	Yesa iira 'Ya seeso haydine' hamayse ina dhiidhimea hayne? Ta goninam giyea i hanna, inin giyenam harrnee tiyan garaa?
43008047	Barjo naas maataa Barjosa upsinam kida qanse; yenin qansimino Barjosa naasi yenin dahaamonnane" kena ki hamade.
43008048	Ayiwd eenam entsaynaar kina yi giyna: " 'Ya Sammaria eedine; beero hadar dahade' wosa hamintano gontayu?" kina ke hamade.
43008049	Yesusaar kena yinin maasenka, "Idar beero qolehe. Ko dahaannaar inta Imbaam ida gobshe; yediar iam yeda bage.
43008050	Intaar isa gobshinam zagattine. Inin gobshadhoadettsi zagea daane; pirdea kidine.
43008051	Inta yena gon ida giye: Inin giyen upsinam toolea hayyear dembhi diyehe" ki hamade.
43008052	Ayiwd eenam entsaynaar "Beero hadar dohonam ta wodi dhesidine. Abraamaar diydine; Barjokala qansayse eenna giyaynaar diydine. Ya 'Inin giyen upsinam toolea dembhi diyehe' hada hame.
43008053	Ta ya wosa imbaa Abraamdaraar sagaa sago? Kidi diydine; Barjokala qansayse eenna giyaynaar diydine; ya haam hayyea hame?" kina ke hamade.
43008054	Yesusaar yin giyayse kena ki maasade: "Inta iam i gobshina, isa gobshino pootehe. Iam gobshea 'Kidi wosa Barjoane' yenin hamea Imbane.
43008055	Yedi kiam dheseetene; inta kiam dhesayda dhese. 'Kiam dhesattine' i hamidianna, ini yedettsi buuda eedi i maatade. Ko dahaannaar kiam dhesayda dhese; kisa upsinam toolayda toole.
43008056	Yesa imbaa Abraam isa rooronam anngardhite shedana kattsi wozadhite ki dahade; ogoraar shedayse ki wozadhade" ki hamade.
43008057	Ayiwd eenam entsayna "Ya akar eedi lamaa kaysa apo tabhi leveysa maataama ea Abraamam ya haapidu?" kina ke hamade.
43008058	Yesusaar "Inta yena gon ida giye: Abraam adhadhima birayse inta daane" kena ki hamade.
43008059	Ogonante kiam paxayse deesana seeni ke tiyade; Yesusaar kekalanka aadhimbhayse Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayara utayse ki yivade.
43009001	Yesus goynka kinin yivenka, aapi kaya dahayse adhadhaa eedi kalaam ki haapade.
43009002	Yesussa paanan yivaynaar Yesuskal "Woam Dhettsea, ea kaa aapi kaya dahayse kinin adhadhoadettsi seeson hayaa hayne? Kidimoo? Kiam adhaana eenaw?" hamayse kiam ke oysade.
43009003	Yesusaar kena yinin maasenka, "Barjosa waadimanam kanka konin dhesadhoadettsine; kidi way kiam adhaana eena seeso kenin hayonnatehe.
43009004	Rooron daaka iam nittsaasa waadimanam haya iam koda zaske; hayyear waadadhana kinin damimino sooti niva ko nive.
43009005	Peendar inin dohonka, peendar dohon eensa shaakaa intane" ki hamade.
43009006	Ogoam yinin giyonsa budonte yirk hamayse pathika peenam capshayse aapin kaya easa aapinam ki qadhade.
43009007	Ogora eana "Yivayse Seeloom dalbante shiidhaa" kina ki hamade. "Seeloom" hamintano "nittsadhaa" hamintane. Ogonante ea yivayse yisa aapinam shiidhayse, shedada ki nivade.
43009008	Kisa gurdan eenabee birayse yer ki miskaka kiam shedaana eenabe "Kaa ea dooqayse miskimeatayu?" ke hamade.
43009009	Waani eena "Kaa kidine" ke hamade; waani eena "Aavav, kaa kiam kida maate, kiditehe" ke hamade. Kidiar "Intane" kena hamite ki dahade.
43009010	Eenaar "Ta keeda aapino hanno hamin hayayse ko shedaa?" kina ke hamade.
43009011	Kidiar kena yinin maasenka, "Yesus hambhea ea peenam pathika capshayse isa aapinam qadhayse, 'Seeloom yivayse shiidhaa' ina ki hamade; intaar yivayse i shiidhade; isa aapinoar ko shedade" kena ki hamade.
43009012	Kediar "Ea agaa ta hamote ki dahaa?" ke hamade. Kidiar "Hamote kinin dohonam inta dhesattine" ki hamade.
43009013	Kedi ena aapin kayaa eam Parisa eenakal entsate ke yivade.
43009014	Yesus peenam pathika capshayse easa aapindar qadhayse kinin pacchoono wodano Ayiwd eensa ukunsen rooroakane.
43009015	Ogonante Parisa eena "Hamin hayaysea shedaa?" hamayse pir kiam ke oysade. Kidiar "Pee caapi tiyayse isa aapindar ki qadhaysaka shiidhayse i shedade" kena ki hamade.
43009016	Ogonante Parisa eensa shaarira waani eena "Ea agaa ukunsen rooroam kinin gobshiminna, kidi Barjokalankatehe" ke hamade. Waani eena tapir "Kidi seeso eedi ki hanna, ogodettsi tarshayna yerraam hamin ki waadadhana dame?" ke hamade. Ogoka kesa shaarinte edime ko dhaabhade.
43009017	Ogona yisa aapin kayaa eana "Aapin hannon kinin pacchonna, ya ea agaasa hamina giye?" hamayse tapir kiam ke oysade. Kidiar "Barjokala qansayse eenna giyeane" kena ki hamade.
43009018	Ayiwd eenam entsaynaar kiam adhaana eenaam eelayse keam oysate yinin dhesenka yekka, kidi ena aapi kaya kinin dohonbee ta kinin shedenbeam gonne hamayse kedi tiyadehe.
43009019	Ogonante kisa imbanana yi giyna: "Yedi 'Aapi kaya maatayse ki adhadhade' yenin hamea yesa naasa kaa kidiw? Ta hamin hayayse ki shedaa?" hamayse keam ke oysade.
43009020	Kedi imbanaar "Kaa wosa naasi kinin dohonbee ena aapi kaya maatayse kinin adhadhonbeam wodi dhesooda dhese.
43009021	Ko dahaannaar ta hamin hayayse kinin shedonam dhesattone; aapinam kisaar hayn pacchonam wodi dhesattone. Yedi kiam oysee. Kidi eedi gebhine; yinnon metensa yinti giyana dama ki dame" kena ke hamade.
43009022	Imbana yin kenin giyoono Ayiwd eenam entsaynana yinin kurtumbhonnane. Harrna hambhidianna, " 'Yesus Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoosne' hamayse tarjea eedi daa ki hanna, bukin raqira bulooda bule" hamayse Ayiwd eenam entsayna birayse kinka kenin dhalqonnane.
43009023	Ogona kisa imbana "Kidi eedi gebhine; kiam oysee" ke hamade.
43009024	Ogonante aapin kayaa eam lansi eelayse, "Ya gon giyayse Barjoam gobshaa! Ea agaa seeso eedi kinin maatonam wodi kiam dhesooda dhese" kina ke hamade.
43009025	Kidi kena yinin maasenka, "Seeso eedi kinin maatonam inta dhesattine; inta yer kalaa ida dhese. Ogonoar isa aapin kayon konin shedoadettsi kinin hayonam bish ida dhese" ki hamade.
43009026	Kediar tapir "Hana har ki hayaa? Aapin hannonam hamin hayayse ki pacchaa?" kina ke hamade.
43009027	Kidiar kena yinin maasenka, "Ini birayse yena inta giydine; yedi qanseetene. Pir qansana harrnee zagaa? Yediar kisa paanan yivayna eena maatana zagee zago?" kena ki hamade.
43009028	Kediar kiam iirayse, "Ya ea agaasa paanan yiveane; wodi Musesa paanan yivaynane.
43009029	Barjo Musena kinin giyonam dhesooda dhese; ea kaa hamora kinin dohonam dhesattone" kina ke hamade.
43009030	Ear kena yin ki giyade: "Yedi hamora kinin dohonam yenin dhesaammo ogono tarshea yerne. Kidi isa aapinam pacchidine.
43009031	Barjoam kurtumbheabee Barjosa bhocchinam waadadheabe kinin giyenam Barjo qansa ki qanse; seeson eenaam Barjoyn qansiminam dhesooda dhese.
43009032	'Aapi kaya maatayse adhadhaa eediam pacchaa daane' hambhenam peen pijadhorra yedayse qansadhadehe.
43009033	Ea agaa Barjokala yi dahaamma, ini yer kalaar waadadhana damehe" kena ki hamade.
43009034	Kediar "Ya seesoka dahayse adhadhaa woama dhettso?" hamayse bukin raqira kiam ke bulade.
43009035	Eam bukin raqira kenin bulonam Yesus qansidine. Kiam yinin haapenka, "Ya Eedi Naasdar woylamin qajaa qajo?" kina ki hamade.
43009036	Kidiar "Imbo, kidar woylamin inin qajoadettsi kidi hayne?" ki hamade.
43009037	Yesusaar kina yi giyna: "Ya kiam haapidine; taar hambesana kinka dhalqea kidine" kina ki hamade.
43009038	Kidiar "Imbo, inta hadar woylamin qajayda qaje" hamayse kina ki goodimade.
43009039	Yesusaar "Aapin kayaana kenin shedoadettsi, aapin yisa shedaynaar shedimina kenin maatoadettsi inta peen kodar inin nivoono eenam kikala edanane" ki hamade.
43009040	Parisa eensa shaarira kimbesana kinka dahaana ogoam qansayse, "Ta wodiar aapiysa shediminaw?" kina ke hamade.
43009041	Yesusaar kena yin ki giyade: "Yedi aapiysa shedimina ye hanna, ini seeso yena maatehe; ta keeda 'Shedooda shede' yenin hamonna, seeso eedi maatayse shidheeda shidhe" kena ki hamade.
43010001	Yesus "Inta yena gon ida giye: Yaana kerinka ardima goyti abka ardea ea diibibee buurate itseabene.
43010002	Kerinka ardea ea yaanaam gisheane.
43010003	Kerin toolea kina kerinam kida bule. Yaanaar kisa upsinam qansa ke qanse. Kidiar yisa yaanaam kesa naabenka eelada keam mayanka kida bule.
43010004	Yisa yaana wulam yinin bulonsa budonte kesa birante kida yive; yaanaar kisa upsinam yinin dhesenna, kisa paanan keda yive.
43010005	Eedi absa upsinam kenin dhesiminna, kikala goba ke gobe; hamin ko dahaakaar kisa paanan yivehe" kena ki hamade.
43010006	Yesus kamsin ogoam kena ki giyade; kedi kinin giyonam bhocchadehe.
43010007	Ogonante Yesus tapir "Inta yena gon ida giye: Yaanasa kerea intane.
43010008	I nittsima iam birayse nivaana wul diibibee buurate itsea eedibene; ko dahaannaar yaana kesa upsinam qansadehe.
43010009	Kerea intane; inka ardea kidi dhaqa ki dhaqe. Arda ki arde; uta ki ute; yinin itsenam kida haape.
43010010	"Diibin nivayno diibanabee, taxanabee, kaysanabe bishne. Inin nivoono sada kenin haapoadettsibee ogono sadano kena konin thoothoadettsibene.
43010011	Payyan gishiman gishea intane. Payyan gishiman gishea yisa sadanam yaanana hamayse saskate kida ime.
43010012	Yaanasa imba maataama gishea ea yaayoayn nivonam yinin haapen wodanka, yaanaam garayse kida gobe; yaayoar keam yeda ki yede; yaanaamaar kikalanka thar thar kida haye.
43010013	Gishea ea yaanaam garayse kinin gobayno yaana kinti kenin dahaamonnabee yaanana yinin burqadhiminnabene.
43010014	-
43010015	"Payyan gishiman gishea intane. Barjo Imbaar iam dhesendettsi, intaar Barjo Imbaam inin dhesendettsi, isa yaanaam dhesayda dhese; isa yaanaar iam dhesa ke dhese. Isa sadanam kena hamayse saskate ida ime.
43010016	Kina yaanasa iir qolmina yaati ab isa daane; keamaar tapir bava iam koda zaske. Isa upsinam qansa ke qanse. Kedi zelen kallon yaana keda maate; keam gishea eedi kalaane.
43010017	"Isa sadanam maasate dhaasana dembhinna saskate imayda ime; ogonante Imbaa iam kida nashe.
43010018	Inta isa sadanam saskate inti ida ime; ikalanka koam hayyear tiyehe. Isa sadanam imanabee maasate tiyanabe isa hayamo daane; ko upsinam inin tiyoono Imbakalankane" ki hamade.
43010019	Igina upsinaka Ayiwd eenam entsaynasa shaarinte tapir edime ko dhaabhade.
43010020	Kesa shaarira thoothino eeno "Rum kidar daane; kidi bardhidine. Kinin giyenam harrnee qanse?" ke hamade.
43010021	Waani eenoar "Igina upsina rum yindar dahaa eedisa upsitehe; rum aapin kayaanasa aapinam pacchana dama ko damo?" ke hamade.
43010022	Yerusaalem gidir Barjosa gazan ooninam minngamora gazisadhaana rooronaam gobshadhayno bavallo ko yeskade; ogono wodanoar bargi wodane.
43010023	Yesusaar Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayante Solomoon baaransa demenka yaayte ki dahade.
43010024	Ayiwd eenam entsaynaar kisa gasante bukayse, "Hamaaka yekka qothimaate haam wo toolo? Ya Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoos ha daana, may wona giyaa!" kina ke hamade.
43010025	Yesusaar kena yinin maasenka, "Inta yena giydine; yediar inin giyonam gonne hamayse tiyeetene. Inta Imbasa naabenka inin waadadhayno waadimano ina koda tarje.
43010026	Yediar isa yaana yenin dahaamonna, isa dhalqinam gonne hamayse tiyattene.
43010027	Isa yaana isa upsinam qansa ke qanse; intaar keam dhesayda dhese; isa paananka niva ke nive.
43010028	Intaar rooro wul lay dehen sadanam kena ida ime; kedi rooro wul lay kayehe. Isa aanira hayyear keam sarate tiyehe.
43010029	Keam ina imaa Imba wuldara saga ki sage; Imbasaar aanira keam sarate tiyana damea hayyear qolehe.
43010030	Imbee Imbabe wodi kalaane" kena ki hamade.
43010031	Ayiwd eenam entsayna Yesusam paxana pir seeni ke tiyade.
43010032	Yesus "Imbakalanka thoothi payya waadimanam yena i dhahade; igina waadimanasa waadima hamaasa iam ye paxe?" hamayse keam ki oysade.
43010033	Ayiwd eenam entsaynaar "Haam wonin paxayno hasa payyan waadimanna dayma, Barjoam hanin iirennane; ogonoar ya eedi dahayse haam Barjo hanin hayonnane" hamayse kina ke maasade.
43010034	Yesusaar yin giyayse kena ki maasade: "Yesa yigginte 'Yedi barjonane i hamade' hamayse Barjoyn giyoono thaapadhittayu?
43010035	Mathaap Gazanam ookana damimehe. Barjosa upsinin yina nivaana eenaka 'Yedi barjonane' Barjo keam hamidi ki hanna,
43010036	'Inta Barjo Naasane' inin hamonna, yedi Imba kinin gazisaa, peen kodar kinin nittsaa 'Barjoam hada iire' hamayse haminee iam giyaa?
43010037	Inta Imbasa waadimanam i waadadhiminna, iam gonne hamayse tiyeebhode.
43010038	Imbasa waadimanam i waadadhea hanna, iam gonne hamayse ye tiyaammaar, isa waadimanam gonne hamayse tiyee. Imba inka kinin dohonbee intaar Imbaka inin dohonbeam ogoka payya hayayse dheseeda dhese" kena ki hamade.
43010039	Kediar tapir kiam yedana ke zagade; kidiar kekalanka dhaqate ki yivade.
43010040	Yesus Wannisin birayse eenaam kinin shivon Yordaanoos baynsa saabar tapir yivayse raqin ogotear ki dooqade.
43010041	Thoothino eenoar kikal ko nivade. Kediar "Wannis tarshea yer kala hattear waadadhadehe; ko dahaannaar Wannis ea agaasa kinin giyoono wul gonne" hamite ke dahade.
43010042	Ogo raqinte thoothino eeno Yesusdar woylamin ko qajade.
43011001	Mayriyambee indanaan Martabeyn dohon Bitaania gurdante dehea Alaazar hambhea eedi kalaa hajadhayse ki dahade.
43011002	Mayriyamaar Imbaa wontea Yesussa roonam gaamen shittonka qadhayse meten sitinka qodoonone; hajadhaa Alaazaraar kosa indanaasane.
43011003	Ogonante Mayriyambee Martabe "Imbo, hanin nashea hajadhidine" hamayse apo Yesusdar ke yittsade.
43011004	Yesusaar upsin ogoam qansayse, "Burqono ogono Barjo Naasayn yinka gobshadhoadettsi Barjosa gobshinnane; dembhina yeskiseatehe" ki hamade.
43011005	Yesus Martabee, indanaan Mayriyambee, Alaazarbeam kida nashe.
43011006	Kidi yinin dahaa raqate Alaazarsa burqonam qansayse rooro lamaa ki dooqade.
43011007	Ogosa budonte yisa paanan yivaynakal "Tapir Yiwda peendar wo yive" kena ki hamade.
43011008	Kisa paanan yivayna eenaar "Woam Dhettsea, rooro likkasa birayse Ayiwd eenam entsayna seenika paxate haam deesana ke zagade; tapir ya ogodar yivaa yivo?" kina ke hamade.
43011009	Yesusaar kena yinin maasenka, "Rooro kalaasa dahaana savaatina tabhi lamaatayu? Rooronka yaayea eedi dahaa ki hanna, peen kosa shaakanka kinin shedenna goa kiam qanehe.
43011010	Sootinka yaayea ki hanna, shaakayn kisa qolmonna, goa kiam qana ko qane" kena ki hamade.
43011011	Kena yin yinin giyonsa budonte "Wosa nashoa Alaazar raatidine; ko dahaannaar kiam raatira dhaasana ida yive" kena ki hamade.
43011012	Kisa paanan yivayna eena "Ta keeda Imbo, yi raatidianna, paasha ki paashe" kina ke hamade.
43011013	Yesusaar Alaazarsa dembhin goynsa ki giyade; kediar raat kinin raatonsa kinin giyea kena ko maatade.
43011014	Ogo wodanka Yesus kena may "Alaazar diydine.
43011015	Yedi idar woylamin yenin qajoadettsi konin hayenna raqin ogote inin dahaamonna, yenante ida wozadhe. Ta keeda kikal wo yive" kena ki hamade.
43011016	Ogonante Didimos hambhea Toomaase Yesussa paanan yivayna yettsinakal "Kimbesana diyota wodiar wo yive" kena ki hamade.
43011017	Yesusin nivenka, Alaazar duukadhaysaka rooro oydi konin maatonam ki qansade.
43011018	Bitaania Yerusaalemkala kilometir makkamaddha koda pegadhe.
43011019	Ayiwd eensaar thoothina eena Martabee Mayriyambesa indanaasasa dembhin goynsa keam wocchinsana kekal nivayse ke dahade.
43011020	Martaar Yesusin nivonam yinin qansenka, kiam chocchana ko utade; Mayriyamaar ooninte dooqayse ko dahade.
43011021	Martaar Yesusna "Imbo, ha ini kote daana, indanaasa diyehe.
43011022	Ta Barjoam hanin misken wulam Barjo hana kinin imenam dhesayda dhese" kina ko hamade.
43011023	Yesusaar "Hambanaasa dembhira kida dhaabhe" kona ki hamade.
43011024	Martaar "Dembhira dhaabhadhen macchin rooroaka kinin dhaabhenam dhesayda dhese" kina ko hamade.
43011025	Yesusaar kona "Eenaam dembhira dhaaseabee kena dehen sadan imeabe intane; idar woylamin qajea yi diyaakaar, sadaka daa ki dee.
43011026	Sadaka dahayse idar woylamin qajayna wul rooro wul dembhi diyehe. Ogoam gonne hamayse tiyaa tiyo?" ki hamade.
43011027	Kodiar "Ee, Imbo, ya 'Peen kodar niva ki nive' hambhaa Kiristoos, Barjo Naasa hanin dohonam gonne hamayse tiyayda tiye" kina ko hamade.
43011028	Ogoam kikal konin dhalqonsa budonte, yivayse yinnon indanaan Mayriyamam aachika eelayse, "Dhettsea nivayse haam kida eele" kona ko hamade.
43011029	Kodiar ogoam yinin qansenka, saanawa dhaabhayse Yesuskal ko yivade.
43011030	Yesusaar Martayn kikal keeron raqinte ki dahade; akar gurdandar ardadehe.
43011031	Koam wocchinsada kombesana kinka ooninte dahaana Ayiwd eenaar Mayriyam kekalanka saanawa utaate konin yivonam haapayse Alaazarsa duukin raqindar eepana konin yivea kena ko maataysaka, kedi kosa paananka ke yivade.
43011032	Mayriyam Yesuskal nivayse kiam yinin haapenka kisa roondar dhambayse, "Imbo, ha ini kote daana, indanaasa diyehe" kina ko hamade.
43011033	Yesusaar konin eepenkabee kombesana nivaana Ayiwd eenaar kenin eepenkabe keam shedayse, qaabonka yisa kattsi burqadhayse,
43011034	"Hamotee kiam duukaa?" kena ki hamade. Kediar "Imbo, shedota wombesana dhaabhaa" kina ke hamade.
43011035	Yesusaar ermitka ki eepade.
43011036	Ogonante Ayiwd eenaar "Hamin kiam kinin nashenam shedee" ke hamade.
43011037	Kesa shaarira waani eena "Ea kaa aapin kayaa easa aapinam pacchaa ta Alaazarin diyoamadettsi kiam hayano bashaw?" hamayse ke giyade.
43011038	Yesusaar pir yisa iinka kattsi burqadhaate duukindar ki yivade. Alaazarin duukadhoono qoopasa iirne; qoopansa aponam seenika ko shupadhade.
43011039	Yesus "Seeninam dhaasee" ki hamade. Diyaasaar indanaano Marta "Imbo, ki diyaysaka kina rooro oydi konin dohonna, coqima garehe" kina ko hamade.
43011040	Yesusaar "Idar woylamin ha qajidianna Barjosa gobshinam hanin haapenam hana giyaati?" kona ki hamade.
