43011041	Ogonante seeninam ke dhaasade. Yesusaar tura cecin shedayse, "Imbo, inin giyenam hanin qansonna haam ida gobshe.
43011042	Rooro wul inin giyenam hanin qansenam dhesayda dhese; ko dahaannaar iam hanin nittsonam isa gasante woyaana eena gonne hamayse kenin tiyoadettsi i giyade" hamayse ki miskade.
43011043	Yesus yin kinin giyonsa budonte upsi gebhika "Alaazar, ora utaa!" hamayse ki eelade.
43011044	Diyaa Alaazaraar kisa aaninbee roonbe dhaxadhonka duukira ki utade; kisa aapin kerroar apalanka ochadhondar ko dahade. Yesusaar "Kiam bulee; ki yive" kena ki hamade.
43011045	Ogonante Mayriyamkal nivaana eenasa shaarira Yesusin waadadhonam haapoono Ayiwd eensa thoothino eeno kidar woylamin ko qajade.
43011046	Waani waani eena Parisa eenakal yivayse Yesusin waadadhonam kena ke giyade.
43011047	Ogonante gudullasa hayonabee Parisa eenabe peensa donzanaam yikal pucchayse, "Ta hamino hayo? Ea kaa thoothi tarshea yer kida waadadhe.
43011048	Sun kiam wo garanna, eeno wul kidar woylamin koda qaje; ogona Roome eena nivayse Barjosa gazan ooninbee wosa eenbeam kaysa ke kayse" ke hamade.
43011049	Kesa iira kalaa, ogo wodanka gudullasa gebhaa maataa Qayappa kena yi giyna: "Yediar yer kala hattear dhesattene.
43011050	Wosa een wulin kayerra eedi kalaa wo wulna diydi ki hanna payya konin maatenam bhocchattenu?" kena ki hamade.
43011051	Ogoam kinin giyaynoar kisa bhocchinkatehe; ko dahaannaar ogo wodanka gudullasa gebha yinin dohonna, Yesus Ayiwd eenna kinin diyendettsi hamota dohonam ki giyade.
43011052	Ogonoar Yesussa dembhino Ayiwd eenna bishtehe; ko dahaannaar thar thar hamayse dahaana Barjo naana wulam pir raq kalaadar kinin pucchoadettsine.
43011053	Ogonante rooroa agaara yedayse kiam deesana kinka ke dhalqade.
43011054	Ogona Yesus Ayiwd eensa shaarinte may yaayadehe; ko dahaannaar daransa gasante dohon Epreem hambhen katamandar ki yivade. Ogotear yisa paanan yivaynabesana ki kappade.
43011055	Ayiwd eensa Paasikan bavallo ko yeskade. Thoothino eenoar meten yinnonam gazisana hamayse Paasikan rooroasa birayse peen yinnora Yerusaalemdar ko yivade.
43011056	Ogote Yesusamaar zagite ko dahade. Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayante woyayse kinka kikal "Har ko yena maate? Ogo bavaalindar nimbha shidho ki dew?" hamayse ko dhalqade.
43011057	Gudullasa hayonabee Parisa eenabe kiam yedana, kinin dohon raqinam dhesea eedi daa ko hanna, kena kinin dhoadettsi ke giyade.
43012001	Paasikan rooronaam gobshanna rooro lax shidhaysaka Yesus dembhira kinin dhaasaa Alaazarin dohon Bitaania gurdandar ki nivade.
43012002	Ogotear sooti gala kina ashkayse ke imade. Martaar keam kunsite ko dahade; Alaazaraar Yesusbesana dooqaana eenasa eedi kalaane.
43012003	Mayriyam koymo gebhika shanshadhen naardoosira bish ashkadhon bikkole kalaa gaamea shitto tiyayse Yesussa roonam qadhayse yisa metensa sitinka ko qodade; onnoar naardoos shittonsa gaamenka ko thoothade.
43012004	Ko dahaannaar kisa paanan yivayna eenasa shaarinte kiam yettsate imana hayea Asqoronto peen ea Yiwda
43012005	"Gaamen shitton koam birre mato makkamdar shanshayse koymon ogoam qambhinana imbhimino harrnane?" ki hamade.
43012006	Ogoam kinin giyoonoar diibi yinin dohonnane; gon qambhinana burqadhaysetehe. Ogonoar kesa birre yedea maatayse kosa iira birrenam yinin tiyennane.
43012007	Yesusaar "Konin hayoono iam duukadhea rooroasa ashkimbhe konin dohonna, koam garaa.
43012008	Qambhina rooro wul yembesana keda dee; inta rooro wul yembesana dahattine" kena ki hamade.
43012009	Ayiwd eensa thoothino eeno Yesus ogote kinin dohonam dhesayse ko nivade. Ogonoar diira kinin dhaasaa Alaazaram pir shedanane; Yesusna bish nivadehe.
43012010	Gudullasa hayona Alaazaramaar deesana kinka ke dhalqade.
43012011	Harrna hambhidianna, Alaazarsa diira dhaabhidin goynsa Ayiwd eensa thoothino eeno kekalanka edimayse Yesusdar woylamin qajaate konin dohonnane.
43012012	Kina hamon bavaalinam gobshota nivoono thoothino eeno "Yesus Yerusaalem nivite ki dahade" hambhenam yinin qansenka,
43012013	meetha haccha yinka yedayse kiam tiyana utayse, "Gobshi kina ko dee; Barjo Imbasa naabenka nivea Israveel eensa bitaa kidi gobshadhaane" hante upsi gebhika kiam ko gobshade.
43012014	-
43012015	Ogora "Yedi Thiyoon katamante dahaana eenato, kurtumbheebhode! Marrato! Yesa bitaa ukuli ootodar dooqayse kida nive" hamayse thaapadhondettsi, Yesus ukuli ooto haapayse daran ki dooqade.
43012016	Yesussa paanan yivaynaar ogo wulam birayse bhocchadehe; ko dahaannaar Yesus cecindar utayse kinin gobshadhonsa budonte, ogono wul kinnon goynsa thaapadhonbee waadadhadhonbe ogo wodanka kena bhoq ko hamade.
43012017	Yesus Alaazaram duukira eelayse kinin dhaasenka kimbesana kinka dahaana eena ogosa ke tarjade.
43012018	Thoothino eeno ogo tarshen yerin kinin waadadhonam yinin qansonna, kiam tiyana ko utade.
43012019	Ogonante Parisa eena yi giyna: "Marrato! Ta keeda hamino hayo? Eeno wul kisa paanan ko yivade" kinka kikal ke hamade.
43012020	Bavaalin rooronaka Barjona goodimota Yerusaalemdar nivon eensa shaarira waani waani eena Girik eedine.
43012021	Kediar Galila peensa Beetesayda katamara nivaa Pilbhooskal nivayse, "Imbo, Yesusam shedana woda zage" hamayse kiam ke oysade.
43012022	Pilbhoosaar yivayse Indiriasna ki giyade; Indiriasbee Pilbhoosbe kinka yivayse Yesusna ke giyade.
43012023	Yesusaar maasayse "Eedi Naasin gobshadhayno wodano yeskidine.
43012024	Inta yena gon ida giye: Gazgonsa aapi peente wavayse yi capaamma, baqalima koda shidhe; yi capidianna, baqalayse thoothi aapi koda ushe.
43012025	Sadan yinnonam nashea koam kaysa ki kayse; peen kodar sadan yinnonam jibbea rooro wul lay dehen sadanna koam gisha ki gishe.
43012026	Ina waadadhea yi hanna, isa paananka ki nive; ina waadadhea ea inin dohon raqinte kida dee; ina waadadhea eam Imba kiam gobsha ki gobshe" kena ki hamade.
43012027	Yesus yi giyna: "Ta isa sadano kattsi gaalidine. Hariy hamo? 'Imbo, ogo gaalen wodara iam dhacchaa!' i hamo? Ko dahaannaar inin nivoono ogo gaalenam tiyanane.
43012028	Imbo, hasa naabenam gobshaa!" ki hamade. Ogo wodanka "Intaar isa naabenam gobshidine; tapir koam ida gobshe" hamea upsi cecira ko nivade.
43012029	Ogote woyayse qansaana eena "Kaa guganatne" ke hamade; waani eenaar "Barjosa gaana kina ki giyade" ke hamade.
43012030	Yesus yin giyayse kena ki maasade: "Ogono upsino cecira yena hamayse ko nivade, ina hamayse nivadehe.
43012031	Ta peen kodar pirdino yeskidine; ta peen koam wottsea Seethaanam mayandar kida dhabadhe.
43012032	Eedi Naas peen kora tura ki ziitadhidianna, een wulam yidar eela ki eele" ki hamade.
43012033	Ogono yin kinin giyoono hamin hama dembhi yinin diyensa keam bhocchisana ki giyade.
43012034	Ogora thoothino eeno "Wodi Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoos rooro wul lay kinin dehenam Musesa yigginte wodi qansidine. Ya 'Eedi Naas tura ziitadha kiam koda zaske' hamayse haminaa giyaa? Agaa Eedi Naas hayne?" hamayse kiam ke oysade.
43012035	Yesusaar "Akar likka wodana shaaka yembesana kida dee. Thipan yedar yeskoamadettsi shaakan yekal daaka yaayee. Thipante yaayea hamodar yinin yivenam dhesehe.
43012036	Shaaka yekal daaka, shaaka eedi maatana shaakaadar woylam qajee" kena ki hamade. Yesusaar ogoam giyayse kekalanka yivayse ki aadhimbhade.
43012037	-
43012038	Ko dahaannaar Yesus igina tarshayna yerraam kesa birante ki waadadhaakaar Barjokala qansayse eenna giyea Isias "Imbo, wosa tarjamonam gonne hamayse hayne tiyaa? Barjosa kantanosin hayna ko haapadhaa?" hamayse kinin giyoono upsino konin thoothoadettsi kidar woylamin qajadehe.
43012039	-
43012040	Isias pir "Aapinka kenin shedoamadettsi, woylaminkaar kenin bhocchoamadettsi, ogoraar ke maataysaka keam kinin pacchoamadettsi, Barjo kesa aapinam ki kaysade; kesa woylaminamaar ki duttsade" ena ki hamade. Ogonante kedi Yesusdar woylamin qajana damadehe.
43012041	Isias ogoam kinin giyoono Yesussa gobshinam shedayse kisa ki giyade.
43012042	Ko dahaannaar Ayiwd eenam entsayna eenasa shaarira shidhima thoothina eena kidar woylamin ke qajade. Ko dahaakaar Ayiwd eensa bukin raqira keam kenin buloamadettsi Parisa eenaam kenin kurtumbhonna Yesussa tarjadehe.
43012043	Ogoam yin kenin hayoono Barjoyn keam gobsherra, eedin keam gobshenam kenin nashonnane.
43012044	Yesusaar upsi gebhika yin ki giyade: "Idar woylamin qajea iam nittsaadar woylamin kida qaje; idar bishtehe.
43012045	Iam haapea iam nittsaamaar ta haapidine.
43012046	Idar woylamin qajea wul thipante kinin doamadettsi inta shaaka maatayse peendar i nivade.
43012047	Inta peendar dohon eenam dhacchana i nivade; peendar dohon eendar pirdana nivaatine. Ogonante isa upsinam qansayse toolimadar pirdea intatehe.
43012048	Iam jibbeabee isa dhalqinam tiyma eabedar pirdea daane. Inin giyoono upsino yinti macchin rooroaka kidar koda pirde.
43012049	Harrna hambhidianna, inta isa qaaboka giyaatine; ko dahaannaar iam nittsaa Imba yinti har inin giyenbee hamin inin giyenbeam ina ki imade.
43012050	Kinin giyoonoar rooro wul lay daadhea sadandar konin yeskisenam dhesayda dhese. Ogonante inin giyayno Imba ina kinin giyaadettsi ida giye" ki hamade.
43013001	Yesus Paasikan rooronaam gobshadhensa birayse, peen kora Barjo Imbaakal kinin yiven wodanin yeskonam ki dhesade. Peen kodar dahaana eena yinnaam kidi nashidine; yinin nashaanaam macchi ki nashade.
43013002	-
43013004	Birayse Seethaan Simoon naasa Asqoronto peen ea Yiwdasa woylaminte Yesusam yettsate kinin imoadettsi qaabo kina ki imade. Yesus Barjo Imbaa yer wulam kisa aanindar kinin imonbee, Barjokala kinin nivonbee, Barjodar kinin yivenbeam ki dhesade. Sootin galan itsite ke daaka, Yesus dhaabhayse yinin qaadhon apalanam wodayse, bishin qodadhen apalanam tiyayse ki dhaximbhade.
43013005	Ogoraar shaaqante noqo kahayse, yisa paanan yivaynasa roonam shivayse, yinin dhaximbhon apalanka kesa roonam qodan ki yedade.
43013006	Yesus Simoon Bhethirooskal kinin nivenka, Bhethiroosaar "Imbo, ya isa roon shivaa shivo?" kina ki hamade.
43013007	Yesus yinin maasenka, "Inin hayenam ya ta dhesattane; budobar koam hada bhocche" kina ki hamade.
43013008	Bhethiroosaar "Yer hamin hambhaakaar isa roonam shivattane" kina ki hamade. Yesusaar "Hasa roonam i shivaamma, imbesana dahattane" kina ki hamade.
43013009	Simoon Bhethiroosaar "Imbo, isa aaninbee isa metenbeam shivaa; isa roon bish shivaabhode!" kina ki hamade.
43013010	Yesusaar "Kosa birayse bishinam shiidhaa ea roonam bish shiidha kiam ko zaske; kisa bishino wul payyane. Yedi payyane; ko dahaannaar yedi wul payyatehe" kina ki hamade.
43013011	Yettsate kiam imea eam Yesus yinin dhesenna, "Yedi wul payyatehe" ki hamade.
43013012	Kesa roonam yinin shivonsa budonte, apalan yinnonam qaadhayse, pir maatate dooqayse kena yin ki giyade: "Inin yena hayonam yedi bhocchee bhoccho?
43013013	Yedi Dhettsea way Imbo iam yeda hame; yenin giyaadettsi inin dohonna, payyee giyade.
43013014	Ta inta yesa Imbabee Dhettseabe dahayse yesa roonam i shividianna, yedi taar kinka kisa roonam yenin shivoadettsi yeam koda zaske.
43013015	Inta yena inin hayondettsi yedi pir yenin hayoadettsi kamsin koam yena i dhahade.
43013016	Inta yena gon ida giye: Waadadhea ea kiam waadiseara sagehe; ergadhaa ea kiam ergaara sagehe.
43013017	Ogoam dhesayse ye haydianna, yedi gobshadhaanane.
43013018	"Ko dhalqinam inin giyayno ye wulsatehe; inta inin kamaanaam dhesayda dhese. Ko dahaannaar Mathaap Gazante 'Innon balashanam itsea idar ki dhaabhade' hambhoono upsino konin thoothoadettsine.
43013019	Yin konin maatonsa birayse ta yena inin giyayno, konin thoothonsa budonte inin hay dohonam gonne hamayse yenin tiyoadettsine.
43013020	Inta yena gon ida giye: Inin yittsea hayyeamaar chocchamon tiyea iam kida tiye; iamaar tiyea iam nittsaam kida tiye" kena ki hamade.
43013021	Yesus ogoam yin giyayse yisa manpasinka kattsi qaabayse, "Inta yena gon ida giye: Yesa shaarira kalaa iam yettsate ima ki ime" hamayse kena ki giyade.
43013022	Kisa paanan yivayna eenaar dhalqin ogoam haysa kinin giyenam yinin dhesaamonna, kinka kiam kiam shedan ke yedade.
43013023	Kesa iira kalaa Yesusin nashea Yesuskal theedi ki dooqade.
43013024	Ogonante Simoon Bhethiroos aapi kina qunthayse, "Haysa kinin giyenam wona oysaa" kina ki hamade.
43013025	Kidiar Yesussa sadankal theedayse, "Imbo, agaa hayne?" hamayse ki oysade.
43013026	Yesusaar "Balashanam woothinte duggayse aponte inin arsea agaa kidine" hamayse kina ki maasade. Balashanamaar woothinte duggayse Asqoronto peen ea Simoon naasa Yiwdana ki imade.
43013027	Ogo balashanam aponte kinin arsonsa budobar, saanawa Seethaan Yiwdasa woylaminte ki ardade. Ogona Yesusaar "Hanin hayenam saanawa hayaa" kina ki hamade.
43013028	Ko dahaannaar ogote galandar dooqaana eena Yesus harrna ogoam kina kinin giyonam hayyear dhesadehe.
43013029	Yiwda birre yedea kinin dohonna, Yesus kina "Bavaala gobshana wona zaskenam shanaa" way "Qambhinana iminto imaa" kinin hamaa waani eenana ko maatade.
43013030	Yiwdaar balashanam tiyanka saana ki utade. Kinin utenka peeno sootine.
43013031	Yiwdayn utonsa budonte Yesus yin ki giyade: "Ta Eedi Naas gobshadhota ki dahade; Barjoar kanka kida gobshadhe.
43013032	Barjoar kanka ki gobshadhidianna, Barjo pir Naasaam yinka gobsha ki gobshe; saanawa kiam kida gobshe.
43013033	"Naanato, akar likka wodana yembesana kinka ida dee. Iam zageeda zage; Ayiwd eenam entsaynana 'Inin yiven raqinte nivana damattene' inin kena hamondettsi, ta yena pir ogoam ida giye.
43013034	Kinka kiam kiam yenin nashoadettsi haali upsi yena ida ime. Inin yeam nashondettsi, yedi pir kinka kiam kiam nashee.
43013035	Kinka kinka nashimmakko yesa daa ko hanna, isa paanan nivayna eena yenin maatonam eeno wul yeam ogoka dhesa ko dhese" kena ki hamade.
43013036	Simoon Bhethiroosaar "Imbo, hamoa yive?" hamayse kiam ki oysade. Yesusaar "Ta isa paananka inin yiven raqindar nivana damattane; bere isa paanan nivaada nive" hamayse kina ki maasade.
43013037	Bhethiroosaar "Imbo, ta hasa paanan yiva iam marayno hare? Isa sadanam ko hannaar hana saskate imayda ime" kina ki hamade.
43013038	Yesusaar kina yinin maasenka, "Ya gon hasa sadanam ina saskate imaa imo? Inta hana gon ida giye: Makkam goyt 'Inta kiam dhesattine' hamayse iam hanin marimenka yekka kina sootin baacha qiiqehe.
43014001	"Yesa woylaminka qaabayse gaaleebhode; Barjodar woylam qajee, idarar pir woylam qajee.
43014002	Imbasa ooninte thoothi daadhea raq daane; yin ko dahaamma, ini yena giyayda giye. Raq yena ashkota ida yive.
43014003	Yivayse raq yena inin ashkonsa budonte, inin dohon raqinte yedi pir yenin doadettsi lansi nivayda nive; ikalar yeam tiyayda tiye.
43014004	Inin yiven goynamaar dheseeda dhese" kena ki hamade.
43014005	Toomaasear "Imbo, hamodar hanin yivenam dhesattone; hamin hayayse goynam woda dhese?" kina ki hamade.
43014006	Yesusaar kina yinin maasenka, "Goyteabee, gonin hamaabee, sadabe intane; inka dayma goyti abka eedi hay ki hannaar Barjo Imbakal nivana damea qolehe.
43014007	Iam ye dhesanna, Imbaamaar pir dheseeda dhese. Ta keeda kaara kiam yedi dhesidine; kiam yedi haapidine" kena ki hamade.
43014008	Pilbhoosaar "Imbo, Barjo Imbaam wona ha dhaanna, yeeka ko yeeke" kina ki hamade.
43014009	Yesusaar "Ya Pilbhooso, koka yekka yembesana kinka inin dehenka iam dhesattanu? Iam haapaa Imbaam haapidine. Ta ya 'Barjo Imbaam wona dhahaa' hamayse haminaa giyaa?
43014010	Inta Imbaka inin dohonbee Imbaar inka kinin dohonbeam gonne hamayse tiyattanu? Inka dahaa Imba waadimanam kida waadadhe; inin yena giyen upsinam ikalanka giyattine.
43014011	Inta Imbaka inin dohonbee Imbaar inka kinin dohonbeam gonne hamayse isa upsinam tiyee. Yin ko dahaamma, inin waadadhen waadimanam shedayse gonne hamayse tiyee.
43014012	Inta yena gon ida giye: Idar woylamin qajea inin waadadhen waadimanam kidi pir kida waadadhe; ogora sagi kida waadadhe. Harrna hambhidianna, inta Imbadar inin yivennane.
43014013	Imbaar i kisa Naasaka kinin gobshadhoadettsi isa naabenka yenin misken wulam yena hayayda haye.
43014014	Yer har ko hannaar isa naabenka iam yenin miskenam inta yena hayayda haye.
43014015	"Iam nashayna ye hanna, inin giyen upsinam toolee.
43014016	Intaar Imbaam ida miske; rooro wul lay yembesana kinin doadettsi ab yeam wocchinsea yena kida ime.
43014017	Kidiar goninsa Manpasne. Peendar dahayna eena kiam haapiminabee dhesiminabe kenin dohonna, kiam tiyana damehe; ko dahaannaar yembesana kinka kinin dohonnabee os birante yesa iinte kinin dehennabe yedi kiam dheseeda dhese.
43014018	"Imbaysa qolmina naanadettsi yeam inta garattine; yekal nivayda nive.
43014019	Likka wodasa budonte peendar dahaana eena iam haapehe; yedi iam haapeeda haape. Inta sadaka inin dehenna, yediar sadaka yeda dee.
43014020	Inta Imbaka inin dohonam, yediar inka yenin dohonam, intaar yenka inin dohonam agaa rooroaka dheseeda dhese.
43014021	Isa upsinam tiyayse koam toolea iam nashea kidine. Iam nasheamaar Imba nasha ki nashe; intaar kiam nashayda nashe; iamaar kina dhaayda dhee" kena ki hamade.
43014022	Asqoronto peen ea Yiwda dayma aba Yiwda "Imbo, peendar dahayna eenana dayma wona bish haam hanin dhahayno harrnane?" hamayse kiam ki oysade.
43014023	Yesusaar kina yinin maasenka, "Iam nashea hay ki hannaar, isa upsinam toola ki toole; Imbaar kiam nasha ki nashe. Wodiar kikal nivooda nive; kimbesana kinka woda dee.
43014024	Iam nashima isa upsinam toolehe. Yenin qansayno upsinoar iam nittsaa Imbasane, intitehe.
43014025	"Ta yembesana dahayse koam yena i giyade.
43014026	Ko dahaannaar Imba isa naabenka yena kinin nittsayno, wocchinsayno Manpas Gazano, wulam yena koda dhettse; inin yena giyon wulam yena koda bhocchise.
43014027	"Payyamonam yena ida gare; isa payyamonam yena ida ime. Inin yena imayno payyamono peen konin imendettsitehe. Yesa woylaminka qaabayse gaaleebhode, kurtumbheebhode.
43014028	'Inta yivayda yive; yekalar maatayse nivayda nive' inin yena hamonam yedi qansidine. Iam nashayna ye hanna, Imbakal inin yivenka ini yeda wozadhe; harrna hambhidianna, Imba idara kinin sagennane.
43014029	Ogoyn thoothonsa budonte inin giyonam gonne hamayse yenin tiyoadettsi ta konin maatensa birayse koam inta yena giydine.
43014030	Ta keeda yembesana kinka thoothi dhalqattine; harrna hambhidianna, peen koam wottsea Seethaan kida nive. Idar kisa kanta qolehe.
43014031	Ko dahaannaar Imbaam inin nashenam peen kodar dohoono eeno konin dhesoadettsi, Imba ina kinin giyon ogoam ida haye. "Dhaabhee, kora wo yive.
43015001	"Gonin hamaa woynea hatta intane; koraar Imbane.
43015002	Aapin ushimin idar dohon antin wulam Imba taxayse kida dhabe; aapin ushen antin wulam thoothi konin ushoadettsi koam murdayse kida ashke.
43015003	Inin yena giyon upsin goynka ta yedi payya maatidine.
43015004	Yedi inka dehee; intaar yenka ida dee. Antino hattadar yi dahaamma yimal aapi ushana konin damimadettsi, yin yedi taar inka ye dahaamma aapi ushana damattene.
43015005	"Woynea hatta intane; yediar antinane. Hayyear inka ki daana, intaar kanka i daana, kidi thoothi aapi usha ki ushe. Harrna hambhidianna, inka ye dahaamma, yer kala hattear hayana damattene.
43015006	Inka dayma ea hattonsa antindettsi taxate kiam mayante dhabadhaysaka kida wocche; iginaamaar buurate nuunte dhabayse koda koqadhe.
43015007	Inka daa ye hanna, isa upsinoar yekal daa ko hanna, yenin nashen wulam miskee; yena imbha ko imbhe.
43015008	Thoothi aapi ye ushidianna, isa paanan nivayna eena yenin maatonam yeda dhee; Imbaar ogoka gobsha ki gobshadhe.
43015009	"Imba iam kinin nashondettsi, intaar yeam nashidine; isa nashimmakkonka dehee.
43015010	Inta Imbasa upsinam toolayse kisa nashimmakkonka inin dohondettsi, isa upsinam ye toolina isa nashimmakkonka yeda dee.
43015011	Isa wozano yenka konin doadettsi, yesa wozanoar konin thoothoadettsi koam yena inta giydine.
43015012	"Inin yeam nashondettsi kinka kiam kiam yenin nashoadettsi isa upsino konone.
43015013	Sadan yinnonam yisa nashonana saskayse imara sagi nashimmakko haykalar qolehe.
43015014	Inin yena giyonam hayayna ye hanna, yedi isa nashonane.
43015015	Ta keeda kaara os 'Ina waadadhaynane' yeam hamattine; harrna hambhidianna, waadadhea ea yiam waadiseayn hayenam dhesehe. Ko dahaannaar Imbakala inin qanson wulam yena inin dhettsonna, 'Isa nashonane' yeam inta hamidine.
43015016	Inta yeam i kamade; yedi iam kameetene. Yivayse aapi yenin ushoadettsibee yesa aapinoar konin doadettsibe yeam kamayse i wodade. Ogona Imba isa naabenka yenin misken wulam yena kida ime.
43015017	Kinka kiam kiam yenin nashoadettsi yena inin giyayno upsino konone.
43015018	"Peen kodar dohoono eeno yeam jibbidi ko hanna, yesa birayse iam konin jibbonam dhesee.
43015019	Peen ko eena ye daana, ini peen kodar dohoono eeno kenti yenin dohonna yeam nasha ko nashe. Ko dahaannaar inta peen kodar dohon eensa iira yeam i kamade; ogona peen kosa yenin dahaamonna, peen kodar dohoono eeno yeam jibba ko jibbe.
43015020	'Waadadhea ea kiam waadiseadara sagehe' hamayse inin yena giyon upsinam bhocchee. Iam oytidi ke hanna, yeamaar pir oyta ke oyte. Isa upsinam toolidi ke hanna, yesa upsinam toola ke toole.
43015021	Iam nittsaam kenin dhesimonna, ko wulam isa naaben goynka yedar keda haye.
43015022	Inta nivayse kena i giyaamma, ini kena seeso maatehe; keeda seeso kenin waadadhonsa kenin imea upsi qolehe.
43015023	Iam jibbea Imbaam pir jibba ki jibbe.
43015024	Eedi abin waadadhaamon waadimanam kesa shaarinte i waadadhaamma, ini kena seeso maatehe. Keeda inin waadadhonam shedayse imbee Imbabeam kedi jibbidine.
43015025	Ogonoar kesa yigginte 'Sun iam ke jibbade' hamayse thaapadhoono konin thoothoadettsine.
43015026	"Inta Imbakala inin nittsayno, kikalaar utayno, yeam wocchinsen gonin Manpasin nivon wodanka, kodi innon goynsa tarja ko tarje.
43015027	Yedi taar birara yedayse imbesana yenin dohonna, innon goynsa tarjeeda tarje.
43016001	"Yena goa konin maatoamadettsi ogoam yena inta giydine.
43016002	Ayiwd eensa bukin raqiraar yeam bula ke bule; ogoraar saskayse pir yeam deesayna wul 'Inta Barjosa waadima eedine' kenin hamayno woda koda nive.
43016003	Ogoamaar yedar kenin hayayno Imbabee imbeam kenin dhesimonnane.
43016004	Ko dahaannaar wodayn yeskenka, inin yena giyonam yenin bhocchoadettsi koam yena inta giydine. "Yembesana kinka inin dohonna, ko wulam yena birayse giyma i garade.
43016005	Keeda iam nittsaadar yivayda yive. Yesa shaarira 'Hamoa yive?' hamayse iam oysea qolehe.
43016006	Ta koam inin yena giyonna, yesa woylaminte sii qaabe thoothidine.
43016007	Inta yena gon ida giye: I yividianna, yena aga ko age. Harrna hambhidianna, i yivaamma wocchinsea yekal nivehe; i yividianna, kiam yekal nittsayda nittse.
43016008	Kidiar nivayse seesonbee, tipamonbee, pirdin goynbesa peendar dahaana eenaam bhocchisa ki bhocchise:
43016009	Seeson goynsa keam kinin bhocchisayno idar woylamin kenin qajimonnane;
43016010	tipamon goynsa keam kinin bhocchisayno Imbakal inin yivennabee keeda iam yenin haapiminnabene;
43016011	pirdin goynsaar keam kinin bhocchisayno peen koam wottsea Seethaandar konin pirdadhonnane.
43016012	"Inin yena giyayno akar thoothi yer daane; ko dahaannaar ta yena i giydianna, yedar koda dethe.
43016013	Bere goninsa Manpasino konin nivon wodanka, gonin wulam yenin dhesoadettsi yeam entsa ko entse. Harrna hambhidianna, yinin qanson wulam koda giye; yikalanka konin giymonnane. Kodi os birante nivenam yena giya ko giye.
43016014	Inti maatonam tiyayse yena konin giyenna, iam gobsha ko gobshe.
43016015	Imbasa dohoono wul intine; ogonante 'Innora tiyayse yena giya ko giye' inin hamoono ogonane.
43016016	"Likka roorosa budobar iam haapattene; pir likka roorosa budobar iam haapeeda haape" kena ki hamade.
43016017	Kisa paanan yivayna eenasa waani waani eena " 'Likka roorosa budobar iam haapattene; pir likka roorosa budobar iam haapeeda haape' pir, 'Imbakal inin yivennane' kisa hamintano hamin giyntane?" kinka kikal ke hamade.
43016018	"Ta keeda 'likka roorosa' kinin hamoono kisa hamin giyntane? Kinin giyenam dhesattone" hamayse kinka dhalqite ke dahade.
43016019	Yesusaar kiam oysana kenin zagonam dhesayse kena yin ki giyade: " 'Likka roorosa budobar iam haapattene; pir likka roorosa budobar iam haapeeda haape' inin hamonna ye kinka kiam kiam oyso?
43016020	Inta yena gon ida giye: Yedi eepeeda eepe, qayteeda qayte; peen kodar dohoono eeno ko hanna, wozadha ko wozadhe. Yediar sii eed yeda maate; ko dahaannaar yesa siino wozadar ookima ko ookime.
43016021	Maa adhiman rooroa kosa yeskenka koda burqadhe. Ko dahaannaar naasin yinin adhonsa budonte, 'Peen kodar naasi inta adhidine' hamayse wozaka yisa gaalenam koda wale.
43016022	Ogodettsi yedi ta yesa woylaminka burqadheeda burqadhe. Ko dahaannaar pir yeam ida shede; yesa woylaminkaar wozadheeda wozadhe; yesa wozanamaar yekalanka tiyea hayyear qolehe.
43016023	"Ogo wodanka ikalanka yer kala hattear miskattene. Inta yena gon ida giye: Imba isa naabenka yenin misken wulam yena ima ki ime.
43016024	Ta koka yekka isa naabenka yer kala hattear miskeetene. Yesa wozano konin thoothoadettsi miskee; tiyeeda tiye.
43016025	"Koam yena kamsika i giyade. Ko dahaannaar keeda kaara os kamsika inin giymino woda koda nive; ogo wodanka Imba goynsa yena may ida giye.
43016026	Ogo wodanka isa naabenka miskeeda miske; intaar 'Yena Imbaam ida miske' yena hamattine.
43016027	Harrna hambhidianna, yedi iam yenin nashonna, Barjokalankaar inin nivonam gonne hamayse yenin tiyonna, Imba kidi yeam nasha ki nashe.
43016028	Imbakalanka utayse peen kodar i nivade; pir peen koam garayse Imbadar yivayda yive" kena ki hamade.
43016029	Kisa paanan yivayna eenaar "Shedaa! Ta kamsika giyattane; may hada giye.
43016030	Wulam hanin dhesenbee hayyear haam oysa zaskiminbeam ta wodi dhesidine; ogona Barjokalanka hanin nivonam gonne hamayse wodi tiydine" kina ke hamade.
43016031	Yesusaar yin giyayse kena ki maasade: "Ta yedi inin giyonam gonne hamayse yedi tiydu?
43016032	Yedi wul kalaa kalaa yesa onnadar thar thar hamayse yenin yivayno, iamaar imal yenin garayno woda niva ko nive, ogonoar ta yeskidine; ko dahaannaar Imba imbesana kinin dohonna, inta ta imaltehe.
43016033	Inka yena payyamoyn doadettsi inta yena ogoam giydine. Peen kodar yenin dehenka, gaale yedar yeska ko yeske. Ko dahaannaar kurtumbheebhode! Inta peen koam bashidine" kena ki hamade.
43017001	Yesus ogoam yinin giyonsa budobar tura cecin shedayse yin giyayse ki miskade: "Imbo, wodano yeskidine; hasa Naasa haam kinin gobshoadettsi kiam gobshaa.
43017002	Hanin kina imaana wulna rooro wul lay daadhea sadan kinin imoadettsi een wuldar hayamo kina ha imade.
43017003	Gonin hama Barjo bish maataa hambee hanin nittsaa Yesus Kiristoosbeam kenin dhesoadettsi rooro wul lay daadhea sada agaane.
43017004	Inin waadadhoadettsi ina hanin imon waadimanam macchayse, peen kodar haam inta gobshidine.
43017005	Keeda Imbo, peen pijadhima birayse hakal isa dohon gobshinka ya pir iam hakal gobshaa.
43017006	"Peen kodar dohon eensa shaarira ina hanin imaana eenana hasa naabenam kena inta dhettsidine. Kedi hanti ke dahade, inaar keam ha imade; hanin giyen upsinamaar kedi toolidine.
43017007	Ina hanin imoono wul hakalanka konin dohonam ta kedi dhesidine.
43017008	Harrna hambhidianna, ina hanin imon upsinam intaar kena imidine; kediar ogoam ke tiyade. Hakalankaar inin nivonam gon kedi dhesidine; hanin iam yittsonam kedi gonne hamayse tiydine.
43017009	Ina hanin imaana eenana haam ida miske; igina kedi hanti kenin dohonna, kena haam ida miske; peen kodar dohon een waanina haam miskattine.
43017010	Inti maataana wul hantine; hanti maataana wul intine; intaar kenka gobshadhidine.
43017011	"Keeda kaara os peen kodar inta dahattine, kedi peendar keda dee; inta hadar ida yive. Gazaa Imbo, igina eena wodettsi kalaa kenin maatoadettsi ina hanin imon hasa naabenka keam toolaa.
43017012	Kembesana kinka peendar inin dohonka hanin ina imon hasa naabenka inta keam toolite i dahade; inta keam toolidine. Mathaap Gazante thaapadhoono konin thoothoadettsi agaa kayendar yivea ea bishkalanka kesa iira kala hattear kayadehe.
43017013	"Taar hadar ida yive; isa dohoono wozano kenka konin thoothoadettsi peen kodar inin dohonka yerra iginaam ida giye.
43017014	Hasa upsinam kena inta imidine. Intaar peendar dahayna eenabesana kala inin dahaamadettsi kediar peendar dahayna eenabesana kala kenin dahaamonna, peendar dahayna eena keam jibbidine.
43017015	Siyonkalanka keam hanin tooloadettsi ida miske; peen kora keam hanin buloadettsi miskattine.
43017016	Intaar peendar dohon eenbesana kala inin dahaamadettsi, kediar peendar dohon eenbesana kalaatehe.
43017017	Goninka keam gazisaa; upsinoar hasa gonne.
43017018	Peendar dohon eendar iam hanin yittsondettsi, intaar keam yin peendar dohon eendar i yittsade.
43017019	Kedi gon gazimbhaana kenin doadettsi inta kena hamayse iam gazinsidine.
43017020	"Kena bish dayma kenin giyen upsinam qansayse idar woylamin qajaynanaar haam ida miske.
43017021	Imbo, ya inka hanin dohondettsi, intaar hanka inin dohondettsi, igina taar wonka kenin doadettsi ida miske. Inin miskaynoar hanin iam yittsonam peendar dahayna eena gonne hamayse kenin tiyoadettsi, idar woylamin qajayna wul kinka kala ke maate hamayse haam ida miske.
43017022	Wodi kinka kala wonin dohondettsi kediar kinka kala kenin maatoadettsi, ina hanin imon gobshinam inta kena imidine.
43017023	Intaar kenka inin dohondettsi, yaar inka hanin dohondettsi, kediar gon kinka kala kenin maatoadettsi haam ida miske. Peen kodar dohoono eeno iam hanin yittsonbee, iam hanin nashondettsi keam hanin nashonbeam ogoka dhesa ko dhese.
43017024	"Imbo, peen pijadhima birayse iam hanin nashonna, ina hanin imon gobshinam kenin shedoadettsi, ina hanin imaana kedi taar inin dohonte imbesana kinka kenin doadettsi ida nashe.
43017025	Tipaa Imbo, peendar dohoono eeno haam dhesadehe. Inta haam dhesidine; iginaar hanin iam nittsonam kedi dhesidine.
43017026	Iam hanin nashoono nashimmakkono kesa iinte konin doadettsibee inta kesa iinte inin doadettsibe intaar hasa naabenam kena dhettsidine; pir kena dhettsayda dhettse" hamayse ki miskade.
43018001	Yesus ogoam yinin giyonsa budonte, ogora utayse Qediroon baynsa saabar yisa paanan yivaynabesana kinka haaqan kordhon haaminte yivayse ke ardade.
43018002	Yesusaar kisa paanan yivayna eenabete thoothi woda ogote kenin bukenna, yettsate kiam imea Yiwda pir raqinam dhesa ki dhese.
43018003	Ogonante Yiwda Roome poolisanabee Ayiwd poolisanabeam yinka entsate raqin ogote ki nivade. Kedi Ayiwd poolisana gudullasa hayonabee Parisa eenabekalanka nittsadhaanane. Kediar paanoosbee, kuushabee, banqin koymobeam yinka bavate ke nivade.
43018004	Yesus yidar yesken wulam dhesayse kekal nivayse, "Yedi hayyeame zage?" kena ki hamade.
43018005	Kediar "Naazret peen ea Yesusam woda zage" hamayse kina ke maasade. Yesus kena "Intane" ki hamade. Yettsate kiam imea agaa Yiwda pir kembesana kinka woyayse ki dahade.
43018006	Yesusaar "Intane" kena ki hamaysaka, kedi budoka yivayse peendar ke dhambade.
43018007	Pir "Hayyeame zage?" hamayse keam ki oysade. Kediar kina yinin maasenka, "Naazret peen ea Yesusam woda zage" ke hamade.
43018008	Yesusaar kena " 'Intane' yena iam hamaati? Ta yenin zagea inta i hanna, kina eena ke yive; keam garee" ki hamade.
43018009	Ogonoar Yesus "Igina ina hanin imaanara eedi kala hattear kaysaatine" hamayse kinin giyoono upsino konin thoothoadettsine.
43018010	Halpan dhaximbhaa Simoon Bhethiroosaar yisa halpanam gochayse gudullasa gebhaana waadadhea easa qaamia mizaqaam taxate ki dhabade; waadima easa nammo Malkoosne.
43018011	Yesusaar Bhethiroosna "Hasa halpanam halpan ooninte arsaa. Imba ina kinin imon gaalen wucimanam inta wucattinu?" kina ki hamade.
43018012	Ogora Roome poolisanabee, keam wottseabee, Ayiwd eensa hayonayn nittsaana poolisanabe Yesusam yedayse ke dhaxade.
43018013	Biraysear Qayappasa baysa Hannadar kiam entsate ke yivade; Qayappa wodan ogoka Ayiwd eensa gudullasa gebha kidine.
43018014	Qayappa "Eedi kalaa een wulna diydi ki hanna payyane" hamayse Ayiwd eensa entsanaam kiilaa kidine.
43018015	Simoon Bhethiroosbee waa Yesussa paanan yivea eabe Yesussa paananka ke yivade. Ogonoar Yesussa paanan yivea ea gudullasa gebhaakal dhesadhaane; kidi gudullasa gebhaasa kerminte Yesusbesana ki ardade.
43018016	Bhethiroosaar mayante kerinkal ki woyade. Ogona gudullasa gebhaakal dhesadhea waa Yesussa paanan yivea ea kerin toolen edonkal nivayse kombesana dhalqayse Bhethiroosam ki arsade.
43018017	Ogono kerin toolayno waadiman edono Bhethiroosna "Ya pir ea agaasa paanan yivayna eenasa kalaatayu?" kina ko hamade. Kidi "Intatehe" ki hamade.
43018018	Peenin kattsi qajenna, waadimayna eenabee poolisanabe nuu guttsayse nuunsa gasante woyayse kicardhite ke dahade; Bhethiroos pir kembesana kinka woyayse kicardhite ki dahade.
43018019	Ogo wodanka gudullasa gebhaa Yesusam kisa paanan yivaynabee kisa timmirinbesa kiam ki oysade.
43018020	Yesusaar kina yinin maasenka, "Inta peen kodar dohon een wulna may i giyade; Ayiwd eeno wul konin buken kosa bukin raqinbee Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayanbesa iir rooro wul ida dhettse; aachika kala hattear giyaatine.
43018021	Ta harrnaa iam oyse? Inin giyenka qansaanaam oysaa. Kedi inin giyonam dhesa ke dhese" kina ki hamade.
43018022	Ogoam kinin giyenka, ogote dahaana poolisanasa kalaa "Ta ya gudullasa gebhaana yin giyaysea maaso?" hamayse Yesusam ki cavade.
43018023	Yesus maasayse "Siya i giydianna, siyon inin giyonam tarjaa; gon i giydianna, harrnaa iam ceve?" kina ki hamade.
43018024	Ogosa budobar Hanna Yesusam dhaxinka ki daaka gudullasa gebhaa Qayappadar kiam ki yittsade.
43018025	Simoon Bhethiroos woyayse nuu kicardhite ki daaka, "Ya taar Yesussa paanan yivayna eenasa kalaatayu?" kina ke hamade. Kidiar "Intatehe" hamayse ki marimade.
43018026	Gudullasa gebhaana waadimayna eenasa kalaa, Bhethiroosin qaamin taxaasa muldha maataa ea "Haaqan kordhon haaminte kimbesana kinka ha daaka haam haapaati?" kina ki hamade.
43018027	Bhethiroosaar pir "Kiam dhesattine" hamayse ki marimade. Ogo yin kinin marimenka, saanawa baacha ki qiiqade.
43018028	Ayiwd eenam entsayna eena Yesusam Qayappakalanka peen wottseasa kermin iinte kiam arsota entsate ke yivade. Ogono wodano burin sedhimanne; kediar Paasikan galanam itsa keam zaskenna, yinin minngimoamadettsi peen wottseasa kermin iinte ardadehe.
43018029	Ogonante peen wottsea Bhilathoos mayan kekal utayse, "Ea kaam yenin bersensa kisa seesono hare?" hamayse keam ki oysade.
43018030	Kediar kina yinin maasenka, "Kaa ea siya waadadhea ki dahaamma, yedayse hadar ini kiam bavattone" kina ke hamade.
43018031	Bhilathoosaar "Yedi kiam entsate yivayse yennon yiggindettsi kidar pirdee" kena ki hamade. Ayiwd eenam entsayna eenaar "Wodi haydarar dembhi pirdi pirdayse wonin deesoadettsi Roome yigginte wona giidhadehe" kina ke hamade.
43018032	Ogoam kenin giyoono Yesus hamin dahaa dembhi kinin diyensa kinin giyoono upsino konin thoothoadettsine.
43018033	Bhilathoosaar pir maatayse kermin iinte ardayse Yesusam eelayse, "Ayiwd eensa bitaa yaw?" kina ki hamade.
43018034	Yesusaar kina maasayse "Ya koam hanin giyayno hasa qaaboramoo? Waani eenow isa hana giyoono?" kina ki hamade.
43018035	Bhilathoosaar kina maasayse "Inta Ayiwd eediw? Haam yettsate ina imaana hasa peen eenabee gudullasa hayonabene. Ya haraa hayaa?" kina ki hamade.
43018036	Yesusaar maasayse "Isa bitamono peen koratehe. Isa bitamono peen kora ko hanna, Ayiwd eenam entsayna iam kenin yedoamadettsi ina waadimayna eena ini kembesana banqi keda kanse; yin ko dahaakaar isa bitamono peen koratehe" kina ki hamade.
43018037	Bhilathoosaar "Keeda ya bitiw?" kina ki hamade. Yesusaar maasayse "Inin bit dohonam hasa giydino gonne; inta goninna tarjana i adhadhade, ogona pir peen kodar i nivade. Gon maataa wul isa upsinam kida qanse" kina ki hamade.
43018038	Bhilathoosaar "Gonno hare?" kina ki hamade. Koamaar yin giyayse pir Ayiwd eendar utayse, "Inta kisa kala hattear seeso haapaatine.
43018039	Ko dahaannaar Paasikan rooroaka dhaxadhon eensa shaarira eedi kalaam inin yena bulea dambi yesa daane. Ta keeda Ayiwd eensa bitaam yena dhaxira inin buloadettsi yedi nashee nasho?" kena ki hamade.
43018040	Kediar "Kiamtehe! Wona Barbaanam bulima" hamada pir ke ilatade. Barbaanaar eedi koymo buurite itseane.
43019001	Ogo wodanka Bhilathoos Yesusam poolisanaka ki qansisade.
43019002	Poolisanaar ukumbha qorayse kisa metendar ke wodade; pir apala zoo kiam ke qattsade.
43019003	Kikal theedayse, "Ayiwd eensa bitaa, payyamo hana ko dee" hamada kiam ke bagade; pir kiam cavite ke dahade.
43019004	Bhilathoosaar pir mayanka utayse, "Marrato! Ea kaasa seeso kala hattear inin haapaamonam yenin dhesoadettsi mayanka kiam yena ida bule" kena ki hamade.
43019005	Yesusaar ukumbhanka qurayse ashkadhonam yisa metendar wodayse apala zoo qaadhayse mayanka ki utade. Bhilathoosaar "Marrato, yesa ea kash!" kena ki hamade.
43019006	Gudullasa hayonabee kesa poolisanabe kiam yinin haapenka, "Kiam ziitima! Ziitima!" hante ke ilatade. Bhilathoosaar "Inta kisa seeso kala hattear inin haapaamonna, yedi kiam entsate yivayse ziitee" kena ki hamade.
43019007	Igina Ayiwd eenam entsaynaar kina yinin maasenka, "Wosa yiggi daane; yiam Barjo Naas kinin hayonna, wosa yigginka diya kiam ko zaske" kina ke hamade.
43019008	Ogonante Bhilathoos upsin ogoam yinin qansenka ini hamora sagi ki kurtumbhade.
43019009	Pir maatayse kerminsa iinte ardayse Yesuskal "Ya hamora nivaa?" kina ki hamade. Yesusaar yer kala hattear kina maasadehe.
43019010	Ogonante Bhilathoosaar "Ina giyattanu? Haam dhaxira bulanabee ziitanabe isa hayamo dohonam ya dhesattanu?" kina ki hamade.
43019011	Yesusaar kina yinin maasenka, "Barjokala hana imbhaamma idar hasa hayamo qolehe; ogonante iam yettsate hana imaa easa seesono hannora sagine" kina ki hamade.
43019012	Ogosa budonte Bhilathoos Yesusdar pirdima yittsana ki zagade. Ko dahaannaar Ayiwd eeno kina yi giyna: "Ya ea kaam pirdima ha garina, ya Roome peen bitaasa nashotehe; meten yinnonam bit hayayna wul Roome bitaam jibbaynane, nashaynatehe" hante ko ilatade.
43019013	Bhilathoosaar dhalqin ogoam qansayse Yesusam mayanka ki bulade. "Seeni Labha" hambhen raqinte pirdin borkotondar ki dooqade; ogono ranqo Ibra aponka "Gebeta" koda hambhe.
43019014	Paasikan rooroana ashkimbhadhayno rooro ko dahade; wodanoar savaat laxaddhane. Bhilathoosaar Ayiwd eenna "Marrato, yesa bitaa kash!" kena ki hamade.
43019015	Kediar "Ea kaam kaysima! Kaysima! Kiam ziitaa!" hante ilataate ke waajade. Bhilathoosaar "Yesa bitaam i ziito?" kena ki hamade. Gudullasa hayonaar "Roome peen bitaara ab bit wosa qolehe" hamayse kina ke maasade.
43019016	Ogo wodanka masqalindar konngayse kiam kenin ziitoadettsi kena saskate ki imade. Ogosa budonte Yesusam yedayse ke yivade.
43019017	Kidiar yinin ziitadhen masqalinam kedayse "Eedisa Metedettsi Maataa Raq" way Ibra aponka Golgotta hambhea raqadar ki utade.
43019018	Ogo raqintear eedi lamaa Yesussa warkatambarbee mizaqimbarbe hayayse, Yesusamaar kesa shaarinte masqalindar konngayse ke ziitade.
43019019	Bhilathoosaar pir thaapi thaapayse masqalindar ki ziitisade. Thaapadhoono thaapino "Ayiwd eensa bitaa Naazret ea Yesus" hamaynone.
43019020	Yesusamaar ziitadhoono ranqo katamankal theedi konin dohonna, Ayiwd eensa thoothina eena thaapadhon ogoam ke nabbabade; thaapadhoonoar Ibrabee, Roomebee, Girikbe aponkane.
43019021	Ogonante Ayiwd gudullasa hayona Bhilathoosna, " 'Kidi "Inta Ayiwd eensa bitaane" ki hamade' hamayse thaapaa; 'Ayiwd eensa bitaa' hamayse thaapaabhode" kina ke hamade.
43019022	Bhilathoosaar "Inin thaapenam inta thaapidine" hamayse ki maasade.
43019023	Poolisanaar Yesusam yinin ziiton wodanka kisa apalanam tiyayse ke wulna konin yeskoadettsi raq oydidar ke kashade. Jaagadhaama apala gudubhaam pir ke tiyade. Apallo ogonoar bhaara choo nukindar ko ashkadhade.
43019024	Ogonante kinka kikal "Hayna konin yeskenam dhesana daran itha wo dhabe; koam hattsattone" ke hamade. "Isa apalanam kinka ke kashimade; isa apalandar itha ke dhabade" hamayno Mathaap Gazante thaapadhoono upsino konin thoothoadettsi poolisanaar yin ke hayade.
43019025	Ogo wodanka Yesussa indanbee, indansa indanaanbee, Qeliyobha geshon Mayriyambee, Megdela peen edon Mayriyambe kisa masqalinkal theedi woyayse ke dahade.
43019026	Yesusaar indanbee yisa paanan yivayna eenasa yinin nasheabeam kikal woyayse ke daaka keam haapayse indanka "Indo, hasa naasaam shedaa!" kona ki hamade.
43019027	Ogora yisa paanan yiveana "Shedaa! Inda kosha" kina ki hamade. Keeda agaa wodara yedayse kisa paanan yivea oonin yinnondar koam entsate ki yivade.
43019028	Ogosa budonte Yesus kisa giidhon yer wulin maqonam dhesayse, Mathaap Gazante thaapadhoono upsino konin thoothoadettsi "I dheebardhade" ki hamade.
43019029	Ogotear woyni thorkaa wucadhen koymonka thoosadhaa dahade; kediar woynin thorkonam saaroka tittsayse yisoobh hambhea hattasa koolinka kisa apondar ke yeskisade.
43019030	Yesusaar woynin thorkonam yinin wuconsa budonte, "Keeda maqidine" hamayse meten yinnonam yirk hayayse ki diyade.
43019031	Ukunsen rooroana ashkimbhadhayno rooro konin dohonnabee agaa ukunsen rooroa kattsi detha rooro kinin dohonnabe, Ayiwd eenam entsaynaar ziitadhaana eenasa leesino ukunsen rooroaka masqalindar konin doamadettsi saana ke diye kesa gubeezinam aysayse keam masqalira hanchadhoadettsi Bhilathoosam ke miskade.
43019032	Poolisanaar nivayse kimbesana masqalindar ziitadhaana eenasa gubeezinam ke aysade.
43019033	Yesuskal kenin nivenka kidi birayse kinin diyonam shedayse kisa gubeezinam aysadehe.
43019034	Ko dahaannaar poolisanasa kalaa kisa demenam banqika ki uxade; saanawa zombhibee noqobe ko utade.
43019035	Ogoam haapaar tarjidine; kisa tarjamonoar gonne. Yedi pir gonne hamayse yenin tiyoadettsi kidi gonin kinin giyenam kida dhese.
43019036	Ogono yin maatoono "Kisa lepinsa kala hattear aysadhehe" hamayse Mathaap Gazante thaapadhoono upsino konin thoothoadettsine.
43019037	Pir mathaapinsa waani raqinte "Agaa yinin uxaa eam sheda ke shede" koda hame.
43019038	Ogosa budonte Ayiwd eenam entsaynana yinin kurtumbhonna, aachika Yesussa paanan yivea Armatias katamara nivaa Yoseep Yesussa leesinam tiyana Bhilathoosam ki miskade. Bhilathoosaar leesinam kina imbhoadettsi ki giyade. Ogonante nivayse Yesussa leesinam ki tiyade.
43019039	Pir birayse sootinka Yesuskal nivaa Niqodimos eedi kalaa kaysa apo tabhi kiloaddha gochea kerbe hambhen gaamen shittonbee walqobeka worsadhonam bavate ki nivade.
43019040	Yesussa leesinamaar tiyayse Ayiwd eenin qunthen dambindettsi qunthayse gaamen shittonam laalayse apalanka kiam ke ochade.
43019041	Kinin ziitadhon raqinkal theedi haaqa kordhaa haami ko dahade; haaqan kordhon haaminte eedin duukadhaama duuki oolo ko dahade.
43019042	Ogonante duukin ranqo theedi konin dohonnabee Ayiwd eensa ukunsen rooroana ashkimbhadhayno rooro konin dohonnabe Yesussa leesinam ogote ke duukade.
43020001	Gabansa rooroa biraa Wuudi seddhiman peen thipa daaka, Megdela peen edono Mayriyam Yesussa duukindar ko yivade; duukin oolon shupadhoono senno apora gunngumayse ko daaka ko haapade.
43020002	Kodiar gobate Simoon Bhethiroosbee Yesusin nashea kisa paanan yivea waabekal nivayse, "Imba Yesussa leesinam duukira ke tiyade; hamote kiam kenin wodonam dhesattone" kena ko hamade.
43020003	Ogonante Bhethiroosbee Yesussa paanan yivea waabe utayse duukindar yivan ke yedade.
43020004	Lamaanaar kinka gobite ke daaka, kesa waa Bhethiroosam saana gobaka duukinam birayse ki yeskade.
43020005	Yirk hamayse kinin shedenka, leesinam yinka ochadhoono apallo ogote ko dahaysaka ki haapade; ko dahaannaar kidi duukinte ardadehe.
43020006	Simoon Bhethiroosaar kisa budonte nivayse duukinte ki ardade; Yesussa leesinam yinka ochadhoono apallo ogote ko daaka,
43020007	pir kisa meten ochadhaa apalam, kisa leesinam ochadhon apalanbesana dayma yimal raq abir ki daaka ki haapade.
43020008	Ogo wodanka birayse duukindar yeskaa Yesussa paanan yivea waa duukinsa iinte ki ardade; ogora shedayse Yesus dembhira kinin dhaabhonam gonne hamayse ki tiyade.
43020009	"Dembhira dhaabha kiam ko zaske" hamayno Mathaap Gazante thaapadhon upsinam akar kedi dhesadehe.
43020010	Ogora kedi lamaana onna yinnadar maatayse ke yivade.
43020011	Mayriyam eepada duukinkal ko woyade. Pir eepada yirk hamayse duukinsa iinaam ko shedade.
43020012	Apala cawli qaadhaana Barjosa gaanana lamaana Yesussa leesin wodadhon raqinsa kalaa metembar, lansoar roonbar dooqayse ke daaka keam ko haapade.
43020013	Kediar "Ya edono, harrnaa eepe?" kona ke hamade. Kodiar "Isa Imbaam kedi tiydine; hamote kiam kenin wodonam dhesattine" kena ko hamade.
43020014	Ogoam yin giyayse budoka wal hamayse konin shedenka, Yesus ogote woyayse ki daaka kiam ko haapade; Yesus kinin dohonam kodi dhesadehe.
43020015	Yesusaar "Ya edono, harrnaa eepe? Hayyeama zage?" kona ki hamade. Kodiar haaqan kordhon haaminte waadadhea eedi kona kinin maatonna, "Imbo, ha kiam tiydianna, hamote hanin wodonam ina giyaa; intaar kiam tiyayda tiye" kina ko hamade.
43020016	Yesusaar "Mayriyam" kona ki hamade. Kodiar kidar wal hamayse Ibra aponka "Rebuuni!" ko hamade; kosa bulinoar "Dhettsea" hamintane.
43020017	Yesusaar "Akar Imbadar tura inin yivaamonna, iam kaamaabhode; ko dahaannaar imbanaanakal yivayse, 'Inta imbee yembesa Imba maataa, pir imbee yembesa Barjo maataakal ida yive' hamayse kena giyaa" kona ki hamade.
43020018	Ogona Megdela peen edono Mayriyam Yesussa paanan yivayna eenakal yivayse, "Imbaam inta haapidine" kena ko hamade. Ogora Yesusin kona giyonam kena ko giyade.
43020019	Agaa gabaasa biraa rooroa Wuudi sootin Yesussa paanan yivayna eena kinka bukayse, Ayiwd eenam entsaynaam kurtumbhintaka kerinam yidar diithayse ke daaka, Yesus kekal ki nivade. Kesa shaarintear woyayse, "Payyamo yena ko dee" kena ki hamade.
43020020	Yin giyayse yisa aaninbee demenbeam kena ki dhahade. Kisa paanan yivayna eenaar Imbaa Yesusam yinin haapenka kattsi ke wozadhade.
43020021	Yesus pir "Payyamo yena ko dee; Imba iam kinin yittsondettsi inta taar yeam ida yittse" kena ki hamade.
43020022	Yin giyayse kedar uf hamayse, "Manpas Gazanam tiyee.
43020023	Yedi eensa seesonam ko shidhe ye hamina, kesa seesono kena shidha ko shidhe; yedi eensa seesonam ye garimina, kenaar gardhehe" kena ki hamade.
43020024	Ko dahaannaar Yesusin niven wodanka tabhi lamaanasa kalaa, Didimos hambhea Toomaase kekal qolehe.
43020025	Yesussa paanan yivaynasa waani "Imbaam wo haapade" kina ke hamade. Kidiar "Kisa aaninte konngadhonsa madanam i haapaamma, isa aaninsa surkenka kisa konngadhon raqinam i kaamaamma, kisa uxadhon demenam isa aaninka i kaamaamma gonne hamayse tiyattine" kena ki hamade.
43020026	Rooro lankaysa budonte kisa paanan yivayna eena tapir ooninsa iinte ke dahade; Toomaasear kembesana kinka ki dahade. Kerro diithimi ko daaka Yesus kekal nivayse kesa shaarinte woyayse, "Payyamo yena ko dee" kena ki hamade.
43020027	Ogosa budonte Toomaasena "Hasa aaninsa surkenka isa annaam kaamayse shedaa; aanin hannonka isa uxadhon demenam kaamaa. Idar woylam qajaa, qothimaabhode" kina ki hamade.
43020028	Toomaasear "Isa Imbaa, isa Barjoa!" hamayse kina ki maasade.
43020029	Yesusaar "Iam hanin haaponna idar woylamina qajade; haapima idar woylamin qajayna eena gobshadhaanane" kina ki hamade.
43020030	Yesusaar mathaapa kaate thaapadhaama thoothi tarshea yer yisa paanan yivaynasa birante waadadhidine.
43020031	Ko dahaannaar koam thaapadhoono Yesus Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoos, Barjo Naas kinin dohonam gonne hamayse yenin tiyoadettsibee kidar woylamin qajayse kisa naabenka sadaka yenin doadettsibe hamaysene.
43021001	Ogosa budonte Yesus Thibiriyadoos bazinsa aponte yisa paanan yivaynakal pir ki haapadhade. Kinin haapadhoonoar yinne:
43021002	Simoon Bhethiroosbee, Didimos hambhea Toomaasebee, Galila peensa Qaana katamara nivaa Natinaveelbee, Zabdoos naanabee, Yesussa paanan yivaynasa lamaana waanibe kinka ke dahade.
43021003	Simoon Bhethiroos "Inta kaaran qazota ida yive" kena ki hamade. Kediar "Wodi hambesana yivooda yive" kina ke hamade. Utayse bazindara sagadhen gonngalante ardayse ke yivade; sootin ogo kaara kala hattear yedadehe.
43021004	Peen sedhaysaka Yesus bazinsa aponte ki woyade; kisa paanan yivayna eena Yesus kinin dohonam dhesadehe.
43021005	Yesusaar "Naanato, kaara yekal daaw?" kena ki hamade. Kediar "Qolehe" hamayse kina ke maasade.
43021006	Kidiar "Kaaran qazadhen zaaninam bazindara sagadhen gonngalansa mizaqimbar dhabee; yedeeda yede" kena ki hamade. Ogonante kediar ke dhabade; thoothi kaaranin yedadhonna, gochayse bulano keam bashidine.
43021007	Yesusin nashea kisa paanan yivea ea Bhethiroosna "Kaa kidi Imbane!" kina ki hamade. Ogonante Simoon Bhethiroos Imbaa kinin dohonam yinin qansenka, pundiri yinin dohonna apalan yinnonam qaadhayse bazinte ki bhulade.
43021008	Yesussa paanan yivayna waani eedi tabhi kaysa dhundhuma bish bazinsa apora kenin pegadhonna, kaaran iir thoothon zaaninam gochayse bazindara sagadhen gonngalanka ke nivade.
43021009	Gonngalara peendar kenin utenka, balashabee nuun qolshinandar wodadha kaarabe ke haapade.
43021010	Yesusaar "Ta yenin yedon kaarara bevee" kena ki hamade.
43021011	Simoon Bhethiroosaar bazindara sagadhen gonngalante ardayse eedi tobbhaa kaysa apo tabhi makkam gembha kaaranaka thoothon zaaninam peendar ki gochade; ogoaddha hamon kaaran ko yedaakaar zanno havadehe.
43021012	Yesusaar "Kote nivayse itsee" kena ki hamade. Kisa paanan yivaynasa kala hattear "Ya hayne?" hamayse kiam oysana zagaa eedi qolehe; Imbaa kinin dohonam kedi dhesidine.
43021013	Yesus balashanam tiyayse kena ki imade; kaaranamaar ogodettsi kena ki imade.
43021014	Yesus dembhira yinin dhaabhonsa budonte yisa paanan yivaynana kinin haapadhenka kono kisa goyti makkansone.
43021015	Galan kenin itsonsa budonte Yesus Simoon Bhethirooskal "Wannissa naasa Simoon, kinara sagi iam ya nashaa nasho?" kina ki hamade. "Ee, Imbo, haam inin nashenam ya dhesaada dhese" kina ki hamade. "Isa anqanaam gishaa!" kina ki hamade.
43021016	Pir lanso "Wannissa naasa Simoon, iam ya nashaa nasho?" kina ki hamade. "Ee, Imbo, haam inin nashenam ya dhesaada dhese" kina ki hamade. "Isa yaanaam gishaa!" kina ki hamade.
43021017	Makkanso goyt "Wannissa naasa Simoon, iam ya nashaa nasho?" kina ki hamade. Makkanso goyt "Iam ya nashaa nasho?" kinin hamonna Bhethiroos woylaminka yisa atayse, "Imbo, ya wulam hada dhese; haam inin nashenam ya dhesaada dhese" kina ki hamade. Yesusaar "Isa yaanaam gishaa!
43021018	Inta hana gon ida giye: Ya barsh hanin dohonka hasa qalbathanam karnante hanti dhaxayse hanin nashendar hada yive. Ko dahaannaar hanin gecchenka aanin hannonam hada pishke; eedi ab hasa qalbathanam karnante hana kida dhaxe; yivana hanin nashimondar haam kida entse" kina ki hamade.
43021019	Hamindettsi dembhika Barjoam kinin gobshenam kina eshkana ogoam ki giyade. Ogoamaar yin giyayse, "Isa paanan nivaa" kina ki hamade.
43021020	Bhethiroos budoka wal hamayse kinin shedenka, Yesusin nashea kisa paanan yiveam kesa paananka kinin nivenka kiam ki haapade. Kidi anngala sootin galandar kenin dohon wodanka Yesussa sadankal theedayse, "Imbo, haam yettsate imea hayne?" hamayse oysaa kidine.
43021021	Bhethiroosaar kiam haapayse Yesusna "Imbo, ea kaa keeda hamin ki hame?" kina ki hamade.
43021022	Yesusaar "Inin nivenka yekka kinin doadettsi i zagidianna, haam gidir arsoono hare? Ya isa paanan nivaa!" kina ki hamade.
43021023	Ogonante agaa Yesussa paanan yivea ea "Dembhi keeda diyehe" hamayno dhalqino imbaanaanasa shaarinte ko qansimade. Ko dahaannaar Yesus "Inin nivenka yekka kinin doadettsi i zagidianna, haam gidir arsoono hare?" ki hamade; "Dembhi diyehe" hamadehe.
43021024	Yerra iginana tarjaabee thaapaabe kisa paanan yivea ea agaane; kisa tarjamonoar gon konin dohonam dhesooda dhese.
43021025	Waani pir Yesusin waadadhoono thoothi yer daane; wulam kalaa kalaa thaapadhidianna, ini thaapadhayna mathaapinana peeno kono yeekehe hamayse ida bhocche.
44001001	-
44001002	Toplooso, Yesus waadiman yinnonam yinin yedon wodara cecindar yinin yivenka yekka, kinin waadadhonbee dhettsonbe wulam biraa mathaapadar inta thaapidine. Cecindar kinin utensa birayse yisa tarjamonnante kamayse yinin yittsaana eenana Manpas Gazanka "Yin hayee" hamayse ki giyade.
44001003	Ogonoar dembhira yinin dhaabhonsa budonte, eedi lamaa kaysa rooroka yekka thoothi tarjaka may kena sadanka dahayse haapadhaate Barjosa bitamonam kena giyaate ki dhahade.
44001004	Kembesana kinkaar yinin dohon wodanka Yerusaalemra kenin utoamadettsi kena ki giyade. Ko dahaannaar, "Inin yena giyoono Imba 'Yena imayda ime' kinin hamonam toolee.
44001005	Harrna hambhidianna, Wannis eenaam noqoka ki shivade; yedi likka roorosa budonte, Manpas Gazanka yeda shiidhe" kena ki hamade.
44001006	Kediar kinka bukayse kenin dohonka, "Imbo, Israveel eena maatate kenin bitimoadettsi hanin hayayno wodano taakiw?" hamayse kiam ke oysade.
44001007	Yesusaar kena yinin maasenka, "Imba yisa hayamonka kinin bhocchon wodanbee levenbeam ye dhese yena imbhadehe.
44001008	Ko dahaannaar Manpas Gazanin yedar hanchon wodanka kantanam yeda tiye; Yerusaalembee, Yiwda peen wulbee, Sammaria peenbe, pir peensa gasanka yekka, isa tarja yeda maate" ki hamade.
44001009	Yesus ogoam yinin giyonsa budonte, kiam keda shedika tura cecindar ki yivade; polonoar kesa aapira aachayse kiam ko tiyade.
44001010	Kinin yivenkaar kedi tura cecin shedayse ke daaka, marrato! Apala cawli qaadhaana eena lamaa kesa gasante ke woyade.
44001011	"Yedi Galila eenato, tura cecin shedada harrnee woyaa? Agaa yekalanka cecindar tiidhaa Yesus cecindar kinin yivenka yenin shedaadettsi, yin maatate kida nive" kena ke hamade.
44001012	Ogo wodanka Dabirezayt hambhen dhukara Yerusaalemdar ke maatade; Dabirezayt dhukano Yerusaalemkal theedine.
44001013	Yerusaalem gidir nivayse yinin dehen ooninsa zulondar woysadhon oonin ke utade. Kediar Bhethiroosbee, Wannisbee, Yayqoobbee, Indiriasbee, Pilbhoosbee, Toomaasebee, Bartelemoosbee, Maatoosbee, Ilpoos naasa Yayqoobbee, peen yinnonna bish qaabea Simoonbee, Yayqoob naasa Yiwdabe,
44001014	pir maa waanibee, Yesussa indan Mayriyambee, Yesussa kannabe kinka maatayse rooro wul Barjoam miskana bhocchi kalaaka bukite ke dahade.
44001015	Ogo wodanka bukaana eedi lax kaysa maatayna Yesussa paanan yivayna eenasa shaarinte Bhethiroos woyayse yin ki giyade:
44001016	"Imbanaanato, Yesusam yedaana eenasa entsaa Yiwdana Manpas Gazano birayse Dawtsa aponka kinin giyoono Mathaap Gazante thaapadhoono thootha ko zaskade.
44001017	Yiwda wombesana paydadhaa, ko Barjosa waadimanna kambhaa eedi ki dahade" ki hamade.
44001018	Ea agaa kisa siyon waadimanna kashadhon koymonka pee ki shanade. Kidi gupana ki dhambaysaka kisa iino bhaqayse nuqurtino ko utade.
44001019	Ogono yerro Yerusaalem gidir dohon een wulkal ko dhesimade. Ogonante peen ogoam kesa aponka "Akeldama" hamayse ke eelade; kosa bulinoar "zombhi pee" hamintane.
44001020	Bhethiroos pir "Ogonoar yin konin dohoono Mazmur mathaapinte 'Kinin dahayno ranqo eedin qolmino ko dee; eediar gidir ko dahabhoode' taar, 'Kisa hayamonam eedi ab ki tiye' hamayse thaapadhonnane.
44001021	"Ogonante Imbaa wontea Yesus wosa shaarinte kinin dohon wodan wulka wombesana kinka dahayna eenasa shaarira,
44001022	Wannisin shiverra yedayse Imbaa wontea Yesus cecindar kinin yivaa rooroaka yekka dahayna eenasa kalaa wombesana kinka Yesussa diira dhaabhidinsa tarja maata ko kiam zaske" ki hamade.
44001023	Ogonante kesa shaarira eedi lamaam ke woysade; kediar Bersaabas way Iyosthos hambhea Yoseepbee Maatiasbene.
44001024	-
44001025	Barjodar woylamin qajayna eenaar yin giyayse Barjoam ke miskade: "Een wulsa woylamin dhesea Imbaa wontea Yesuso, hasa tarja hayayse yiam hanin nittsaa kinin doadettsi, eena igina lamaanasa hayyeam hanin kamonam wona eshkaa. Kono waadimano Yiwda yisa raqinte yivan kinin garoono waadimanone" hamayse kiam ke miskade.
44001026	Ithaar ke dhabade; ithanoar Maatiasdar ko wavade. Ogonante kidiar tabhi kalaana Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaanabesana kinka ki paydadhade.
44002001	Bhentheqosthe bavaala yeskaysaka Yesussa paanan yivayna eena wul raq kalaadar bukayse ke dahade.
44002002	Bhocchadhima wura kantadettsi maatoono upsi cecira nivayse kenin dohon ooninka ko thoothade.
44002003	Nuusa laabhinadettsi maatayna atabh kashimayse kesa metena metenadar ko dooqade.
44002004	Kedi wulaar Manpas Gazanka ke thoothade. Manpasinoar kenin giyoadettsi kena imoono apo waana waanaka giyan ke yedade.
44002005	Ogo wodanka peen wulra nivaana Ayiwd eenasa Barjona goodimintaka wocchimbhayna eena Yerusaalem gidir ke dahade.
44002006	Ogo upsinam yinin qansen wodanka thoothino eeno ko bukade; eeno ogono wul kesa aponka kenin giyenka keam kenin qansonna yinin giyenam ke bashadhade.
44002007	Kattsi targadhayse yin ke giyade: "Marrato! Igina giyayna eena wul Galila eenatayu?
44002008	Ta keeda wodi wul wonnon aponka kenin giyenka woda qanse. Yin hamin ko maataa?
44002009	Wodi Bharte eenabee, Meedon eenabee, Elaam eenabee, Mesbhethoomia eenabee, Yiwda eenabee, Qebhedoqia eenabee, Bhanthoos eenabee, Isiya eenabee,
44002010	Pirgia eenabee, Bhinpilia eenabee, Gibth eenabee, Qerena katamansa gasante dohon Liibia eenabe; pir Roome katamara nivaana Ayiwd eenabee Barjodar woylamin qajintanka Ayiwd eenadar ardaana eenabe;
44002011	tapir Qerthes eenabee, Areb eenabe dahayse Barjosa gebhon waadimanam wodi wul wonnon aponka kenin giyenka qansite wo dahade" ke hamade.
44002012	Eena wul targadhayse yinin giyen bashadhayse, kinka kikal "Kono yer hare?" ke hamade.
44002013	Waani eeno ko hanna, "Wucadhenam wucayse ke bardhade" hamayse keam ko bagade.
44002014	Ogo wodanka Bhethiroos tabhi kalaana Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaanabesana kinka woyayse, upsi gebhika eenana yin ki giyade: "Yedi Yiwda peen eenabee Yerusaalem gidir dahaana eena wulbeto, inin yena giyenam qansee; payya hayayse dhesee.
44002015	Yenin qaabendettsi eena igina bardhaanatehe; peen sedhaysaka savaat makkamne.
44002016	Ko dahaannaar ta ko yenin qansayno dhalqino ena Barjokala qansayse eenna giyea Yuveelin giyoonone:
44002017	'Barjo yin ki giyade: "Macchin rooroaka yin koda maate: Een wuldar isa Manpasinam ida laale. Naana yenna annginabee maanabe Barjokala qansayse eenna keda giye; barshina naana yennaar Barjoyn kena dhohon shedintonam keda haape; yesa donzanaar haama keda haape.
44002018	Igina rooronaka annginabee maanabe ina waadimayna eenadar isa Manpasinam ida laale; kediar ikala qansayse eenna keda giye.
44002019	Tura cecinte tarshen yerinaam, mia peentear milkitinam ida dhee; zombhibee, nuubee, cubabe koda haapadhe.
44002020	Kattsi gebhi maatayno tarshayno Barjosa rooronin nivonsa birayse hayno thipa ko thipe, arpinoar zombhidettsi maatayse koda ookime.
44002021	Barjosa naabenam eelayna wul dhaqa ke dhaqe" ki hamade' hamayse ki giyade.
44002022	"Yedi Israveel eenato, upsina kinaam qansee: Yenin dhesendettsi Barjo Naazret ea Yesusbar yesa shaarinte kinin waadadhon kattsi tarshen yerinbee milkitinbe goynka Barjokalanka nivaa ea kinin dohonam yena ki tarjade.
44002023	Yesusam Barjo birayse kinin bhocchonbee kinin dhesondettsibe yena saskate kiam ko imbhade; yediar seeson eenasa aaninka kinin ziitadhoadettsi hayayse ye dettsade.
44002024	Barjoar dembhisa gaalenam bashayse diira kiam ki dhaasade; harrna hambhidianna, dembhinoar kiam yedayse kinin dhaabhoamadettsi marana damadehe.
44002025	Dawtaar kinnon goynsa yin ki giyade: 'Barjoam rooro wul isa birante ida shede; imbesana kinka kinin dohonna gibazattine.
44002026	Ogonante isa woylammo ko wozadhade; isa atambhoar wozanka ko thoothade; pir isa waanoar Barjodar qaabe hayayse koda dee.
44002027	Harrna hambhidianna, isa sadanam diyaana eenayn dohon raqinte garattane; Gazaa hasa Naasaar kinin capoadettsi kiam hayattane.
44002028	Sadaka daadhensa goynam ina ha dhettsade; imbesana kinka hanin dohonna, ina wozanam hada thoose' ki hamade.
44002029	"Imbanaanato, ena wosa eykea Dawt kinin diyonbee, kinin duukadhonbee, kisa duukinoar kinaka yekka wosa gasante dohonbeam qothimima yena ida giye.
44002030	Dawt Barjokala qansayse eenna giyea kinin dohonnabee, Barjo 'Hasa muldhara hasa bitamon borkotondar ida wode' hamayse malla kina yinin ardonam yinin dhesonnabe,
44002031	birayse shedayse, Barjoyn yiam qadhaa Kiristoosam diyaana eenayn dohon raqinte kinin garoamadettsibee kisa waanar duukinte konin capoamadettsibe diira kinin dhaabhenam ki giyade.
44002032	Kaa Yesusam Barjo diira kiam ki dhaasade; yerin kosa wodi wul tarjana eenane.
44002033	Ogonante Barjo yisa mizaqimbar dheg dheg hayayse kiam ki wodade. Kisa Imbaa Barjo 'Yena Manpas Gazanam imayda ime' hamonam Yesus tiyayse ogo yenin haapenbee yenin qansenbeam ki laalade.
44002034	-
44002035	Dawt yina cecindar utadehe; ko dahaannaar Dawt yinti yin ki giyade: 'Barjo isa Imbaana, "Haam jibbayna eenaam hasa hayamon demente inin hayenka yekka, isa mizaqimbar dooqaa" kina ki hamade' hamayse ena ki giyade.
44002036	Ta keeda yenin ziitaa kaa Yesusam Imbaabee qadhadhaa Kiristoosbe kiam Barjoyn hayonam Israveel eena wul gon ke dhese" ki hamade.
44002037	Eenaar dhalqin ogoam yinin qansenka, yisa woylaminka kattsi atayse Bhethiroosbee waani Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaana eenabena "Imbanaanato, ta keeda yer har wo hayo?" kena ke hamade.
44002038	Bhethiroosaar kena yin ki giyade: "Seeson waadiman yennonam garayse Barjodar maatee; yesa seesonam yena shiishadhoadettsi yedi yesa meteka meteka Yesus Kiristoossa naabenka shiidhee; Barjo yena imayno Manpas Gazanamaar tiyeeda tiye.
44002039	Harrna hambhidianna, Barjo 'imayda ime' kinin hamon Manpas Gazano yembee, yesa naanabee, Imbaa wosa Barjo yikal kinin eelayna pegente dahaana eena wulbenane" ki hamade.
44002040	Bhethiroos thoothi kena yinin tarjenka, "Ko wodanka dahaana siyana eenadar niven Barjosa wacimera dhaqee!" hamayse keam ki kiilade.
44002041	Kisa dhalqinam tiyaana eena ke shiidhade; ogo rooronka shii makkamaddha Barjodar woylamin qajayna eena kedar ke ardade.
44002042	Kediar Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaana eena kenin dhettsenam qansintabee, kinka kalaa dayntabee, kinka gala itsintabee, Barjoam miskintabeka ke wocchimbhade.
44002043	Ogo wodanka Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaana eenaka thoothi tarsheabee Barjosa hayamon dhehea yerbe yinin waadadhonna eena wul ke kurtumbhade.
44002044	Barjodar woylamin qajayna eena wul kinka kalaa ke dahade; yisa dohon yer wulamaar kinka ke kashimade.
44002045	Yisa haaminbee dohon koymonbeam shanshayse een wulna zaskendettsi ke kashimade.
44002046	Rooroa rooroaka Barjosa gazan ooninte woylam kalaaka maatayse keda buke; kinka yisa onnar kiam eelayse wozadhaate woylam payyaka kinka galanam keda kumme.
44002047	Barjoamaar keda gobshe; eeno wulaar keam koda gobshe. Imbaa wontea Yesusaar kidar woylamin qajayse dhaqayna eenaam rooroa rooroaka kedar kida arse.
44003001	Bhethiroosbee Wannisbe Barjoam miskadhen sal savatka Barjosa gazan oonindar ke yivade.
44003002	Ogo wodanka adhadhorra yedayse rooysa wobaa eedi kalaam eedi waani kedayse ke nivade; kiamaar rooro wulka bavayse "Kerro Goobeno" hamayse yiam eldhen Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayante ardadhen kerin gasante kiam keda wode. Ear ogote dooqayse Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayante ardayna eenakalanka yer kida miske.
44003003	Kidiar Bhethiroosbee Wannisbe Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayante kenin ardenka keam shedayse yer keam ki miskade.
44003004	Kediar payya hayayse kiam ke shedade; Bhethiroos "Woam shedaa!" kina ki hamade.
44003005	Ear yer kina imana kenin hayea konin maatonna keam ki shedade.
44003006	Bhethiroosaar "Koymo kala hattear ikal qolehe; ko dahaakaar ikal dohonam hana imayda ime. Naazret peen ea Yesus Kiristoossa naabenka dhaabhayse yaayaa!" kina ki hamade.
44003007	Kisa mizaqin aaninamaar yedayse kiam ki dhaasade; saanawa kisa roonbee gaaran buqonbe ko wocchimbhade.
44003008	Lav hamayse woyayse yaayan ki yedade. Yaayadabee, bhuladabee, Barjoam gobshadabe Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayante kembesana kinka ki ardade.
44003009	Eena wulaar yaayada Barjoam kinin gobshenka kiam ke haapade.
44003010	Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayante ardadhayno Kerin Goobensa gasante dooqayse eenkala yerin miskea ea kinin dohonam ke dhesade. Kinin yaayenamaar haapayse kattsi ke targadhade.
44003011	Ear Bhethiroosbee Wannisbeam yedayse ki daaka, eeno wul targadhaate kekal gobayse Solomoon Baaran hambhen raqinte ke nivade.
44003012	Bhethiroosaar eenaam shedayse kena yin ki giyade: "Yedi Israveel eenato, yerin koka harrnee targadhe? Wodi wosa kantabee wosa gazamobeka ea kaa ki yaaye wonin hayaadettsi maasayse harrnee woam shede?
44003013	Wosa eykena Abraambee, Yisaaqbee, Yayqoobbesaar Barjoa, kisa Naasa Yesusam ki gobshade. Yediar Bhilathoosna saskate kiam ye imade; Bhilathoosaar kiam bulana kinin bhocchenka, 'Kiam zagattone' hamayse ye giyade.
44003014	Yediar gazabee tipabe maataa eam 'Kiam zagattone' hamayse, een deesaa eam yena buldhoadettsi ye miskade.
44003015	Sadanka daadhen imea eam ye dettsade; Barjoar diira kiam ki dhaasade. Ogona wodi tarjanane.
44003016	Kaa yenin haapeabee yenin dheseabe kinin paashoono Yesusdar woylamin qajintakane; Yesussa naabenka dhaqayse ki wocchimbhade. Yesusbar haapadhen Barjodar woylamin qajintakaar ye wulsa birante payyamo kidi haapidine.
44003017	"Taar imbanaanato, yembee yeam wottsaynabe dhesima Yesusdar yenin waadadhonam dhesayda dhese.
44003018	Barjoar ena birayse yikal qansayse eenna giyayna wulsa aponka 'Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoos gaale tiya kiam ko zaske' kinin hamoono konin thoothoadettsi ki hayade.
44003019	Ta keeda yesa seesonam yena gardhoadettsi seeson waadimanam garayse Barjodar maatee.
44003020	Yin ye hayna Barjokala ookime woda yena nivasane. Barjoar ena birayse yena kamayse kinin qadhaa Yesusam kida nittse.
44003021	Barjo enara yedayse kikala qansayse eenna giyayna gazana eenasa aponka kinin giyondettsi, yer wul haalisadhenka yekka Yesus cecinte kappa kiam ko zaske.
44003022	Musear 'Imbaa yesa Barjo iam kinin dhaasondettsi yesa shaarira Barjokala qansayse eenna giyea eam yena dhaasa ki dhaase; kinin yena giyen wulam qansee.
44003023	Ogo Barjokala qansayse eenna giyea eakal qansima eedi hayyear eensa shaarira edimayse ki kaye' hamayse ki giyade.
44003024	Ogodettsi Saameeldara yedayse dahaana Barjokala qansayse eenna giyayna wul ta ko wodansa kedi giydine.
44003025	Yedi Barjokala qansayse eenna giyayna eenaka kinin imon upsinam tiyayna eenane. Barjo Abraamna 'Hasa muldhanaka peendar dohoono eeno wul gobshadhoono koda maate' hamayse wosa eykenabesana kinin ardon mallanam yedi tiyayna eenane.
44003026	Barjo Naasa yinteam dhaasayse kinin yittsoono birayse yenane. Ogono yin kinin hayoonoar yedi kalaa kalaana yesa siyon waadimara yeam maasintaka yeam gettsanane" kena ki hamade.
44004001	Bhethiroosbee Wannisbe eenana kenin giyenka, gudullabee, Barjosa gazan ooninam toolayna eenasa wottseabee, Saduqa eenabe kedar ke nivade.
44004002	Bhethiroosbee Wannisbe eenaam kenin dhettsenbee Yesuska diira dhaabhinta dohonam kenin giyenbena ke wacimade.
44004003	Keam yedaysear peenin ibanonna, peenin sedhenka yekka dhaxin ooninte keam ke dhaskade.
44004004	Ko dahaannaar Bhethiroosbee Wannisbesa dhalqinam qansaana eenasa shaarinte thoothino eeno Barjodar woylamin ko qajade; ogo wodanka Barjodar woylamin qajon eensa paydino shii dongaddha ko yeskade.
44004005	Peen sedhaysaka Ayiwd eenaam wottsaynabee, peensa donzanabee, Musesa yigginam dhettsaynabe Yerusaalem gidir ke bukade.
44004006	Bukaana eenasa shaarinte gudullasa gebhaa Hannabee, Qayappabee, Wannisbee, Iskindirosbee, gudullasa gebhaasa muldhana wulbe ke dahade.
44004007	Kediar Bhethiroosbee Wannisbeam yisa shaarinte keam woysayse, "Ogo yenin hayoono har kantakabee haysa naabenbeka ye waadadhaa?" hamayse keam ke oysade.
44004008	Ogo wodanka Bhethiroos Manpas Gazanka thoothayse kena yin ki giyade: "Yedi eenaam wottsaynabee peensa donzanabe,
44004009	ea woboana waadadhadhon payyan waadimanka hamin kinin paashonam kina woam oysadhidianna,
44004010	kiam yenin ziitaa Barjoar diira kiam dhaasaa Naazret ea Yesus Kiristoossa naabenka ea kaa paashayse yesa birante kinin woyondettsi, yembee Israveel een wulbena ko dhesime.
44004011	Ogonoar yedi ooninam woysayna eena bagayse yenin dhabaa seenia kidine; agaa seeniar kattsi ooninna zaskea ki maatade.
44004012	Dhaqinta kikalanka ab haykaar qolehe; wonin dhaqoadettsi zaskea eennaar imbhaa Yesus naabera cecinsa choobar naabe ab qolehe" kena ki hamade.
44004013	Yiwda peensa donzana Bhethiroosbee Wannisbe kurtumbhima kenin giyonam yinin haapenka, raq yinna imbhaammabee timmirinsa qolminabe kenin maatenam yinin dhesenka kedi targadhidine; Yesusbesana kinka ena kenin dohonam kedi dhesidine.
44004014	Yisa burqonka paashaa ear kembesana kinka woyayse ki daaka kiam kenin shedenka yinin giyenam ke bashadhade.
44004015	Yiwda peensa donzana os mayanka keam bulayse, yin giyayse kinka ke dhalqade:
44004016	"Eena kinadar yer har wo hayo? Ogono yer tarshayno kenin waadadhoono Yerusaalem gidir dahaana eena wulkal dhesimidine; ogonante wodi marimana damattone.
44004017	Ko dahaannaar eenakal dhalqino kono kattsi konin workoamadettsi, keeda kaara os eedi haynaar Yesussa naabenka kenin giyoamadettsi wocchinsayse kena wo giye" ke hamade.
44004018	Keam eelayse, Yesussa naabenka eenna hamin ko dahaakaar kenin giyoamadettsibee kenin dhettsoamadettsibe wocchinsayse kena ke giyade.
44004019	Bhethiroosbee Wannisbe yin giyayse kena ke maasade: "Ta yedi pirdee: Barjona ee hamara yena ee haminta Barjo birante zaskaynow?
44004020	Wodi wonin haaponbee wonin qansonbeam giyara lay hamana damattone" kena ke hamade.
44004021	Yiwda peensa donzana hamin keam yinin dhabshenam ke bashadhade; ogonoar zarsinam kenin kurtumbhonna keam kattsi kurtunsayse ke garade. Ogonoar zarsino yerin hamon wulka Barjoam gobshite konin dohonnane.
44004022	Harrna hambhidianna, ogo tarshea yerinka yiam pacchadhaa easa lendho eedi lamaa kaysadara sagi ko dahade.
44004023	Bhethiroosbee Wannisbe dhaxira keam buldhaysaka, yisa eedanakal nivayse gudullasa hayonabee peensa donzanabe kena hamon wulam ke giyade.
44004024	Kediar ogoam yinin qansenka woylam kalaaka upsinam dheg hayayse Barjodar yin giyayse ke miskade: "Imbo, cecinbee, peenbee, bazinbeam, kesa iinte dohon wulam pijaa yane.
44004025	Manpas Gazanka hasa waadiman ea wosa eykea Dawtsa aponka ha giyna: 'Ayiwdtay hamma eena harrna ke wacimaa? Eenoar pootimin yerinam harrna ko bhocchaa?
44004026	Peensa binna banqinna ashkimbhayse, wottsaynaar kinka bukayse Barjobee kinin qadhaa Kiristoosbedar ke dhaabhade' hamaysea giyade.
44004027	Herodisbee Bhenthenaawi Bhilathoosbe, Ayiwdtay hamma eenabee Israveel eenabe kinka kataman kote bukayse, hanin qadhaa gazaa hasa Naasa Yesusdar gon ke dhaabhade.
44004028	Kenin dhaabhoono ya birayse hasa kantanbee bhocchinbeka hanin bhocchonam waadadhanane.
44004029	Taar Imbo, kenin kurtunsenam shedaa; wodi hana waadimayna eena kurtumbhima hasa upsinam wonin giyoadettsi woam wocchinsaa.
44004030	Gazaa hasa Naasa Yesussa naabenka hajadhaana eenaam pacchotabee, tarshea yer hayotabee, milkit dhootabe aanin hannonam pishkaa" hamayse Barjoam ke miskade.
44004031	Barjoam kenin miskonsa budonte, bukayse kenin dohoono ranqo ko shohade; kedi wulaar Manpas Gazanka ke thoothade; Barjosaar upsinam kurtumbhima ke giyade.
44004032	Barjodar woylamin qajayna eena wul woylam kalaabee qaabo kalaabeka ke dahade. Yer wul kesa kalaa ko dahade; kesa dohorra yer kala hattear "Kaa intine" hamayse giyea eedi qolehe.
44004033	Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaana eenaar Imbaa wontea Yesus dembhira kinin dhaabhonam gebhon kantanka eenna ke tarjade. Barjosa sunin imintono ke wuldar ko dahade.
44004034	-
44004035	Haamibee oonibe yisa dahaana wul shanshaate koymonam bavayse Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaana eenana ke imade. Kiristoosin yittsaanaar een wulna keam zaskendettsi kenin imonna, kesa shaarinte gaale eed kala hattear qolehe.
44004036	Qobhiroos gidir adhadhaa Lewi muldha maataa Yoseep hambhea eedi kalaa ki dahade. Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaana eenaar "Barnabaas" hamayse kiam ke eelade; "Barnabaas" haminta "wocchinsea ea" hamintane.
44004037	Kidiar yisa haaminam shanshayse, koymonam bavayse Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaana eenana ki imade.
44005001	Hanania hambhea kisa geshon Sabhirabesana yisa haami ke shanshade.
44005002	Hanania geshonda dhesika haamin yinin shanshon birrera antinam yina shiishayse, antinam Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaana eenana bavayse ki imade.
44005003	Bhethiroosaar "Hanania, Manpas Gazanam ha taysebee haamin hanin shanshonsa antinam hanin shiishoadettsibe Seethaan hasa woylaminte harrna ki ardaa?
44005004	Hanin shanshensa birayse hammo hantitayu? Hanin shanshonsa budontesin koymono hasa aanintetayu? Ta yerin koam hasa woylaminka harrnaa bhocchaa? Hanin taysoono Barjoamne, eediamtehe" kina ki hamade.
44005005	Hananiar dhalqin ogoam yinin qansenka dhambayse ki diyade. Yerin ogoam qansaana eena wul kattsi ke kurtumbhade.
44005006	Barshinaar dhaabhayse kisa leesinam ochayse tiyate ke duukade.
44005007	Hanania diyaysaka savaat makkamsa budonte kisa geshono raqin ogote ko nivade; kodi geshoadar yeskon yerinam dhesadehe.
44005008	Bhethiroosaar "Yesa haaminam yenin shanshoono koymona kinadaru? Ina giyaa" hamayse koam ki oysade. Kodiar "Gon iginadarne" kina ko hamade.
44005009	Bhethiroosaar "Barjo Imbasa Manpasinam taysate shedana haminee kinka dhalqaa? Shedaa! Hasa geshoam duukayse maatayna eena mayante yeskidine; ta haamaar bulayse duuka ke duuke" kona ki hamade.
44005010	Kodiar saana kisa roonkal dhambayse ko diyade. Geshoam duukaana eenaar kenin ardenka diyayse ko daaka koam haapayse tiyate geshoakal koam ke duukade.
44005011	Barjodar woylamin qajayna eena wulbee dhalqin koam qansaana eena wulbe kattsi ke kurtumbhade.
44005012	Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaana eena thoothi milkitbee tarshea yerbeam eensa shaarinte waadadhite ke dahade. Barjodar woylamin qajayna eena wul woylam kalaaka maatayse Solomoon Baaran hambhen raqinte bukite ke dahade.
44005013	Waani eensa eedi kala hattear kembesana kinka dahaana wocchimbhea eedi qolehe; ko dahaannaar eeno keam gobshite ko dahade.
44005014	Imba Yesusdar woylamin qajayna annginabee maanabesa paydino kattsi thoothada ko yivade.
44005015	Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaana eenayn waadadhen tarshen waadiman goynka, eeno hajadhaana eenaam goyn apondar bulayse haaqabee eebhebedar keam ko wodade; ogono yin kenin hayoonoar Bhethiroos raqin ogoka kinin yivenka kisa shipeno hattear kesa waani waanidar konin yeskoadettsine.
44005016	Pir eena Yerusaalemsa gasante dahaana gurdanara hajadhaanabee rumin dhaasite gaalaynabeam ke bavade; kedi wulaar burqora paashite ke dahade.
44005017	Saduqa eensa shaarira gudullasa gebhaabee kimbesana kinka dahaana yettsina wulbe woogintaka Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaanadar ke dhaabhade.
44005018	Keam yedayse dhaxin ooninte ke dhaskade.
44005019	-
44005020	Barjosa gaana sootinka dhaxin ooninsa kerinaam bulayse keam entsate yivayse, "Yedi yivayse Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayante woyayse, ko haalin sadanka daadhensa upsin wulam eenna giyee" hamayse keam ki yittsade.
44005021	Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaana eenaar upsin ogoam yinin qansenka, burin sedhiman Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayante ardayse eenaam dhettsan ke yedade. Ogo wodanka gudullasa gebhaabee kimbesana kinka dahaana eenabe nivaysaka, Yiwda peensa donzanabee Israveel eensa shaarira donzana wulbeam eelate ke buskade. Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaana eenaamaar kenin bovoadettsi dhaxin oonindar poolisanaam ke yittsade.
44005022	Poolisana dhaxin ooninte yivayse Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaanaam haapadehe. Maatate peen donzanakal nivayse,
44005023	"Dhaxin ooninam diithadhaysaka, toolayna eenaar kerindar woyayse ke daaka keam wo haapade. Ko dahaannaar dhaxin ooninsa kerinaam wonin bulenka ooninte hayyeamaar haapootone" kena ke hamade.
44005024	Barjosa gazan ooninam toolayna eenasa wottseabee gudullasa hayonabe dhalqin ogoam yinin qansenka, "Kono yer hamin hamonne?" hamayse kenin giyayno keam ko bashade.
44005025	Ogo wodanka eedi kalaa nivayse, "Marrato! Dhaxin ooninte yenin dhaxaana eena Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayante woyayse eenam dhettsite ke dahade!" hamayse kena ki giyade.
44005026	Ogona Barjosa gazan ooninam toolayna eenasa wottseabee poolisanabe yivayse keam ke bavade. Poolisana "Eeno woam seenika paxate deesasane" hamayse kenin kurtumbhonna, keam kenin bovoono kantakatehe.
44005027	Keam bavate nivayse peensa donzanasa birante ke woysade. Gudullasa gebhaa
44005028	"Yesussa naabenam eelintaka eenam yenin dhettsoamadettsi wocchinsayse yena wodi giydine. Ko dahaannaar, marrato! Yerusaalemir yesa timmirino raq wulir yeskidine; ea agaasa zombhinamaar wodar hayana ye zagade" hamayse kedar ki dhiidhimade.
44005029	Bhethiroosbee waani Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaanabe yin giyayse ke maasade: "Eedina ee hamintara Barjona ee haminta ko woam zaske.
44005030	Yedi masqalindar konngayse yenin ziitayse deesaa Yesusam wosa eykenasa Barjoa dembhira kiam ki dhaasade.
44005031	Ogonoar Barjo Yesusam Entseabee Dhaccheabe hayayse yisa mizaqinte gobshinka kiam dheg dheg ki hayade. Ogoam yin kinin hayoono Israveel eena seeson waadimanam garayse Barjodar kenin maatoadettsibee kesa seesonam kena gardhoadettsibe zagaysene.
44005032	Dhalqin ogosa wodiar tarjanane; Barjo yina ee hamayna eenana kinin imoono Manpas Gazanoar tarjane" kena ke hamade.
44005033	Yiwda peensa donzanaar dhalqin ogoam yinin qansenka kattsi dhagadhayse deesana keam ke qaabade.
44005034	Ko dahaannaar een wulin gobshea Musesa yigginam dhettsea Gamalial hambhea Parisa eedi kalaa Yiwda peensa donzanasa shaarinte dhaabhayse Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaana eenaam likka wodana mayanka keam kenin buloadettsi kena ki giyade.
44005035	Ogora kena yin ki giyade: "Yedi Israveel eenato, eena iginadar yenin hayota dohon yerinka mete yesaam gishee.
44005036	Ena birayse Toodas hambhea ea 'Inta eedi gebhine' hamayse dhaabhidine; eena mato oydiaddhana kimbesana kinka dhalqayse ke yivade. Ogora kiam deesadhaysaka kimbesana kinka yivaynaar thar thar ke hamade; kisa qaabonoar pootimino maatayse ko shidhade.
44005037	Ogosa budontear eensa naabenam thaapadhen levenka Galila peen ea Yiwda dhaabhayse thoothino eeno kisa paananka konin yivoadettsi haydine. Kiam deesadhaysaka kisa paanan yivayna wul thar thar ke hamade.
44005038	Taar inin yena giyayno igina eenakalanka pegadhayse keam yenin garoadettsine. Harrna hambhidianna, ogo kesa qaabonbee kesa waadimanbe eedikalanka ko daana kaya ko kaye.
44005039	Barjokalanka nivoono ko hanna, keam kaysana damattene; tapir Barjosa waadimanam jibbintaka kimbesana kinka gemmaana yeda maate" hamayse keam ki kiilade. Kediar kisa kiilimenam ke tiyade.
44005040	Ogora Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaana eenaam eelayse kenin qandhoadettsi hayayse Yesussa naabenka kenin giyoamadettsi kena giyayse keam ke garade.
44005041	Kediar "Yesussa naabenna bagadha yiam zaskayna eenane" hamayse Barjo keam paydonna wozadhintaka Yiwda peensa donzanakalanka utayse ke yivade.
44005042	Rooro wul Barjosa gazan ooninsa mayantebee eensa onnarbe Yesus Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoos kinin dohondettsi eenam dhettsintaka Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam giyte ke dahade.
44006001	Ogo wodanka Barjodar woylamin qajayna eena thoothada kenin yivenka, Girik aponka dhalqayna Ayiwd eena "Rooroaka rooroaka imbhen yerinka wosa maana qambhinaam yedi walidine" hamayse Yiwda peente adhadhaana Ayiwd eenadar ke gundumade.
44006002	Ogonante tabhi lamaa Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaana eena Barjodar woylamin qajayna eena wulam yikal eelayse kena yin ke giyade: "Barjosa upsinam giynta garayse yer itsadhea kasha woam zaskehe.
44006003	Ta keeda imbanaanato, yisa payyamon waadimanna tarjadhaana, pir Manpas Gazanbee pakalmakkonbeka thoothaana eedi tobbhaa imbhen yerinam kashayna yesa iira kamee; keam waadiman ogodar woda wode.
44006004	Wodiar Barjoam miskaatebee Barjosa upsinam eenna giyaatebe woda wocchimbhe" kena ke hamade.
44006005	Kesa dhalqino ogono een wulam ko wozisade; ogora Barjodar woylamin qajintanbee Manpas Gazanbeka thoothaa Isthipaanoos, pir Pilbhoosbee, Bhirkoroosbee, Niqaronbee, Thimoonabee, Bharmenabee, Ayiwd eenasa Barjodar woylamin qajintante ardaa Anthokia kataman ea Niqolaasbeam ke kamade.
44006006	Igina eenaamaar Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaana eenasa birante ke woysade; kediar Barjoam miskayse aaninam yisa kedar wodayse waadiman ogodar keam ke wodade.
44006007	Barjosa upsinoar workada ko yivade; Yerusaalem gidir Barjodar woylamin qajayna eenasa paydino kattsi thoothada ko yivade; gudullasa thoothina Barjodar woylamin ke qajade.
44006008	Isthipaanoosaar Barjosa sunin imintonbee kantanbeka thoothayse eensa shaarinte kattsi tarshea yerbee gebhi milkitbe kida waadadhe.
