48004020	Taaki yembesana kinka daanabee ta isa dohon bhocchinam ookanabe i zagade. Harrna hambhidianna, yennon goynsa har haya iam konin zaskenam inin dhesaamonna ida gaale.
48004021	Yedi yigginsa demente daana zagayna eenato, yinda ina giyee: Yigginin giyenam qansattenu?
48004022	Abraamsa naana lamaa kenin dohondettsi, kalaa edon worshonsa naasa, lansoa pir worshotay hamon edonsa naasa kinin dohonam Mathaap Gazante thaapadhidine.
48004023	Ko dahaannaar edon worshonsa naasa eedin adhadhendettsi waan bhocchika ki adhadhade; worshotay hamon edonsa naasa Barjo "imayda ime" kinin hamon qaabeyn haydhenka ki adhadhade.
48004024	Ogono dhalqino kamsine. Igina maana lamaana mallana lamaanasa kamsine. Birayse Siina dhukandar imbhon mallansa kamsino Aggarne; kodi naanaam konin adhayno worshamonnane.
48004025	Aggar Areb peente dohon Siina dhukansa kamsine; kodi taaki dohon Yerusaalemdettsi koda maate. Harrna hambhidianna, Yerusaalembee kosa naanabe worshamonte ke dahade.
48004026	Cecinte dohoono Yerusaalem worshotay hammone; kodi wosa indane.
48004027	Harrna hambhidianna, "Ya naasi adhayse dhesimino seekino edono, wozadhaa! Ya adhiman burqon dhesimino, ililsayse ilataa! Geshoaysa dohon mayndara sagi geshoayn garon edonsa naana ke thoothade" hamayse ko thaapadhade.
48004028	Imbanaanato, yedi Yisaaqdettsi Barjo "imayda ime" kinin hamon qaabeyn haydhenka adhadhaana naanane.
48004029	Ko dahaannaar ogo wodanka waan bhocchinka adhadhaa manpasinka adhadhaam kinin oytondettsi, taar ogodettsi ko maatade.
48004030	Ko dahaannaar Mathaap Gazano hamin ko giye? "Edon worshonbee naasabeam bulate oytaa. Harrna hambhidianna, edon worshonsa naasa worshotay hamon edonsa naasabesana kinka toydimehe" koda hame.
48004031	Ogonante imbanaanato, wodi worshotay hamon edonsa naanane, edon worshonsa naanatehe.
48005001	Kiristoos worsho wonin dohorra woam kinin buloono natha wonin doadettsine. Ogonante wocchimbhayse woyee, tapir worsho maateebhode.
48005002	Marrato! Inta Bhawloos yena ida giye: Yesa qaamanam taxadhoadettsi yenin ee hamenna, Kiristoos hamin ko dahaannaar yena pootehe.
48005003	Qaama taxadhana ee hamayna wulna tapir yena ida giye: Musesa yiggin wulam toola yeam koda zaske.
48005004	Yedi yigginam toolintaka Barjo birante tipa maatana zagayna eena Kiristooskalanka edimayse Barjosa sunin imintora yedi pegadhidine.
48005005	Wodi Barjosa Manpasinka Barjodar woylamin qajintaka "Barjo yisa birante tipana eena woam kida maase" hamayse qaabe hayayse woda toole.
48005006	Harrna hambhidianna, Yesus Kiristooska wona pootayno Barjodar woylamin qajayse nashimmakkoka waadadhintane; qaama taxadhintabee taxadhima garintabe wona pootehe.
48005007	Ta koka yekka payyaka yivite ye dahade; ta keeda goninna yenin ee hamoamadettsi yeam maraa hayne?
48005008	Ogodettsino taysimeno yeam eelaa Barjokalankatehe.
48005009	"Likkono irshono taapan wulam koda ocche" hambhondettsine.
48005010	Yer waaniam hamin ko dahaakaar, yenin qaaboamadettsi inta Imbaa wontea Yesuska yedar woylamin inta qajidine. Yeam dhaddhisea hay ki hannaar, pirdinam yidar kida tiye.
48005011	Imbanaanato, inta ta koka yekka "Dhaqana qaamanam taxadha koda zaske" hamayse i giyna, ta koka yekka harrna i oytadhaa? Yin ko hanna, Kiristoossa masqalindar ziitadhayse diydinsa inin giyoono goa konin maatayno shidhidine.
48005012	Ta keeda yeam dhaddhisayna eena qaamaam taxadha bish dayma, buu ke maate ida zage.
48005013	Imbanaanato, nathamona ye eldhade. Nathamono yenno waan anngarmanam yenin thoosea hayeebhode; yin yenin hayerra kinka kinka nashimmakkoka kina waadadhee.
48005014	Harrna hambhidianna, "Een wulam hadettsi hayayse nashaa" hamea upsi kalaaka yiggino wul ko thoothade.
48005015	Ko dahaannaar kinka kiam kiam gavaynabee kiam itsaynabe ye hanna, kiam kiam yenin kaysoamadettsi mete yesaam gishee.
48005016	Ta keeda inta yena ida giye: Manpasinka dehee; waansa anngarmanam hamin ko dahaakaar hayeebhode.
48005017	Harrna hambhidianna, waano Manpasindar, Manpasinoar waandar koda dhaabhe. Kinka kinka kiam kenin jibbenna, yenin zagenam hayana damattene.
48005018	Manpasin yeam entsendettsi ye yivina, yigginsa demente dahattene.
48005019	Waan waadimanoar dhesadhoonone; ogonoar sharmucimakko, minngamo, tagach,
48005020	aaninka ashkadhaana barjonana goodime, palpala haynta, jibbinta, palime, wooginta, waciminta, yibishiam nashinta, edime, kikalanka kashimayse kidar dhaabhinta,
48005021	eedi yeram anngardhinta, bardhinta, warsa, iginadettsinane. Birayse yena inin giyondettsi pir yena ida giye: Ogodettsin hayayna Barjosa bitamonam tiyehe.
48005022	Manpas Gazansa aapino nashimmakko, woza, payyamo, darshinta, lemmakko, eedina payya haynta, gonamo,
48005023	payya eedi maatinta, yisa metenam wottsintane. Iginadettsina yerraam marea yiggi qolehe.
48005024	Yesus Kiristoossa maataana eena waanam kosa qaabonbee anngarmanbesana kedi masqalindar ziitayse deesidine.
48005025	Barjosa Manpasinka dahaana wo hanna, ogo Manpasinka wo yaaye.
48005026	Kinka kinka kidar dhaabhintaka way woogimbheka sun wo erimabhoode.
48006001	Imbanaanato, eedi kalaa seesonsa iinte ki dahaysaka ye haapidianna, yedi manpasinka dahayna eena ogodettsin waadadhea eam lemmakkoka maasee. Yaar pir ogodettsinka hanin taysadhoamadettsi mete hasaam gishaa.
48006002	Yesa iira waa waasa baskenam ki baske; yin hayada Kiristoossa yigginam yeda toole.
48006003	Eedi hayyear waani eendara kinin sagea yer qolma "Inta sagine" hamayse ki qaabina yiam kida tayse.
48006004	Ko dahaannaar eedi wul yisa waadimanam marmarayse ki shede. Ogosa budonte yiam waani eenbesana yeekinsate shedota dayma, yisa meteka yinin erimen yerinam kida haape.
48006005	Harrna hambhidianna, eedi wul yinnon baskenam koda baske.
48006006	Barjosa upsinam timmirea ea payyan yerin wulam kiam dhettseabesana ki kashime.
48006007	Yeam dhaddhiseebhode; Barjo bagadhehe. Eedi yinin yiithonam koda buure.
48006008	Waan yinnonam wozisota yiithea waanka dembhinam kida buure; Manpas Gazanam wozisota yiithea Manpaskalanka rooro wul lay dehen sadanam kida buure.
48006009	Qaabe wonin hayenam garma wonin wocchimbhenna, kosa wodanka koam wonin buurenna, payya waadimanam hayana wo boosimabhoode.
48006010	Ta keeda waadadhana goyti haapidi wo hanna een wulna, kalon Barjodar woylamin qajaynasa oonin eenana payyan waadimanam wo haye.
48006011	Ta hamin dahaana gembha pidallaka koam isa aanka yena inin thaaponam shedee.
48006012	Mayante payya maatayse haapadhana zagayna eena yesa qaamanaam yenin taxadhoadettsi yeam keda kantise; ogoam kenin hayayno Kiristoos masqalinsa oytaydha kedar yeskoamadettsi hamaysene.
48006013	Kedi yesa waanka erimana hamayse yesa qaamanam yenin taxadhoadettsi keda zage; qaaman taxadhaanaar Musesa yigginam toolehe.
48006014	Intaar wosa Imbaa Yesus Kiristoos masqalinkalanka ab inin erimea yer ikalanka ko pegadhe. Ko masqalinka peeno kono ikalanka, intaar peen kokala dembhika edimadhendettsi edimidine.
48006015	Haali pijadhi maatintano koda poote; qaamanaam taxadhabee taxadha garabe pootehe.
48006016	Bhocchin ogoka entsadhayna wulbee Barjo eedi maataana Israveel eenabena payyamobee garintobe kena ko dee.
48006017	Isa waandar dohoono madano Yesussa waadima eedi inin dohonam konin dhehenna, ta keeda kaara os eedi hayyear iam ko galshabhoode!
48006018	Imbanaanato, wosa Imbaa Yesus Kiristoossa sunin imintono yembesana ko dee; amiin.
49001001	Barjo bhocchinka Yesus Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaa i Bhawlooskalanka, Yesus Kiristooska gon maataana Epsoon gidir dahaana Barjo eenana nittsadhoono warqannone.
49001002	Wosa Imbaa Barjobee Imbaa wontea Yesus Kiristoosbesa sunin imintonbee payyamonbe yena ko dee.
49001003	Kiristooska cecinte dohon manpasin gobshin wulka woam gettsaa wosa Imbaa Yesus Kiristoossa Imba maataa Barjo ki gobshadhe.
49001004	Gazanabee siya yer yindar qolmina eenabe maatayse kisa birante wonin haapadhoadettsi, ena peen pijadhima birayse Kiristooska woam ki kamade.
49001005	Barjo yisa payyan bhocchinka woam kinin nashonna, ena birayse qaabayse Yesus Kiristooska kisa naana wonin doadettsi ki hayade.
49001006	Yin kinin hayoonoar nashadhaa yisa Naasaka wona kinin imon yisa sunin iminton gebhonin gobshadhoadettsine.
49001007	Barjosa sunin imintonsa thoothamora dhaabhoono kisa Naasasa zombhino wosa seesonsa baza kashadhea maatayse laymon goynka wosa seesonsa garintonam wodi haapidine.
49001008	Yisa sunin imintonamaar pakalmakkonbee dhettsintonbeka thoosayse wona ki imade.
49001009	Barjo yisa payyamonka Kiristoosbar ena birayse yinin qaabon bhocchinsa aachin dhalqinam wonin dhesoadettsi ki hayade.
49001010	Barjosa bhocchino cecinbee peenbedar dohon pijadhin wulam kinka kidar Kiristoossa hayamon demente maasanane. Ogono yin kinin maasayno Barjoyn qaabon wodanin yeskenkane.
49001011	Yer wulam yisa bhocchinka qaabayse waadadhea Barjo ena birayse yinin giyondettsi ta ki hayade; ogonoar Kiristoosbar kisa eeda wonin doadettsi woam ki kamade.
49001012	Ogono yin konin maatoono birayse Kiristoosdar qaabe hayaana wodi Barjosa gobshinna wonin doadettsine.
49001013	Yediar kanka yenin dhaqayno gon upsi maaton wozisen dhalqinam yenin qansen wodanka, Kiristoosdar woylamin ye qajade. Barjoar "yena imayda ime" yinin hamon Manpas Gazanam kinti yenin maatenam eshkea milkit hayayse yena ki imade.
49001014	Barjoam gobshadhoadettsi, yisa eenaam yinin tiyenka yekka "yena imayda ime" kinin hamon wulam wonin tiyensa tarja maaten Manpas Gazanam wona ki imade.
49001015	Ogonante Imbaa wontea Yesusdar woylamin yenin qajenbee Barjo eena wulna yesa dohon nashimmakkonbeam qansayse,
49001016	Barjoam inin miskenka yeam bhocchada yennon goynka garma Barjoam ida gobshe.
49001017	Kattsi Barjoam yenin dhesoadettsi, wosa Imbaa Yesus Kiristoossa Barjo maataa gobshi yiam zaskea Imbaa pakalmakkobee may dhesintobesa Manpas yena kinin imoadettsi yena kiam ida miske.
49001018	Hamin dohon qaabe haydhenna yeam kinin eelonbee Barjo yisa eenna "imayda ime" kinin hamon gobshinsa thoothamono hamaddha konin dohonbeam yenin dhesoadettsi, yesa woylaminin bulimoadettsi yena Barjoam ida miske.
49001019	-
49001020	Yin pir wodi Barjodar woylamin qajaynana kisa dohoono kantano hamaddha gebhi konin dohonam yenin dhesoadettsi yena Barjoam ida miske. Ogono kantanoar Kiristoosam dembhira dhaasoono cecinte kiam yisa mizaqinte dottsoono Barjo kanka kinin waadadhoono gembho kisa kantanone.
49001021	Barjo Kiristoosam yisa mizaqimbar kinin dottsoono yer harsaar hayamonbee, kantanbee, imba dayntan wulbedara dheg hayayse, pir peen kodar bish dayma keeda kaara os niven wodanka imbhea naabe wuldara sagea gobshi naabe kina imintakane.
49001022	Barjo yer wulamaar Kiristoossa hayamon demente ki hayade. Taar yer wulam wottsea kinin doadettsi misken ooninna mete hayayse kiam ki imade.
49001023	Misken onno Kiristoossa bishine; kodi Kiristoos yer wulka thoothi kinin dohonam koda dhee. Kiristoos zasken wulka yer wulam thoothi kida haye.
49002001	Yedi ee haman yenin garonbee yesa seeson waadimanbeka ena diyaanane.
49002002	Ogo wodanka peen kogayn siyon yerinka yivada, jibarendar dahayse hayamonka wottseana yedi ee hamite ye dahade. Kidi Barjona ee hamiminasa woylaminka taar waadadhea meeshine.
49002003	Iginasa shaarinte wodi wulaar wosa waanbee wosa qaabonbesa bhocchinam waadadhaate waansa anngarmanka ena birayse wo dahade; waani eendettsiar wosa pijadhinka Barjosa wacime wodar ko dahade.
49002004	Ko dahaannaar Barjo yisa garintonsa wodimmakkonka woam kattsi kinin nashonna,
49002005	ee haman garayse diyaana wonin dohon wodanka, Kiristoosbesana kinka sadanka dahayna eena woam ki maasade. Ogono yenin dhaqoonoar Barjosa sunin imintonkane.
49002006	Barjo Kiristoosbesana woam dembhira dhaasayse, cecinte kimbesana ki dottsade. Yesus Kiristooska dahaana eenana
49002007	ogoam kinin hayoonoar Yesus Kiristoosbar wona kinin eshkon payyamon goynsa keeda kaara os niven wodanka yisa sunin imintonsa wodimmakkonam dhaanane.
49002008	Harrna hambhidianna, yenin dhaqoono Barjodar woylamin qajadhen goynsa kisa sunin imintonkane. Ogonoar Barjosa imintone, yekalatehe.
49002009	Hayyear kinin erimoamadettsi ogo dhaqintansa haapadhidino eedisa waadimakatehe.
49002010	Harrna hambhidianna, Barjo birayse wona kinin ashkon payyan waadimanam waadadhaate wonin doadettsi wodi Yesus Kiristoosbar pijadhaana Barjosa pijadhine.
49002011	Ogonante yedi ena yesa adhadhinka Ayiwdtay hamma ye dahade. Ayiwd eena eedina haapadhen qaamanam aanka taxadhaate erimada, "Yedi qaamanam taxadhaamma eenane" yeam keda hame.
49002012	Ogo wodanka Israveel eenasa muldhamora pegadhayse, Barjo "imayda ime" hamayse yinna eenabesana kinin ardon mallanna chocchidettsi maatayse, peen kodar qaabe yindar haydheaysa qolmina, Barjokalaar edimayse Kiristoos qolma yenin dohonam bhocchee.
49002013	Keeda yedi ena birayse pegadhaana Yesus Kiristooska maatayse kisa zombhinka Barjokal yedi theedidine.
49002014	-
49002015	Payyamonam wona imaa Kiristoosne. Kidiar yigginka giidhon dhalqinam shiishintaka woam edon wacimensa kubanam yisa waanka kottsayse, raq lamaadar edimaana eenaam kinka kidar kalaa ki maasade. Ogono yin kinin hayoonoar lamaanaam yinka eedi haali kalaa hayayse payyamonam ki bavade.
49002016	Masqalindar diyayse kinka keam kenin jibbenam kaysayse, ke lamaanaamaar waa kalaa hayayse Barjobesana kinka keam ki qaashinsade.
49002017	Ogoraar nivayse ye pegadhayse dahaanabee theedin dahaanabena payyamonam beven Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam ki giyade.
49002018	Harrna hambhidianna, kanka wodi wulaar Manpas kalaaka Barjo Imbakal ardana wo damade.
49002019	Ogonante yedi Barjo eenabesana kinka pee kalaa eedibee Barjosa ooni eedibene; keeda kaara os chocchibee eedi peera nivaana eedibetehe.
49002020	Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaanabee Barjokala qansayse eenna giyaynabeyn meeshon raqindar yedi oonidettsi ye woysadhade. Ooninam kattsi wocchinsea seenia Yesus Kiristoosne.
49002021	Onno wul kanka yedimayse Imbaa wontea Yesusna edimoono gaza ooni maatayse koda gebhe.
49002022	Yediar Barjo yisa Manpasinka kinin wodhea ooni maatana Kiristooska kinka kinka woysadhite ye dahade.
49003001	Ogonante yena hamayse Yesus Kiristoosna dhaxin ooninte dahaa inta Bhawloos ye Ayiwdtay hamma eenana Barjoam ida miske.
49003002	Yena konin pootoadettsi Barjo yisa sunin imintonam yisa waadimanna ina kinin imonam yedi qansima gareetene.
49003003	Kosa birayse upsi tokaa inin yena thaapondettsi, Barjo yisa aachin dhalqinam may ina dhaydine.
49003004	Ogo inin thaaponam yenin nabbabenka, Kiristoossa aachin dhalqinam hamin bhocchayse inin dhesonam yedi dhesana dameeda dame.
49003005	Ogono aachin dhalqino Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaana gazana eenabee Barjokala qansayse eenna giyaynabekal ta yin Barjosa Manpasinka haapadhondettsi, ena birayse dahaana eenakal haapadhadehe.
49003006	Ogono aachin dhalqinoar Barjosa dhacchintan upsinka Ayiwdtay hamma eena Ayiwd eenabesana kinka toydi kenin maatenbee, waa kalaa kenin maatenbee, Barjo Yesus Kiristoosbar "imayda ime" hamayse kinin giyon qaabe yindar haydhenam kashimayna kenin maatenbeam giyaynone.
49003007	Barjo yisa kantan waadimanka ina kinin imon kisa sunin imintonka kisa dhacchintan upsinam waadadhea i maatade.
49003008	Inta Barjodar woylamin qajen een wuldara i tokaakaar, macchinsa qolmin Kiristoossa gebhamonam Ayiwdtay hamma eenana inin giyoadettsi, ogo Barjosa sunin imintonam ina ko imbhade.
49003009	Konin imbhoonoar ena sagon wodanka yerin wulam pijaa Barjoka aachadhon Barjosa aachin dhalqinam een wulna may inin giyoadettsine.
49003010	Ogono yin maatoono ta wodan koka Barjodar woylamin qajayse kalaa maataanaka, cecinte dahaana wottsaynabee hayamoysa dahaanabe Barjosa pakalmakkon wulam kenin dhesoadettsine.
49003011	Barjo ogoam ena, wodansa birara yedayse, waadadhana yinin qaabonamaar wosa Imbaa Yesus Kiristooska ki thoosade.
49003012	Kidar woylamin wonin qajenka kurtumbhe qolmabee ooshimbhe qolmabe maatayse, Kiristooska Barjokal ardana wo damade.
49003013	Ogonante yena inin tiyayno gaaleno yena gobshi konin maatenna, isa gaalen goynka yedi qaabe hayanam gareebhode hamayse yeam ida miske.
49003014	Ta Barjo Imbasa birante kumpurdhayse inin miskayno ogonane.
49003015	Cecinbee peenbedar dahaana zarsina wul gonin hamon naabenam kenin haapayno Barjo Imbakalankane.
49003016	Barjo yisa gobshinsa thoothamora yesa iinaam wocchinsen kantanam yisa Manpasinka yena kinin imoadettsi kiam ida miske.
49003017	Yin pir Barjodar woylamin yenin qajenka Kiristoos yesa woylaminte kinin doadettsibee yesa caacino nashimmakkodar woyaa konin doadettsibe yena Barjoam ida miske.
49003018	Pir Kiristoossa nashimmakkonsa workamonbee, gudumbhakkonbee, dhegamonbee, mia theeramonbe hamaaka yekka konin dohonam Barjo eena wulbesana kinka may bhocchana yenin damoadettsibee
49003019	ogo eedin dhesensa bhaabar dohon Kiristoossa nashimmakkonam dhesayse Barjosa thoothamonkal yeskayse yenin thoothoadettsibe yena Barjoam ida miske.
49003020	Ogonante wosa iinte waadadhen kisa kantanka wonin miskenbee wonin bhocchenbera kalon sagi hayana damea Barjona,
49003021	Barjodar woylamin qajayse kalaa maataanabee Yesus Kiristoosbeka, adhadhira adhadhindar wodan wulka rooro wul lay gobshi kina ko dee, amiin.
49004001	Imbaa wontea Yesusna dhaxin ooninte dahaa inta Bhawloos, yeam eldhon goynka zaskaadettsi ye dee inta yeam ida miske.
49004002	Nashimmakkoka kinka kina darshada, rooro wul kina garada meten yesaam toskaatebee lemmakkokabe dehee.
49004003	Payyamonka dhaximayse Manpas Gazansa kalaa maatintanam toolana wocchimbhee.
49004004	Yenin eldhon wodanka yer kalaadar qaabe hayana yenin eldhondettsi, bishi kalaabee Manpas kalaabene.
49004005	Yin pir wosa Imbaa kalaa, woylamin wonin qajear kalaa, wonin shiidhoono shiidhimbhenoar kallone.
49004006	Pir wulam wottsea, wulka waadadhea, wulsa iinte dehea, wulsaar Imba dahaa Barjo kalaane.
49004007	Ko dahaannaar Kiristoosin imana qaabon sunin imintonam wo kalaa kalaanana ko imbhade.
49004008	Ogonoar "Tura yinin uton wodanka bashayse thoothinam yinka tiyayse ki yivade; eenna imintonam ki imade" hamayse ena thaapadhondettsine.
49004009	Ta ogono "Tura ki utade" hambhoono dhalqino peensa choobar dohon raqindar ki hanchade hamara ab keeda har ko dhee?
49004010	Agaa mia hanchaa wulam thoosota cecin wulsa bhaabar utaa kidine.
49004011	Kidiar waani eena yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaana, waani eena Barjokala qansayse eenna giyayna, waani eena Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam tarjayna, waani eena Barjodar woylamin qajaynaam toolaynabee eenna Barjosa upsinam dhettsaynabe kenin doadettsi hayayse ki imade.
49004012	Ogoam yin kinin hayoonoar Kiristoossa bishi maataana kenin wocchimbhoadettsi Barjo eenam yisa waadimanna ashkanane.
49004013	Yin pir Barjo Naasaam dhesintabee kidar woylamin qajintakabe haapadhayno kinka kalaa dayntankal wodi wul yeskayse, Kiristoos goninbee yiam damaabe kinin dohondettsi wodiar goninbee woam damaana eenabe wonin maatoadettsine.
49004014	Ogonoar bazindara sagadhen gonngalanam jibare osbee orabe kupeadettsi, keeda eedisa gadimmakkoka eediam taysayse dhaddhisana giidhen timmirinsa jibarenka kupimada naasi navva maata woam zaskehe.
49004015	Kalon goninam nashimmakkonka giyada mete maataa Kiristoosdar yer wulka wo gebhe.
49004016	Waana waana hamma bishinsa waana wul kinka kenin yedimayno Kiristooskane. Jinna wul bishinam wocchinsayse kenin yedenkabee meteka meteka bishinsa waana yina imbhon waadimanam kenin toolenkabe, bishino wul koda gebhe, nashimmakkoka koda wocchimbhe.
49004017	Ta keeda kaara os pootimin bhocchinka dahaana Barjoam dhesiminadettsi deheebhode hamayse Imbaa wontea Yesussa naabenka yena ida giye.
49004018	Kesa qaabono kaydine; kenin dhesamonnabee kesa woylamin duudonnabe Barjoyn imen sadankala kedi pegadhidine.
49004019	Kesa ooshimbhen qaabonin kayonna, "Ina yeekehe" hamada minngamon waadiman wulam waadadhana yisa metenam waana waana hamon siyon anngarmanna saskayse ke imade.
49004020	Yediar Kiristoossa yenin timmiroono yintehe.
49004021	Gon yedi kisa qansidine; Yesuska dohon gonamonam yedi kikala timmiridine.
49004022	Ena yennon dayntan goynsa bhocchaate, taysayse seesondar entsen anngarmanka gemmon gecchon dayntanam yesa iira bulee.
49004023	Yesa meskenam manpasinka haali maasee;
49004024	gonin hamon tipamonbee gazamonbeka Barjo kamsindettsi pijadhon haalin dayntanam qaadhee.
49004025	Ogonante yekala buudamonam kaysayse, kinka kina goninam giyee; harrna hambhidianna, wodi wul bishi kalaasa waa wonin dohonnane.
49004026	Wacimee, seeso hayeebhode; yesa wacimenam kinka kina ye garma, hayno ko wavabhoode;
49004027	Seethaannaar raq imeebhode.
49004028	Dimmea keeda kaara os ki dimmabhoode; ogona yisa qolmana kinin imea yer kisa doadettsi, yisa aaninka payya waadima waadadhaate ki qajadhe.
49004029	Hamin ko dahaakaar yesa apora dhalq siya ko utabhoode; qansayna eena kanka kenin wocchimbhoadettsi keam ashkana zasken dhalqinam giyee.
49004030	Kiristoosin yeam dhacchea rooroaka kinti yenin dohonam eshkea milkitdettsi hayayse yedar yettsadhon Barjosa Manpas Gazanam geneebhode.
49004031	Dhalq thaqimabee, dhagabee, wacimebee, ilatbee, iirimebee, yerra siyana wulbeam yekalanka pegisee.
49004032	Ogonante kinka kinka kina leeminabee kina burqadhaynabe maatee; Barjo Kiristooska yena kinin garondettsi, yediar kinka kina garee.
49005001	Ta keeda nashadhaana naanadettsi yediar Barjosa kamsinka yivee.
49005002	Kiristoosin yeam nashondettsi, Barjoam wozisen payya gaamen shittonsa dohon imintobee marshabe hayayse yiam wona kinin imondettsi, yediar nashimmakkoka dehee.
49005003	Sharmucimakkobee, waani minngina yerrabee, "Yer wul ina ko dee" hamenbe yesa shaarinte ko dahabhoode; iginadettsina yerrasa dhalq hattear ko dhaabhabhoode. Harrna hambhidianna, iginadettsina yerra Barjodar woylamin qajayna eenana kenin zaskimonnane.
49005004	Kalon Barjoam gobshee; ooshinsenbee, pootimon dhalqinbee, jibbishen yerinbeam giya yeam zaskehe; ogodettsino yerro yesa shaarinte ko dahabhoode.
49005005	Sharmucimakko hayea ki dahaannaar, minngi yeram hayea ki dahaannaar, "Yer wul ina ko dee" hamea ki hannaar, Kiristoosbee Barjobesa bitamon ranqin kinin tiyminam dhesee. "Yer wul ina ko dee" hamea kidi aaninka ashkadhaana barjona goodimeane.
49005006	Yerra iginaka dhaabhoono ee hamiminadar Barjosa wacimenin nivenna, hayyear pootimin dhalqinka yeam ki taysabhoode.
49005007	Ogonante kembesana kinka kashimayna maateebhode.
49005008	Harrna hambhidianna, yedi ena thipante ye dahade; ta Imbaa wontea Yesuska shaakante ye dahade. Ta keeda shaakante dahaana eenadettsi yaayee.
49005009	Shaakansa aapino payyamobee, tipamobee, gon maataa yer wulbene.
49005010	Ta Imbaa wontea Yesusam wozisayno har ko hannaar marmarayse shedee.
49005011	Aapiysa qolmon thipan waadimanbesana wormeebhode; kalon shaakandar bavayse koam dhehee.
49005012	Aachinka kenin hayen yerinam giyanoar ooshinsaynone.
49005013	Yer wuldar shaakanin shaakenka, gonno kosa may maatayse koda haapadhe.
49005014	Harrna hambhidianna, yer wul may maatayse ko haapadhe hayayno shaakane. Ogonante "Ya gindhea, qaymaa; dembhiraar dhaabhaa! Kiristoos hana kida shashke" hambhidine.
49005015	Ta keeda hamin dahaana ye hannaar payya hayayse bhocchee; pakalla eenadettsi dehee, malgimma eenadettsi deheebhode.
49005016	Kono woda siya konin dohonna, yenin damen payyan waadiman wulam waadadhee.
49005017	Ogonante Imbaa wontea Yesussa bhocchino har konin dohonam qaabee; malgimma eena maateebhode.
49005018	Ogono yeam siyondar konin arsenna, wucadhenka bardheebhode; ko dahaannaar Manpas Gazanka thoothee.
49005019	Mazmurbee Manpas Gazan yena imen upsinbeka zammaraate kinka kinka dhalqee; Imbaa wontea Yesusam yesa woylaminka walshaate zammaree.
49005020	Wosa Imbaa Yesus Kiristoossa naabenka yer wulna Barjo Imbaam rooro wul gobshee.
49005021	Kiristoossa gobshinna hamayse yedi kinka kina ee hamee.
49005022	Yedi maana, Imbaa wontea Yesusna yenin ee hamendettsi yesa annginana ee hamee.
49005023	Harrna hambhidianna, Kiristoos misken ooninsa mete kinin dohondettsi, geshoa geshon yinnonsa metene. Pir Kiristoos yisa bishi maaton misken ooninam Dhaccheane.
49005024	Misken ooninte dahaana eena Kiristoosna ee kenin hamendettsi, ogodettsi yin maana yer wulka annginana ee ke hame.
49005025	Yedi annginato, Kiristoos misken ooninam kinin nashondettsibee yiamaar kona saskayse kinin imondettsibe yediar yesa maanaam nashee.
49005026	Kiristoos ogoam kinin hayoono misken ooninam noqoka shiidhaadettsi yisa upsinka koam gazisanane.
49005027	Pir dakayndar qolmon way aapin kerin yisaam thipsima, ogodettsi maataa siya yer kodar haapadhima, gazabee payyabe hayayse yisa birante gobshinka misken ooninam woysanane.
49005028	Ogodettsi anngina yiam yinin nashendettsi maana yinnaam nasha keam ko zaske. Geshon yinnonam nashea yiam kida nashe.
49005029	Harrna hambhidianna, yinnon bishinam jibbea hayyear qolehe; koam kalon kunsa ki kunse, pir payya hayayse kida toole. Ogodettsi Kiristoos misken ooninna yin kida haye.
49005030	Harrna hambhidianna, wodi kisa bishinsa waana wonin dohonnane.
49005031	"Ogonante eedi imbabee indabeam kida gare, geshon yinnonbesana kinka kida dee; lamaanaar waa kalaa keda maate" hamayse thaapadhidine.
49005032	Kono aachin dhalqino gembhone. Intaar koam inin giyayno Kiristoosbee misken ooninbesa ida giye.
49005033	Ko dahaannaar yedi kalaa kalaana wul yesa maanaam yennon metendettsi hayayse nashee; geshonoar yisa geshoam ko gobshe.
49006001	Naanato, yeam adhaana imbanana Imbaa wontea Yesusna hamayse kena ee hamee; harrna hambhidianna, konin zaskennane.
49006002	-
49006003	"Payya hana konin maatoadettsibee peendar hasa levenin gudubhoadettsibe hambabee handabeam gobshaa" koda hame. Kodiar Barjo hayota kinin qaabon woylam yindar haydhensa dohoono birono upsinone.
49006004	Yedi imbanato, yesa naanaam Imbaa wontea Yesussa kiilimenka wacimaate keam gettsee; keam dhagattseebhode.
49006005	Yedi eedina waadadhaynato, yeam wottsayna eenana kurtumbhaatebee gibazaatebe kena ee hamee; woylam payyaka Kiristoosna yenin waadadhendettsi kena ee hamee.
49006006	Yenin ee hamaynoar Barjosa bhocchinam yesa woylaminka toolada Kiristoosna yenin waadadhendettsi ko maate; eediam wozisana eedina haapadhota waadadheebhode.
49006007	Eedina dayma Imbaa wontea Yesusna hamayse yenin waadadhendettsi payya bhocchika waadadhee.
49006008	Harrna hambhidianna, worsho ke hannaar, worshotay hamma ke hannaar, kedi kalaa kalaana yinin waadadhon yisa payyan waadimansa bazanam Imbaa wontea Yesuskalanka kenin tiyenam dheseeda dhese.
49006009	Ogodettsi yedi wottsaynato, eedisa woti shedayse waadadhima yembee kembesa Imbaa cecinte kinin dohonam bhocchaate, yena waadadhaynaam kurtunsan garayse kena payya waadadhee.
49006010	Shidhoono Imbaa wontea Yesusbee gebhon kisa kantanbeka wocchimbhaana maatee.
49006011	Seethaansa taysimen kolanam yekalanka marana yenin damoadettsi, Barjo yena kinin imen banqin koymon wulam dhaximbhee.
49006012	Harrna hambhidianna, wosa banqin kansano eedibesana dayma cecinte dahaana siyana meeshinasa banqin eenabesanane; iginaar wottsaynabee, hayamoynsa dahaanabee, ogo thipante waadadhayna peendar kantaysa dahaanabene.
49006013	Ogonante siyon rooronka yesa baalagarasa banqinam marana yenin damoadettsibee wulam macchayse woyana yenin damoadettsibe Barjo yena kinin imen banqi koymon wulam tiyee.
49006014	-
49006015	Ta keeda goninam yesa karnante dhaximbhayse, tipamonam sadandar qaashidettsi qaadhayse, payyamonam imen Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam yesa roonte dunnguridettsi arsayse, ashkimbhayse woyee.
49006016	Pir nuudettsi yeden Seethaansa paldhen wulam kaysana yenin damoadettsi, igina yerrabesana Barjodar woylamin qajadhenam lonngadettsi tiyee.
49006017	Dhaqintanamaar qoobhedettsi yesa metendar wodee; Manpas Gazansa halpan maaton Barjosa upsinam yedee.
49006018	Yeam zasken wulam miskaate Manpas Gazanin yeam entsendettsi rooro wul Barjoam miskee; ogodettsi maaton qaabonka Barjo een wulna yesa miskenam garma qaymaysebee wocchimbhaysebe miskee.
49006019	Barjosa dhacchintan upsinsa aachin dhalqinam kurtumbhe qolma may inin giyoadettsi, ina zasken dhalqinam Barjo kinin imoadettsi inaar Barjoam miskee.
49006020	Kisa dhacchintan upsinna ta dhaxadhayse i dahaakaar, iam zaskendettsi kurtumbhima ogoam inin giyoadettsi ina Barjoam miskee.
49006021	Nashadhaa imbanaasa, Imbaa wontea Yesus waadimansa gon eedi maataa Tikiqoos, innon goynsa yenin dhesoadettsi yer wulam kidi yena giyasane.
49006022	Ogonante wodi hamin wonin dohonam yenin dhesoadettsibee tapir kinin yeam wocchinsoadettsibe hamayse yekal kiam i yittsade.
49006023	Barjo Imbaabee Imbaa wontea Yesus Kiristoosbekalanka payyamonbee, nashimmakkonbee, Barjodar woylamin qajadhenbe imbanaanana ko dee.
49006024	Shidha shidhimin nashimmakkonka Imbaa wontea Yesus Kiristoosam nashayna wulna Barjosa sunin imintono ko dee.
50001001	Yesus Kiristoossa waadima eedi maataana i Bhawloosbee Thimaatoosbekalanka Pilbhisoos katamante dahayna Yesus Kiristooska gaza maataana wulna, pir misken ooninsa donzanabee waani waadiman eenabena nittsadhoono warqannone.
50001002	Wosa Imbaa Barjobee Imbaa wontea Yesus Kiristoosbesa sunin imintonbee payyamonbe yena ko dee.
50001003	Yeam inin bhocchen wodan wulka isa Barjoam ida gobshe.
50001004	Ye wulna Barjoam inin misken wodan wulka, rooro wul wozaka ida miske.
50001005	Biraa rooroara yedayse kinaka yekka Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam inin giyenka imbesana waadadhaana yenin maatonna Barjoam ida gobshe.
50001006	Yesus Kiristoosin nivea rooroaka yekka payyan waadimanam yesa iinte yedaa Barjoyn yeskisenam gon inta dhesidine.
50001007	Ye wulna ogodettsi qaaba iam koda zaske. Ogonoar isa dhaxinka ko hanna, Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam gon konin dohonam keedhadhenbee ogoamaar wocchinsadhenbeka ko hanna, Barjosa sunin imintonka yedi wulatte kashimayna yenin dohonna, yedi rooro wul isa woylaminte ye dahade.
50001008	Yesus Kiristoossa nashimmakkonka yedi wul hamaddha ikal yenin bhoqensa Barjo isa tarjane.
50001009	Yesa nashimmakkono dhesintobee bhocchibeka thoothoono maatayse gebhaate konin yivoadettsi yena Barjoam ida miske.
50001010	Ogonoar kattsi payya maaten yerinam marmarayse yenin dhesoadettsibee Kiristoos maatate kinin nivea rooroaka gazanabee siyamo yindar qolminabe maatayse yenin haapadhoadettsine.
50001011	Ogodettsin dayntan yennonka Yesus Kiristooskala haapadhen tipa waadimaka thoothaana maatayse Barjona gobshi hapsayna yeda maate.
50001012	Imbanaanato, ogono idar yeskoono yerro Barjosa dhacchintan upsino kattsi konin workoadettsi konin hayenam yenin dhesoadettsi ida nashe.
50001013	Inin dhaxadhoono Kiristoos goynka konin dohonam hayonasa oonin toolaynabee waani een wulbe dhesidine.
50001014	Inin dhaxadhon goynka Barjodar woylamin qajayna thoothina Barjosa upsinam kurtumbhima giyana Imba wontea Yesuska kedi sagi kanta haapidine.
50001015	Waani waani Kiristoossa tarjen upsinam kenin giyayno woogintabee palimebekane; waani pir payyamon qaabenka keda giye.
50001016	Igina Barjosa dhacchintan upsinna inin palimoadettsi inin kambhonam yinin dhesenna, nashimmakkoka ogoam keda haye.
50001017	Igina waani Yesus Kiristoossa tarjayna lemmakkoka dayma, meten yinnonam gettsota isa dhaxindar gaale ab idar bovota qaabaysene.
50001018	Ogona dhari maataamaka ko dahaakaar, gonka ko dahaakaar, goyti wulka, Kiristoossa tarja ko tarjadhe. Ogokaar wozadhayda wozadhe; os birantear wozadhayda wozadhe.
50001019	Ogonoar yesa miskenbee Yesus Kiristoossa Manpasin kelshonbeka ko gaalera inin dhaqenam inin dhesennane.
50001020	Rooro wul inin hayendettsi kinaar sadaka i dahaakaar way i diyaakaar, Kiristoos i kaa waan qaadhaaka gobshadhasane hamayse kurtumbhima may ida giye. Pir yer hamin dahaa goytika ooshimbhayse inin haapadhoamadettsi gebhi anngarmaka qaabe hayte i dahade.
50001021	Harrna hambhidianna, ina sadaka daa haminta Kiristooska daynta hamintane; diynta haminta yer payya haapintane.
50001022	Ko dahaakaar ko waanka dehea i hanna, aapi imea waadima ida waadadhe. Dahayse dayntabee dembhibesa hamaam kama iam konin zaskenam dhesattine.
50001023	Igina lamaana qaabonaka inta gaalidine. Kiristoosbesana dayntano yer wuldara konin sagenna, diyayse kimbesana kinka daana ida anngardhe.
50001024	Ko dahaannaar sadaka isa daano yena kattsi zaskaynone.
50001025	Ogoam inin dhesonna dembhira dhaqayse yesa Barjodar woylamin qajidino konin gebhoadettsibee woza yenin haapoadettsibe ye wulbesana inin kappenam dhesayda dhese.
50001026	Inta pir yekal maataate inin nivenka, inka yesa dohoono pormakkono Yesus Kiristooska koda thoothe.
50001027	Keeda yer wuldara sagi maatayno dayntano yesa Kiristoossa dhacchintan upsinam gobshayno ko dee. Ogonoar inta nivayse yeam inin shedenka, way yekalanka i pegadhaakaar bhocchi kalaaka wocchimbhayse yenin woyenbee kinka Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam yeskisana yenin mashimenbeam ida qanse.
50001028	Yembesana palimaynaam hamin hambhaakaar kurtumbheebhode; ogono yesa wocchimbheno kena kayesa milkit konin maatenka, yena dhaqintasa milkitne; yenin dhaqaynoar Barjosa kantankane.
50001029	Kiristoosna waadadhana baali yena imbhoono kidar woylamin ye qaje bish dayma, tapir kinnon goynka gaale ye tiyene.
50001030	Ogono gaalen mashimeno ena birayse idar ko yeskaysaka yedi haapidine; taar yeskaate konin dohonam yedi qansaate ye dahade. Ogonante taaki imbesana gaalite mashimayna ye maatade.
50002001	Kiristooska yesa wocchimbhe daa ko hanna, kisa nashimmakkonkaar wocchimbhaana ye hanna, Manpas Gazankaar kinka kalaa maataana ye hanna, kinka kinka kinaar burqadhaynabee payya yer hayaynabe ye hanna,
50002002	nashimmakko kalaabee, woylam kalaabee, qaabo kalaabeka maatayse kinka kinka agintaka, isa wozanam thoosee.
50002003	Metenam toskayse waani eenaam yedara kattsi sagi kenin dohonam bhocchee; meten yennonam gettsayse way "Idara sagea hayne?" hamayse pormakkoka yer kala hattear hayeebhode.
50002004	Yin yedi kalaa kalaana yena agen bish dayma, eedi abnaar agenam bhocchee.
50002005	Yesus Kiristoosdar dohoono qaabono yedarar ko dee.
50002006	Kidi Barjo dantanka dahayse Barjobesana kiaddha maasenam yina yedana bhocchadehe.
50002007	Ogona yisa dohon gobshinam garayse eedina waadima eedi dantanam tiyayse ki haapadhade; peen kodar eedidettsi maatayse ki dahade.
50002008	Meten yinnonam toskayse dembhi ko hannaar, diyota Barjona ee hamaa ki maatade; ogonoar masqalindar konngadhayse ziitadhidinkane.
50002009	Ogonante Barjo kiam kattsi dheg ki hayade; naabe wulsa bhaabar hama naabe kina ki imade.
50002010	Ogona Yesussa naabenam gobshintaka cecinbee, peenbee, peensa choobarbe dahaana wul buqon yinnonka kenin kumpurdhoadettsine;
50002011	yisa aponkaar "Yesus Kiristoos Imbane" hamayse kenin tarjoadettsine. Yin hayntaka Barjo Imbaam keda gobshe.
50002012	Ogonante isa nashonato, inta yembesana inin dohon wodan wulka ina ee hamayna yenin dohondettsi, ta yekala pegadhayse inin dohon wodanka sagi ee hamayna yenin doadettsi ida bhocchise. Ogodettsi yedi kalaa kalaana yenin dhaqonam may hayana kurtumbhebee gibazabeka wocchimbhayse waadadhee.
50002013	Harrna hambhidianna, Barjo yisa payyan bhocchinam yenin zagoabee hayoabedettsi yesa iinte hayea Barjone.
50002014	Waadima hamaamaar yenin waadadhenka gundumimabee palimimabe waadadhee.
50002015	Yin hayayna ye hanna, ko wodan een wobonbee siyonbesa shaarinte wuupobee siyamobeysa qolmina Barjosa gazana naana maatintaka, peen kodar wancodettsi shaakayna maatayse yeda haapadhe.
50002016	Ogono yin konin maatayno, sadan imen upsinam kena garma yenin giyenkane. Ogodettsi isa gobenbee isa waadimanbe sun pootima maatayse konin shidhiminna, Kiristoos nivea rooroaka kanka inin erimea isa yer daane hamintane.
50002017	Yesa Barjodar woylamin qajidinbee waadimanbe Barjona marsha machadheadettsine; pir i deesadhidiannaar isa zombhino marshandar laldhea wucimadettsi konin maatenna, ida wozadhe; isa wozanamaar yembesana ida kashime.
50002018	Ogodettsi yedi wozadhee; yesa wozanamaar imbesana kashimee.
50002019	Intaar yennon goynsa qansayse inin wocchimbhoadettsi, Imbaa wontea Yesussa bhocchi maatidi ko hanna, Thimaatoosam saana yedar yittsana qaabe ida haye.
50002020	Yesa dayntan goynsa idettsi woylam wulka bhocchea eedi ab qolehe.
50002021	Waani eena wul yina maaten yerinam keda zage; Yesus Kiristoosna maaten waadimanam qaabehe.
50002022	Thimaatoos taysate shedadhenkaar gon hama eedi kinin dohon, pir naasibee imbabe kinka kenin waadadhendettsi, kidi imbesana kinka Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam giyaate kinin waadadhonam yedi dheseeda dhese.
50002023	Ta keeda inno yerro hardar konin yeskonam inin qansonsa budonte Thimaatoosam saana yedar yittsana bhocchi ida haye.
50002024	Taar inta imal yekal saana inin nivoadettsi Imbaa wontea Yesus haya ki haye ida hame.
50002025	Ko dahaannaar iam kinin kelshoadettsi yenin yittsaa Ebhapirooditos, isa imbanaas maataabee imbesana kinka Kiristoosna banqin kanseabeam yekal maasate yittsa ko iam zaske hamayse inta bhocchidine.
50002026	Yedar kiam yittsana inin zagoono yeam shedana kinin anngardhonnabee yedi pir kisa hajadhidinam yenin qanson goynka kidi kattsi kinin qaabonnabene.
50002027	Kidi gon hajadhayse diyana yeskidine. Ko dahaannaar Barjo kina burqadhayse kiam ki pacchade; kibisheana dayma, pir ogo galshen qaabondar qaabe ab idar yeskoamadettsi ki hayade.
50002028	Ogonante kiam pir yenin shedenka yenin wozadhoadettsibee isa qaabon tokoadettsibe yedar kiam yittsana kattsi i zagade.
50002029	Keeda gebhi wozadhaate Imbaa wontea Yesus goynna hamayse kiam tiyee; kidettsi dahaana eenaamaar gobshee.
50002030	Harrna hambhidianna, yedi ikal nivayse iam kelshana yenin damaamonam kidi waadadhota sadan yinnonam anngardhima Kiristoossa waadimanna hamayse dembhina ki yeskisade.
50003001	Macchindar, imbanaanato, Imbaa wontea Yesuska wozadhee. Kosa birayse yena inin thaaponam tapir yena thaapana iam tottsehe; pir yeam dhaddhiserra toolana damasane.
50003002	Qaskidettsi maataana, siyon hayayna, zaskaama goytika eensa bishinam taxayna eenakalanka mete yesaam gishee.
50003003	Wodi Barjosa Manpasinka goodimayna, wosa waandar keedhimayse dayma, Yesus Kiristooska erimayna wonin dohonna, gonin hamon qaamanam taxadhaana wodine.
50003004	Intaar waandar inin keedhimayno yer isa daane; waani eeno waan yinnondar konin keedhimea yer kona maataakaar inta kodara sagayda sage.
50003005	I adhadhaysaka lankaysoa rooroaka isa qaamanam ko taxadhade; inta Biiniam muldhara dahaa Israveel eedine; pir gon hama Ibra eedine. Muse yigginam toldhen goyn ko hannaar, inta Parisa eedine.
50003006	Barjo goynka woogimbhea i hanna, Yesusdar woylamin qajaynaam ida oyte; Muse yigginam toolintaka haapadhayno tipamon goynka ko daana, inta siyamoysa qolma eedine.
50003007	Ko dahaannaar kosa birayse ina pootayna yerra wulam Kiristoosna hamayse pootimadettsi hayayse i paydade.
50003008	Ogora sagi isa Imbaa Yesus Kiristoosam dhesintano yer wuldara kattsi konin sagenna, waani yerin wulam pootima yerdettsi koam ida payde. Kina hamayse yer wulam i kaysade; Kiristoosam haapana yer wulam hargedettsi ida payde.
50003009	Ogoam inin hayaynoar Muse yigginam toolintaka inin haapen tipamonam dayma, Kiristoosdar woylamin qajintaka haapadhen tipamonam haapayse Kiristoosbesana kalaa maatanane. Tipamon ogoam Barjo kidar woylamin qajayna eenana kida ime.
50003010	Kiristoosbee kisa dembhira dhaabhidinsa kantanbeam dhesana, kisa gaalenkaar kimbesana kinka kashimanabee kisa dembhinkaar kidettsi maatanabe ida zage.
50003011	Ogona inta diyaanayn dembhira dhaabhendar inin yeskoadettsine.
50003012	"Ko wulam inta haapidine" way "Ogo wulka gonin ea i maatade" hamattine. Ko dahaannaar Yesus Kiristoos iam yinti eedi hayayse kinin bhocchonam yedana os birandar ida gobe.
50003013	-
50003014	Imbanaanato, inta akar ogodar yeskidine hamayse paydattine. Ko dahaannaar yer kalaa ida haye: Isa budonte dohonam walaate, isa birante dohon bazanam tiyana wocchimbhayse ida gobe. Ogono inin tiyayno bazano Barjo Yesus Kiristooska tura cecindar eelayse ina kinin imayno gonin hamon sadanone.
50003015	Keeda Kiristooska gebhaana wodi wul koam wo bhocche. Yer ab bhocchayna ye hanna, Barjo ogoamaar yena may hayasane.
50003016	Yin ko dahaakaar ta wonin yeskon dayntanka kiaddha maatoono wosa dayntano ko dee.
50003017	Imbanaanato, inin hayendettsi hayayna eena maatee; wosa kamsinka yivayna wulam payya hayayse shedee.
50003018	Harrna hambhidianna, kosa birayse thoothi woda yena inin giyaadettsibee ta ermitka eepite yena inin giyendettsibe, thoothino eeno yisa yivintanka Kiristoos masqalinsa banqi eed ko maatade.
50003019	Kesa macchino kayene; kesa barjoa iine; kesa gobshino ooshimbhekane; kesa qaabono peen yerindarne.
50003020	Wonno peeno ko hanna cecintene. Ogora nivea woam Dhacchea Imbaa wontea Yesus Kiristoosam anngarmaka woda toole.
50003021	Kidi yer wulam yisa hayamon demente hayana damisen kantaka ooshimbhe yindar dohon wosa bishinam ookayse, yisa gobshinsa bishi konin maatoadettsi kida haye.
50004001	Keeda inin nashaynabee kattsi inin bhocchaynabe imbanaanato, pir ininka wozadhaynabee isa waadimansa aapi maataanabe, yedi Imbaa wontea Yesuska wocchimbhayse woyee.
50004002	Ewodiabee Sinthikibe kinka kinka Imbaa wontea Yesuska agayse kenin doadettsi keam ida miske.
50004003	Yaar gonin ea, imbesana kinka waadadhea imbanaasa, igina maanaam hanin kelshoadettsi ida miske. Kedi imbesana waadadhaana Qeleminthoosbee waani eenabesana kinka maatayse Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam eenna yeskisana kedi mashimidine. Ke wulsa naabenaam dayntan mathaapinte thaapadhidine.
50004004	Rooro wul Imbaa wontea Yesuska wozadhee. Pir yena ida giye: Wozadhee!
50004005	Yesa lemmakkonam rooro wul eedi wulna dhehee. Imbaa wontea Yesussa maatate nivano saanidine.
50004006	Yer wulka Barjoam gobshika miskaate yesa oysimenam kina dhettsisee. Yer kalaaka hattear qaabite gaaleebhode.
50004007	Eedisa bhocchi wulra sagi maatoono Barjosa payyamono yesa woylaminbee yesa qaabonbeam Yesus Kiristooska koda toole.
50004008	Macchinte, imbanaanato, gonbee, gobshibee, tipabee, gazabee, nashadheabee, shawkadheabeam bhocchee; kattsi payya way gobshadhayno ko hanna, igina wulam maasite maasite bhocchee.
50004009	Ikala yenin timmironbee yenin tiyonbe, ogonoar inin giyenka yenin qansonbee inin hayenka yenin haaponbeam hayee. Payyamon Barjoa yembesana kida dee.
50004010	Thoothi wodansa budonte tapir isa gaalen goynka yenin bhocchonna, Imbaa wontea Yesuska kattsi ida wozadhe. Ta koka yekka yenin qaabonam waadimaka dhaana goyti payya haapeetene; isa gaalenna qaabite ye dahade.
50004011	Pir ogoam inin giyayno isa dayntanna zaskayno qolmakatehe. Harrna hambhidianna, "Isa dayntano ina yeeka ko yeeke" hambhenam inta timmiridine.
50004012	Bashadhintanam ko dahaannaar, thoothika haapintanam ko dahaannaar, dhesayda dhese. Raq hamote ko hannaar, hamaa wodakaar mishintabee, daaqardhintabee, haapintabee, kaysintabeam inta dhesidine.
50004013	Kantanam ina imea Kiristooska yer wulam damayda dame.
50004014	Ko dahaannaar isa gaalenam imbesana kinka kashimayna yenin maatonna, payya ye hayade.
50004015	Ogonoar Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam yesa shaarinte giyan inin yedenka, Moqodoonia peera inin uten wodanka, ye Pilbhisoos gidir dahaana eena yesa misken oonira ab ina koymon imintakabee tiyntakabe iam kelshaa misken ooni qolmonam yedi dheseeda dhese.
50004016	Teselonqe katamante inin dohonka, ina zaskenam lamaa goyt yedi nittsidine.
50004017	Yesa imintonam anngardhayse dayma, yesa imintonsa aapino kalon yena konin thoothoadettsi anngardhayse ida giye.
50004018	Iam zaskenbee iam zaskenbesa bhaabar hamon ina yenin yittson imintonam Ebhapirooditoskalanka inta tiydine. Ogono imintono Barjoyn tiyayse kanka wozadhen payya gaamen shittonka thoothon marshandettsine.
50004019	Isa Barjoa yisa gobshinka dohon thoothin wodimmakkorra Yesus Kiristooska yena zasken wulam kida ime.
50004020	Wosa Imbaa Barjona rooro wul lay gobshi kina ko dee; amiin.
50004021	Yesus Kiristooska dahaana gazana eena wulna "Nagaya" hamee. Imbesana kinka dahaana imbanaana yena "Nagaya" keda hame.
50004022	Gazana eena wulbee kattsika Roome peen bitaasa waadiman eenabe yena "Nagaya" keda hame.
50004023	Imbaa wontea Yesus Kiristoossa sunin imintono yembesana ko dee.
51001001	Barjo bhocchinka Yesus Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaa i Bhawloosbee wosa imbanaasa Thimaatoosbekalanka
51001002	Qolasias gidir dahaana Kiristooska gazabee gonin hamma wombanaanabena nittsadhoono warqannone. Wosa Imbaa Barjosa sunin imintonbee payyamonbe yena ko dee.
51001003	Yena Barjoam wonin miskenka, wosa Imbaa Yesus Kiristoossa Imba dahaa Barjoam rooro wul woda gobshe.
51001004	Harrna hambhidianna, Yesus Kiristoosdar woylamin yenin qajenbee Barjo eena wulna yesa dohon nashimmakkonbeam wodi qansidine.
51001005	Gonin hammo Barjosa dhacchintan upsino birayse yekal ko yeskaysaka Kiristooskal dohon qaabe haydhenam yedi qansidine. Ogono woylam yindar haydhayno cecinte ashkadhaysaka yeamaar toolaynone.
51001006	Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam qansayse kisa sunin imintonsa goninam bhocchaate yenin dheson wodara yedayse, ogono Barjosa dhacchintan upsino yennon shaarinte konin dahaadettsi yin pir peen wuldar aapi ushaate gebhaate ko dahade.
51001007	Ogo Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam wombesana kinka Barjosa waadima eedi maataa nashadhaa Ebhapirakalanka yedi qansidine; kidiar eedi gon hama Kiristoosna wonnon oolonte waadadhea eedine.
51001008	Pir Manpas Gazanka yesa dohon nashimmakkonam kidi wona giydine.
51001009	Wodi ogoam wonin qansaa rooroara yedayse yedi Manpas Gazansa pakalmakkonkabee qaabon wulbeka Barjosa bhocchinam thoothi yenin dhesoadettsi yena Barjoam miskintanam garootone.
51001010	Yin ko dahaakaar Imba Yesusna zaskaa goyteaka dahaate yer wulka Barjoam yeda wozise; payyan waadiman wulam waadadhintaka aapi ushaate Barjoam dhesintonka gebhada yenin yivoadettsi woda miske.
51001011	Barjo yisa gebhon kantanka wocchimbhen wulam yena ki ime. Darshintanka yer wulam damana ashkimbhaana maatee.
51001012	Pir shaakan bitamon raqinte Barjo eenabesana kinka yenin kashimoadettsi yeam dandisea Barjo Imbaam wozaka gobshee.
51001013	Barjo woam thipan wottsira dhacchayse, nashadhaa yisa Naasasa bitamon raqinte woam ki arsade.
51001014	Barjo Naasa wosa seesonsa baza kashadhea kinin maatonna, wosa seesonsa garintonam wo haapade.
51001015	Barjo Naasa haapadhima Barjosa gon hama kamsine; kidiar pijadhin wulsa bhaabar hama biraane.
51001016	Harrna hambhidianna, peendar dohonbee cecindar dohonbe, haapadhenbee haapadhimonbe, cecinte kantaysa dahaanabee wottsaynabe, binnabee hayonabe, yerra wulin pijadhoono kankane. Yer wulam Barjoyn pijoono kankabee kinabene.
51001017	Kidiar yer wulsa birayse ki dahade; yer wul yedimayse konin woyoono kankane.
51001018	Kiristoos yisa bishi maaton misken ooninsa metene; koam woysaa kidine. Yer wulka bira kinin doadettsi dembhira dhaabhintakaar biraane.
51001019	Ogonoar yin konin dohoono Barjo yisa Naasaka kisa dayntano wul konin haapadhoadettsi Barjo Imbasa qaabe konin maatonnane.
51001020	Barjo Kiristooska cecinbee peenbedar dohon yer wulam yikal ki qaashinsade; Kiristoos masqalindar kinin laalon zombhin goynka Barjo payyamonam ki hayade.
51001021	Ena birayse Barjokalanka pegadhayse ye dahade; yesa qaabonbee yesa siyon waadimanbeka yedi Barjosa banqi eedine.
51001022	Keeda yisa Naasasa waan dembhinka Barjo yeam yimbesana kinka qaashinsidine; ogoam yin kinin hayoono gazanabee seeso yindar qolminabe maasayse yisa birante yeam woysanane.
51001023	Ogonoar yin konin maatoono payya hayayse yenin woyenkabee Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam qansayse "Tiyooda tiye" hamayse woylamin yenin hayora jugimima Barjodar woylamin yenin qajenka wocchimbhayse yenin dehenkabene. Kono upsino cecinsa choobar dohon pijadhin wulna giidhoonone. Inta Bhawloosaar Barjosa dhacchintan upsinsa waadima eedine.
51001024	Ta yena inin tiyen gaalenka ida wozadhe; kisa bishi maaton misken ooninna Kiristoosin tiyon gaalenam idar tiyayse ida thoose.
51001025	Barjo upsin wulam joshkima yena inin giyoadettsi Barjo ina kinin imon hayamonka misken ooninna waadadhea i maatade.
51001026	Ogono Barjosa upsino ena wodara yedayse eedi naasina aachimayse dohoono, ta Barjo yisa eenana may kinin dhohoono aachin upsinone.
51001027	Ogo aachin upsinsa gobshinbee wodimmakkonbe peendar dohon zarsin wulsa shaarinte hamin gebhi konin dohonam Barjo yisa eenna dhettsana ki zagade. Ogo aachin upsinka Kiristoos yesa iinte kinin dohonna, "Barjosa gobshinam woda kashime" hamayse qaabe hayayse yeda toole.
51001028	Een wulam Kiristooska gebhaana maasayse Barjo birante keam woysota pakalmakko wulka eedi wulam kiiladabee dhettsadabe Kiristoossa woda giye.
51001029	Barjo yisa gebhon kantanka isa iinte kinin waadadhenna, ogo kisa kantanka dhalqin koam thoosana gebhi mashimaate ida qajadhe.
51002001	Yembee, Lodoqia katamante dahaana eenabee, iam haapaamma eena wulbena hamaaka yekka mashimaate inin dohonam yenin dhesoadettsi ida nashe.
51002002	Inin mashimaynoar kesa woylammo wocchimbhayse, nashimmakkokaar kinka dhaximbhayse, gonin wulam bhocchaate wodimbhaana maatayse kenin doadettsine. Ogoka Barjosa aachi upsi maataa Kiristoosam kenin dhesoadettsine.
51002003	Pakalmakkonbee dhesintonbesa wodimmakkono wul aachimayse konin dohoono Kiristooskalne.
51002004	Hayyear taysen dhalqinka yeam kinin dhaddhisoamadettsi yena ida giye.
51002005	Yekala waanka i edimaakaar manpasinka yembesana kinka i dahade; payya goytika yesa dayntanbee Kiristoosdar woylamin yenin qajonka wocchimbhayse yenin woyonbeam inin shedenka kattsi wozadhite i dahade.
51002006	Ta keeda Imbaa wontea Yesus Kiristoosam yenin tiyondettsi kanka dehee.
51002007	Caaci yittsayse kanka wocchimbhee; yeam dhettsadhondettsi kidar woylamin yenin qajonka wocchimbhayse woyee; Barjona kattsi gebhi gobshi imaate dehee.
51002008	Kiristoossa timmirindettsi dayma, eenin bulon gilondettsibee peen kodar dohon yiggindettsibe, sun shidhen dhalqinka hayyear yeam taysayse yidar kinin maasoamadettsi mete yesaam gishee.
51002009	Harrna hambhidianna, Kiristooska Barjosa dayntano wul joogima waanka koda haapadhe.
51002010	Yediar joogaamon sadanam yenin haapoono Kiristooskane; kidiar wottsinbee hayamon wulbesa meteane.
51002011	Yedi Kiristooska qaamanam ye taxadhade. Ogono yenin qaaman taxadhoono yesa waansa seeson dayntanam yedara marana Kiristooska haydhoonone; eedi aanka haydhoonotehe.
51002012	Yesa shiidhimenka kimbesana kinka ye duukadhade; pir dembhira Kiristoosam dhaasaa Barjosa kantan waadimanam gonne hamayse yenin tiyenka kimbesana kinka yedi dhaabhidine.
51002013	Yedi seeson waadadhaynabee Ayiwdtay hamma Muse yigginam tooliminabe yenin maaton goynka diyaana ye daaka, Barjo Kiristoosbesana dembhira dhaasayse yena sadanam ki imade; wosa seeson wulamaar wona ki garade.
51002014	Barjo woam bersen Muse yigginka wodar dohon bazansa thaapin warqatinam ki shiishade. Kidiar masqalindar konngayse ogoam ki marade.
51002015	Kiristoos masqalindar diyntaka wottsaynabee hayamoynsa dahaanabeam bashayse kenin dhaximbhon banqin koymonam yinin bulonsa budonte, uxate baadhaana maatayse may kenin haapadhoadettsi keam ki hayade.
51002016	Ta galanbee wucadhenbe way bavaalinbee, arpin gobshadhenbee, ukunsen rooroam gobshadhen goynbeka hayyear yedar ki pirdabhoode.
51002017	Igina os birante nivanna dahaana yerrasa shipone; gonin haapadhayno Kiristooskane.
51002018	Buudamoka yisa metenam toskotabee Barjosa gaananana goodimota nasheabe eedi hayyear sun guuri yeam kinin shiishoamadettsi mete yesaam gishee. Ogodettsi hayea ea "Barjokalanka i haapade" hamayse yinin haapon shedintonka erimada waa bhocchika sun kida poorimbhe.
51002019	Ogodettsin hayea ea mete maataa Kiristooskalanka edimidine; mete bishin wulam jiininka kidar yettsada hayayse kunseane. Barjo bishin wulam kinin gettsayno ogokane.
51002020	-
51002021	Kiristoosbesana diyayse peen kodar dohon yigginkalanka edimaana ye daana, ta peen kodar dehen eendettsi maatayse "Yedaabhode; lavaabhode; kaamaabhode" hamayna upsinana harrnee ee hame?
51002022	Igina wul eedin bulaa sharqabee timmiribedar woyaa kenin dohonna, waadimadar yinin haaqonsa budonte kaysana ashkadhaanane.
51002023	Igina upsina Barjosa gaananana goodimintabee, buudamoka meten yisaam toskintabee, yisa waanam gancisintabeka pakalmakko yisa dahaana keda maate; ko dahaannaar waansa anngarmanam marana damehe, poota pootiminane.
51003001	Keeda Kiristoosbesana kinka dembhira ye dhaabhidianna, Kiristoos Barjo Imbaasa mizaqinte dooqayse kinin dohon bhaa cecinte dohonam kattsi anngardhee.
51003002	Bhaa cecinte dohonam qaabee; peendar dohonam qaabeebhode.
51003003	Harrna hambhidianna, yedi diydine; sadan yennonamaar Kiristoosbesana Barjokal ko wodadhade.
51003004	Yesa sada maataa Kiristoosin haapadhen wodanka, yediar kimbesana kinka gobshinka yeda haapadhe.
51003005	Ta yesa iinte dohon peen kosa anngarman wulam deesee; iginaar sharmucimakkobee, minngamobee, sharmucimakko waadima zagabee, siya yeram anngardhintabee, "Yer wul inti ko dee" hamintabene. "Yer wul inti ko dee" hamea kidi aaninka ashkadhaana barjonana goodimea eadettsine.
51003006	Yerra igina goynka Barjosa wacimeno ee hamimina eenadar niva ko nive.
51003007	Yediar ena birayse ee hamimina eenasa shaarinte yenin dehenka, yerra iginaam hayaate ye dahade.
51003008	Keeda yedi wacimebee, dhagabee, gadimmakkobee, iirimebee, ooshinsea dhalqbe, igina wulam yekalanka kaysee.
51003009	Kinka kikal buudimeebhode; harrna hambhidianna, gecchoa eam kisa waadimanbesana yekalanka kiam yedi kaysidine.
51003010	Yedi haalia eam qaadhidine; kidi yiam pijaa Barjo kamsi kinin maatoadettsi dhesintonka haalimbhada yiveane.
51003011	Ogoka Girik eedibee Ayiwd eedibe, qaamaysa taxadhaabee taxadhaamabe, gilon dhesaabee gilon dhesaamabe, worshobee worshotay hamabesa shaarinte edime qolehe. Kiristoos bishne yer wulka dahaa.
51003012	Ta keeda Barjoyn kamaana gazana eenabee nashadhaanabe yenin maatonna, eedina burqadhintabee, lemmakkobee, mete toskintabee, payyamobee, payya eedi maatintabee, darshintabeam qaadhee.
51003013	Kinka kina kina darshee; yenin kinka gemmaa yer dahaanna kinka kina garee. Imbaa wontea Yesus yena garaadettsi, yediar pir yin kinka kina garee.
51003014	Igina wulsa bhaabar macchi keam kidar kala hayayse dhaxana damea nashimmakkoam qaadhee.
51003015	Kiristoossa payyamono yesa woylaminam ko shane; harrna hambhidianna, yeam eldhoono waa kalaa maatayse payyamoka yenin doadettsine. Barjoamaar gobshayna maatee.
51003016	Kiristoossa upsino yesa woylaminte thoothi ko dee; pakalmakkon wulka kinka kiam kiam dhettsaate kiilee; tapir mazmurbee, Manpas Gazan yena imen upsinbeka zammaraate Barjoam yesa woylamin wulka walshee.
51003017	Barjo Imbaam Yesuska gobshada, yesa dhalqinbee yesa waadiman wulbeam Imbaa wontea Yesussa naabenka hayee.
51003018	Yedi maanato, Imbaa wontea Yesuska yeam zaskendettsi yesa annginana ee hamee.
51003019	Yedi annginato, yesa maanaam nashee; kena burqadhimina maateebhode.
51003020	Yedi naanato, yer wulka yesa imbanabee indanabena ee hamee; ogono Imbaa wontea Yesuska Barjoam wozisaynone.
51003021	Yedi imbanato, kesa wozan kayoamadettsi yesa naanaam dhagattseebhode.
51003022	Yedi worshonato, eediam wozisana eedina haapadhota dayma, woylam wulka Imbaa wontea Yesusam kurtumbhada yeam wottsayna eenana yer wulka kena ee hamee.
51003023	Eedina dayma, Imbaa wontea Yesusna hamayse yenin hayen yer wulam yesa dohon woylamin wulka hayee.
51003024	Cecinte dohon "imayda ime" kinin hamon imintonam Imbaa wontea Yesuskalanka yenin tiyenam dheseeda dhese. Yenin waadadhayno yesa Imbaa Kiristoosnane.
51003025	Siyon waadadhear siyon yinin waadadhonsa bazanam kida tiye; Barjo eedisa woti shedayse waadadhehe.
51004001	Yedi wottsaynato, yedi pir cecinte yeam wottseayn dohonam dheseeda dhese; ogonante worshona yennaam tipamoka edima wottsee.
51004002	Rooro wul wocchimbhayse Barjoam gobshaate garma miskee.
51004003	Inta inin dhaxadhoono Kiristoossa aachin dhalqinam inin giyonnane. Ogona pir Kiristoossa aachin dhalqinam wonin giyoadettsi Barjo wona goyti ki bule miskee.
51004004	Intaar iam zaskaadettsi may i giye ina Barjoam miskee.
51004005	Yenin damen payyan waadiman wulam waadadhada, Barjodar woylamin qajiminasa shaarinte pakalmakkoka dehee.
51004006	Eedi kalaa kalaanana hamin malsi maasa yeam zaskenam yenin dhesoadettsi, yesa dhalqino rooro wul eedina agea daatha ko dee.
51004007	Nashadhaa imbanaasabee, eedi gon hama waadima eedibee, imbesana kinka Imbaa wontea Yesussa waadima eedibe maataa Tikiqoos isa dayntan wulam yena giya ki giye.
51004008	Kiamaar yekal inin yittsoono wonnon goynsa yena kinin giyoadettsibee yeam kinin wocchinsoadettsibene.
51004009	Kimbesana kinka peen yennon eedi maataa, eedi gon hamaa, nashadhaa imbanaasa Anasmosam yekal inta yittsidine. Kedi raqin kote dohon yerin wulam yena giya ke giye.
51004010	Imbesana kinka dhaxadhaa Aristhirokoos yena "Nagaya" kida hame. Barnabaassa aaraka naasa Marqoosaar yena "Nagaya" kida hame; yekal nividi ki hanna, kiam yenin tiyoadettsi yedar eedi abka apo wo yittsade.
51004011	Iyosthos hambhea Iyaaso yena "Nagaya" kida hame. Ayiwd eensa shaarira Barjo bitamonna imbesana kinka waadadhayna igina bishne; iamaar kedi wocchinsidine.
51004012	Peen yennon eedi maataa Yesus Kiristoossa waadiman ea Ebhapira yena "Nagaya" kida hame. Barjosa bhocchin wulam hayada kidar woylamin yesa qajidinka wocchimbhaate yenin woyoadettsi kidi rooro wul yena Barjoam miskada kida qajadhe.
51004013	Yennon goynka, pir Lodoqiabee Yiraapolis katamante dahaana eenabe goynka kattsi kinin qajadhenam inta kina ida tarje.
51004014	Nashadhaa akkimea Luqaasbee Deemaasbe "Nagaya" yena keda hame.
51004015	Lodoqia katamante dahaana imbanaanabee, Nimpabee, kosa ooninte bukayna Barjodar woylamin qajaynabena "Nagaya" wona kena hamee.
51004016	Warqatin koam yena nabbabadhonsa budonte, Lodoqia katamante dohon misken ooninte pir nabbabadhoadettsi hayee; ogora yediar Lodoqia eenana inin thaaponam kekala tiyayse nabbabee.
51004017	Arkibhaasnaar "Imbaa wontea Yesusbar hanin tiyon waadimanam hanin macchoadettsi mete hasaam gishaa!" kina hamee.
51004018	Nagaymakkon koam isa aaninka thaapaa inta Bhawloosne. Inin dhaxadhonam bhocchee. Barjosa sunin imintono yembesana ko dee.
52001001	Barjo Imbaabee Imbaa wontea Yesus Kiristoosbesa eeda maataana Teselonqe misken ooninte dahaana eenana, i Bhawloosbee, Sillaasbee, Thimaatoosbekalanka nittsadhoono warqannone. Barjosa sunin imintonbee payyamonbe yena ko dee.
52001002	Rooro wul Barjoam wonin miskenka yeam bhocchada Barjoam woda gobshe.
52001003	Barjodar woylamin yenin qajenka hamin yenin waadadhenbee, yesa nashimmakkonka hamin yenin qajadhenbee, Imbaa wontea Yesus Kiristooska yesa qaabe haydino kattsi wocchimbhoono konin doadettsibe, Imbaa wontea Barjosa birante garma woda bhocche.
52001004	Barjoyn nashayna imbanaanato, Barjo yeam kinin kamonam dhesooda dhese.
52001005	Harrna hambhidianna, yena wonin giyayno Barjosa dhacchintan upsino apoka bish dayma Barjosa kantanbee, Manpas Gazanbee, qothime qolma tipamobeka ko nivade. Yekal wonin dohon wodanka, yena hamayse hamin wonin dohonam dheseeda dhese.
52001006	Yedi Barjosa upsinam thoothi gaaleka, Manpas Gazankala haapadhen wozanka yenin tiyonna, wombee Imbaa wontea Yesusbeam maatayna eena ye maatade.
52001007	Ogonante Moqodoonia peenbee Akaya peentebe dahaana Barjodar woylamin qajayna wulna payya kamsi ye maatade.
52001008	Imbaa wontea Yesus goynsa giyayno upsino yekalanka utayse konin qansimoono Moqodoonia peenbee Akaya peentebe bish dayma, Barjodar woylamin yenin qajoono raq wulir dhesimidine; ogona yerin ogosa yer kalaar giya woam zaskehe.
52001009	Harrna hambhidianna, yekal wonin nivon wodanka hamin woam yenin tiyonam, pir aaninka ashkadhaana barjonana goodiman garayse sadanka dehea, gonin hama Barjodar hamin yenin maatonam kedi yinti yennon goynsa keda tarje.
52001010	Tapir Barjo dembhira kiam kinin dhaasaa, niven wacimera woam dhacchea, Naasa kintea Yesussa cecira nivintanam hamin yenin toolenam tarja ke tarje.
52002001	Imbanaanato, wosa yekal nividino sun konin dahaamonam yedi yenti dheseeda dhese.
52002002	Yenin dhesendettsi Pilbhisoos katamante wonin dohonka gaalebee iirimebe wodar yeskidine. Ko dahaannaar wonin giyoamadettsi woam mardhaakaar, Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam yena wonin giyoadettsi Barjo woam ki wocchinsade.
52002003	Harrna hambhidianna, yeam wonin kiiloono wobonbee minngimon qaabonbeka entsadhayse yeam taysanatehe.
52002004	Kalonar Barjo yisa dhacchintan upsinam wonin giyoadettsi wodar woylamin qajintaka kinin elqimaadettsi woda giye. Ogonoar wonin hayayno wosa woylaminam marmarea Barjoam wozisanane; eediam wozisanatehe.
52002005	Eediam walshintabee koymoam anngardhintabeka wonin giyaamonam yedi dheseeda dhese; Barjoar wosa tarjane.
52002006	Yekalankaar waani eenkalankaar gobshi zagootone.
52002007	Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaana wonin maatonna woam zaskenam yekalanka oysana damooda dame. Ko dahaannaar inda yisa naasina konin burqadhendettsi, yena burqadhayna wo maatade.
52002008	Yin pir kattsi yeam wonin nashenna, Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam yena giynta bish dayma, wosa nashimmakkondara dhaabhonka wosa sadanam yena imana ashkimbhayse wo dahade.
52002009	Imbanaanato, hamin wonin waadadhonbee wonin qajadhonbe yena bhoqa ko bhoqe. Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam yena wonin giyenka, yesa iira eedi kaladar hattear baske wonin maatoamadettsi sootinbee rooronbe waadadhaate wo dahade.
52002010	Ye Barjodar woylamin qajaynasa shaarinte wonin dehenka hamin dahaa gazamobee, tipamobee, siya yer yindar haapadhiminabe maatayse wonin dohonsa yedi wosa tarjanane; Barjoar wosa tarjane.
52002011	Imba yisa naasina kinin hayendettsi wodiar ye wulna yesa meteka meteka wonin waadadhonam dheseeda dhese.
52002012	Yeam kiiladabee yeam wocchinsadabe, yisa bitamonbee yisa gobshinbedar yeam eelaa Barjoam wozisen goynka yenin doadettsi yena giyte wo dahade.
52002013	Tapir yennon goynsa garma Barjoam woda gobshe. Harrna hambhidianna, wonin giyen Barjosa upsinam yenin tiyen wodanka, eedin giyendettsi dayma gon Barjosa upsindettsi hayayse ye tiyade; kodi gon Barjosa upsine. Ogono upsino Barjodar woylamin qajayna yesa iinte waadadhaynone.
52002014	Imbanaanato, yediar Yiwda peente Yesus Kiristooska dahaana Barjosa misken onnasa kamsinka ye yivade. Harrna hambhidianna, kedi Ayiwd eenkalanka gaale kenin tiyondettsi, yediar yesa peen eenkalanka gaale ye tiyade.
52002015	Igina Ayiwd eena Imbaa wontea Yesusbee Barjokala qansayse eenna giyaynabeam ke deesade; woamaar ke oytayade. Kedi Barjoam wozinsiminabee een wulam jibbayna eenabene.
52002016	Ayiwdtay hamma eena ke dhaqe Barjosa upsinam kena wonin giyoamadettsi woam keda mare; ogoka seesodar seeso waadadhaate kedi yividine. Ogonante Barjosa wacimeno kedar macchi yeskidine.
52002017	Imbanaanato, bhocchika dayma, waaka likka wodana yekalanka wonin edimonna, yeam aapika shedana kattsi anngardhite wo dahade.
52002018	Yekal nivana wodi zagidine; inta Bhawloos yekal nivana thoothi woda i zagade; ko dahaannaar Seethaan woam ki marade.
52002019	Ta keeda Imbaa wontea Yesus Kiristoosin niven wodanka, kisa birante woninkay yindar qaabe hayaynabee, wozadhaynabee, yinka wonin erimaynabe yeditayu?
52002020	Gon yedi wosa gobshinabee wosa wozanabene.
52003001	Ogonante keeda kaara os darshano woam konin bashonna, Atena katamante womal bish daano payya wona ko maatade.
52003002	Kiristoossa dhacchintan upsinam giyntaka wombesana kinka Barjona waadadhea imbanaasa Thimaatoosam yekal kiam wo yittsade. Kiam wonin yittsoonoar yeam kinin wocchinsoadettsibee Barjodar woylamin yenin qajenka yenin wocchimbhoadettsibene.
52003003	Pir ogo gaalenka hayyear kinin ookimoamadettsine; Barjo ogo gaalenna woam kinin kamonam yedi yenti dheseeda dhese.
52003004	Harrna hambhidianna, yekal wonin dohonka, gaale wodar yeskenam birayse yena giyte wo dahade; yin pir gaale wodar yeskidine; ogoamaar yedi dheseeda dhese.
52003005	Ogonante keeda kaara os darshana inin damaamonna, Barjodar woylamin yenin qajenam dhesana Thimaatoosam yedar i yittsade. Yedar kiam inin yittsoonoar "Taysayse shedea yeam taysayse shedidi doo ki dew? Ogoka wosa waadimanoar sun konin shidhoamadettsi" hamayse inin bhocchonnane.
52003006	Ko dahaannaar Thimaatoos taaki yekalanka wodar nivayse, Barjodar woylamin yenin qajenbee yesa nashimmakkonbesa wozisen upsinam wona ki giyade; ogodettsi yedi rooro wul wozaka woam yenin bhocchenbee wodi yeam shedana wonin anngardhendettsi yediar woam shedana yenin anngardhenbeam wona ki giyade.
52003007	Ogona imbanaanato, gaalitebee qaabitebe wo dahaakaar, Barjodar woylamin yenin qajen goynsa yenka wo wocchimbhade.
52003008	Harrna hambhidianna, yedi Imbaa wontea Yesuska wocchimbhayse daa ye hanna, wonnon sadanna wozane.
52003009	Marrato! Yennon goynsa Barjo birante wosa dohon wozan wul goynka Barjoam hamindettsi wo gobsho?
52003010	Sootinbee rooronbe wocchimbhayse Barjoam wonin miskayno yeam shedanabee Barjodar woylamin yenin qajen goynsa joogonam thoosana wonin damoadettsibene.
52003011	Wosa Imbaa Barjobee Imbaa wontea Yesusbe yekal wonin nivoadettsi yinti goyti wona ki ashke.
52003012	Wonin yeam nashendettsi, kinka kinkabee waani een wulbena yesa dohoono nashimmakkono konin thoothoadettsi Imbaa wontea Yesus ki haye.
52003013	Ogodettsi Imbaa wontea Yesus yisa gazana eena wulbesana kinin niven wodanka, wosa Imba maataa Barjosa birante siya yer yindar haapadhiminabee gazana eenabe maatayse yenin doadettsi yeam ki wocchinse.
52004001	Ta keeda shidhon goynsa, imbanaanato, Barjoam wozisana hamin daa yeam konin zaskenam wokalanka yedi dhesidine; taar yenin dahayno ogodettsine. Imbaa wontea Yesussa naabenka yeam wonin miskenbee kiilenbe kalon keeda Barjoam wozisaate yenin doadettsine.
52004002	Imbaa wontea Yesussa naabenka hamin dahaa upsi yena wonin imonam yedi dheseeda dhese.
52004003	Barjosa bhocchino yenin gazimbhoadettsine; ogonoar sharmucimakkokalanka yenin pegadhoadettsine.
52004004	-
52004005	Barjoam dhesimina eena sharmucimakkonam kenin anngardhendettsi dayma, yedi wul meteka meteka yesa bishinam gazamobee gobshibeka toolayse yenin yedoadettsine.
52004006	Dhalqin ogoka eedi hayyear imbanaasaam taysate ki genabhoode. Kosa birayse yena wocchinsayse wonin giyonbee tarjonbedettsi igina yerraam waadadhayna eenadar Barjo halon kida maase.
52004007	Harrna hambhidianna, Barjo woam kinin eeloono gazamoka wonin doadettsine; minngamoka wonin doadettsitehe.
52004008	Ogonante kiilimen koam jibbea ea kinin jibbayno yinnon Manpas Gazanam yena imea Barjoamne, eediamtehe.
52004009	Kinka kiam nashintanam yedi yenti Barjokalanka yenin dhesonna, ogo goynsa hayyear yena thaapoadettsi zaskehe.
52004010	Harrna hambhidianna, Moqodoonia peen wulir dahaana imbanaana wulam nasheeda nashe; ko dahaannaar imbanaanato, ta yeam wonin kiilayno kalon keam yenin nashoadettsine.
52004011	Payyamoka daanabee, yennon bhocchinam thoosanabee, kosa birayse yena wonin giyondettsi yennon aaninka waadadhanabe yenin wocchimbhoadettsi yeam woda kiile.
52004012	Yin ye hayanna, Barjodar woylamin qajiminakal shawkadhaana yeda maate; eedi haydar baske maatattene.
52004013	Imbanaanato, qaabe yindar haydheaysa qolmina waani eenadettsi qaabonka yenin atoamadettsi, diyaana goynsa ye dhese woda zage.
52004014	Yesusin diyonbee dembhira kinin dhaabhonbeam gonne hamayse wonin tiyenna, Yesusdar woylamin qajayse diyaanaam Yesusbesana kinka Barjoyn bevenam dhesooda dhese.
52004015	Imbaa wontea Yesussa upsinka yena yin woda giye: Imbaa wontea Yesusin nivenka yekka wodi sadanka dahaana eena diyaanaam birattone.
52004016	Barjo yinti upsin kinin imenkabee, gaananasa hayoa upsin kinin imenkabee, Barjosa thurumban pugadhenkabe Imbaa wontea Yesus yinti cecira kida hanche; Kiristoosdar woylamin qajayse diyaana eenaar dembhira birayse keda dhaabhe.
52004017	Ogora wodi sadanka dahaana eena kembesana kinka Imbaa wontea Yesusbesana jibarendar keerana polonka woda tura tiidhe. Yin rooro wulna Imbaa wontea Yesusbesana woda dee.
52004018	Ogonante upsin ogoka kinka kiam wocchinsee.
52005001	Imbanaanato, ogo yerin yin maaten wodanbee levenbesa yena thaapa zaskehe.
52005002	Harrna hambhidianna, Barjosa rooronin nivayno diibi sootika nivendettsi konin nivenam yedi yemal payya hayayse dheseeda dhese.
52005003	Eeno wul "Payyane, gaale qolehe" konin hamen wodanka, adhima burqo mayn sirmanam konin yedendettsi kaye dhesadhima kedar koda nive; hamin ko dahaakaar kedi dhaqehe.
52005004	Imbanaanato, yediar thipansa iinte yenin dahaamonna, ogono roorono diibidettsi yedar nivehe.
52005005	Harrna hambhidianna, yedi wul shaakanbee rooronbesa iinte dahaana eenane; wodi sootinbee thipanbesa iinte dahaana eenatehe.
52005006	Ta keeda qaymayse wosa metenam wottsintaka wo dee; waani eendettsi wo raatabhoode.
52005007	Harrna hambhidianna, raatayna sootinka keda raate; barin bardhaynaar sootinka keda bardhe.
52005008	Wodiar shaakansa iinte wonin dohonna, wosa metenam wottsintaka wo dee; Barjodar woylamin qajintanbee nashimmakkonbeam qaashidettsi wo qaadhe; dhaqintansa qaabe yindar haydhenam wonnon metendar qoobhedettsi wo wode.
52005009	Barjo woam kinin kamoono woam wacimana dayma, wosa Imba maataa Yesus Kiristooska dhaqinta wonin haapoadettsine.
52005010	Kiristoosin wona diyoono sadaka dahaa wo hannaar wo diydiannaar kimbesana kinka wonin doadettsine.
52005011	Ogonante yedi keeda ta yenin hayendettsi, kinka kiam kiam kiilaate wocchinsee.
52005012	Imbanaanato, yesa shaarinte Barjosa waadimanka qajadhaate Imbaa wontea Yesuska yeam wottsaynabee kiilayna eenabeam yenin gobshoadettsi yeam woda miske.
52005013	Kesa waadiman goynka kattsi nashimmakkoka keam gobshee. Kinka kinkaar payyamoka dehee.
52005014	Imbanaanato, "Boosona eenaam wacimee; kurtumbhaynaam wocchinsee; eena kantaysa qolminaam kelshee; een wulna darshee" hamayse yeam woda kiile.
52005015	Hayyear eedina siya raqate siya kinin hayoamadettsi mete yesaam gishee; ogora sagi rooro wul kinka kinkabee een waani wulbena payya yer hayota wocchimbhee.
52005016	Rooro wul wozadhee;
52005017	garma Barjoam miskee;
52005018	yer wulka Barjoam gobshee. Harrna hambhidianna, Barjosa bhocchino Yesus Kiristooska ogoam yenin hayoadettsine.
52005019	Manpas Gazansa waadimanam mareebhode;
52005020	Barjokala qansayse eenna giidhenam bageebhode.
52005021	Yer wulam taysayse shedee; payya maatonamaar yedee.
52005022	Siya yer wulkalanka pegadhee.
52005023	Payyanam imea Barjoa yinti yer wulka yeam ki gazise; yesa manpasinbee, yesa sadanbee, yesa bishin wulbeam Imbaa wontea Yesus Kiristoosin niven wodanka siya yer yindar haapadhimina hayayse yeam ki toole.
52005024	Yeam eelaa gon hama kinin dohonna, ogoam kida haye.
52005025	Imbanaanato, wona Barjoam miskee.
52005026	Imbanaana wulam gonin nashimmakkonka sunqintaka "Nagaya" kena hamee.
52005027	Warqatin koam imbanaana wulna nabbabadhoadettsi Imbaa wontea Yesussa naabenka yena ida giye.
52005028	Imbaa wontea Yesus Kiristoossa sunin imintono yenka ko dee.
53001001	Wosa Imba maataa Barjobee Imba wontea Yesus Kiristoosbeka Teselonqe katamante dohon misken ooninna i Bhawloosbee, Sillaasbee, Thimaatoosbekalanka nittsadhoono warqannone.
53001002	Wosa Imbaa Barjobee Imbaa wontea Yesus Kiristoosbesa sunin imintonbee payyamonbe yena ko dee.
53001003	Imbanaanato, yennon goynka rooro wul Barjoam gobshano woam zaskaynone; ogonoar Barjodar woylamin yenin qajayno kattsi gebhadabee ye wulsa kinka kinka nashimmakkono thoothadabe konin yivennane.
53001004	Yedar yeskoono oytaydhanbee gaalen wulbeka yenin wocchimbhonnabee Barjodar woylamin qajayse yenin woyonnabe, Barjosa misken onnasa shaarinte yenka woda erime.
53001005	Ogono yer wul Barjosa pirdino tipa konin dohonam may koda dhee. Ogonante Barjo yisa bitamonte ardana damayna eena yeam kida haye; gaalenamaar yenin tiyayno kisa bitamon goynnane.
53001006	Barjo yeam galshaynadar gaalenam maasana kisa pirdino tipane.
53001007	-
53001008	Pir taaki gaalen haapayna yembee wombeam ukunsisanane. Ogonoar yin konin maatayno Imbaa wontea Yesus kantanka dahaana yisa gaananabesana kinka nuunsa laabhinanka cecira kinin niven wodankane. Ogo wodanka Barjoam dhesiminabee Imbaa wontea Yesussa dhacchintan upsinna ee hamiminabedar kida pirde.
53001009	Kedi Imbaa wontea Yesus birantebee kantan kisa gobshinbekalanka edimayse rooro wul lay kayensa pirdika keda dhabshadhe.
53001010	Keam dhabshadhaynoar Imbaa wontea Yesusin nivea rooroakane. Ogono kinin nivayno yisa gazana eena kiam kenin gobshoadettsibee kidar woylamin qajayna wul kanka kenin targadhoadettsibene. Wosa tarjamonam qansayse gonne hamayse yenin tiyonna, yediar kembesana yeda paydadhe.
53001011	Ogoam bhocchintaka yena rooro wul Barjoam wonin miskayno, Barjo yeam kinin eelonna yeekayna yeam kinin hayoadettsibee payya waadadhana yesa dohon qaabonbee kidar woylamin qajintaka yenin waadadhen wulbeam yisa kantanka yena kinin thoosoadettsibene.
53001012	Yin wonin miskayno Imbaa wontea Yesussa naabeno yenka konin gobshadhoadettsibee wosa Barjo maataa Imbaa wontea Yesus Kiristoossa sunin imintonka kanka yenin gobshadhoadettsibene.
53002001	Imbanaanato, Imbaa wontea Yesus Kiristoossa nivintanbee wodi kidar wonin buken goynbesa yin giyayse woda yeam miske:
53002002	"Inta Barjokala i qansade" hamayse giyntaka way wonin apoka giyate yittsaadettsi way wokalanka warqat thaapate yittsadhaadettsi hayayse een waanin giyenka, "Barjosa roorono yeskidine" hamayse yedi saanawa yesa bhocchinam ookeebhode, kurtumbheebhode.
53002003	Eedi hayyear yer harkaar yeam ki taysabhoode. Harrna hambhidianna, birayse "Barjona ee hamattone" hamayna dhaabhimabee haynaar ee hamima, agaa kayendar yivea ea haapadhimabe ogono Barjosa roorono nivehe.
53002004	Agaa haynaar ee hamima ea "barjone" hambhayna wulbee yina goodimbhayna wulbeam jibbada kedara yiam bhaabar hayayse Barjosa gazan ooninte dooqayse, "Inta Barjone" kida hame.
53002005	Ena yembesana kinka inin dohon wodanka, ogo inin yena giyonam yedi bhocchattenu?
53002006	Yinnon wodanka kinin haapadhoadettsi ta kinin nivoamadettsi kiam marayno har ko hannaar dheseeda dhese.
53002007	Harrna hambhidianna, ta aachimaa ko hannaar, haynaar ee hamima easa kantano taar waadadhite ko dahade. Kisa kantanam marea daane; agaa maream goyra mardhenka yekka kisa kantano aachika koda waadadhe.
53002008	Agaa maream goyra mardhen wodanka, haynaar ee hamima ea may kida haapadhe. Imbaa wontea Yesus aponka uten upsinka kiam bashayse kida deese; pir tarshen nivintan yinnonka kiam kida kayse.
53002009	Haynaar ee hamima ea kinin nivayno Seethaansa kantanka, eediam dhaddhisana tarshea yerbee, milkitbee, kattsi gebhi yerbeam waadimintakane.
53002010	Yin pir kayendar yivayna eenaam siyon yerin wulka taysite kida waadadhe. Eena igina kenin kayaynoar dhaqana keam yeskisen goninam nashayse kenin tiyaamonnane.
53002011	Ogona buudanam gonne hamayse kenin tiyoadettsi Barjo keam dhaddhisen yerinam kedar kida yittse.
53002012	Ogonoar goninam "tiyattone" hamayse siyonka wozadhayna wuldar pirdadhoadettsine.
53002013	Imbaa wontea Yesusin nashayna imbanaanato, wodiar yennon goynka Barjoam rooro wul gobsha woam koda zaske. Wonin gobshaynoar yedi Manpas Gazanka yenin gazimbhenbee goninam yenin tiyen goynbeka yenin dhaqoadettsi Barjo yisa birana eena hayayse yeam kinin kamonnane.
53002014	Barjo yena wonin giyon dhacchintan upsinka ye dhaqe yeam kinin eeloono Imbaa wontea Yesus Kiristoossa gobshinam yenin kashimoadettsine.
53002015	Ogonante imbanaanato, wocchimbhee; wonin giyoono ko dahaannaar, wonin thaapoono ko dahaannaar, yena wonin dhettson timmirin wulam payya hayayse yedee.
53002016	Kidi yinti wosa Imba maataa Yesus Kiristoosbee woam nashaa, yisa sunin imintonkaar rooro wul lay wocchisintanbee qaabe haydhenbeam wona imaa wosa Imbaa Barjobe
53002017	yesa woylaminam ke wocchinse; payya maaton wulam yenin hayoadettsibee yenin giyoadettsibe kantanam yena ke ime.
53003001	Ta keeda shidhon goynsa, imbanaanato, ogo yekal konin maataadettsi Imbaa wontea Yesussa upsino saanawa konin workoadettsibee konin gobshadhoadettsibe wona Barjoam miskee.
53003002	Yin pir eeno wul Barjodar woylamin qajoono konin dahaamonna, qaaboysa siyanabee wobona eenakalankabe wonin dhaqoadettsi wona Barjoam miskee.
53003003	Imbaa wontea Yesus kidi eedi gon hamaane; kidi yeam kida wocchinse; Seethaankalankaar yeam kida toole.
53003004	Yena wonin giyenam ta ko hannaar, os birante ko hannaar, yenin hayenam Imbaa wontea Yesuska yedar woylamin woda qaje.
53003005	Imbaa wontea Yesus Barjosa nashimmakkonbee Kiristoossa darshintanbeka yesa woylaminam wocchimbhintandar ki maase.
53003006	Imbanaanato, wokalanka yenin tiyon timmirinam garayse waadima qolma sun yaayayna yesa imbanaana wulkalanka yenin edimoadettsi wosa Imbaa Yesus Kiristoossa naabenka yena woda giye.
53003007	Woam maatinta hamin yeam konin zaskenam yemal dheseeda dhese. Wodi yekal wonin dehenka waadima qolma dohootone;
53003008	eedi haysaar galanam sun itsootone; yedar yer goyti kalaaka hattear wonin dethoamadettsi sootinbee rooronbe qajadhitebee gaalitebe waadadhaate wo dahade.
53003009	Yin wonin waadadhoonoar wonnon kamsika yenin yivoadettsine; yekalanka tiyana wosa hayamo qolmina wonin dohonnatehe.
53003010	Harrna hambhidianna, yekal wonin dohon wodanka, "Waadadhana nashima ki itsabhoode" hamea upsi wodi yena imidine.
53003011	Hamin ko dahaakaar waadima waadadhimina, yiam zaskaamon dhalqinte ardayse goyti qolma yaayayna yesa shaarinte dahaana eenasa wodi qansidine.
53003012	Iginadettsina eena lay hamayse yisa waadimanam waadadhaate yinnon galanam kenin itsoadettsi Imbaa wontea Yesus Kiristoossa naabenka kena giyada keam woda kiile.
53003013	Imbanaanato, yediar payyan waadiman waadadhana boosimbheebhode.
53003014	Ko warqatinte wonin thaapon dhalqinam qansayse ee hamima eedi daa ki hanna, kiam payya hayayse shedee; kinin ooshimbhoadettsi kimbesana kinka wormeebhode.
53003015	Ko dahaannaar yesa imbanaasdettsi kiam kiilee; yesa banqi eedidettsi kiam paydeebhode.
53003016	Payyamonsa Imbaa kidi yinti rooro wul yer wulka payyamonam yena ki ime. Imbaa wontea Yesus ye wulbesana ki dee.
53003017	Ko nagaymakkonam innon aaninka thaapaa inta Bhawloosne. Innon warqatin wuldar haapadhea milkita kaane; inin thaapaynoar ogodettsine.
53003018	Imbaa wontea Yesus Kiristoossa sunin imintono ye wulka ko dee.
54001001	Woam Dhacchea Barjobee wonindar woylamin hayea Yesus Kiristoosbesa upsinka Yesus Kiristoossa tarjamonnante nittsadhaa i Bhawlooskalanka
54001002	Barjodar woylamin qajintaka gon isa naasi maataa Thimaatoosna nittsadhoono warqannone. Barjo Imbaabee Imbaa wontea Yesus Kiristoosbesa sunin imintonbee, garintonbee, payyamonbe hana ko dee.
54001003	Moqodoonia peendar inin yiven wodanka inin hana elqimondettsi Epsoon katamante dooqaa; ogote dahaana waani waani eena buudan timmirinam eenna kenin dhettsoamadettsi,
54001004	eerin giidhenbee macchiysa qolmon eykenasa caacin paydada giidherrabe kenin maatoadettsi kena giyaa. Iginadettsina yerra palimenam keda beve; Barjodar woylamin qajayse waadadhadhen Barjosa waadimanna pootehe.
54001005	Ogoam kena hanin giyayno gazamo woylamkabee, payya qaabokabee, gon Barjodar woylamin qajintabeka haapadhen nashimmakkonka kenin doadettsine.
54001006	Waani waani eena igina yerrakalanka dhaddhismayse sun pootima waraqadhadhendar ke maatade.
54001007	Ogoam kenin hayaynoar Musesa yigginam dhettsayna eena maatana zagaysene. Ko dahaannaar yinin giyenam kedi dhesehe; "May wodi dhesidine" yinin hamenamaar bhocchehe.
54001008	Ko dahaannaar eedi zaskaadettsi yiggika ki waadadhina, yiggino payya konin maatonam dhesooda dhese.
54001009	Yigginam imbhoono tipana eenana konin dahaamonam dhesooda dhese. Yigginam imbhoono yigginam tooliminabee, ee hamiminabee, Barjona goodimiminabee, seesaynabee, gazamoysa qolminabee, Barjo waadimanam bagaynabee, imbanabee indanabeam deesaynabee, eediam deesaynabee,
54001010	sharmucimakkon hayaynabee, anngi dahayse anngika wodhaynabee, eediam shanshaynabee, buudan giyaynabee, buudamoka mallaynabee, tipa maaton timmirinam jibbayna yerin waani wulamaar waadadhaynabenane.
54001011	Ogono tipa maatoono timmirino konin haapadhayno gobshadhaa Barjosa gobshinam giyen dhacchintan upsirane. Ogono dhacchintan upsino ina elqimayse imbhoonone.
54001012	Iam "Eedi gon hamaane" hamayse waadiman yinnonna iam kinin kamonna, kantan yinnonam ina imaa Imbaa wontea Yesus Kiristoosam ida gobshe.
54001013	Ena birayse Kiristoosam iireabee, oytayeabee, eediam ooshinseabe i dahaakaar, kidi ina ki garade. Harrna hambhidianna, ogo wulam ina kinin garoono kidar woylamin qajimabee kiam dhesimabe inin hayonnane.
54001014	Wosa Imbaasa sunin imintonam Yesus Kiristooska dohon Barjodar woylam qajintanbee nashimmakkonbeka thoosayse ina ko imbhade.
54001015	"Yesus Kiristoos seeson eenam dhacchana peen kodar ki nivade" hamayno upsino gonin hammobee eedi wulin tiyoadettsi zaskeabene. Seeson een wulra sagi seesoysa dahaa ea intane.
