54001016	Ko dahaannaar rooro wul lay dehen sadan haapana kidar woylamin qajayna eenana kamsi konin maatoadettsi Yesus Kiristoos i seeson waadimanka sagaam yisa darshintan wulam dhaana ina ki garade.
54001017	Kidi yimal Barjo maataa, diymabee haapadhimabe rooro wul bit maataa Barjona rooro wul lay gobshi kina ko dee; amiin.
54001018	Isa naasa Thimaatoos, ena birayse Barjokala qansayse giyayna eena hasa kenin giyon upsinam banqi koymo hayayse kanka payyan banqinam kansaa hamayse hana ida elqime.
54001019	Barjodar woylam qajintabee payya qaabobe hasa ko dee. Waani waani eena payyan qaabon yinnonam garayse bazindara sagadhen gonngalanam wuranin qunthate kaysendettsi Barjodar woylamin yinin qajenam ke kaysade.
54001020	Kesa iira Hemenoosbee Iskindirosbe ke dahade. Kedi Barjoyn iiradhiminam kenin dhesoadettsi Seethaanna saskate keam i imade.
54002001	Ta keeda een wulna Barjoam gobshada yenin miskoadettsi yer wulsa birayse yeam ida kiile.
54002002	Barjodettsi dayntabee kinka kiam gobshintabeka gaale qolma payyamonka wonin doadettsi, binnabee hayamoysa dahaana wulbena miskee.
54002003	Ogono yer payyabee woam Dhacchea Barjosa birante woziseabene.
54002004	Harrna hambhidianna, Barjoyn zagayno eedi wulin dhaqoadettsibee goninam kenin dhesoadettsibene.
54002005	Barjo kalaane; pir Barjobee eedibesa shaarinte dahayse qaashinsea kalaane; kidiar eedi maataa Yesus Kiristoosne.
54002006	Een wulsa seeson bazanam kashana yiam ki imade; ogonoar gonin hamon wodan yeskaysaka Barjosa dhacchintan waadimanam dhettsisayno tarjamonone.
54002007	Ogonante Barjo Ayiwdtay hamma eenana Kiristoossa tarjamonnante yittsana iam kamidine; iam kinin yittsoono yisa dhacchintan upsinam giyayse Barjodar woylamin qajintanbee goninbeka inin dhettsoadettsine. Ogoam inin giyenka goninam ida giye, buuda giyattine!
54002008	Keeda raq wulir dahaana eena anngina wacimenbee palimenbeam yikalanka pegisayse, yisa gazisadhon aaninaam dhaasayse Barjoam kenin miskoadettsi ida zage.
54002009	Ogodettsi maana yisa sitinam ashkadhintakabee, worqibee inqu hambhea bazaysa detha maataa yerraam qorcindar qaadhintabee, bazaysa gebhi maaton apala qaadhintabeka bishin yinnonam gobshana dayma, kurtumbhebee meten yinnonam wottsintabeka maana zasken apalan ke qaadhe ida zage.
54002010	"Barjona woda goodime" hamayna maana hayan keam zaskendettsi payyan waadimanka ke goobe.
54002011	Maana lay hamayse ee hamintaka timmirinam ke tiye.
54002012	Maa anngiam konin dhettsoadettsibee anngidar kosa hayamo doadettsibe giyattine; lay hama koam koda zaske.
54002013	Harrna hambhidianna, birayse Addaam ki pijadhade; Hewaan budobar ko pijadhade.
54002014	Tapir taysadhayse Barjosa yigginam kottsoono Hewaanne; taysadhaa Addaamtehe.
54002015	Ko dahaannaar maa Barjodar woylamin qajintabee, nashimmakkobee, gazamobee, mete yisaam shanintabeka ko daana, naasi adhintaka dhaqa ko dhaqe.
54003001	"Eedi hayyear misken ooninam wottsea maatana yi zaganna, payyan waadimanam kida anngardhe" hamayno dhalqino gonne.
54003002	Ogonante misken ooninam wottseam yin daa kiam ko zaske: Bagime yindar qolma, maa kallon geshoa, yiam zaskendettsi dehea, meten yinnonam wottsea, goytika waadadhea, chocchi tiyea, eenaam dhettsana damea,
54003003	bardhima, wacimima, leemi maataa, eedibesana kinka goorima, koymo nashima,
54003004	oonin eena yinnaam payyamoka wottseabee kisa naanaar yer wulka kiam gobshaate kina ee hamaynabe maataa ea ki dee.
54003005	Eedi oonin eena yinnaam wottsana yi damaamma, Barjosa misken ooninam hamin wottsana kida dame?
54003006	Pormakkonka purdhayse Seethaandar yeskoono pirdino kidar konin yeskoamadettsi Barjodar woylam qajaa eedi haali misken ooninam wottsea ki dahabhoode.
54003007	Eensa wuupontebee Seethaansa zaanintebe kinin dhamboamadettsi Barjodar woylamin qajiminakalanka payya tarjaysa dahaa maata kiam koda zaske.
54003008	Ogodettsi misken ooninte waadadhayna eena yiam gobshadhaanabee, upsinka yisa wocchimbhaanabee, bardhiminabee, koymona gibiminabe maata keam koda zaske.
54003009	Pir Barjodar woylamin yinin qajensa aachin dhalqinam payyan qaabonka yedayna maata keam koda zaske.
54003010	Kedi birayse taysayse ke shedadhe; ogosa budonte siya yer yindar haapadhimina ke hanna, misken ooninte waadadhayna eena ke maate.
54003011	Ogodettsi kesa maanaar yiam gobshadhaanabee, eediam wuupiminabee, yiam zaskendettsi dahaynabee, yer wulka gon hammabe maata keam koda zaske.
54003012	Misken ooninte waadadhea ea maa kallon geshoa, pir naana yinnabee oonin yinnonbeam payyamoka wottsea maata kiam koda zaske.
54003013	Misken ooninte waadadhayna eena payyan waadimanka yinnon metenna gebhi gobshi keda haape; Yesus Kiristoosdar woylam qajintansa kantanamaar keda haape.
54003014	Warqatin koam hana inin thaapenka saana hakal nivana bhocchi i hayade.
54003015	Hakal nimbha i kappidiannaar, Barjo ooninte eedi hamin daa kiam konin zaskenam hanin dhesoadettsi hana ida thaape. Ogonoar Barjosa oonin eena goninsa turturbee baalabe maataana kedine; pir kedi lay dehea Barjosa misken onnone.
54003016	Barjodettsi maatintansa aachin dhalqino qothime qolma gebhine. Ogonoar Kiristoos "eedi maatayse haapadhaa, kisa gonamonsa Manpas Gazanin tarjaa, Barjo gaananana haapadhaa, zarsin wulna tarjadhaa, peendar dohon eenin yindar woylamin qajaa, gobshinkaar cecindar yivaane" hamaynone.
54004001	Manpas Gazano "Macchin wodanka waani waani eena dhaddhisen manpasinka entsadhayse meeshisa timmirinam qansayse Barjodar woylamin yinin qajenam keda gare" hamayse may koda giye.
54004002	Ogodettsin timmirinin nivayno mesken yisa gemmaysaka maltamoka buudimayna eenakalanka koda nive.
54004003	Iginadettsina eena keemon kiam keemadhenam keda mare; Barjodar woylamin qajayse goninam dhesayna eena kiam gobshayse ke itse Barjoyn pijon waani waani galanam "itseebhode" hamayse keda mare.
54004004	Ko dahaannaar Barjoyn pijon yer wul payyane; Barjoam gobshayse ke tiydianna, kala hattear dhabadhea yer qolehe.
54004005	Harrna hambhidianna, ogono yerro Barjosa upsinbee Barjoam miskintanbeka gazisadhoono koda maate.
54004006	Dhettsintan ogoam Barjodar woylamin qajaynaam ha bhocchisidianna, Barjodar woylamin hanin qajon upsinbee hanin yiven payyan timmirinbeka dusada gebhaate Yesus Kiristoossa payya waadima eedi hada maate.
54004007	Maana gecchonasa eeri maaten peen kogayn dhalqinkalanka pegimbhaa; Barjodettsi maatintanka meten hasaam duttsaa.
54004008	Harrna hambhidianna, hasa bishinam ashkana hanin duttsayno yerro likkana koda age; Barjodettsi maatana hanin duttsayno ko hanna, ta dohon dayntanbee os birante niven dayntanbena woylam daran haydhayna yerra wulna koda age.
54004009	Ogono dhalqino gon hama, pir eedi wul gonne hamayse tiya yiam zaskaynone.
54004010	Wodi ogoam haapota waadadhaate woda mashime; ogonoar een wulam, kalon Barjodar woylamin qajaynaam Dhacchea, lay dehea Barjodar woylam wonin hayennane.
54004011	Yerra iginaam eenna giyada dhettsaa.
54004012	Hasa naasamonam eedi hayyear ki bagabhoode; hasa dhalqinbee, dayntanbee, nashimmakkonbee, Barjodar woylamin hanin qajenbee, hasa gazamonbeka Barjodar woylamin qajaynana payya kamsi maataa.
54004013	Inin nivenka yekka Mathaap Gazanam eenna nabbabaatebee, Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam giyaatebee, dhettsaatebe wocchimbhaa.
54004014	Barjokala qansayse hana giidhenka misken ooninsa donzanaar hadar aanin kenin woden wodanka, hana imbhon hakal dohon Manpas Gazansa imintonam walaabhode.
54004015	Hasa gebhintano een wulsa birante may konin haapadhoadettsi igina yerraka wocchimbhaa; igina yerraam waadimadar hacchota haam imaa.
54004016	Hannon metenbee hanin dhettsenbeka haam gishaa; igina yerraka wocchimbhaa. Harrna hambhidianna, ogoam ha haydianna, hannon metenbee hanin dhettsenka qansaynabeam hada dhacche.
54005001	Ea gebhadhaam hasa imbadettsi hayayse kiilaa, kiam wacimaabhode; barshina naanaam hasa indanaasdettsi hayayse,
54005002	maana gecchonaam hasa indadettsi hayayse, maana barshinaamaar hasa michadettsi hayayse gazamoka keam gobshada kiilaa.
54005003	Gon eedi kelsheaysa qolmina maana qambhinaam kelshaa.
54005004	Hayyear anngiysa diyon maynsa naasi way kosa naasi naas daa ko hanna, igina naana birayse yisa oonin eenana Barjodettsi maatintanam may dhaanabee yiam adhaana imbanabee eykenabe kena kenin gaalonsa bazan maasadhenbeam ke dhese. Harrna hambhidianna, ogono waadimano Barjoam wozisaynone.
54005005	Anngiysa diyoono gon yimal bish dohoono mayno Barjodar yisa qaabe hayayse, sootinbee rooronbe Barjoam miskada wocchimbhayse koda dee.
54005006	Peen ko yerinka yisa metenam wozisana bish nashayno anngiysa diyoono mayno sadaka dahayse diyoonone.
54005007	Bagime yindar qolmina maatayse kenin doadettsi yerra iginaam kena giyaa.
54005008	Ko dahaannaar yisa muldha maataana, kalon oonin eena yinnaam bhocchima ea Barjodar woylamin yinin qajenam garidine; Barjodar woylamin qajimaadaraar kalon sagi ki gemmade.
54005009	Eedi makkam kaysa leve thoothaama maam annginaysa diyaana maanayn thaapadhen warqatinte koam thaapaabhode. Thaapadhayno mayno anngi kalaysa dohoono maa maata koam koda zaske.
54005010	Pir payya waadimaka yina tarjadhaa maa maata koam koda zaske; ogonoar naana yinnaam gettsintabee, chocchi tiyntabee, Barjo eenasa roo shivintabee, gaalensa iinte dahaanaam kelshintabee, payyan waadiman wulam hayntabeka wocchimbhoono maata koam koda zaske.
54005011	Annginaysa diyaana maanayn thaapadhen warqatinte maana barshinaam thaapaabhode. Harrna hambhidianna, kesa waan anngarman keam bashaka, kesa Kiristoosdar dohoono nashimmakkono tokaate konin yivenka kembhana kenin zagennane.
54005012	Ogo ena birayse Kiristoosbesana kinka yinin ardon mallanam kenin garonna kedar koda pirdadhe.
54005013	Tapir waadimanam garayse eensa onnar yaayanam keda duse; waadimanam garinta bish dayma eediam wuupaynabee, eensa dhalqinte ardaynabee, giya yiam zaskiminam giyaynabe keda maate.
54005014	Ogonante annginaysa diyaana maana barshina kembhayse naasi kenin adhoadettsibee oonin yinnonam kenin wottsoadettsibe ida kiile. Yin kenin hayenka woam jibbayna kenka wosa naabenam kenin genensa goyti keda bashadhe.
54005015	Harrna hambhidianna, kosa birayse annginaysa diyaana waani waani maana Seethaansa paanan yivota Kiristoosam ke garade.
54005016	Barjodar woylamin qajayno mayno annginaysa diyaana maana eedana kosa daa ke hanna, misken ooninna baske kenin maatoamadettsi ko keam kelshe. Ogona misken onno gon yiam kelshaynaysa qolmina eena annginaysa diyaana maanaam kelshana koda dame.
54005017	Misken ooninam payya hayayse wottsayna donzanaam, kalon Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam giyaatebee eenaam dhettsaatebe qajadhaynana sagi gobshi koda zaske.
54005018	Harrna hambhidianna, Mathaap Gazante "Isininam qurthora bulo hanin qapsea waxasa apon dhaxaabhode" yin pir, "Waadiman waadadheana damooz kasha koda zaske" ko hambhade.
54005019	Eedi lamaa way makkam tarjaamma misken ooninsa donzaam bersadhonam qansaabhode.
54005020	Waani eenin kurtumbhoadettsi kesa iira seeson waadadhaynaam een wulsa birante wacimaa.
54005021	Hanin hayen yerin wulka haysaar woti shedima way haydarar keedhimima kiilimen ko wulam hanin tooloadettsi Barjobee, Yesus Kiristoosbee, Barjoyn kamaana kisa gaananabesa birante elqimen koam hana ida giye.
54005022	Aanin hannon kedar wodayse hayyeamaar haynsana gibaabhode; waani eensa seesonte wormaabhode; hannon metenam gazamoka toolaa.
54005023	Hasa iin burqono rooro wul haam konin galshenna, woynea hattasa aapin cuubadhonam likka wucaa; keeda kaara os noqo bish wucaabhode.
54005024	Waani eensa seesono may konin dohonna, kedar pirdadhoadettsi dhesima ko dhesime; waani eensa seesono ko hanna, likka kappayse koda dhesime.
54005025	Ogodettsi payyan waadimanoar mayne; may dhesimimino ko hannaar aachimayse shidhehe.
54006001	Barjosa naabenbee timmirinbe konin irdhoamadettsi, eedina waadadhayna wul yiam wottsaynana gobshin wulam ima keam zaskendettsi hayayse ke bhocche.
54006002	Keam wottsaynaar Barjodar woylamin qajayna ke hanna, waadadhayna Yesuska kesa imbanaana kenin dohonna keam ke bagabhoode. Kalon waadimanka agenam haapayna Barjodar woylamin qajaynabee nashadhaanabe kenin dohonna, ena birara sagi ke waadadhe. Yerra kinaam dhettsaate keam kiilaa.
54006003	Imbaa wontea Yesus Kiristoossa payyan upsinbee Barjodettsi maasen gonin hamon timmirinbesana agimon abin timmirinam hayyear dhettsea ki hanna,
54006004	pormakkonka purdhaa, yer kalaar dhesimaane; ko dahaannaar dhalqka palimanabee sun goore dhaasea upsi giyanabe siya anngarma kisa daane. Iginarankaar woogintobee, goorebee, iirimebee, eedidar siya qaabintabee,
54006005	gara garma palimebe koda ute. Igina kinka palimayna yisa qaabon gemmaanabee gonin yikalanka kayaana eenabene; iginadettsina eenasa Barjoam gobshintano koymo kenin haapeasa goyti kena koda maate.
54006006	"Isa dohoono ina yeeka ko yeeke" hamea eana gon Barjoam gobshintano koymo kenin haapeasa goytine.
54006007	Harrna hambhidianna, peen kodar yer kala hattear bavate nivootone; peen kora yer kala hattear bavate yivana damattone.
54006008	Wonin itsenbee wonin qaadhenbeam wo haapidianna wona yeeka ko yeeke.
54006009	Wodimbhota zagayna eena taysadhayse thoothi malgimmakkonbee keam genen anngarmanbesa zaaninte keda yedadhe; ogono kesa anngarmano keam genayse koda kayse.
54006010	Harrna hambhidianna, koymo nashinta seeso wulsa caacine. Waani waani eena koymo anngardhintaka Barjodar woylamin yinin qajerra dhaddhismayse thoothi gaalesa iir ke ardade.
54006011	Ya Barjo ea, igina yerrakalanka pegadhaa. Tipamobee, Barjodettsi dayntabee, Barjodar woylamin qajintabee, nashimmakkobee, darshayse wocchimbhintabee, lemmakkobeka gebhana zagaa.
54006012	Barjodar woylamin qajadhen goynna banqinam bashana payya hayayse kansaa. Thoothi tarjaynasa birante payyan tarjamonam hanin tarjon wodanka hanin yedoadettsi haam eldhon rooro wul lay dehen sadanam yedaa.
54006013	Yer wulna sadanam imea Barjobee Bhenthenaawi Bhilathoossa birante payyan tarjamonam tarjaa Yesus Kiristoosbesa birante hana ida elqime:
54006014	Imbaa wontea Yesus Kiristoos maatayse kinin nivenka yekka upsin koam genimabee bagime yindar qolmabe maatayse toolaa.
54006015	Kiristoossa nivintano Barjo yinti kinin giyon wodanka koda maate. Barjo gobshadhaabee yimal bish wottsea maataabee, binnasaar Bitaabee imbanasaar Imbaabe kidine.
54006016	Kidi bish dembhi diymane; hayyear theedana damimon shaakante deheane. Hayyear kiam haapadehe, haapanaar damehe. Gobshibee rooro wul lay dehea kantabe kina ko dee; amiin.
54006017	Ta wodan koka wodimo maataana eena kenin erimoamadettsi way kayen koymondar woylam kenin hayoamadettsi kena giyaa. Kenin qaabe hayayno woam ko wozise hamayse yer wulam thoosayse imea Barjodar konin doadettsi kena giyaa.
54006018	Pir payya yer eenna kenin hayoadettsi, payyan waadimanka wodimbhaana kenin maatoadettsi, kedi imanabee yisa dohonam eenbesana kinka kashimanabe ashkimbhaana kenin doadettsi kena giyaa.
54006019	Yin hayada gonin dayntanam haapana niven wodanna maatea kaya kaymin koymonam yinante keda pucche.
54006020	Thimaatoos, hana elqimbhonam toolaa. Kesa buudan dhesintonam "gon dhesintone" hambhen peen kona agen pootimon waraqinbee palimenbekala pegadhaa.
54006021	Waani waani eena "Ogodettsi wosa dhesinto daane" hamada Barjodar woylamin yinin qajenam kedi garidine. Barjosa sunin imintono hambesana kinka ko dee.
55001001	Yesus Kiristooska haapadhen lay dehen sadanam haapooda haape hamen qaabe yindar haydhenkabee Barjosa qaabon goynkabe Yesus Kiristoossa tarjamonnante nittsadhaa i Bhawlooskalanka
55001002	nashadhaa isa naasa Thimaatoosna nittsadhoono warqannone. Barjo Imbaabee Imbaa wontea Yesus Kiristoosbekalanka sunin imintonbee, garintonbee, payyamonbe hana ko dee.
55001003	Rooro wul sootinbee rooronbe Barjoam inin miskenka walma haam inin qaabenka, eykena wonnayn hayaadettsi payya meskeka inin yina waadadhea Barjoam ida gobshe.
55001004	Hasa ermitinam inin bhocchenka, kattsi inin wozadhoadettsi haam shedana ida anngardhe.
55001005	Ya gon Barjodar woylamin hanin qajenam ida bhocche. Ogonoar Barjodar woylamin qajintano ena birayse haaka Loydibee handa Ewniqebekal dohoonone; ta hakalar konin dohonam inta dhesidine.
55001006	Ogo goynka isa aaninam hadar inin woden wodanka nuudettsi hasa iinte yeden Barjosa imintonam hanin dhaasoadettsi hana ida bhocchise.
55001007	Harrna hambhidianna Barjo kantabee, nashimmakkobee, meten wonnonam wottsadhenbesa manpas wona ki imade; kurtumbhesa manpas wona imadehe.
55001008	Ta keeda wosa Imbaa Kiristoosna tarjanabee kinnon goynka dhaxadhaa imbena ooshimbhaabhode; ko dahaannaar Barjo hana imen kantanka kisa dhacchintan upsinna imbesana kinka gaalen tiyaa.
55001009	Kidi wonin waadadhon payyan waadimanna dayma, yisa qaabonbee sunin imintonbeka woam dhacchayse gazana kisa eena maatayse wonin doadettsi woam ki eelade. Ogo Barjosa sunin imintonam ena wodan kosa birayse Yesus Kiristooska wona ko imbhade;
55001010	taaki woam Dhacchea Yesus Kiristoossa nivintanka ko haapadhade. Kidi dembhinsa kantanam kaysayse Barjosa dhacchintan upsin goynka dembhi qolma rooro wul lay dehen sadanam wona ki dhahade.
55001011	Intaar ogo Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam eenna i giyebee i dhettsebe Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaa maatayse i kambhade.
55001012	Ko gaalenam ogonante tiyte i dahade. Ko dahaannaar ooshimbhattine; haydar woylamin inin qajonam dhesayda dhese; inin kina imon elqimenamaar macchin rooroaka yekka toolana kinin damenam inta dhesidine.
55001013	Yesus Kiristooska dohon Barjodar woylamin qajintanbee nashimmakkonbeka ikalanka hanin qanson tipa maaton upsinam kamsidettsi hayayse toolaa.
55001014	Hana imbhon payyan elqimenam wodar dohon Manpas Gazanka toolaa.
55001015	Isiya peente dahaana wul iam kenin garonam dhesaada dhese; kesa shaarinte Pigelusbee Yermogenesbe ke dahade.
55001016	Imbaa wontea Yesus Onesipoorsa oonin eenana yisa payyan waadimanam kena ki waadadhe. Harrna hambhidianna, kidi thoothi wodana iam ki wocchinsade; pir inin dhaxadhenkaar kidi ooshimbhadehe.
55001017	Tapir Roome gidir yinin nivon wodanka gebhi zagayse iam ki haapade.
55001018	Macchin rooroaka Imbaa wontea Yesus yisa payyan waadimanam kina ki waadadhe. Epsoon gidir hamaaka yekka ina kinin waadadhonam ya payya hayayse hada dhese.
55002001	Ta keeda isa naasa, ya Yesus Kiristooska haapadhen Barjosa sunin imintonka wocchimbhaa.
55002002	Thoothina tarjanasa birante ikalanka hanin qanson timmirinam waani eenaamaar dhettsana damayna gon hamma eenana elqimayse imaa.
55002003	Ya Yesus Kiristoosna payya banqi eedi maatayse gaalenam imbesana kinka tiyaa.
55002004	Banqi eedi banqin eensa entsaam wozisana kida zage; een waani waadadhen waadimanka yiam dhaxehe.
55002005	Yin pir galangacchon raqindar gobea gobadhen dambindettsi yi gobaamma, bashintansa gobshin bazanam tiyehe.
55002006	Wocchimbhayse haamin koyea yinin waadadhorra haapadhen biron aapinam tiya kiam koda zaske.
55002007	Imbaa wontea Yesus yer wulka bhocchi hana kinin imenna, inin hana giyenam qaabaa.
55002008	Dembhira dhaabhaa Dawtsa muldha maataa Yesus Kiristoosam bhocchaa. Inin giyayno Barjosa dhacchintan upsino konone.
55002009	Ogo Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam inin giyenna, siya waadadhaadettsi inin dhaxadhenka yekka gaale tiyte i dahade; ko dahaannaar Barjosa upsino dhaxadhehe.
55002010	Ogonante kediar Yesus Kiristooska haapadhen dhaqintanbee rooro wul lay dehen gobshinbeam kenin haapoadettsi Barjoyn kamaanana hamayse yer wulka darshite i dahade.
55002011	Yin giyayno upsino gon hammone: Kimbesana kinka wo diyanna, kimbesana kinka sadaka woda dee.
55002012	Darshayse wo wocchimbhidianna, kimbesana kinka woda bitime; kiam wo garanna, kidiar woam gara ki gare.
55002013	Wodiar gon hamma wo maataamma, kidi yiam garana kinin damimonna, rooro wul gon hama maatayse kida dee.
55002014	Kina yerram eenna bhocchisaa; dhalqinka kenin palimoamadettsi Barjo birante keam kiilaa. Harrna hambhidianna, ogo dhalqinka palimano qansayna eenaam koda kayse; yer harrnaar pootehe.
55002015	Gonin hamon upsinam tipa giyada ooshimbhima waadima eedi maatayse Barjo birante taysate shedadhaa doota wocchimbhaa.
55002016	Peen kogayn sun waraqaate dhalqadhenkalanka pegimbhaa; harrna hambhidianna, ogodettsin maatoono dhalqino eenaam Barjokalanka kalon kenin pegimbhoadettsi keam koda haye.
55002017	Kesa dhalqino paasha paashima hajimidettsi workaate koda yive. Ogodettsin yerin hayayna eenasa shaarinte Hemenoosbee Pilithosbe daane.
55002018	Igina eena "Diyaana eenayn dhaabhayno ena sagidine" hante palimada gonirra kedi dhaddhismidine; waani waani eenasa Barjodar woylamin kenin qajenam ogo dhalqinka ookite ke dahade.
55002019	Ko dahaannaar, "Barjo Imbaa yinti maataanam dhesa ki dhese" tapir, "Barjo Imbaasa naabenam eelayna wul tipa maataamon waadimara ke pegadhe" hamayno milkit yindar dohoono shoa shoymino Barjoyn ashkayse woysoono turturro wocchimbhayse koda dee.
55002020	Oonin gebhonte worqibee birrebera ashkadhoono koymo bish dayma, haaqabee dhoqalabera ashkadhoono koymo gidir daane. Iginasa antino gobshadhon waadimanna, antino waani gobshin qolmon waadimandar koda haaqe.
55002021	Igina siyana yerrakalanka edimayse yiam gazinsea ea gobshadhon waadimanna agea koymo kida maate; ogonoar payyan waadiman wulna ashkayse edadhaa Imbaa kinteana agea koymo kida maate.
55002022	Barshamonsa siyon anngarmankalanka pegadhaa; woylam gazaka Imbaa wontea Yesusam eelaynabesana kinka tipamobee, Barjodar woylamin qajintabee, nashimmakkobee, payyamobeam yedayse yivaa.
55002023	Goytiysa qolma pootima palime uuri kinin bevenam dhesayse kikala pegadhaa.
55002024	Imbaa wontea Yesussa waadima eedi maataa een wulkal leemibee, dhettsana dameabee, darshayse wocchimbheabe kiam maata koda zaske; eedibesana kinka uuri kansea maata kiam zaskehe.
55002025	Kidi kinka uurin kansaynaam yisa lemmakkonka kiilea kiam maata koda zaske. Yin haydi ki hanna, goninam kenin dhesoadettsi Barjo seeson waadimanam garayse kidar kenin maatea baali imima garehe hamaysene.
55002026	Ogo goynka malgimmakkon bhocchira maatayse Seethaan yisa bhocchinam kenin waadadhoadettsi kinin yedon zaanira utana dama ke dame.
55003001	Macchin rooronaka galshea woda nivenam dhesaa.
55003002	Eeno meten yinnonam nashayno, koymo nashayno, erimayno, poorimbhayno, iirimayno, imbanana ee hamimino, eedin kona hayonam bhocchimino, gazamoysa qolmino,
55003003	nashimmakkoysa qolmino, qaashimana zagimino, eediam wuupayno, yiam wottsimino, eedina burqadhimino, payyan yerinam nashimino,
55003004	yidar woylamin qajadhimino, gibayno, pormakkoka purdhayno, Barjodara sagi peen kogayn wozanam nashayno koda maate.
55003005	Tapir Barjoam gobshayna maatayse keda haapadhe; ko dahaannaar Barjosa kantanam kedi garidine. Igina eenakalanka pegadhaa.
55003006	Harrna hambhidianna, kedi eensa ooninte ardayse, thoothi seeso yidar baske maataana, waana waana anngarmaka yivayna, yisa qaabenka raq kalaadar woymina maanaam taysate yedayna eenane.
55003007	Igina maana rooro wul timmiraate keda dee; ko dahaannaar goninam dhesana damehe.
55003008	Iyanesbee Iyanberesbe Musesa bhocchinam kenin garaadettsi, eena igina meskeysa gemmaana, Barjodar woylamin qajadhen goynsa dhambintan yindar yeskaana kenin dohonna, goninam keda gare.
55003009	Iyanesbee Iyanberesbesa malgimmakkono may konin haapadhondettsi, igina eenasaar malgimmakkono een wulsa birante may konin haapadhenna kena agehe.
55003010	Ya keeda inin dhettsenbee, isa dayntanbee, isa qaabenbee, Barjodar woylamin inin qajenbee, inin darshenbee, isa nashimmakkonbee, inin yedon wocchimbhenbeka ha yivade.
55003011	Idar yeskon oytaydhanbee gaalenbeam, Anthokiabee, Iqoniyoonbee, Listhirabe gidir hamin dohon oytaydhanam darshintaka inin tiyonam ya dhesaada dhese. Imbaa wontea Yesus yerra igina wulsa iira iam ki dhacchade.
55003012	Gon Yesus Kiristooska Barjodettsi maatota nashayna wul oytaydha ke oytaydhe.
55003013	Ko dahaannaar siyanabee eediam taysaynabe eenaam dhaddhisadabee yinnon metenkaar dhaddhismaatebe seesondar seeso thoosada keda yive.
55003014	Yaar hanin dhesonbee gonne hamayse hanin tiyon yerinbeka wocchimbhayse dahaa; harrna hambhidianna, haykalanka hanin dhesonam ya dhesaada dhese.
55003015	Naasamora yedayse Yesus Kiristoosdar woylamin qajintaka dhaqinta haapadhen pakalmakkonam hana imen Mathaap Gazanam ya dhesidine.
55003016	Mathaap Gazante thaapadhoono wul Barjo Manpasinka entsadhayse ko thaapadhade; kodiar eenaam dhettsanabee, yerin yikal dhaqaanaam wacimanabee, wobon qaabora maasanabee, tipamoka waadadhaate kenin yivoadettsi keam kiilanabe koda age.
55003017	Ogoka Barjo eedi gon dhesaabee payyan waadimanna ashkimbhaabe kida maate.
55004001	Barjo birante, pir sadanka dahaanabee diyaanabedar pirdea Yesus Kiristoos birante, kisa nivintanbee bitamonbeam bhocchaate hana ida elqime.
55004002	Barjosa upsinam eenna giyaa; hana agidi ko hannaar, ko agaammaar, rooro wul wocchimbhayse giyaa; eenaam kesa seeson goynsa bhocchisadabee, wacimadabee, kiiladabe darshintaka keam dhettsada wocchimbhaa.
55004003	Harrna hambhidianna, eeno tipa maaton timmirinam qansana konin zagimino woda koda nive; ko dahaannaar giidhen dhalqinam qansana anngardhintaka yinin nashayna yerram kena giyada dhettsayna eenaam eelaate yinnon metenna keda pucche.
55004004	Goninam qansan garayse eerin dhalqinam qansota qaami keda wode.
55004005	Yaar yerin wulam goyteaka waadadhaa; gaalenam tiyaa; Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam eenna giyaa; hana imbhon waadiman wulam thoosaa.
55004006	Inta Barjona imbhea marshadettsi hayayse inin imbhayno wodano theedidine; peen kodara edimayse inin yivensa wodano yeskidine.
55004007	Banqinam payyamoka inta kansidine; isa gobenam inta macchidine; Barjodar woylamin qajintanamaar inta toolidine.
55004008	Os birante tipamon waadimansa ina imbhen gobshin qoobheno ashkayse wodadhidine. Ogo inin tiyenam tipamonka pirdea Imbaa wontea Yesus ogo wodanka ina kida ime. Ogoamaar ina bish dayma, kisa nivintanam nashayna wulna kida ime.
55004009	Saanawa ikal nivaa.
55004010	Deemaas peen kogayn yerinam nashayse iam garayse Teselonqe katamandar yividine. Qerqis Galatia peendar ki yivade; Tiitoar Dilmathia peendar ki yivade.
55004011	Luqaas bishne ikal dahaa. Marqoos waadimanna ina kinin agenna hanka kiam entsate nivaa.
55004012	Tikiqoosam Epsoon katamandar inta yittsidine.
55004013	Hanin nivenka Thirovadda katamante Karpuskal inin garaa kotteabee mathaapinabe, kattsika mathaapinasa eebhera ashkadhaanaam ina bavate nivaa.
55004014	Anngamon paxate ashkea Iskindiros kattsi siya yer idar ki hayade. Imbaa wontea Yesus kisa waadimandettsi kina kida ime.
55004015	Kidi wonin giyenam kattsi kinin garenna, yaar kikalanka mete hasaam gishaa.
55004016	Iam kenin bersen yerinsa birayse malsinam inin maasenka, wul iam garayse ke yivade; imbesana kinka maatayse iam keedhaa hayyear qolehe. Ogoamaar Barjo kedar seesodettsi ki paydabhoode.
55004017	Ko dahaannaar Barjosa dhacchintan upsinam giyano inka konin thoothoadettsibee Ayiwdtay hamma eena wul kenin qansoadettsibe, Imbaa wontea Yesus imbesana kinka maatayse iam ki wocchinsade; zobonsaar apora iam ki dhacchade.
55004018	Imbaa wontea Yesus siyon yerin wulsa iira iam kida dhacche; cecinte dohon kisa bitamon raqinte iam kida yeskise. Ogona rooro wul lay gobshi kina ko dee; amiin.
55004019	Bhirsqillabee, Aqilabee, Onesipoorsa oonin eenabena "Nagaya" ina kena hamaa.
55004020	Erasthoos Qorontoos gidir ki shidhade; Thiropimoos kinin hajadhonna Milithi katamante kiam i garade.
55004021	Bargin wodan yeskima ikal nivaa. Ewbulusbee, Bhudesbee, Linosbee, Qilawdiabee, imbanaana wulbe "Nagaya" hana keda hame.
55004022	Imbaa wontea Yesus Kiristoos hasa manpasinbesana ki dee. Barjosa sunin imintono yembesana ko dee.
56001001	Barjosa waadima eedibee Yesus Kiristoos yisa tarjamonnante kinin yittsaabe, Barjoyn kamaanaam kidar woylamin qajintaka wocchinsanabee Barjoam kenin maatoadettsi hayen goninam keam dhettsanabe wodadhaa i Bhawlooskalanka nittsadhoono warqannone.
56001002	Ogonoar Barjodar woylamin qajadhen goyno rooro wul lay dehen sadandar qaabe hayntadar ko woyade. Buudimima Barjo rooro wul lay dehen sadanam imana ena wodansa birayse malla wona ki ardade.
56001003	Ogo wodan yeskaysaka, woam Dhacchea Barjo ogo rooro wul lay dehen sadansa inin giyoadettsi ina kinin elqimon goynsa Barjo yisa upsinam ki dhahade.
56001004	Wosa kinka dohon Barjodar woylamin wonin qajen goynka gon isa naasi maataa Tiitona nittsadhoonone. Wosa Imbaa Barjobee woam dhacchaa Yesus Kiristoosbesa sunin imintonbee payyamonbe hana ko dee.
56001005	Qerthes peente haam inin garoono ogote joogonam hanin ashkoadettsibee inin hana giyondettsi misken onnasa donzanaamaar kataman wulir hanin wodoadettsibene.
56001006	Misken ooninsa donza wodadhea ea siya yer yindar haapadhima, maa kallon geshoa, naana yisa Barjodar woylamin qajayna, pir "Naana kisa sun yaayaynabee ee hamiminabene" hambhima ea ki dee.
56001007	Misken ooninsa wottsea hayayse wodadhea Barjokalanka erge yinin tiyonna, yer siya yindar haapadhima, poorimbhima, wacimima, bardhima, eedibesana goorima, koymona gibima,
56001008	chocchi tiyea, yer payya maatonam nashea, siya maaton yerira meten yinnonam gishea, tipa maataa, gazaa, meten yinnonam wottsea ki dee.
56001009	Tipa maaton timmirinam eenna dhettsaate kiilanabee ogoam garayse palimaynana malsi maasanabe kinin damoadettsi yinin dhettsadhon gonin hamon upsinka wocchimbhayse ki woye.
56001010	Harrna hambhidianna, thoothino eeno, kalonar Ayiwd eensa shaarira "Qaama taxadha koda zaske" hamayna ee hamimina, sun pootima waraqaynabee eenaam taysaynabe daane.
56001011	Igina eenaam lay haya haam koda zaske; harrna hambhidianna, kedi ooshinsen goynka koymo haapota zaskimon yer eenaam dhettsada oonin eena wul Barjodar woylamin kenin qajerra keam keda dhaddhise.
56001012	Qerthes eenasa shaarira mooro kalaa "Qerthes eena rooro wul buuda giyayna, dabi siyadettsi maataana, gala nashayna, waadima hayminane" ki hamade.
56001013	-
56001014	Ogono tarjamono gonne. Ogona Ayiwd eenasa eerinbee goninkalanka pegimbhayna eenasa upsinbeam kenin qansoamadettsi Barjodar woylamin qajintaka payya kenin doadettsi wocchinsayse keam wacimaa.
56001015	Gazana eenana yer wul gazane; minngimaana Barjodar woylamin qajiminana ko hanna, gaza maataa yer kala hattear qolehe; yin pir kesa qaabonbee kesa meskenbe minngimidine.
56001016	Kedi "Barjoam dhesooda dhese" keda hame; ko dahaannaar jibbishaynabee, ee hamiminabee, payyan waadiman wulam waadadhana damiminabe yinin dohonna, waadiman yinnonka "Barjoam dhesattone" keda hame.
56002001	Ya keeda tipa maaton timmirinam dhettsaa.
56002002	Eena gebhadhaana anngina yiam zaskendettsi dahayna, yisa gobshinam toolayna, yisa metenam gishayna maatayse, Barjodar woylamin qajintabee, nashimmakkobee, darshintabeka payya kenin doadettsi keam kiilaa.
56002003	Yin pir gebhadhaana maana yisa dayntanka gazana kenin doadettsi, eediam wuupimina, wucamo anngarmaka yedadhaamma, payyan timmirinam dhettsayna kenin doadettsi keam kiilaa.
56002004	-
56002005	Tapir maana gebhadhaana Barjosa upsino konin irdhoamadettsi maana barshina geshoa yinteabee naana yinnabeam nashayna, yisa metenam gishayna, gaza maataana, ooninte waadadhayna, payya maataana, geshoa yinteana ee hamayna kenin doadettsi keam ke dhettse.
56002006	Tapir barshina naana yisa metenam kenin gishoadettsi keam kiilaa.
56002007	Ya payyan waadimanam hayntaka yer wulka kamsi kena maataa; eenaam hanin dhettsenka goninbee, zaskenbee,
56002008	siyamoysa qolmon payyan dhalqinbeam giyaa. Yin hanin hayenka woam jibbayna siya wodar kenin giyea yer yinin kaysenka, ooshimbha ke ooshimbhe.
56002009	Waadadhayna yiam waadisaynana ee kenin hamoadettsibee, yer wulka keam kenin wozisoadettsibee, siya upsi kena kenin maasoamadettsibee,
56002010	kekalanka koymo kenin diiboamadettsibe keam kiilaa. Kalon woam dhacchaa Barjosa timmirino yer wulka konin gobshadhoadettsi rooro wul yindar woylamin qajadhaana yinin maatenam ke dhee.
56002011	Een wulam dhacchana damayno Barjosa sunin imintono haapadhidine.
56002012	Ogono sunin imintono seeson waadimanbee peen kogayn anngarmanbeam garayse, ta wodan koka wosa metenam gishaynabee, tipa maataynabee, Barjodettsi maataynabe wonin doadettsi woam koda dhettse.
56002013	Gebhaa wosa Barjo, woam Dhacchea Yesus Kiristoos gobshinka kinin niven wodanka, gobshadhon qaabe yindar haydhenam toolite wo dahade.
56002014	Kiristoos seeson wulra woam dhacchanabee payyan waadiman waadadhana wocchimbhayna, kina edimaana zarsi wonin doadettsi woam gazinsanabe wona hamayse yiam seesosa baza kashadhea hayayse ki imade.
56002015	Hayamon wulka yerra iginaam giyada, wacimada, keam kiilaa; hayyear haam ki bagabhoode.
56003001	Barjodar woylamin qajayna eena yiam wottsaynabee yisa hayamo dahaanabena yiam toskayse ee kenin hamoadettsi, payyan waadiman wulam waadadhana ashkimbhaana kenin doadettsi,
56003002	eedi haydarar siya yer kenin giyoamadettsi keam bhocchisaa. Kalonar eedibesana uuri kansiminabee, leeminabee, een wulkal yer wulka meten yinnonam toskayse dhahaynabe ke dee.
56003003	Wodi kosa birayse malgimma eena wo dahade; ee hamimina, dhaddhismayna, anngarmanbee waana waana hamon waan wozanbena worsho maataana, siyamobee woogintobeka dahaana, jibbadhaanabee kinka kiam kiam jibbaynabe wo dahade.
56003004	Ko dahaannaar woam dhacchaa Barjosa payyamonbee eenam kisa nashintanbe may konin dhesimon wodanka,
56003005	kisa garintonka haali adhadhi maaton shiidhintanbee Manpas Gazanka haalisintanbeka woam ki dhacchade; wonin tipa waadadhon waadimankatehe.
56003006	Barjo woam dhacchaa Yesus Kiristooska Manpas Gazanam thoosayse wodar ki laalade.
56003007	Ogoam kinin hayoonoar kisa sunin imintonka woam tipana eena maasayse, qaabe hayayse wonin toolayno rooro wul lay dehen sadanam wonin tiyoadettsine.
56003008	Ogono gon hama upsine. Barjodar woylamin qajayna eena payya waadimanam waadadhana kenin wocchimbhoadettsi, igina hana inin giyaana dhalqinam wocchimbhayse hanin giyoadettsi ida zage. Ogono dhalqino payyabee eedina ageabene.
56003009	Ko dahaannaar malgimma eenasa palimenbee, eykenasa caacin paydadhenbee, goorenbee, Muse yiggira dhaabhen wacimenbera pegimbhaa. Ogono pootimabee bazaysa qolmabene.
56003010	Eensa shaarinte edimen bevea eam kalaa way lamaa goyt kiam hanin wacimonsa budonte kikalanka pegimbhaa.
56003011	Ogodettsin waadiman hayea ea wobobee, seeso eedibee, yisa metendar kinin pirdonbeam dhesaa.
56003012	Arthemaasam way Tikiqoosam hakal inin yittsenka, ya Niqabhiliyon katamandar ikal saana nivaa. Inta barginam ogote kappana i qaabade.
56003013	Yigginam dhesea Zeenaasbee Abhiloosbeam yer kala hattear kekalanka joogoamadettsi kesa goynna zasken wulka keam kelshaa.
56003014	Wonna muldhana aapi ushimina maatayse kenin shidhoamadettsi, dayntanna zaskenam thoosana kenin damoadettsi payyan waadiman waadadhanam ke dhese.
56003015	Imbesana kinka dahaana wul "Nagaya" hana keda hame. Barjodar woylamin qajayna wosa nashonana "Nagaya" kena hamaa. Barjosa sunin imintono ye wulka ko dee.
57001001	Yesus Kiristoosna dhaxadhaa i Bhawloosbee imbanaasa Thimaatoosbekalanka, kattsi wonin nashea, wombesana kinka waadadhea Pilmonanabee,
57001002	wosa imbanaan Apibianabee, wombesana kinka Kiristoosna banqin kansea Arkibhaasnabee, pir hasa ooninte Barjoam miskota bukayna eenabena nittsadhoono warqannone.
57001003	Wosa Imbaa Barjobee Imbaa wontea Yesus Kiristoosbesa sunin imintonbee payyamonbe yena ko dee.
57001004	Barjoam inin misken wodanka haam bhocchada rooro wul isa Barjoam ida gobshe.
57001005	Harrna hambhidianna, Imbaa wontea Yesusdar woylamin hanin qajenbee Barjo eena wulam hanin nashenbeam inta qansidine.
57001006	Kiristoossa wonin maatonna, wokal dohoono payyan yerro wul may konin dhesadhoadettsi, Barjodar woylamin hanin qajenam een waanina wocchimbhayse hanin dhettsoadettsi hana Barjoam ida miske.
57001007	Imbanaasa, hannon goynka Barjodar woylamin qajaynasa woylammo konin ukunsonna, hasa nashimmakkonka thoothi wozabee wocchimbhebe inta haapidine.
57001008	Ogonante haya haam zaskenam hanin hayoadettsi hana Kiristooska kurtumbhima giyana i damaakaar,
57001009	inta geccho maataa, taaki Yesus Kiristoosna dhaxadhaa Bhawloos nashimmakkoka haam ida miske.
57001010	Dhaxin ooninte dahayse inin adhaa isa naasa Anasmosna haam ida miske.
57001011	Kidi ena hana pootima, taaki imbee hambena pooteane.
57001012	Woylam wulka inin nashea Anasmosam inta hadar maasate yittsidine.
57001013	Inta Barjosa dhacchintan upsin goynka dhaxin ooninte daa i hanna, hannon oolonte ina kinin waadadhoadettsi ikal ki dee ida zage.
57001014	Ko dahaannaar hasa payyan waadimano kantaka dayma hanin nashendettsi ko dee hamayse, haam oysima yer kala hattear hayana zagattine.
57001015	Anasmos likka wodana hakalanka kinin edimoono way rooro wulna hambesana kinka ki dee hamaysene.
57001016	Keeda kaara os hambesana kinka kinin dahayno waadima eedidettsi dayma, waadima eedira sagi nashadhaa hasa imbanaasdettsi kida maate. Harrna hambhidianna, isa kattsi nashadhaa imbanaasa ki hanna, waanka hana kinin waadadhenbee Imba Kiristooska hambanaasa kinin dohonbeka hana hamin kalon nashadhaa kida maate.
57001017	Ta keeda aanamodettsi iam ha paydidianna, idettsi hayayse kiam tiyaa.
57001018	Haam kinin genaa yer dahaa ko hanna, way hasa baza kidar dahaa ko hanna, bazanam idar paydaa.
57001019	"Inta Bhawloos bazanam kashayda kashe" hamayse aanin innonka imal hana i thaapade. Hasa sadansa ko hanna, ya hanti isa baza eedi hanin dohonam hana bhocchisana zagattine.
57001020	Imbanaasa, Imbaa wontea Yesusna hamayse iam hanin kelshoadettsi haam ida oyse; iam galshen bhocchira Kiristooska ukunsisaa.
57001021	Ina ee hada hame hamayse dhesintaka, hana inin giyerra sagi hanin waadadhenam inin dhesenna, hana i thaapade.
57001022	Pir nivayse inin ukunsea raq ina ashkaa; harrna hambhidianna, Barjo yesa miskenam qansayse inin yekal nivoadettsi kida haye hamayse bhocchi ida haye.
57001023	Yesus Kiristoosna imbesana kinka dhaxadhaa Ebhapira "Nagaya" hana kida hame.
57001024	Pir imbesana kinka waadadhayna Marqoosbee, Aristhirokoosbee, Deemaasbee, Luqaasbe "Nagaya" hana keda hame.
57001025	Imbaa wontea Yesus Kiristoossa sunin imintono yembesana ko dee.
58001001	Barjo ena wodanka waana waana goytika Barjokala qansayse eenna giyaynaka wosa eykenana thoothi wodana giydine.
58001002	Taaki macchin wodan koka yer wulsa toydi maataa yisa Naasaka wona giydine. Barjoar yer wulam kinin pijoono Naasa yintea goynkane.
58001003	Kidi yinti Barjo gobshinsa shaakane; kidi yisa dantanka Barjo Imbaabesana kalaane. Yisa kantan upsinka pijadhin wulam keedhayse ki yedade. Eenaamaar kesa seesora yinin gazinsonsa budonte cecinte wuldara gobshinka sagi maataa Barjosa mizaqimbar ki dooqade.
58001004	Barjo Naasana imbhoono naabeno Barjo gaananasa naabendara kattsi sagine; ogodettsi kidi kedara sagine.
58001005	Harrna hambhidianna, Barjo yisa gaananasa kalaana "Ya isa Naasine; inta haam kina adhidine" pir, "Inta kisa Imba ida maate; kidiar isa Naasi kida maate" hamayse kinin giyaa hayne?
58001006	Pir Barjo biraa Naasa yinteam peendar yinin nittsenka, "Barjosa gaanana wul kumpurdhayse kina ke goodime" ki hamade.
58001007	Barjo yisa gaananaka "Isa gaananaam wuradettsi ida haye; ina waadimaynaamaar nuusa laabhinadettsi ida haye" ki hamade.
58001008	Yisa Naasaka ko hanna, "Barjo, hasa bitamon borkotono rooro wul lay koda dee; hasa eenaam tipamoka hada wottse.
58001009	Tipamon waadimanam nashayse siyon waadimanam ha jibbade. Ogo goynka hasa Barjoa haam kamayse hasa aanammadara kattsi sagi hayayse haam wozisen zaytinka ki qadhade" ki hamade.
58001010	Yin pir, "Imbo, ya ena birayse peenam ha pijade; cecinoar hasa aanin waadimanone.
58001011	Igina kaya ke kaye; ya rooro wul daada dee. Kedi wul apaladettsi keda gecche;
58001012	apaladettsiar keam hada umbhuse; apaladettsiar ookaada ooke. Yaar rooro wul lay ookimattane; hasa levensa macchi qolehe" ki hamade.
58001013	Barjo gaananasa kalaana "Haam jibbaynaam hasa hayamon demente inin hayenka yekka isa mizaqinte dooqaa" hamayse kinin giyaa hayne?
58001014	Ta keeda gaanana wul Barjoyn dhacchaynaam kenin kelshoadettsi nittsadhayna Barjona waadadhayna manpasinatayu?
58002001	Ogonante wonin qanson yerira shurt hamayse wonin dhamboamadettsi, koam kattsi wocchinsayse yeda woam koda zaske.
58002002	Barjosa gaananaka giidhoono upsino wocchi konin dohonna, ogo upsira sageabee kona ee hamimabe yiam zasken dhabinam ke tiyade.
58002003	Ta keeda wodi ogo gebhon dhaqintanam boosimbhayse lay woda hamina haminooda dhaqe? Ogo dhaqintansa upsinam birayse giyaa Imbaa wontea Yesus yintine; kinin giyenam qansaanaar wona ke giyaysaka gonne hamayse wonin tiyoadettsi woam haydine.
58002004	Barjo yimal milkitbee, tarshen yerinbee, waana waana hamon yisa kantanam dhahayna yerrabeam hayntaka, pir Manpas Gazansa imintonaam yinin qaabadettsi imintaka kesa tarjamonam wocchinsidine.
58002005	Barjo ko wonin giyen os birante niven peenam gaananasa hayamon demente haysadehe.
58002006	Tapir mathaapin gazante yin giyayse raq kalaate thaapadhidine: "Barjo, ya eedina qaabana eedi yer hare? Kiam shedana eedi yer hare?
58002007	Gaananakala kiam likkaa toskade; dheg hama gobshi kisa metendar qoobhedettsi ha wodade. [Hasa aanin waadiman wuldar kiama haynsade.]
58002008	Yer wulam kisa hayamon dementea hayade" hamayse thaapadhidine. Yer wulam kisa hayamon demente kinin hayenka, kisa hayamon demente haydhaama yer kala hattear qolehe. Ko dahaannaar ta yer wul kisa hayamon demente konin dohonam akar haapootone.
58002009	Ko dahaannaar kidi Barjosa sunin imintonka wo wulna kinin diyoadettsi, Barjosa gaananakala likka tokaa maataa, dembhinsa gaalen yinin tiyon goynka dheg hama gobshi kisa metendar qoobhedettsi wodadhaa Yesusam woda haape.
58002010	Yer wul Barjonabee Barjokabe ko pijadhade. Barjoar thoothi naasi yisa maataynaam gobshindar bavana, dhaqintansa entsa maataa Yesusam gaalenka gonin hama kiam haya ko zaskade.
58002011	Eenaam gaza hayeabee kanka gaza haydhaynabe Imba kala naasine; ogo goynka Yesus "Imbanaanane" hamayse keam eelana ooshimbhehe.
58002012	Ogonante "Hasa naabenam imbanaanana ida giye; hana goodimota bukaynasa shaarinte mazmurka haam ida gobshe" ki hamade.
58002013	Taar, "Inta kidar woylamin qajayda qaje" ki hamade; pir, "Imbee Barjo ina kinin imaana isa naanabe kishaa!" ki hamade.
58002014	Ogonante "isa naana" hamayse kinin eelaanasa waabee zombhibe kesa dohondettsi, Yesusaar kedettsi eedi ki maatade. Ogoam kinin hayoonoar yisa dembhinka eediam deesana kantaysa dahaa Seethaanam kaysanane.
58002015	Yin pir dembhinna yinin kurtumbhenna yisa dohon leven wulka worshodettsi maatayse dahaanaam worshamora bulanane.
58002016	Harrna hambhidianna, Yesussa qaabono Barjosa gaananaam kelshana dayma Abraamsa muldhanaam kelshanane.
58002017	Ogona yer wulka imbanaanadettsi maata kiam ko zaskade. Ogo goynka eensa seesonam shiishana machadhea marsha imota hamayse Barjona waadadhea eenna burqadheabee yindar woylam qajadheabe gudullasa gebhaa ki maatade.
58002018	Kidi yinti taysate shedadhayse gaalenam yinin tiyonna, taysate shedadhaynaam kelshana dama ki dame.
58003001	Ogonante cecinngayn Barjosa eelimenam kashimayna, gaza maataana imbanaanato, Barjodar woylamin wosa qajidin goynsa Barjoyn yittsaa gudullasa gebhaa Yesusam bhocchee.
58003002	Muse Barjo oonin wulir woylam yindar qajadhea kinin dohondettsi, Yesusaar yiam kamayse wodaa Barjokal woylam yindar qajadhea ki maatade.
58003003	Ooninam woysea oonindara sagi kisa gobshi dohondettsi, ogodettsi Yesus Musedara sagi gobshi yiam zaskea maatayse ki haapadhade.
58003004	Ooni wul koam woysaa eedi daane; yerin wulam ashkaa Barjone.
58003005	Os birante giidhen yerinna tarja maatota Muse Barjo oonin wulsa waadima eedi dahayse woylam yindar qajadhea ki maatade.
58003006	Kiristoos Barjosa Naasi dahayse Barjo oonin wottsadhenka woylam yindar qajadhea ki maatade. Wodiar Barjosa oonine; kisa ooni wonin maatayno wonin woylam qajenbee qaabe daran hayayse woninka erimayna yerrabeam wocchinsayse wonin yedenkane.
58003007	Ogonante Manpas Gazanin giyendettsi, "Kina kisa upsinam ye qansidianna,
58003008	darante yesa eykena iam taysayse kenin shedenka iam kenin dhagattsondettsi yesa woylaminam wocchinseebhode.
58003009	Ogote eykena yenna iam taysate ke shedade; eedi lamaa kaysa levena inin waadadhonam ke haapade.
58003010	Ogonante ogo wodanka dahaana eenaam i wacimade. 'Kesa woylammo rooro wul koda dhaddhise; isa goynamaar kedi dhesadehe' i hamade.
58003011	Pir 'Inin imen ukunsen raqinte hamin ko dahaakaar kedi ardehe' hamayse isa wacimenka inta mallidine" hamayse ko giyade.
58003012	Imbanaanato, yesa iira hayyear lay dehea Barjokala pegisea siyabee kidar woylamin qajima woylambe konin doamadettsi mete yesaam gishee.
58003013	Kalon yesa iira hayyear seesoka taysadhayse yisa woylaminam kinin wocchisoamadettsi, "kina" hamayse kinin eldhaa rooroayn dohonka yekka rooroa rooroaka kinka kiam kiam kiilee.
58003014	Harrna hambhidianna, birayse wosa dohon Barjodar woylamin wonin qajenam macchinka yekka wocchinsayse wo yedanna, Kiristoosbesana kashimayna wo maatade.
58003015	Ogonoar "Kina kisa upsinam ye qansidianna, yesa eykena iam kenin dhagattsondettsi yesa woylaminam wocchinseebhode" ko hambhade.
58003016	Igina kisa upsinam qansayse kiam dhagattsaana haybene? Igina Muse keam entsaysaka Gibth peera utaana wultayu?
58003017	Barjoar eedi lamaa kaysa levena yindar wacimaana igina haybene? Igina seeson hayaana, yisa leesinin darante dhambayse shidhaanatayu?
58003018	"Inin kena imen ukunsen raqinte ardehe" hamayse kedar kinin mallaana haybene? Igina kina ee hamimina eenatayu?
58003019	Ogonante Barjo kena imen ukunsen raqinte ardana kenin damaammo Barjodar woylamin kenin qajea kesa qolmon goynka konin dohonam woda haape.
58004001	Ta keeda wona kinin imen ukunsen raqinte "ardeeda arde" hamayno qaabe wonin hayayno akar konin dohonna, yesa iira hayyear ogo ukunsen raqinte kinin ardensa baali konin shidhoamadettsi, wodi wulatte mete wosaam wo gishe.
58004002	Harrna hambhidianna, "ardeeda arde" hamayse kena giidhon wozisen upsinam wonaar giidhidine. Ko dahaannaar kedi yinin qanson upsinam Barjodar woylam qajayse kenin tiyaamon goynka kena pootima ko shidhade.
58004003	Barjo " 'Inin imen ukunsen raqinte hamin ko dahaakaar kedi ardehe' hamayse isa wacimenka inta mallidine" kinin hamondettsi, wodi Barjodar woylamin qajaana ogo Barjo wona kinin imen ukunsen raqinte ardooda arde. Barjo waadimano ko hanna peen pijadhorra yedayse thoothidine.
58004004	Harrna hambhidianna, raq kalaadar tobhsoa rooroasa "Barjo yisa waadiman wulra tobhsoa rooroaka ki ukunsade" hamayse thaapadhidine.
58004005	Taar ogo "Inin imen ukunsen raqinte kedi ardehe" ki hamade.
58004006	Ogo wozisen upsinam ena birayse yina giidhaana eena ee hamanam kenin garonna, Barjoyn kena imen ukunsen raqinte ardadehe. Ta keeda akar ogo ukunsen raqinte ardayna daane.
58004007	Ogoamaar ini birayse giidhondettsi, "Kina kisa upsinam ye qansidianna, yesa woylaminam wocchinseebhode" hamayse Barjo thoothi levesa budonte Dawtka maatayse kinin giyon upsinka "kina" hamayse pir rooroam giyntaka ki dhahade.
58004008	Iyaaso eenaam Barjosa ukunsen raqinte arsidi ki hanna, ini Barjo "kina" hamayse rooro absa giyehe.
58004009	Ta keeda ukunsen rooroa Barjo eenana akar shidhidine.
58004010	Harrna hambhidianna, Barjo yisa waadimara kinin ukunsondettsi, Barjoyn imen ukunsen raqinte ardea yisa waadimara kida ukunse.
58004011	Ogonante eedi hayyear igina eenayn ee haman garondettsi ee haman garayse kinin dhamboamadettsi, Barjosa ukunsen raqinte ardana wo wocchimbhe.
58004012	Barjo upsino lay deheabee waadadheabene; wulbar taxen halpan carindara kattsi sagi carine; sadanbee manpasinbe, jiininbee lepinbeam yinin edenka yekka taxaynone; woylaminsa iinte aadhimayse dohon bhocchinbee anngarmanbeam marmaraynone.
58004013	Barjo birante aachimaa yer qolehe; kisa birante yer wul maybee pundiribe maatayse koda haapadhe. Wodiar malsin maasana woam zaskayno kisa birantene.
58004014	Ta keeda cecindar Barjokal yivaa gudullasa gebhaa Barjo Naasa Yesusin wosa dohonna, ogono gonne hamayse kidar woylamin wonin qajenam wocchinsayse wo yede.
58004015	Harrna hambhidianna, kidi gudullasa gebhaa wosa qajenkaar burqadhana dameane. Kidi yer wulka wodettsi taysate ki shedadhade, ko dahaannaar seeso hayadehe.
58004016	Ta keeda seesonsa garintonam tiyanabee kelsho woam zasken wodanka Barjosa sunin imintonam wonin haapoadettsibe Barjosa sunin imintonin haapadhen kisa bitamon borkotonkal kurtumbhima kidar woylamin qajintaka wo theede.
58005001	Gudullasa gebhaa eensa shaarira kamayse Barjona maaten yerin wuldar eensa oolonte Barjona imbhenbee seesonna machadhen marshanbeam kinin imoadettsi kida wodadhe.
58005002	Kidi eedi kantaysa qolma yinin dohonna, timmirinsa qolmina eenabee yerin yikal dhaqayna eenabena burqadhana kida dame.
58005003	Ogona eedisa seesonna yinin machendettsi yisa seesonnaar tapir Barjona marsha macha kiam koda zaske.
58005004	Aarondettsi Barjoka eldhaa yi dahaamma ogo gobshinam tiyana damea qolehe.
58005005	Ogodettsi Kiristoos gudullasa gebhaa yinin maaten gobshinam yisa hayamonka tiyadehe. Kidi gudullasa gebhaa kinin dohoono "Ya isa Naasine; inta haam kina adhidine" kina hamaa Barjokalankane.
58005006	Raq abir taar Barjo "Melkethedeq gudulmakkondettsi rooro wul lay ya gudulne" kina ki hamade.
58005007	Yesus eedi maatayse peen kodar yinin dehenka, dembhira kiam dhacchana damea Barjodar upsi gebhibee ermitbeka yinin misken oysimenam ki thettsade. Lemmakkoka yisa metenam yirk kinin hayonna Barjo kisa miskenam ki qansade.
58005008	Barjo Naas yi dahaakaar, yinin tiyen gaalenka ee hamintanam dhesidine.
58005009	Barjona ee hamintaka gon maatayse yinin haapadhonsa budonte yina ee hamayna wulna rooro wul lay dhaqintanam imea ki maatade.
58005010	Barjoar Melkethedeq gudulmakkondettsi gudullasa gebhaa hayayse kiam ki wodade.
58005011	Yerin ogosa wonin giyayno thoothi yer daane; ko dahaannaar saana yekal konin dhesimiminna may yena giyana woam koda galshe.
58005012	Yedi ta koka yekka eenaam dhettsayna maata yeam konin zaskenka, Barjosa upsira biron timmirinam eedi ab pir yeam dhettsoadettsi koda zaske. Ogona yeam zaskaynoar raathine, gala wocchitehe.
58005013	Harrna hambhidianna, raathi bish kumea wul naasi yinin dohonna tipanbee wobonbeam edadhen timmirinam dusadehe.
58005014	Galan wocchin yiam zaskayno payyanbee siyonbeam yisa waadimanka edanam dusaana, eena gembhanane.
58006001	-
58006002	Ta keeda Kiristoossa wona imbhon biron timmirinam garayse dhesintondar wo yive. Birayse wonin dheson timmirindar woya woam koda zaske, lansi kodar maata woam zaskehe. Ogono birono timmirino diyon waadimanam garayse Barjodar maatintabee, Barjodar woylamin qajintabee, shiidhime shiidhimintabee, eedidar aan wodintabee, dembhira dhaabhintabee, rooro wul lay dehen pirdinbesa giyayno timmirinone.
58006003	Barjo giyanna ogora sagayse ab sagi dhesintondar yivooda yive.
58006004	Barjodar woylamin qajintanam garaanaam Barjodar hamin hayayse maasana ko dandime? Igina eenana birayse kala goyt shaakano kena shaakidine; cecinngayn imintonamaar lavayse kedi shedidine; waani eenbesana Manpas Gazanam kedi tiydine.
58006005	Barjosa payyan upsinbee niven wodansa kantanbeam lavayse kedi haapidine.
58006006	Ogosa budonte Barjodar woylamin yinin qajenam ke garaysaka, kesa seeson waadimara Barjodar keam maasana dandimehe. Harrna hambhidianna, kedi yinti Barjo Naasaam pir masqalindar konngate ziitayse deesa ke deese; eensa birantear kiam baga ke bage.
58006007	Thoothi wodana doobinin qanenka wucayse kodar koraana eenana maaten aapinam ushayno peeno Barjokala gembhakonam koda haape.
58006008	Ukumbhanbee mugurinbeam baqalsayno ko hanna, pootimino koda maate; kodar ashimeda yeske; macchinoar kosa nuuka koqadhane.
58006009	Yedi isa nashonato, yin wo giyaakaar, yesa dhaqintanbesana agea yer gebhi yesa dohonam dhesooda dhese.
58006010	Barjo tipamoka pirdeane; ogona yesa waadimanbee gazana eenaam kelshintaka kisa naabenna hamayse enaar taar yenin dhehen nashimmakkonbeam walehe.
58006011	Yedi wul "Tiyooda tiye" hamayse qaabe hayayse yenin toolen yerinam yenin yedenka yekka ogo yesa wocchimbhenam macchinka yekka yenin dhoadettsi woda anngardhe.
58006012	Wonin anngardhaynoar boosona eena dayma Barjodar woylamin qajintabee darshintabeka wocchimbhayse "Tiyeeda tiye" hamayse yena imbhon yerinam yedayna eena yenin maatoadettsine.
58006013	-
58006014	Barjo Abraamna "Hayayda haye" yinin hamen wodanka, kininka mallea kidara sagi ab qolmonna, "Gon haam gettsayda gettse; hasa muldhanaam gon thoosayda thoose" hamayse yidar ki mallade.
58006015	Ogodettsi Abraam darshayse Barjodar qaabe hayntaka yina imbhon yerinam ki haapade.
58006016	Eeno yinin mallenka yidara sagea naabeaka koda malle; yisa dhalqinam mallaka wocchinsintaka palimen wulam koda shiishe.
58006017	Ogodettsi Barjo yisa qaabono konin ookimiminam dhettsana zagayse "Hayayda haye" kinin hamon upsinam mallaka ki wocchinsade.
58006018	Ogoka Barjo kinin ookimina buudaar kinin giymina yerra lamaana, iginaar kisa upsinbee mallanbeam wona ki imade. Yerra lamaana igina goynka wosa birante dohon qaabe wonin hayenam wocchinsayse yedana wonin damoadettsi, dhacchintan haapana kikal nivaana wodi gebhon kantanam haapooda haape.
58006019	Ogono qaabe wonin hayayno wosa sadanna bazindara sagadhen gonngalanam yinka woysadhea detha maataa gon hama anngamodettsine. Kodiar Barjosa gazan ooninte apalanka ishkadhon gazisadhon raqinsa iinte koda arde.
58006020	Ogo gazisadhon raqinte Yesus Melkethedeq gudulmakkondettsi rooro wul lay gudullasa gebhaa maatayse wona birayse ki ardade.
58007001	Melkethedeq Saalem peensa bitbee Wuldara Sagea Barjona waadadhea gudulbe ki dahade. Agaa Melkethedeq Abraam binnaam banqin uxate bashayse kinin maatenka, goynte kidar keerayse kina pathin ki imade.
58007002	Abraamaar yinin tiyaana yerra tambha wulsa iira kalaam tiyate kina ki imade. Melkethedeq naabensa bulino "tipamon waadadhea bitaa", lansoa "Saalem peensa bitaa" way "payyamon bitaa" hamintane.
58007003	Melkethedeqsa imbabee indabe dhesimehe, way kisa adhadhidinsa muldha haapadhadehe; kisa levensa birabee macchibe qolehe. Agaa Melkethedeq rooro wulna gudul maatayse sadanka yinin dehenka Barjo Naasaam kida maate.
58007004	Ea agaa hamin gebhi kinin dohonam shedee! Wosa eykenasa imba maataa Abraam ki dahaakaar, banqira uxate kinin bavaana yerra tambhasa iira kalaam bulayse kina ki imade.
58007005	Lewi muldhara gudulmakkon waadadhayna waani eenakalanka tambhasa iira kalaam kenin tiyoadettsi Muse yigginka kena giidhidine. Ta keeda igina eena Abraamsa muldhanabee kesa imbanaanabene.
58007006	Hamin ko dahaakaar Melkethedeq Lewi eensa muldhara yi dahaammaar, Abraamin kina tambhasa iira kalaam kinin imenam ki tiyade; Barjo "imayda ime" kinin hamondar qaabe hayaa Abraamnaar pathin ki imade.
58007007	Pathin tiyeadara pathin imea kinin sagayno mayne.
58007008	Ta goyti kalaaka tambhasa iira kalaam tiyayna dembhin diyayna Lewi eenane; goyti abka ko hanna, tambhasa iira kalaam tiyea sadanka kinin dohonam kinnon goynsa tarjadhaa Melkethedeqne.
58007009	Ta keeda tambhasa iira kalaam tiyea Lewi yintiar Abraamka maatayse tambhasa iira kalaam imidine hamintane.
58007010	Harrna hambhidianna, Melkethedeq Abraambesana yinin keeron wodanka Abraamsa muldhara Lewi akar adhadhadehe.
58007011	Ta keeda eenna yigginam imbhoono Lewi eenasa gudulmakkon goynkane. Kesa gudulmakkonka Barjosa qaabonin thoothayno ko dahaannaar, ini Aaronsa muldhara dayma Melkethedeqdettsi gudul ab harrna ko zaske?
58007012	Harrna hambhidianna, gudullasa muldhanam ookadhenka, yigginamaar ooka ko zaske.
58007013	Agaa yin giidhaa gudula aba muldharane; muldhan ogora Barjona marshan machadhen raqindar woyayse gudulmakkon waadimanam waadadhaa eedi qolehe.
58007014	Wosa Imbaa Yesus Yiwdasa muldhara kinin dohoono may dhesimoonone; Muse gudullasa yinin giyenka, Yiwda eenaam dhahayse kinin giyaa yer kala hattear qolehe.
58007015	Yerro ogono kalon may maatayse konin haapadhayno Melkethedeqdettsi waana gudul maatayse kinin dhaabhennane.
58007016	Kidi gudul kinin dohoono muldhamon goynsa buldhon yigginka dayma kayma sadasa kantakane.
58007017	Harrna hambhidianna, "Ya Melkethedeq gudulmakkondettsi rooro wul lay gudulne" hamayse kina giidhidine.
58007018	Ena giidhoono upsino kantaysa qolmabee pootimabe konin dohonna koam shiishadhidine.
58007019	Harrna hambhidianna, Muse yigginka yer kala hattear thoothana damadehe. Keeda Barjokal wonin theedea kalon qaabe yindar wonin hayea yer wona imbhidine.
58007020	Ogonoar Yesus gudul kinin dohoono malla qolma maatadehe; waani eena kosa birayse gudul kenin dohoono malla qolmakane.
58007021	Kidiar gudul kinin dohoono mallakane. Harrna hambhidianna, "Barjo 'Ya rooro wul lay gudulne' hamayse mallidine; kidi qaabon yinnonam ookehe" hamayse kina giidhidine.
58007022	Ogo mallanka Yesus kalon agen mallansa waasi ki maatade.
58007023	Kedi rooro wul lay kenin doamadettsi dembhinin keam maronna gudullasa paydino thoothi ko dahade.
58007024	Yesus rooro wulna dehea kinin maatonna, kisa gudulmakkono ookimimonone.
58007025	Ogonante kena Barjoam miskota rooro wulna sadaka dehea maatayse kinin dohonna, kanka Barjodar nivaynaam gon keam dhacchana dama ki dame.
58007026	Ta keeda wona zaskea gudullasa gebhaa Yesusne. Kidi gaza maataa, qothime yindar qolmaa, seesoysa qolmaa, seeson eenakalankaar edimayse cecinsa bhaabar dheg hamaane.
58007027	Kidi igina waani gudullasa gembhadettsi birayse yisa seesonna, budontear eensa seesonna, rooroaka rooroaka Barjona marsha ima kiam zaskehe. Harrna hambhidianna, yiam kala goyt seesosa marsha hayayse kinin imen wodanka, ogo yerinam yinin lansimin goynka ki macchade.
58007028	Muse yigginin gudullasa gembha hayayse keam konin wodayno kantaysa qolmina eenaamne; yigginsa budonte nivoono mallano ko hanna, Barjosa qaabonam rooro wulna thoosaa Barjo Naasaam ko wodade.
58008001	Ta keeda wonin giyen dhalqinsa kattsi aapea dhalqa yin giyeane: Cecinte wuldara gobshinka sagi maataa Barjosa bitamon borkotonsa mizaqinte dooqaa ogodettsin gudullasa gebhaa wosa daane.
58008002	Kinin waadadhaynoar gon apala ooni maaton Barjosa gazan oonintene; ogo apalan ooninin konngadhoono eedisa aanka dayma Barjokane.
58008003	Gudullasa gebhaa kalaa kalaanin wodadhayno Barjona imbhenbee marshanbeam kinin imoadettsine. Ogonante agaa gudullasa gebhaa kinin imea yer daa koda zaske.
58008004	Kidi peendar daa ki hanna, ini gudul maatehe. Harrna hambhidianna, Muse yigginka Barjona imintonaam imayna gudulla ke dahade.
58008005	Kenin waadadhayno cecinngayn waadimansa kamsibee shipobe maatonamne. Ogonoar Muse apalan ooninam ashkota kinin hayenka, Barjo "Dhukandar hana haapadhon kamsindettsi yer wulam mete hasaam gishayse ashkaa!" hamayse kina ki giyade.
58008006	Keeda Yesus ena mallandara sagi agen "imayda ime" kinin hamondar waadadhen sagi mallansa motala kinin dohondettsi, kina imbhoono waadimano kesa waadimara saginone.
58008007	Birono mallano bagime yindar qolmino ko hanna, ini lansono mallano zaskehe.
58008008	Harrna hambhidianna, Barjo eendar bagime dohonam shedayse yin ki giyade: "Imba Barjo yi giyna: 'Marrato! Israveel eenabee Yiwda eenabekal haali malla inin ardayno woda koda nive.
58008009	Ogono mallano Gibth peera keam bulana kesa aaninam inin yeden wodanka, kesa eykenabesana inin ardon mallandettsitehe. Kedi isa mallanam kenin garonna intaar keam i garade' ki hamade.
58008010	Pir Imbaa Barjo yi giyna: 'Marrato! Ogo wodansa budonte Israveel eenabesana inin ardayno mallano yin giyaynone: Isa yigginam kesa meskente ida wode; kesa woylamdarar ida thaape. Kesa Barjoar ida maate; kediar isa eedi keda maate.
58008011	Yisa peen eenaam ko hannaar imbanaasaam ko hannaar "Barjoam dhesaa!" hamayse dhettsea eedi qolehe. Harrna hambhidianna, naana shaaqanara yedayse gembhaka yekka eeno wul iam dhesa ko dhese.
58008012	Ee kenin hamaamonam kena ida gare; kesa seesonam keeda kaara os bhocchattine' ki hamade."
58008013	Ta keeda "haali malla" kinin hamenka, birono mallano gecchidine hamintane. Ogonante geccho maatoono yerro wul konin kayensa wodano yeskidine.
58009001	Biron mallansa manpasinngayn Barjona goodimadhensa yigginbee peenngayn gazan ooninbe kosa ko dahade.
58009002	Lamaadar kashadhoono apalan onno ashkadhidine. Shaakanam daran wodadhenbee, Barjo birante wodadhen balashanbee, yindar wodadhen tharbhezanbe iinte dohoono birono ranqo "Gazano Onno" hamayse koam koda giidhe.
58009003	Lanson apalansa budobar dohoono ranqo "Gazisadha Raq" hamayse koam koda giidhe.
58009004	Ogo gazisadhon raqinte worqinka ashkadhoono Barjona qunyan daran cubshate imbhen raqinbee pir worqin yindar yettsayse ashkadhoono mallansa taabootinbe kosa iir ko dahade. Taabootinsa iinte manna hambhen galayn iir wodadhon worqinka ashkadhon koymonbee hacchan bulon Aaronsa koolinbee, mallanam yindar thaapadhaana sennabe ke dahade.
58009005	Taabootindar dohon seesonam shiishota zombhin yindar yiithadhen raqinam kaapina ishkayna gobshiysa dahaana kerubeel hambhaynasa kamsi ke dahade. Ko dahaannaar igina yerra wulsa ta paydayse giyana damattone.
58009006	Yer wulam ogodettsi ashkadhonsa budonte gudulla Barjona goodimota biron apalan ooninte rooro wulna keda arde.
58009007	Lanson ooninsa iinte ardea gudullasa gebhaa bishne. Kinin ardaynoar levensa iinte rooro kalaa bishne; ogonoar yinnon seesonbee eenin dhesima waadadhon seesonbena yinin yiithen zombhin tiyma ardehe.
58009008	Biron apalan oonin dohonka yekka gazan ooninsa Gazisadha Raqate ardana yivayno goyno akar haapadhaamonam Manpas Gazano ogo goynka koda eshke.
58009009	Ogonoar ta wodanna kamsine; ogona Barjona machadhayna marshanabee waani imintonabe Barjona goodimayse imeasa meskenam gon gazisana konin damimonam koda eshke.
58009010	Haalin sharqanin buldhenka yekka igina yerra waadimadar haaqayna yigginane. Kediar galabee, wucadheabee, waana waana shiidhimenbe goynka meskenam dayma waanam bish ookayna dambinane.
58009011	Ko dahaannaar Kiristoos ta niven payyana yerra goynka gudullasa gebhaa maatayse ki nivade; kinin ardoono apalan onno peen kodar dohorra kalon gebhibee gon hamabene. Ogono onno eedinin aanka woysaammo, kote dohon pijadhira waana maatoonone.
58009012	Kidi Gazisadhon Raqinte kalaa goyt yisa zombhinam bavate ki ardade; qolebee ootobesa zombhi bavate ardadehe. Ogona sadan yinnonam seesonsa baza kashadhea hayayse yisa zombhinam imintaka rooro wul lay dhaqintanam wona ki hapsade.
58009013	Qollabee wanngabesa zombhinbee marsha hayayse Barjona koqadhea ooto qatabhsa dibininbeam minngimaana eenadar yiithadhenka kesa waanam gazinsayno ko hanna,
58009014	Kiristoossa zombhino sadanka dahaa Barjona wonin waadadhoadettsi, mesken wonnonam diyon waadimara hamin ko woam gazinsimine? Kiristoos rooro wul lay dehen Manpasinka meten yinnonam siya yer yindar qolma marsha hayayse Barjona ki imade.
58009015	Eldhaana eena Barjo "yena imayda ime" hamayse kinin giyon lay wonin tiyen raqinam kenin yedoadettsi Kiristoos haalin mallansa motala ki maatade. Ogono yin maatoono eena biron mallansa demente dooqayse kenin waadadhon seesora keam dhacchana kidi sadan yinnonam seesonsa baza kashadhea hayayse kinin diyonnane.
58009016	Elqime daa ko hanna elqimaa easa dembhinam sheda ko zaske.
58009017	Harrna hambhidianna, elqimadhoono yerro konin woyayno elqimaa ea ki diyannane; sadaka daa ki hanna, kisa elqimeno waadadhehe.
58009018	Ogonante birono mallano ko hannaar zombhi laymima woysadhadehe.
58009019	Birayse Muse yigginsa upsin wulam een wulna ki giyade. Ogosa budonte ootobee qolebesa zombhi noqoka worsayse yisoobh hambhea hattasa koolibee yaati zoosa sitibeam tiyayse, yiggin mathaapinbee een wulbedar zombhinam ki yiithade.
58009020	Kinin yiithoonoar "Barjo ye toole kinin giyon mallansa zombhino ogonone" hamaysene.
58009021	Yin pir gazan apalan ooninbee ogote yindar waadadhadhen koymon wulbedar zombhinam ki yiithade.
58009022	Muse yiggindettsi yer likka shidhaysaka yer wul zombhika koda gazinsadhe hamana woda dame; zombhi laymima seesonsa garinto haapadhehe.
58009023	Ta keeda igina cecinte dahaana yerrasa kamsi maataana ogo waadimanka gazimbha keam koda zaske; cecinte dahaana yerra ke hanna ogora kattsi sagi Barjona imbhen marshanka gazimbha keam koda zaske.
58009024	Harrna hambhidianna, Kiristoos gon gazan ooninsa kamsi maaton eedin woyson gazan ooninte ardadehe; kidi ta wona Barjo birante haapadhana cecinte ki ardade.
58009025	Ayiwd eenasa gudullasa gebhaa qolesa zombhi bavate leven levenka gazan ooninsa Gazisadha Raqate kida arde. Kiristoos thoothi wodana yiam Barjona imbhea marsha hayayse ima kiam zaskadehe.
58009026	Ini zaskidi ko hanna, peen pijadhorra yedayse thoothi wodana gaale tiya kiam ko zaskade. Keeda wodansa macchin rooronka seesonam shiishana yiam Barjona marsha hayayse kalaa goyt ki haapadhade.
58009027	Eedi kalaa goyt diyayse ogosa budontear pirdin kinin tiyayno kikalanka shidhiminone.
58009028	Ogodettsi Kiristoos thoothin eensa seesonam shiishana kalaa goyt yiam marsha hayayse ki diyade; tapir seesonam baskana dayma wozanka toolayna eenaam dhacchana lanso kida nive.
58010001	Muse yiggino os birante niven payyan yerinsa shipone; gon hamaatehe. Ogonante leven levenka rooro wul Barjona imbhen marshanam tiyayse Barjodar nivayna eenaam hamin hambhaakaar Muse yiggino gon eedi keam maasehe.
58010002	Muse yiggino gon hamma eena keam maasea ko hanna, kedi marshan ogoam imbhenam ini gara ke gare. Harrna hambhidianna, Barjona goodimota nivayna eena kalaa goyt seeson yinnora gazimbhayse seesoysa qolmina kenin maatenam kesa meskente kena koda dhesime.
58010003	Igina marshana leven levenka seesonam kenin bhocchayna yerrane.
58010004	Harrna hambhidianna, wanngabee qollabesa zombhino eensa seesonam shiishana damehe.
58010005	Ogonante Kiristoos peen kodar nivanna yinin hayenka yin ki giyade: "Marshanbee waani imintonbeam zagaatane; ko dahaannaar ina bishi ha pijade.
58010006	Koqadhen waan wul marshanbee seesonam shiishana imbhen marshanbeka wozadhaatane.
58010007	Ogo wodanka, 'Barjo, Mathaapinte innon goynsa konin thaapadhondettsi hanin giyonam waadadhana i nivade' i hamade."
58010008	Birayse yiggin goynka imbhen "Marshanbee waani imintonbe, koqadhen waan wul marshanbee seesonam shiishana imbhen marshanbeam zagaatane; kankaar wozadhaatane" ki hamade.
58010009	Ogoraar "Hanin giyonam waadadhana i nivade" ki hamade. Ogo goynka Kiristoos lansonam woysana bironam ki shiishade.
58010010	Ogo Barjoyn giyondettsi Yesus Kiristoos bishin yinnonam kalaa goyt Barjona imbhen marsha hayayse kisa diydinka wo gazimbhade.
58010011	Gudulla wul rooroaka rooroaka Barjona marshan machadhen raqinte woyayse seesonam shiishana damimin marshanam maatite maatite keda mache.
58010012	Kiristoos seesonam shiishota Barjona imbhen rooro wul lay waadadhen marshanam kalaa goyt yinin imonsa budonte Barjosa mizaqinte ki dooqade.
58010013	Ogora kiam jibbaynaam kisa hayamon demente keam haydhenka yekka kaalite ki dahade.
58010014	Harrna hambhidianna, Barjona imbhen marsha kalaaka gazisadhaanaam rooro wulna gon maataana eena keam kinin hayonnane.
58010015	Manpas Gazanoar dhalqin ogosa wona koda tarje. Birayse
58010016	"Igina rooronasa budonte kembesana inin ardayno mallano yinne: Isa yigginam kesa woylaminte ida wode; kesa meskendaraar ida thaape" ko hamade.
58010017	Guttsayse "Kesa seesonbee siyon waadimanbeam keeda kaara os bhocchattine" ko hamade.
58010018	Igina seesona wulam shiishadhonsa budonte keeda kaara os seesonam shiishota imbhea marsha qolehe.
58010019	Ta keeda imbanaanato, Yesussa zombhinka gazan ooninsa Gazisadha Raqate wonin ardoadettsi hayamo wona imbhidine.
58010020	Wonin ardaynoar ishkadhon apalan goynka, hamintano yisa dembhinka wona kinin bulon haalin lay dehen goynkane.
58010021	Barjosa ooninte hayamoysa dahaa gebhi maataa gudul wosa daane.
58010022	Ogonante siyon meskera gazimbhana wosa woylamindar noqo yiithadhayse, wosa bishinamaar gazan noqonka shiidhayse, gonne hamayse wonin tiyon woylamin qajadhenka qothime qolmaka Barjokal wo theede.
58010023	"Yena imayda ime" wona hamaa gon hama kinin dohonna, ta wonin tarjensa qaabe haydhenam wocchinsayse wo yede.
58010024	Nashimmakkobee payya waadimabeka wonin doadettsi bhocchayse kinka kiam kiam wo qaymise.
58010025	Rooro wul kinka bukada kinka kiam kiam wonin wocchinsoadettsi, waani waani kenin dusondettsi wosa bukanam wo garabhoode. Kalonar Imbaa wontea Yesussa nivintan roorono konin yeskonam bhocchaate ogoam hayee.
58010026	Goninam wonin dhesonsa budonte nashayse seeso wo waadadhidianna, ta keeda kaara os seesonam shiishana Barjona imbhea marsha kala hattear qolehe.
58010027	Ta keeda shidhoono kurtunsen pirdinbee Barjosa banqin eenaam koqen kurtunsen nuunsa pirdinbeam kaalano bishne.
58010028	Muse yigginam garaanadar eedi lamaa way makkam kidar ke tarjanna, kina burqadhima kiam koda deesadhe.
58010029	Ta keeda Barjo Naasaam bagaa, kanka yiam gazisadhon mallansa zombhinam pootima yerdettsi paydaa, Barjo wona sun kinin imon Manpas Gazanam iiraa hamin dohon pirdi tiya kiam ko zaske!
58010030	Harrna hambhidianna, "Halon maasea intane; inta zasken bazanam kashayda kashe" hamaam dhesooda dhese. Ogodettsi "Barjo Imbaa yisa eendar kida pirde" ki hamade.
58010031	Ogonante sadanka dahaa Barjosa aaninte dhambano kattsi kurtunsaynone.
58010032	Shaakan yena shaakonsa budonte thoothi gaale haapayse yenin darshaana igina birana rooronaam bhocchee.
58010033	Rooro kala kala yedi eensa birante irdhaate, osbee orabe haydhada yeam qacchadhidine. Rooro kala kala ogodettsi gaale yindar yeskaana eenabesana kinka kalaa dayntaka yedi gaale haapidine.
58010034	Dhaxadhaanana ye burqadhade. Yedi kalon agen, rooro wulna yesa kayma koymonin cecinte dohonam yenin dhesonna, yesa koymonam yekalanka sardhenka wozaka ye darshade.
58010035	Ta keeda gebhon bazanam kanka yenin haapenna kurtumbhima wocchimbhenam gareebhode.
58010036	Barjoyn giyonam hayayse, "yena imayda ime" kinin hamonam tiyana darshintaka wocchimbha yeam koda zaske.
58010037	Harrna hambhidianna, "Nivota dahaa likka roorosa budonte kida nive, kappehe.
58010038	Isa birante tipa maataa ea idar woylamin qajintaka sadanam kida haape; os budoka ki yivina inta kanka wozadhattine" hamayse thaapadhidine.
58010039	Wodiar dhaqana Barjodar woylamin qajayna eenakalankane; os budoka yivayse kayayna eenakalankatehe.
58011001	Barjodar woylam qajinta hamintano qaabe hayayse wonin kaalayna yerraam gon wonin haapaadettsi hayayse tiyntabee wonin haapimina yerraam wonin haapaadettsi hayayse paydabene.
58011002	Eena birana Barjokal kenin shawkadhoono Barjodar woylamin kenin qajonnane.
58011003	Yer wul Barjo upsika konin pijadhonam wonin dhesayno Barjodar woylamin qajidinkane; ogonante haapadhayno yerro haapadhimina yerraka ashkadhonam dhesooda dhese.
58011004	Aabeel Qaaveelsa marshandara sagi maaton marsha Barjona kinin imoono Barjodar woylamin qajidinkane. Barjo Aabeelsa marshanam wozaka kinin tiyenka Aabeel tipa kinin maatonam kina ko tarjadhade; Aabeel ki diyaakaar Barjodar woylamin kisa qajintano ta koka yekka giidhite ko dahade.
58011005	Henookdar dembhi yeskoamadettsi tura cecindar kiam tiidhoono Barjodar woylamin kisa qajidinkane; Barjo kiam kinin tiyonna haapadhadehe. Harrna hambhidianna, kiam tiidhonsa birayse Barjoam kinin wozisoono kina giidhidine.
58011006	Barjodar woylamin qajima Barjoam wozisana dandimehe. Harrna hambhidianna, Barjokal theedea ea Barjo kinin dohonbee kiam zagayna eenana baza imea kinin dohonbeam gonne hamayse tiya kiam koda zaske.
58011007	Nohe akar haapadhaamon yerrana Barjoyn kina giyonna, Barjona kurtumbhaate oonin eena yinnaam dhacchana noqondar yiven gonngalanam kinin ashkoono Barjodar woylamin qajidinkane. Ogonante peendar dahaanadar pirdinam ki yeskisade; Barjodar woylamin qajidinka haapadhen tipamonam Barjo kina ki imade.
58011008	Abraam yivayse kinin tiyen peenam kinin tiyoadettsi Barjoyn kiam eelen wodanka, hamodar yinin yivenam yi dhesaammaar yivana ee kinin hamoono Barjodar woylamin qajidinkane.
58011009	Abraam Barjo "imayda ime" hamayse kinin giyonam yimbesana tiyayna Yisaaqbee Yayqoobbete eedi eedi peera nivaa maatayse apalan ooninte dahada Barjo imota kinin giyon peente kinin dohoono Barjodar woylamin qajidinkane.
58011010	Harrna hambhidianna, Barjo qaabayse kinin woyson rooro wul dehen katamanam kinin kaalonnane.
58011011	Saaraar "imayda ime" hamaa Barjo gon hama kinin dohonam yinin dhesonna, yisa levenka gecchoono maatayse adhima adhimino yi dahaakaar, konin sirmoono Barjodar woylamin qajidinkane.
58011012	Ogonante diyaa eedidettsi paydadhea agaa kalaa Abraamkalanka cecinsa wancodettsi thoothaanabee bazinsa gasante dohon shaamidettsi paydadhimina kisa muldha maataanabe ke adhadhade.
58011013	Igina wul Barjodar woylamin qajayse ke diyade. Barjo kena "imayda ime" kinin hamonam kedi haapadehe; ko dahaannaar pegeka shedayse yinin tiyaadettsi ke wozadhade. Peendarar chocchibee eedi peera nivaanabe yinin maatenam ke giyade.
58011014	Yin giyayna eena yina maaten peenam zagayna yinin maatenam keda dhee.
58011015	Ogo yinin uton peenam qaabidi yi hanna, gidir maatate yivana dama ke dame.
58011016	Keeda ogora sagi cecinngayn peenam keda anngardhe. Ogonante Barjo katama kena kinin ashkonna, "Wosa Barjoane" hamayse kiam kenin eelenka kidi ooshimbhehe.
58011017	Abraam taysate kinin shedadhon wodanka Yisaaqam Barjona imbhea marsha hayayse kinin imoono Barjodar woylamin qajidinkane. Barjo "imayda ime" kinin hamon upsinam tiyaa Abraam naasa yisa kalaam Barjona imbhea marsha hayayse imanane.
58011018	Ta keeda Barjo "Yisaaqra hasa muldhano koda ute" kina hamidine.
58011019	Abraam "Barjo Yisaaqam dembhira dhaasana dama ki dame" hamayse ki bhocchade. Ogora dembhira dhaabhadhensa kamsidettsi Yisaaqam pir ki haapade.
58011020	Yisaaq os birante maaten yerin goynsa Yayqoobbee Esawbena pathin kinin imoono Barjodar woylamin qajidinkane.
58011021	Yayqoob diyana yinin yeskenka Yoseep naana lamaanana pathin kinin imonbee koolindar keedhimayse Barjona kinin goodimonbe Barjodar woylamin qajidinkane.
58011022	Yoseep yisa dembhin rooroa yeskaysaka, Israveel eena Gibth peera kenin uten goynbee yisa lepin goynsa har haya keam zaskenbe kinin giyoono Barjodar woylamin qajidinkane.
58011023	Museam adhaana imbana kidi naasi payya kinin dohonam shedayse bitaasa dhalqinam kurtumbhima arpi makkamna kiam kenin aachoono Barjodar woylamin qajidinkane.
58011024	Muse yinin gebhonsa budonte Gibth peen bita Paaron naansa naasi yinin hambhenam kinin ee hamaammo Barjodar woylamin qajidinkane.
58011025	Ogonante Muse likka wodana seesonka haapadhen wozandara sagi Barjo eenbesana kinka gaalen haapintanam ki kamade.
58011026	Os birante yinin tiyen bazanam yinin haaponna Gibth peente dohon koymondara Barjoyn qadhaa Kiristoosna hamayse bagadhintano kattsi wodimmakko konin dohonam ki bhocchade.
58011027	Muse bitaasa wacimenam kurtumbhima Gibth peera kinin utoono Barjodar woylamin qajidinkane. Haapadhima Barjoam yinin haapaadettsi bhocchayse ki wocchimbhade.
58011028	Birana naanaam deesea Barjosa gaana Israveel eenasa birana naanaam kinin kaamoamadettsi hamayse, Paasikan bavaalinsa sharqanbee zombhin kerindar yiithadhen sharqanbeam kinin waadadhoono Barjodar woylamin qajidinkane.
58011029	Israveel eena pee wocchidar yinin yivendettsi Ertera bazindara kenin sagoono Barjodar woylamin qajidinkane; Gibth eena sagota kenin hayenka noqono ke wulam ko itsade.
58011030	Israveel eena Iyarko kerminsa gasanka rooro tobbhaa kenin shironsa budonte kerminin yiipoono Barjodar woylamin kesa qajidinkane.
58011031	Sharmucimakkon waadadhayno Revaab peen doyaynaam payyamoka yisa ooninte keam konin tiyonna, Barjona ee hamiminabesana yinin diyerra konin dhaqoono Barjodar woylamin kosa qajidinkane.
58011032	Ta keeda hariy giyo? Gedoonbee, Baraaqbee, Somsombee, Yoptaahebee, Dawtbee, Saameelbee, Barjokala qansayse eenna giyaynabe goynsa inin giyoamadettsi woda ina ko tokade.
58011033	Kedi Barjodar woylamin yinin qajonna binnaam ke bashade; tipamoka eenam ke wottsade; kena imbhon qaabe yindar haydhenam ke haapade; zobonsa aponam ke diithade;
58011034	nuunsa kantanam ke diskade; halpankalankaar ke dhaqade; yisa qajera ke wocchimbhade; banqin yinin kansenka kantaka dahaana eena ke maatade; een peera banqin kanso nivaanaam ke oytade.
58011035	Maana yisa diyaana eedanaam dembhira kenin dhaabhenka ke haapade. Waani eenoar sagi dayntanam haapana dembhira dhaabhadhenam bhocchayse yinin diyenka yekka gaale ko tiyade; dhaxira koam buldhenam nashadehe.
58011036	Waani eenoar eensa yiigi yer maatayse ko qandhade; waani eenam sansalaka dhaxayse dhaxin ooninte keam ko dhabadhade;
58011037	seenika paxate keam ko deesadhade; magazka lamaadar keam ko taxadhade; halpaka keam ko deesadhade; yaatibee qolebesa eebhe qaadhayse yaayte ke dahade; qambhibee oytate yiam yittsadhaana maatayse gaalite ke dahade.
58011038	Darantebee, dhukandarbee, seenin qoopan dementebee, oolon iintebe yaayte ke dahade. Ogo goynka peeno kenin dehea payya raq kena maatayse haapadhadehe.
58011039	Igina wul Barjodar woylamin kenin qajonna Barjoka shawkadhaana ke maataakaar, Barjo "imayda ime" kinin hamonam akar kedi haapadehe.
58011040	Barjo wona kalon agen yerinam kinin qaabonna ogonante kedi wombesana kinka gon eedi keda maate; yimal bishtehe.
58012001	Ta keeda polodettsi wosa gasante woam karaana igina wul wosa tarjana kenin dohonna, wodiar baske wodar maataana yerra wulbee woam zaanidettsi yeden seesonbeam wodara marayse wosa birante dohon gobenam darshintaka wocchimbhayse wo gobe.
58012002	Wonin gobaynoar Barjodar woylamin wonin qajensa birabee maccheabe maataa Yesusam shedintakane. Kidi os birante haapadhen wozan goynka ooshinsen gaalenam hamin ko dahaakaar paydima masqalindar dembhinam darshayse Barjosa bitamon borkotonsa mizaqimbar ki dooqade.
58012003	Ta keeda yenin boosimbhoamadettsibee kanka wozadhanamaar yenin garoamadettsibe seeson eena wulsa jibbintanam darshaa Yesusam bhocchee.
58012004	Yedi seesonbesana kinka mashimada zombhi yenin laalenka yekka siyane hameetene.
58012005	Barjo yisa naasidettsi hayayse yeam kinin kiilonam yedi walidine: "Inaane, Barjoyn haam qanenka toskaabhode; haam kinin wacimenka kanka wozadhanam garaabhode.
58012006	Harrna hambhidianna, Barjo yinin nasheam kida qane; naasidettsi yisa hayayse yinin shedeam kida dhabshe" hamayse ko thaapadhade.
58012007	Barjo yisa naasidettsi yeam hayayse kinin paydenna kinin qanenka darshee. Imbaanin qanima naasi daaw?
58012008	Kisa naasi maataana wulin tiyen wacimenam ye tiymina imba yisa qolmina naana yeda maate, kisa naasi maatattene.
58012009	Tapir wo wulam wacimayna woam adhaana wosa imbana daane; keam gobshooda gobshe. Ta keeda sadaka daana manpasin goynka wosa Imba maataana kalon ee hamano hamin ko woam zaskimine?
58012010	Kedi payya maatayse kena haapadhondettsi, likka wodana woam ke wacimade; kidiar kisa gazamonam kashimayna wonin doadettsi wona agen yerinna woam kida wace.
58012011	Wacime wul eediam bucchea koda maate, wozisea maatehe; budobar koam dusaana eenana payyamoysa iir thoothoono tipamoka waadadhadhen gonin waadimanam kena koda hapse.
58012012	Ogonante qajadhaana yesa annabee buqonabeam wocchinsee.
58012013	Wobo maataana kenin paashoadettsi, kalon kenin woboamadettsi yesa roonna agea goyti ashkee.
58012014	Eedi wulbesana payyamoka doota zagee; gazamoka daana wocchimbhee. Harrna hambhidianna, gazamo qolma hayyear Imbaa Barjoam haapehe.
58012015	Yekalanka hayyear Barjosa sunin imintonkalanka kinin shidhoamadettsi, pir thaqima caaci yesa shaarinte baqalayse yeam galshada thoothin eenam konin minngisoamadettsi mete yesaam gishee.
58012016	Sharmucimakkon hayea eedi way taaki yinin itsen galanna hamayse yisa toydamonam shanshaa Esawdettsi Barjoam gobshima eedi haapadhoamadettsi mete yesaam gishee.
58012017	Ogosa budonte Esaw pathinam tiyana kinin zagen wodanka ogo pathinam kinin mardhonam yedi dheseeda dhese. Eepada wocchimbhayse ki zagaakaar biron wobon qaabon yinnonam goyti hamaakaar ashkana damadehe.
58012018	Yedi aanka kaamana dandimen nuunka aten Siina dhukankal yeskeetene; liilonbee, thipanbee, saylenbekal,
58012019	thurumbansa upsinkal way Barjoyn giyen upsinkal yedi yeskeetene. Upsin ogoam qansaana eena "Keeda kaara os upsi ab wona ko giidhabhoode" hamada miskan ke yedade.
58012020	Harrna hambhidianna, "Qole hattear dhukanam kaamidi ko hanna seenika paxate ko deesadhe" hamen dhalqinin kedar dethonna kedi baskana damadehe.
58012021	Musear "Kattsi kurtumbhayse gibazaybhe" kinin hamenka yekka haapadhayno yerro kattsi kurtunsea ko maatade.
58012022	Yenin yeskoono Thiyoon dhukankalbee lay dehea Barjosa katama maaton cecin Yerusaalemkalbene. Wozadhaate bukaana thoothi shiika paydadhayna Barjosa gaananakal yedi theedidine.
